Buena Vista Games
Square Enix
Kingdom Hearts II
The words rush the screen and the camera moves through them. Fade in to Sora standing at a crossroads. More words appear on the screen

xml.sp: Sora A scattered dream that's like a far-off memory. A far-off memory that's like a scattered dream. I want to line the pieces up--yours and mine.

cutscene.desc: Kairi sits on the Destiny Islands beach, making a charm of thalassa shells. A shell is washed away in the water. Sora, Kairi, and Riku watch the sunset, dreaming of other worlds. Kairi, Riku, and eventually Destiny Islands itself disappears with the wind. Sora jumps off the paopu tree and lands at the Rising Falls in Hollow Bastion with Donald and Goofy. Sora jumps up the platforms, defeating Shadow Heartless. He sees Kairi lying in the Grand Hall of the castle and runs to her. He kneels down beside her and holds her. He turns his head and sees Riku, who turns around and holds out his hand to Sora. A large wave comes up behind him, and Sora appears on Destiny Islands. He runs to Riku with his Keyblade. In the Grand Hall, Sora and Riku's blades clash. Sora spins to hits him, but he leaps into the air. Pieces fly off him as he falls near the entrance to the Dark Depths, revealing him as Ansem. Sora leaps into the air and slams down his Keyblade. The door to Kingdom Hearts opens and light pours out. Ansem shields his eyes with his arm. Riku makes a promise to Sora as the door closes. Sora's heart is opened by the Keyblade, and the princesses' hearts are released. Sora holds Kairi close. Kairi stands on Destiny Islands staring out at the water. Day turns into night and lights fall around Kairi as she watches Sora leave. Kairi stands again at the water, but she is now older. Cross to Naminé, who's drawing in Castle Oblivion. The spiral stairs become reality and Sora, Donald, and Goofy run up them fighting Heartless. Goofy smashes one with his shield. Donald performs Thunder. Sora sees DiZ and a figure in black through the blue smoke. A white hall forms around them and Sora finds himself alone, facing down Marluxia, who smirks. Sora runs forward. Marluxia swipes with his scythe. Sora flies forward, dodging another swing from the scythe. Riku leaps backwards, away from a blast from Ansem, catching himself and running forward. Sora and Riku exchange blocks and blows with Marluxia and Ansem. Sora throws his Keyblade at Marluxia, who stops it with his scythe. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run up through Castle Oblivion's spiral stairs as Riku and Mickey descend them. As Naminé is drawing, Sora enters the room. On Naminé's pad is a drawing of Sora inside a capsule. Sora looks down and a capsule blasts up and envelops him. He looks helpless at a sad Naminé. Sora starts to fall. He soars across the water to Destiny Islands. Naminé closes her sketchbook on a picture of a sleeping Sora. Sora, Kairi, and Riku lie hand in hand upon the beach. Roxas falls down through the water. He wakes up and lands on hard ground. He looks around warily but sees nothing. He steps forward, and covers his face as hundreds of birds fly out of a bright light, revealing a platform with Sora adorned on it. Roxas watches as the birds fly away. At a dark ocean beach, two people in black coats meet, one sitting on a rock overlooking the beach

xml.sp: ?????? You have arrived. I've been to see him... He looks a lot like you.
????? Who are you?
?????? I'm what's left. Or... Maybe I'm all there ever was.
????? I meant your name.
?????? My name is of no importance. What about you? Do you remember your true name?
????? My true name...is...

cutscene.desc: Sora's memories play through his head

xml.sp: Kairi Sora.

cutscene.desc: Sora awakens on the Destiny Islands, and yawns

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Kairi giggles

xml.sp: Sora Give me a break, Kai--!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Riku race on the beach

xml.sp: Riku Giving up already?

cutscene.desc: The three overlook the ocean at twilight

xml.sp: Riku If there are any other worlds out there, why did we end up on this one?

cutscene.desc: Sora gazes at his chalk drawing of him and Kairi in the Secret Place

xml.sp: ????? This world has been connected.

cutscene.desc: Sora gets up in distress.

xml.sp: Sora Wh-who's there?
????? Tied to the darkness...

cutscene.desc: Sora and Kairi watch the ocean on the dock

xml.sp: Kairi Sora, don't ever change.
Riku The door has opened...

cutscene.desc: Riku offers his outstretched hand to Sora. Sora runs to him but is stopped by darkness

xml.sp: Sora What?

cutscene.desc: Sora stands and faces Darkside

xml.sp: ????? You understand nothing.

cutscene.desc: The door behind Kairi in the Secret Place blows her towards Sora, who readies to catch her

xml.sp: Kairi So...ra...

cutscene.desc: Kairi vanishes as Sora catches her. Sora is blown out of the tunnel. We are brought back to a morning view of a boy's room. The blond-haired Roxas sits up on his bed, after waking up

xml.sp: Roxas Another dream about him...

cutscene.desc: Roxas opens the window and looks out on the town as the train station bells ring in the morning air. The logo of Twilight Town appears on the screen as the train passes by in the background. Fade to The Usual Place, where the train passes on the tracks overhead. Hayner, Olette, and Pence are enjoying conversation, while Roxas sits thinking. The words 'The 1st Day' appear on the screen

xml.sp: Hayner Man, doesn't that tick you off?
Pence Yeah, that's just wrong.
Olette Seifer's gone too far this time.

cutscene.desc: They look over at Roxas, who only nods. Hayner jumps off his seat

xml.sp: Hayner I mean, it's true that stuff's been stolen around town. And we've got a score to settle with Seifer and everything. So if he wants to think we did it, I can't really blame him. See...that's not what really bugs me. What really bugs me is that he's goin' around tellin' everybody we're the thieves! Now the whole town and their mothers are treating us like the Klepto Club! Have you ever been this ticked off before in your life? 'Cause I haven't. Nuh-uh, never. Now...what to do.

cutscene.desc: Olette, not knowing what to say, looks over at Roxas, who shrugs

xml.sp: Roxas Uh...well... We could find the real thieves. That would set the record straight.
Pence Hey that sounds fun!
Hayner What about Seifer?

cutscene.desc: Roxas stands up and Hayner crosses his arms

xml.sp: Roxas First, we gotta clear our names. Once we find the real culprit, everyone will get off our backs.

cutscene.desc: Hayner slightly growls

xml.sp: Pence Oh no! They're gone!

cutscene.desc: They look and see that Pence is holding a camera

xml.sp: Pence Our ---- are gone!

cutscene.desc: Pence puts a hand to his throat at his inability to say 'photos'

xml.sp: Pence What?
Hayner All our ------, gone? Huh?

cutscene.desc: Hayner does the same

xml.sp: Olette Huh? You can't say -------? Why not?
Pence But you do understand what I'm saying, right? Our ------ are gone!
Roxas Stolen... And not just the ------. The word ------! They stole it too!
Hayner What kinda thief is that? Seifer could never have pulled that off.
Roxas Yeah!
Hayner All right, time for some recon!

cutscene.desc: Hayner, Olette, and Pence run off. Roxas begins to follow, then becomes dizzy

xml.sp: Roxas Huh?

cutscene.desc: Roxas falls and blacks out

xml.sp: DiZ His heart is returning. Doubtless he'll awaken very soon.

cutscene.desc: Roxas wakes up on the ground and stands up, dusting himself off

xml.sp: Roxas Huh?

cutscene.desc: Olette returns

xml.sp: Olette Roxas, come on.

cutscene.desc: Roxas nods. Roxas catches up to the group in the Market Street: Tram Common and Hayner spots him

xml.sp: Hayner Over here!

cutscene.desc: Roxas approaches his friends in front of the Armor Shop

xml.sp: Pence Let's get this investigation underway.
Storekeeper Yo, Roxas. Never thought you'd do such a rotten thing...
Roxas We didn't steal anything, all right?
Storekeeper I'd like to believe you, but... Who else would steal that stuff?
Roxas What stuff?
Storekeeper As if you didn't know. Hey, I'm not gonna tell you. Go ask at the accessory shop.

cutscene.desc: The group turns around and sees the accessory shop

xml.sp: Hayner Go on, Roxas--- ask her.

cutscene.desc: Roxas speaks to the Accessory Shop owner

xml.sp: Owner Oh, it's you, Roxas... Please don't let me down. You used to be one of my favorite customers.
Roxas I'm not a thief!
Owner Okay...
Roxas It's no fun having everyone suspecting me, ya know.
Owner Then you've got to find a way to clear your name. The woman at the candy shop is pretty disappointed, too.

cutscene.desc: The four of them look to the candy shop

xml.sp: Woman Roxas? Have you seen my cat around?
Roxas Er...

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks up and sees the cat on the awning above them. Roxas retrieves the cat

xml.sp: Woman Thank you, Roxas.
Roxas Did they steal something from you, too?
Woman Oh, my, yes. Something important.
Roxas Just so you know, we didn't do it.
Woman I believe you.
Roxas Thanks for that, ma'am. So what did they take from you?
Woman My ------. My precious ------.
Hayner Looks like the culprit is going around stealing ------. And not just ------, but the word ------, too.
Pence This isn't your average thief...
Olette I wonder if Seifer would know anything about this.
Roxas We gotta talk to him. C'mon, to the sandlot!

cutscene.desc: The four run to the Sandlot, where they find Vivi, Rai, and Fuu talking. Vivi notices them and stops, making them turn around

xml.sp: Fuu Thieves.
Rai That was low, y'know!

cutscene.desc: Vivi shakes her hat

xml.sp: Hayner Oh yeah?

cutscene.desc: Seifer walks in

xml.sp: Seifer Nice comeback there, blondie.
Hayner What'd you say!?
Seifer You can give us back the ------ now.
Rai Yeah! You're the only ones who would take it, y'know?
Seifer That was undeniable proof that we totally owned you lamers. So what did you do? Burn it? Ha, not that we need some ------ to prove that you're losers.
Fuu Replay!
Seifer laughs Now you're talking!

cutscene.desc: Seifer, Vivi, Fuu, and Rai get ready to fight. So does Hayner

xml.sp: Seifer I guess if you get on your knees and beg, maybe I'll let it slide.

cutscene.desc: Roxas moves closer to the gang, who all laugh at him. Seifer crosses his arms. Roxas moves to kneel down

xml.sp: Hayner Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Roxas chooses the long battling sword with the strong handle. Roxas and Seifer prepare to duel

xml.sp: Pence Roxas, focus!
Seifer Kneel, loser!

cutscene.desc: Roxas knocks Seifer around a few times

xml.sp: Seifer Come on... quit playin' around and fight!

cutscene.desc: Roxas proceeds to defeat Seifer, much to Seifer's annoyance. Rai and Fuu move to guard Seifer

xml.sp: Rai Seifer's not feelin' so hot, y'know!
Fuu Tournament decides.

cutscene.desc: Pence gets out his camera to take a picture of Roxas. He gives him the thumbs up when a white Dusk appears out of nowhere and steals the camera. The Dusk flees toward the Market Street: Tram Common

xml.sp: Hayner What was that?
Olette The thief!

cutscene.desc: The three race after the Dusk. Roxas follows it through the hole in the Market Street: Tram Common wall and ends up in the Woods. The Dusk continues through the forest, dancing around the trees as if it wanted Roxas to follow it. Roxas follows and ends up outside the Old Mansion. He approaches the Dusk. Words appear in Roxas's head

xml.sp: ???? We have come for you, my liege.
Roxas Huh?

cutscene.desc: The mouth zipper of the Dusk opens and Roxas attacks. His sword however does nothing to inflict the Dusk

xml.sp: Roxas It's no use...

cutscene.desc: The sword in his hand swirls with data

xml.sp: Roxas What?

cutscene.desc: The sword turns into the Keyblade

xml.sp: Roxas What...what is this thing?

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks from the Dusk to the Keyblade and decides to try again. This time, he succeeds and the Dusk vanishes, dropping the pictures from the camera. The Keyblade in Roxas's hand disappears. Roxas's picks up the pictures and returns to the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Hayner What's this?
Roxas I was his first customer after he took over the shop. So we took a picture together.
Olette It's a really nice photo. Oh...!
Pence Hey! You just said photo!
Hayner So, Roxas--tell us about the picture thief.
Roxas Not much to say. The pictures were just lying there.
Hayner Then how do we prove we weren't the ones who took 'em?

cutscene.desc: Hayner spots the next picture and chuckles

xml.sp: Hayner It's a girl...
Olette You look happy, Roxas.
Roxas Do not.
Pence So, like, anybody else notice that all the stolen pictures are of Roxas?
Olette Ohh. So that's why everyone thought it was us.
Hayner You mean Seifer didn't go around accusing us after all?
Roxas Are they really all of me?
Pence Yep.

cutscene.desc: Pence holds out the picture in his hand

xml.sp: Pence See?
Olette Look!
Pence Right? Every single one. Wouldn't it be weird if the thief wanted to steal the real Roxas or something?
Hayner C'mon, get serious. Why would anyone wanna steal a bonehead like Roxas?
Roxas Oh, thanks!

cutscene.desc: The four friends laugh as the train station bells ring and the train passes overhead. They all look up at the tracks. Hayner, Pence, and Olette leave the Usual Spot, Olette waving. Roxas leaves after a bit. He holds out his hand to block the sun from his eyes and he hears a voice

xml.sp: Sora Where...am I?
Roxas Who's there?
Sora Who are you?

cutscene.desc: The screen becomes scrambled

xml.sp: Computer Restoration at 12%.

cutscene.desc: Someone in a black coat walks up to DiZ, who is sitting at a computer desk in front of many lit screens

xml.sp: DiZ Organization miscreants... They've found us.
????? But...why would the Nobodies steal photographs?
DiZ Both are nothing but data to them. The fools could never tell the difference. We are running out of time. Naminé must make haste.

cutscene.desc: Sora's memories continue to race through his mind. Sora is awoken by Pluto in the back alleyway of Traverse Town

xml.sp: Sora Oh...Where am I?

cutscene.desc: Sora races into the Second District

xml.sp: Sora What happened to my home? My island?

cutscene.desc: Shadows appear around him and he readies his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Riku! Kai--!

cutscene.desc: A static image of Kairi appears. Sora is confronted by Leon in the First District

xml.sp: Sora Who are you?
Leon They will come at you out of nowhere, as long as you continue to wield the Keyblade.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy are knocked out of the sky and onto Sora in the Third District

xml.sp: Goofy Hey, why don't you come with us? We can go to other worlds on our vessel.
Leon Sora, go with them. Especially if you want to find your friends.
Donald Donald Duck.
Goofy Name's Goofy.
Sora I'm Sora. I'll go with you guys.
Leon The Heartless have great fear of the Keyblade.
Aerith That's right. The Keyblade.
Sora So...this is the key?
Jafar But the boy is a problem. He found one of the Keyholes.

cutscene.desc: Sora locks the keyhole in Agrabah. Roxas wakes up in his room

xml.sp: Roxas A key...blade?

cutscene.desc: The words 'The 2nd Day' appear on the screen. Roxas walks to the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Roxas A Keyblade...

cutscene.desc: Roxas spots a stick leaning against a wall and swings it around like it's a fighting weapon

xml.sp: Roxas What was that about?

cutscene.desc: He tosses it over his head and it hits someone wearing a black cloak in the chest

xml.sp: Roxas Oh!

cutscene.desc: The person walks away down the steps

xml.sp: Roxas Sorry... about that...

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks into the Usual Spot and sees Hayner, Pence, and Olette already sitting enjoying some sea-salt ice cream. Hayner offers Roxas some

xml.sp: Roxas Thanks.
Pence Do you guys think we'll always be together like this?

cutscene.desc: Roxas sits down

xml.sp: Olette I sure hope so.
Hayner Huh? Where did that come from?
Pence Oh, well, you know. Just thinking out loud.
Hayner Well, I doubt we can be together forever. But isn't that what growing up's all about? What's important isn't how often we see each other, but how often we think about each other. Right?
Pence laughs Get that off a fortune cookie?
Hayner That's it, no more ice cream for you! Man, today's turning out to be a drag.
Olette Maybe because of yesterday's memory thief.
Hayner Nuh-uh. You know what it is? We don't want summer vacation to be over. That's all! So, how about this?

cutscene.desc: Hayner stand up

xml.sp: Hayner We all go to the beach! And why do we go to the beach? Because we haven't gone once this entire vacation! Blue seas! Blue skies! Let's just get on the train and go!

cutscene.desc: The rest of the group say nothing but stand up as well

xml.sp: Hayner No? Aw, c'mon!
Roxas Maybe you forgot, but we're broke.
Hayner Maybe you forgot I'm smart!

cutscene.desc: The group, except Roxas runs out of the Usual Spot. Pence runs back in

xml.sp: Pence Hurry up, Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Pence leaves again. Roxas meets up with them in the Back Alley outside the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Hayner We're going to Market Street!

cutscene.desc: The group leaves to Market Street: Station Heights. Roxas finds them reading a poster on the wall about The Struggle

xml.sp: Hayner Just two days to go. You and I have to make the finals! That way, no matter who wins, the four of us split the prize!
Roxas Okay, you're on.
Pence You two are gonna clean up!
Olette Go get 'em!

cutscene.desc: Roxas and Hayner make a sign of friendship with their arms

xml.sp: Hayner It's a promise! Now, let's get down to business. One ticket to the beach is 900 munny. How much for four of us?
Olette 3600 munny.
Hayner And 300 each to spend there. What's that for all of us?
Olette 1200 munny. A total of 4800 munny.

cutscene.desc: Pence puts his hands behind his head

xml.sp: Roxas To spend on what?
Hayner Pretzels, of course! What else is there?
Roxas Well, there's always watermelon.
Hayner Too pricey. They're, like, 2000 munny apiece.
Roxas Pretzels it is.
Hayner So, where were we?
Olette We need 4800 munny altogether. But all we have is...
Pence I've got 800.
Olette ...650.
Roxas 150. Sorry.
Hayner That's 1600 munny! We need another 3200. Let's find ourselves some odd jobs and earn some dough! We have 'til the train leaves to earn 800 munny each!

cutscene.desc: Hayner runs off

xml.sp: Hayner Meet at the station with cash in hand!
Pence Didn't he say he had it covered?
Roxas Whatever. Those pretzels are sounding pretty good.

cutscene.desc: Roxas helps out with some odd jobs and meets the other three at the Station Plaza

xml.sp: Hayner All present and accounted for?
Pence What've we got?
Roxas Let's see...

cutscene.desc: Roxas pulls out some munny

xml.sp: Roxas Just this.
Hayner Good job.
Olette Nice work, everyone. Added to what we started with, we now have...

cutscene.desc: Olette shows them the munny pouch she made with the munny inside it

xml.sp: Olette Tada! 5000 munny!
Hayner Sweet!

cutscene.desc: Olette gives the bag to Roxas

xml.sp: Olette Let's get tickets!

cutscene.desc: Olette and Pence run ahead into the station

xml.sp: Hayner We can't be together forever... so we'd better make the time we do have something to remember.
Roxas Huh?
Hayner Gotcha!

cutscene.desc: Hayner jokingly punches Roxas in the stomach and joins the other three. Roxas follows but an invisible something makes him trip

xml.sp: Roxas Whoa!

cutscene.desc: A small stick drops to the ground. Hayner, Pence, and Olette stop. Hayner steps back a bit down the stairs. Roxas grunts slightly coming to his knees and touching his lip. He sees someone in a black cloak standing beside him

xml.sp: Roxas Huh?

cutscene.desc: The person picks Roxas off the ground and whispers something to him

xml.sp: Roxas What?
Hayner Roxas! Three minutes!
Roxas Okay!

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks back to the figure, who is gone. He catches up to his friends in the station. Hayner bends at the teller and holds out four fingers

xml.sp: Hayner Four students!
Pence Roxas, the money!
Roxas Wait--

cutscene.desc: Roxas searches himself for where he put the munny pouch

xml.sp: Roxas No!
Hayner Huh?

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks back out toward the plaza and remembers the cloaked person picking him up

xml.sp: Roxas He took it!

cutscene.desc: Roxas begins to run outside into the plaza

xml.sp: Olette Where are you going?
Roxas Remember when I fell? I had the money before that. I bet that guy took it!
Hayner Guy?
Roxas He couldn't have gotten too far...
Hayner What are you talking about?

cutscene.desc: Hayner remembers Roxas outside getting himself up

xml.sp: Hayner There was no guy.

cutscene.desc: The train station bell wakes Roxas up

xml.sp: Roxas Huh? But he... There wasn't... Really?

cutscene.desc: The train whistle blows and they realize they've missed it

xml.sp: Pence Oh boy...
Roxas There wasn't anyone...there?

cutscene.desc: Hayner, Pence, and Olette leave the Station. Later, the four are eating sea-salt ice cream on the clock tower ledge. The train is moving in the background, while Roxas sits and thinks, his ice cream dripping

xml.sp: Olette It's melting.
Roxas Sorry.
Hayner Cheer up already!
Roxas That was definitely weird, though.
Olette Strange.
Hayner You said it.
Roxas to himself Can you feel Sora?

cutscene.desc: Roxas remembers what the figure whispered to him

xml.sp: ????? Can you feel Sora?

cutscene.desc: The screen becomes scrambled

xml.sp: Computer Restoration at 28%.
DiZ Naminé, hurry.

cutscene.desc: The cloaked man juggles the munny pouch while DiZ remains at the computer screens

xml.sp: ????? Is it really that hard to make a beach?
DiZ We'd be giving the enemy another entry point.
????? And this?

cutscene.desc: He holds out the munny pouch

xml.sp: DiZ We can always buy some sea-salt ice cream.

cutscene.desc: DiZ laughs. The figure juggles the pouch again

xml.sp: DiZ Objects from that town must be kept out of the real world. You can delete that.

cutscene.desc: Sora remembers several events from his journey across worlds

xml.sp: King Triton As the key bearer, you must already know one must not meddle in the affairs of other worlds.
Ariel So many places I want to see... I know I'll get there someday.
Phil Thus, I do hereby dub thee junior heroes.
Donald Hey! What do you mean junior heroes?
Phil You rookies still don't understand what it takes to be a true hero.
Aladdin I...I wish... ...for your freedom, Genie.
Genie Al!

cutscene.desc: Genie is granted legs

xml.sp: Jack Sally, why didn't I listen to you?
Sally Don't feel bad, Jack. We'll come up with another plan for Halloween. Next time, we'll do it together.

cutscene.desc: Sora summons Mushu

xml.sp: Sora Power!
Mushu I am Mushu.
Riku Or are you too cool to play them now that you have the Keyblade?
Sora Riku! What are you doing here?

xml.sp: Sora Did you find her?

cutscene.desc: Sora's on the deck of Captain Hook's pirate ship

xml.sp: Sora I still can't believe it. I really flew. Wait 'til I tell Kai--.

cutscene.desc: Kairi's face flashes again

cutscene.desc: Tinkerbell floats before Sora. Cloud walks beside the group

xml.sp: Sora I'm searching, too.
Cloud For your light? Don't lose sight of it.
Piglet Sora, where are you going?
Sora I'm gonna go look for my friends. They're waiting for me.

cutscene.desc: Pooh waves goodbye and the other animals watch Sora leave

xml.sp: Sora Where are Donald and Goofy?
Riku Instead of worrying about them, you should be asking about her.

cutscene.desc: Kairi's face flashes again on the word 'her'. Sora locks Neverland. Sora slightly remembers Riku and Kairi, when their memories returned in Castle Oblivion. DiZ remains at his desktop. Naminé stands in front of the capsule in a white room. Roxas's consciousness resides with Naminé's

xml.sp: Roxas Who are you?

cutscene.desc: The girl turns around and smiles. Roxas wakes up in his room. Naminé is standing there, but disappears when he turns to look

xml.sp: Roxas Huh...?

cutscene.desc:
The words 'The 3rd Day' appear on the screen. Roxas walks into the Usual Spot and sees a letter on the couch
Meet at the station. Today's the day we hit the beach--and don't sweat about the munny! -- Hayner
Roxas rides to the Market Street: Station Heights and sees Pence and Olette

xml.sp: Roxas Hey.
Olette Morning.

cutscene.desc: The two freeze in midwalk

xml.sp: Roxas Huh...?

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs up to them but it suddenly stopped by Naminé

xml.sp: Naminé Hello, Roxas.
Roxas Uh... Hi... And you are...?

cutscene.desc: Naminé holds up a hand to quiet him

xml.sp: Naminé I wanted to meet you at least once.
Roxas Me?
Naminé Yes, you.

cutscene.desc: Roxas scratches his head and Naminé walks away. Pence and Olette unfreeze

xml.sp: Pence Olette dragged me along to go shopping.
Olette Hey, you wanna come with us?
Roxas Um, uhh, wait... did you just see that...

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks in the direction Naminé left

xml.sp: Pence He's stalling.
Olette Very well, then. We'll see you later, Roxas, okay?
Roxas Y-Yeah...

cutscene.desc: Olette and Pence leave
Roxas looks again

xml.sp: Roxas Did she go to that haunted mansion?

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs to the Tram Common and sees Naminé. He runs to the hole where the Woods are

xml.sp: Roxas Huh?

cutscene.desc: A dark cloud appears and a few Dusks come out of it and try to pull him in

xml.sp: Roxas Lemme go!

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs back to the Tram Common and the Dusks follow him. He runs into the Sandlot, catching the attention of Seifer, Fuu, Rai, and Vivi

xml.sp: Seifer Hey, chicken wuss.

cutscene.desc: Roxas stops as the Dusks enter

xml.sp: Fuu Who's that?

cutscene.desc: Fuu and Rai get in their fighting positions as Vivi runs away

xml.sp: Seifer I dunno, but they've already crossed the line. Find a weapon!

cutscene.desc: Roxas spots one of the battling swords and rolls to grab it. Roxas tries to fight the Dusks, but is thrown down, his weapon having no effect. He stands back up and notices that Seifer, Vivi, Fuu, and Rai are completely frozen in time

xml.sp: Roxas Not good...

cutscene.desc: The Dusks approach a weaponless Roxas

xml.sp: Naminé Roxas! Use the Keyblade!

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks up and sees Naminé on a building overlooking the Sandlot. A Dusk attacks Roxas, who blocks with his hands and is transported to the Station of Serenity on the blue Sora platform. A sword, shield, and staff appear in bursts of light. Roxas chooses, and the Keyblade appears in his hand. Dusks storm the platform and Roxas fights them. A treasure chest appears and he opens it. A mysterious door appears at the other edge of the platform. A bodiless voice seems to emanate from it

xml.sp: Voice Be careful. Beyond that door lies a completely different world. But don't be afraid.

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks toward the door

xml.sp: Voice Don't stop walking...

cutscene.desc: Roxas opens the door and ends up in the Station of Calling. He ascends the stained-glass stairs, fighting Dusks until he comes to another door. He enters the Station of Awakening and encounters Twilight Thorn. He fights Twilight Thorn and it falls on top of him. He is pulled into the darkness, but Naminé catches him and saves him. He finds himself in a white room standing before Naminé. Before he starts to speak, Naminé places a finger to her lips

xml.sp: Naminé My name is Naminé. Roxas... Do you remember your true name?

cutscene.desc: The same cloaked figure returns and picks Naminé up

xml.sp: ????? Say no more, Naminé.
Naminé But if no one tells him, Roxas will...
????? It's best he doesn't know the truth.
Roxas Hey! You're that pickpocket!

cutscene.desc: The man holds out his hand and conjures a dark portal behind Roxas. Roxas leaps away from it. The figure pushes him inside, and Roxas wakes up in the Sandlot

xml.sp: Rai Seifer, strike a pose, y'know?
Seifer How's this?
Rai That's totally perfect, y'know!

cutscene.desc: Roxas sees Fuu take a picture of a posing Seifer while Rai and Vivi stand around her. She is using Pence's camera

xml.sp: Rai How 'bout one more, y'know?

cutscene.desc: Roxas stands up

xml.sp: Roxas What's that for!?
Fuu Keepsake.
Rai Those freaks in the white jumpsuits are gone, y'know?
Fuu Cakewalk.
Roxas What were those things?
Seifer Outsiders, that's what.

cutscene.desc: Roxas shakes his head

xml.sp: Seifer And if they don't wise up to the rules around here, I might have to take disciplinary measure.
Rai Oh yeah, Seifer's always lookin' after the town, y'know?

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks over and sees that Olette, Hayner, and Pence have arrived. Hayner huffs off

xml.sp: Roxas Wait up!

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs to follow them

xml.sp: Seifer Hey! No chickening out of the tournament tomorrow!
Rai We'll be waitin', y'know?

cutscene.desc: Roxas arrives back at the Usual Spot where the three are already having sea-salt ice cream

xml.sp: Pence So...you hung out with Seifer's gang today?
Roxas N-no... It's not like that... Oh yeah! How was the beach? Wasn't that today?
Olette We didn't go. It wouldn't be the same without you, right?
Roxas ...Sorry. Hey...how 'bout we go tomorrow? We could get those pretzels and...
Hayner I promised I'd be somewhere.
Roxas Ohh... Oh!

cutscene.desc: Roxas remembers the events of the previous day

xml.sp: Hayner You and I have to make the finals! That way, no matter who wins, the four of us split the prize!
Roxas Okay, you're on.
Pence You two are gonna clean up!
Olette Go get 'em!

cutscene.desc: Roxas and Hayner make a sign of friendship with their arms

xml.sp: Hayner It's a promise!

cutscene.desc: Roxas waits for a response from Hayner

xml.sp: Hayner I'm outta here.

cutscene.desc: Hayner leaves. The screen becomes scrambled

xml.sp: Computer Restoration at 48%.

cutscene.desc: DiZ sits at the computer with the cloaked man standing behind him

xml.sp: ????? Was that Naminé made of data?
DiZ No. Naminé hijacked the data herself. Look what she's done now... She's totally beyond my control!

cutscene.desc: DiZ slams the desk with a fist

xml.sp: ????? Calm down.
DiZ It doesn't matter. As long as Naminé accomplishes her goal we needn't worry about what befalls Roxas.

cutscene.desc: Sora's memories continue to flood back. He floats toward the light, trying to grab young Kairi in the Hollow Bastion library

xml.sp: Riku It's up to me. Only the Keyblade master can open the secret door and change the world.

cutscene.desc: Riku takes the Keyblade from Sora in the Rising Falls

xml.sp: Goofy But I'm not gonna betray Sora, either.

cutscene.desc: Goofy protects Sora from a Dark Firaga of Riku's

xml.sp: Donald All for one and one for all.
Sora My friends are my power!

cutscene.desc: Sora reclaims the Keyblade

xml.sp: Beast So, your heart won this battle.

cutscene.desc: Sora passes right through a cloaked figure in Hollow Bastion. He blocks a large wave of blue energy from the man and sends it flying into the castle's mortar and stone

xml.sp: Riku It is I, Ansem, lead me into everlasting darkness!

cutscene.desc: Riku moves to strike Sora and release Kairi's heart

xml.sp: Kairi Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora has a flash of Kairi's face and he catches Riku's blow with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Forget it! There's no way you're taking Kairi's heart!

cutscene.desc: Sora releases Kairi's heart. Kairi saves Sora from the Heartless

xml.sp: Sora Kairi.

cutscene.desc: Sora sees Kairi smiling at him

xml.sp: Leon We may never meet again, but we'll never forget each other.
Aerith No matter where we are, our hearts will bring us together again.

cutscene.desc: Kairi gives Sora the Oathkeeper keychain

xml.sp: Kairi Take this. It's my lucky charm. Be sure to bring it back to me.
Sora Don't worry. I will.
Kairi Promise.

cutscene.desc: Sora seals the keyhole at Hollow Bastion

xml.sp: Kairi Don't ever forget. Wherever you go, I'm always with you.

cutscene.desc: Roxas wakes up and looks out his window

xml.sp: Roxas Right... Promise...

cutscene.desc: He moves as if striking with a Keyblade

xml.sp: Roxas What a mess...

cutscene.desc: He scratches his head. The words 'The 4th Day' appear on the screen. Later, Roxas runs out of the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Shopkeeper Hurry to the sandlot! You're gonna be late!

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs to the Sandlot, where many people have gathered to watch The Struggle

xml.sp: Pence Who you gonna root for?
Olette Both of them, silly.

cutscene.desc: Fireworks appear in the sky and the crowd cheers

xml.sp: Producer Ladies and gentlemen, Struggle-fiends of Twilight Town! It's time for summer's most sizzling clash! That's right! Today is the day for the Struggle and title match! Who will be the one to break through the ranks and take on our champion, Setzer!?
Rai Seifer, y'know!?
Producer And who will leave today as our new Struggle Champion!?
Olette & Pence Hayner! Roxas!
Fans Setzerrrrr!
Crowd Setzer! Setzer! Setzer! Setzer! Setzer!
Producer Yes, the crowd is fired up, so you know what comes next Let's...
Crowd STRUGGLE!

cutscene.desc: More fireworks are set off. The announcer gets off the stage for the commentator to begin

xml.sp: Announcer Hey, now. It's time to introduce today's combatants! The four bad boys who struggled their way through the preliminaries! Regular finalist and head of the Twilight Disciplinary Committee Seifer! Completely out of nowhere--who knew he'd make it so far this year? Vivi! An underground favorite and local attitude problem Hayner! It's his first trip to the finals! And Struggler number 4, who happens to be my absolute favorite customer Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Hayner looks to Roxas, who returns his gaze, but looks away solemnly

xml.sp: Announcer So--who will win this sweltering summer Struggle!? Who will take home the grand prize? The summa cum laude of Struggle--- the Four Crystal Trophy! AND...a chance to take on our defending champion, Setzer!

cutscene.desc: Setzer holds up the championship belt

xml.sp: Announcer It won't be long now, folks. I suggest our challengers go over the official Struggle Rules before we begin!

cutscene.desc: The challengers have a quick refresher of the rules. The tournament producer hands Roxas and Hayner each a battle sword and pats them on the shoulder. Hayner points the sword at Roxas, who looks unhappy

xml.sp: Roxas Hey... Sorry about yesterday.
Hayner What, you still worried about that? You need to learn to let that stuff go.
Roxas I've got a lot on my mind.
Hayner Sorry, man.

cutscene.desc: Roxas shakes his head

xml.sp: Hayner Wait, what am I sorry for?

cutscene.desc: He smiles, making Roxas smile as well. Olette and Pence stop their clapping to smirk at each other. Roxas readies for battle

xml.sp: Announcer Our first match of today's Struggle tournament will be between Roxas and his best friend Hayner!
Hayner Ready, Roxas?

cutscene.desc: Roxas and Hayner battle it out and Hayner loses

xml.sp: Announcer And the winner is Roxas!

cutscene.desc: The announcer raises Roxas's arm and Roxas waves to the crowd

xml.sp: Announcer Not even friendship will slow this kid down. And Hayner put up a great fight, too.

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs over to Hayner

xml.sp: Hayner I lost. Awww, I can't believe it!

cutscene.desc: Hayner stands up

xml.sp: Hayner I guess I taught you well.
Roxas I had a lot of fun fighting you.

cutscene.desc: Hayner smiles, then stops and crosses his arms

xml.sp: Hayner Yeah, well I didn't, wise guy.
Roxas Hey, let's find a way to cheer you up.
Hayner Nah, that's all right.

cutscene.desc: Hayner friendly punches Roxas's hand. He leaves and almost walks into Seifer coming up on stage

xml.sp: Seifer Out of the way.
Hayner You in a rush to lose?

cutscene.desc: Roxas is startled by the sudden appearance of Vivi by his side. Vivi looks up at him and giggles. Vivi and Seifer are alone on the stage

xml.sp: Seifer Don't mess with your elders.
Announcer Whew, just look at those sparks fly! I guess Seifer didn't expect to fight one of his own boys!

cutscene.desc: Seifer and Vivi face each other down. Then Vivi flies at Seifer, who jumps away with Vivi in pursuit

xml.sp: Hayner When did Vivi get so tough?

cutscene.desc: Roxas shrugs. After a few attempts at hitting one another, Seifer blocks Vivi's slashes and knocks Vivi away, dropping one of Vivi's orbs

xml.sp: Seifer You're mine!

cutscene.desc: He lunges for the orb when Vivi returns and knocks Seifer down

xml.sp: Announcer I-I'm not sure what just happened... Um...but...the winner is Vivi! In a positively blistering comeback!

cutscene.desc: Seifer sits up and shakes his head

xml.sp: Seifer That's not Vivi.
Roxas Huh?
Seifer Thrash 'im.

cutscene.desc: Seifer, Fuu, and Rai leave the Sandlot

xml.sp: Producer It looks like Seifer's withdrawn from the Struggle for third place.
Hayner So I'm in third now? Aw, baby!

cutscene.desc: The producer hands Roxas and Vivi each a battle sword

xml.sp: Producer Keep it clean, fellas.

cutscene.desc: Roxas and Vivi stare each other down as the Producer leaves the stage

xml.sp: Announcer And now, the match you've been waiting for Roxas vs. Vivi!

cutscene.desc: Roxas battles Vivi. As he goes in for one last strike, something stops him and Roxas notices that everything has frozen in time. Vivi suddenly turns into a Dusk, then more appear

xml.sp: Roxas Again!?

cutscene.desc: His sword turns into the Keyblade

xml.sp: Roxas Again...

cutscene.desc: Roxas fights the Dusks and wins, though he's tired. He's alerted by a cloaked man clapping behind him and turns around

xml.sp: ???? Roxas. All right. Fight fight fight.

cutscene.desc: The man walks in closer to Roxas

xml.sp: ???? You really don't remember? It's me. You know, Axel.

cutscene.desc: The man removes his hood, showing his flaming red hair

xml.sp: Roxas Axel?
Axel Talk about blank with a capital B. Man oh man, even the Dusks aren't gonna crack this one.

cutscene.desc: His chakram appear in flames and he catches them in his hands

xml.sp: Roxas Wait a sec, tell me what's going on!
Axel looking around This town is his creation, right? Which means we don't have time for a Q & A. You're coming with me, conscious or not. Then you'll hear the story.

cutscene.desc: Axel gets ready to fight. A strange presence flies around Roxas. Axel straightens up

xml.sp: Axel Uh-oh.

cutscene.desc: Roxas sighs and looks at the Keyblade. He throws it down in frustration

xml.sp: Roxas What's going ON!?

cutscene.desc: The Keyblade appears back in his hand with a flash of light

xml.sp: Axel Number 13. Roxas. The Keyblade's chosen one.

cutscene.desc: Axel readies to fight again

xml.sp: Roxas Okay, fine! You asked for it!
Axel That's more like it!

cutscene.desc: Roxas fights Axel

xml.sp: Axel Not bad, Roxas.

cutscene.desc: DiZ appears

xml.sp: Axel So it was you.

cutscene.desc: Axel sends his flaming chakram flying at DiZ, but with no impact

xml.sp: DiZ Roxas, this man speaks nonsense!
Axel Roxas, don't let him deceive you!
DiZ Roxas!
Axel Roxas!

cutscene.desc: The two men shouting his name get the best of him and Roxas holds his head in his hands

xml.sp: Roxas Hayner...Pence...Olette... Hayner! Pence! Olette!

cutscene.desc: The Struggle competition returns and the crowd is cheering once again at Roxas's defeat against Vivi

xml.sp: Announcer What? What just happened?
Vivi Huh? ...How did I get here?

cutscene.desc: Hayner, Olette, and Pence rush the stage

xml.sp: Olette Roxas!
Announcer Ladies and gentlemen, Roxas--our new top Struggler!

cutscene.desc: Hayner notices Roxas's a little distraught

xml.sp: Hayner Roxas?
Fans Setzeerrrr!
Crowd Setzer! Setzer! Setzer! Setzer! Setzer!

cutscene.desc: Setzer drinks up the attention

xml.sp: Olette Roxas! It's starting!
Producer You two, play fair now. You're at the top of the bracket.
Setzer There's only room for one up here.
Producer Well, may the best man win!

cutscene.desc: The producer walks offstage

xml.sp: Setzer Hey, Rucksack. How about you throw the match for me?
Hayner Roxas! Focus!

cutscene.desc: Roxas glares at Setzer

xml.sp: Setzer Let me win, and I'll make it worth your while.
Roxas Get real!
Announcer Roxas, our underdog hero, versus Setzer, our defending champion! The winner of this match will be the true champion! That's bragging rights for a whole year, folks!
Setzer Whatever you think is right, you're wrong. And that is a big mistake. My life's a chip in your pile. Time to ante up!

cutscene.desc: Roxas beats Setzer

xml.sp: Setzer I'm not supposed to lose!
Crowd Roxas! Roxas! Roxas! Roxas! Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Setzer walks offstage and points back to Roxas. Hayner, Pence, and Olette rush up to Roxas

xml.sp: Hayner Roxas!
Olette You did it!

cutscene.desc: Setzer turns around and leaves

xml.sp: Pence That was awesome, Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Roxas waves to the crowd. The producer presents him with the championship belt. Roxas holds it up and the crowd cheers. Later, on the ledge of the train station, Roxas sits with his friends, holding the crystal trophy. He takes off the yellow crystal and tosses it to Olette. He does the same with the red and green crystals, tossing them to Hayner and Pence. He takes out his own blue one and holds it up to the sun

xml.sp: Roxas As promised.

cutscene.desc: Pence also holds his out

xml.sp: Pence Thanks a ton, Roxas!
Hayner One more treasure for us to share.

cutscene.desc: Hayner holds his out. Olette follows suit

xml.sp: Olette I've got a present, too...for all of us.

cutscene.desc: She takes out four bars of sea-salt ice cream

xml.sp: Hayner Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Roxas stands up on the ledge and teeters on the edge. He loses his balance and falls as the screen flickers. On the Destiny Islands, Kairi walks down the path to the beach after school.

xml.sp: Selphie Kairi! Wait up!

cutscene.desc: Kairi stops and turns around as Selphie catches up to her

xml.sp: Selphie Hey, do you feel like going out to the island? Tidus and Wakka are all wrapped up in their ballgame and they won't go with me.
Kairi Not today, sorry.
Selphie Aw, why not?
Kairi Do you remember those boys who used to hang out with us?
Selphie Riku?
Kairi Yeah.
Selphie I wonder whatever happened to him. I sure miss him.
Kairi He's far away. But I know we'll see him again.
Selphie Sure. Of course we will.
Kairi And the other boy?
Selphie What other boy?

Kairi The one who was with Riku and me all the time---we played together on that island. His voice always used to be there...but now it's gone. I can't think of his face, or his name. I feel awful about it. So I told myself--I'm not going to the island until I remember everything about him.
Selphie Are you sure you didn't make him up?
Roxas Naminé?

cutscene.desc: Kairi gets a sudden headache while Roxas continues to fall off the clock tower

xml.sp: Roxas Naminé...? What's happening to me?
Kairi Who are you? And that's not my name. I'm Kairi.
Roxas Kairi... I know you. You're that girl he likes.
Kairi Who? Please, a name!
Roxas I'm Roxas.
Kairi Okay, Roxas, but can you tell me HIS name?
Sora You don't remember my name? Thanks a lot, Kairi! Okay, I guess I can give you a hint. Starts with an S!

cutscene.desc: Kairi wakes up on the ground

xml.sp: Selphie Are you okay?

cutscene.desc: Kairi nods. The two girls look to the island across the water. Kairi looks over at Selphie and smiles widely. She then runs to the beach. Selphie catches up

xml.sp: Selphie Kairi...?

cutscene.desc: Kairi places her bag down and lets loose a message in a bottle in the ocean

xml.sp: Selphie What's that?

Kairi A letter... I wrote it yesterday, to the boy I can't remember. I said that no matter where he is... I'll find him. One day. And when I stopped writing, I remembered we made a promise, something important. This letter is where it starts. I know it.
Selphie Wow... I hope he gets it.
Kairi He will. Starts with an S. Right, Sora?

cutscene.desc: The screen becomes scrambled

xml.sp: Computer Restoration at 79%.

cutscene.desc: DiZ continues to sit at the computer screens while the cloaked man juggles a blue crystal

xml.sp: DiZ His progress is astounding.
????? So what happened?

cutscene.desc: The man places the ball back into the munny pouch

xml.sp: DiZ Naminé's encounter with Roxas put his heart in contact with Kairi's. And that, in turn, affected Sora. You see?
????? Naminé?... She's a wonder.
DiZ She wasn't born like other Nobodies. She can interfere with the hearts and memories of Sora and those aligned with him.
????? But whose Nobody is she?
DiZ I could tell you... But first, perhaps you could tell me your true name?

cutscene.desc: The cloaked man revealed his face from under his hood

xml.sp: ????? It's Ansem.

cutscene.desc: DiZ laughs

xml.sp: DiZ It's an honor, Ansem!

cutscene.desc: A white room is revealed. It is circular, with a stone floor and tall white chairs of differing heights. Axel is seated with two cloaked figures, one sitting on the topmost chair; only Axel is unhooded. One of the two sits with his arms crossed

xml.sp: Axel No way!? It's too soon! You can't seriously get rid of him?!
?????? It's an order. Why do you hesitate? You, who has been ruthless towards those who've turned their backs on the Organization?
Axel But it's not like that! He didn't betray us! He can't come back!
?????? If he doesn't return, you know what you must do. Or you will face the consequences.

cutscene.desc: The cross-armed man summons a naginata and drives it toward Axel. It strikes to his right and some hair is sliced off. Axel is unflinching. The leader holds up a hand to pacify him. He looks to the leader, then looks away. The naginata vanishes, and the leader summons a sphere of energy. Electrical bolts shoot out from it toward the walls

xml.sp: Axel So, you'll turn me into a Dusk... He pauses Tch, all right! I'll do it, if that's what you want!

cutscene.desc: Roxas is falling through space, when suddenly he wakes up back in his room. He regains himself and sighs

xml.sp: Roxas I'm dreaming... But which parts...were the dream?

cutscene.desc: The words 'The 5th Day' appear on the screen. The train passes by over the Usual Spot, where the four friends are gathered. Olette walks up to Roxas and puts her hands on her hips

xml.sp: Hayner Only three days left of summer vacation--so don't even mention that assignment!
Olette But we agreed we'd get it finished today.
Roxas Yesterday... I fell off the station tower, didn't I?
Hayner You wouldn't be here if you did!
Pence But man, that was a close one...
Olette Stop changing the subject!
Hayner Okay, already! You win. We'll do the homework. Stupid independent study. So, anybody got any bright ideas for a topic?
Roxas Maybe we could study the stuff that's happening to me. You know, the dreams--- and the guys in white...
Hayner Forget it.
Roxas Why?
Hayner You know, things have been weird with you and the town since the photos were stolen, right?
Pence Well, tomorrow, we're all gonna search the town and find out what's been goin' on.
Olette Lots of people are helping out.
Roxas All that for me?

cutscene.desc: He brightens up considerably

xml.sp: Roxas I'll go get some ice cream!

cutscene.desc: He runs out of the Usual Spot. Later, the friends are all back eating the sea-salt ice cream

xml.sp: Pence There's this strange rumor going around. Wanna hear it? You know the stone steps at Sunset Station? We use 'em all the time, without even thinking about it. But---and this is the weird part---the steps count different going up and down!
Hayner Seriously!?
Pence And there are six other weird stories like that. It's like...the seven wonders of Twilight Town.
Hayner We should investigate those for our school project! Pence, you're a genius!
Pence There might be other rumors going around, too. Let's split up! I'm gonna look for the seven wonders...
Hayner Olette and I will go find some new rumors! C'mon!
Pence That leaves you and me, Roxas. Let's try the train first. To the station!

cutscene.desc: Roxas proceeds to Central Station with Pence

xml.sp: Pence The time has come! Our hunt for the seven wonders begins!

cutscene.desc: Olette and Hayner walk in after them

xml.sp: Pence Whoa! Find new rumors already?
Olette Nothing on Market Street.
Hayner You twerps aren't gonna scoop us. We're going to the terrace with you.
Olette Hayner, it's not a race!
Hayner Well, it is now!
Roxas C'mon, we can all go.

cutscene.desc: They all run to the train and it begins taking them to Sunset Station. They all sit down inside the train. Olette pulls out her yellow crystal and holds it up. So does Hayner and Pence. Roxas searches for it, but his crystal is missing. He sits there sadly. The train comes to a screeching halt at Sunset Station. Hayner runs out of the train

xml.sp: Hayner Olette! Hurry!

cutscene.desc: Olette runs after Hayner. Pence and Roxas walk out together. Roxas stretches for a sec

xml.sp: Roxas Huh. Aren't these the steps you talked about? The ones that count different going up and down?
Pence Umm...actually, it's the stupidest thing ever, but...
Roxas What?
Pence Rai's the one who counted. He's like, Every time I count, it's different, Y'KNOW? Ha ha ha ha!
Roxas So...he just counted wrong?

cutscene.desc: Pence nods. Roxas sighs

xml.sp: Pence Hey, no worries.

cutscene.desc: Roxas and Pence walk to the Sunset Terrace. Roxas finds a dead end where strange balls fly out at him. He runs to the wall dodging the balls and hits it with his battle sword. Pence sees the balls fly out and runs into the dead end

xml.sp: Pence Oh, it's just you, Roxas. Were you throwing a ball? That ball flew out of nowhere and totally startled me. Hey, I know! This explains one of those seven wonders!

cutscene.desc: They leave and a mysterious energy slightly shudders in front of the wall and vanishes. Roxas investigates a tunnel and sees Vivi alone

xml.sp: Roxas Vivi?

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs to Vivi, who then splits into several Vivis. Roxas defeats them and they turn into data. Vivi walks in from the entrance of the tunnel

xml.sp: Vivi What is it, Roxas?

cutscene.desc: Vivi walks toward Roxas holding a battle sword

xml.sp: Vivi Oh, did you need this, Roxas? Planning on getting in some practice, I bet.
Roxas Er, no, it's just that... there were so many of you...
Vivi Huh? So...many of me? I don't get it. Anyway, I'm done with this, Roxas. You can take your time.

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks out while Pence runs in

xml.sp: Pence So the mystery voice was just Vivi practicing.
Roxas Listen, there were a whole bunch of Vivi clones here just a minute ago...

cutscene.desc: The Vivi that had just walked out turns into a Dusk and it floats out. Roxas leaves and passes a small waterfall, where he sees his reflection. Suddenly, the reflection walks out of the waterfall and through Roxas. It turns into a dark form and is ready for battle. Roxas gets out his sword as well. Roxas defeats the Shadow Roxas and it turns into data

xml.sp: Pence Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Roxas stands up and dusts himself off

xml.sp: Pence You all right?

cutscene.desc: Pence looks over at the waterfall. Roxas and his' reflections are back where they should be

xml.sp: Pence Now that's spooky! I thought I saw someone, but it was just my reflection. I bet this is behind one of the seven wonders!
Roxas Another...me?

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks away as his Shadow form appears briefly in the waterfall. Roxas walks to Sunset Hill where there's a strange bouncing bag running around. Roxas jumps onto the bag to keep it from moving around

xml.sp: Roxas Yikes!

cutscene.desc: A dog comes out of the bag. Pence walks in

xml.sp: Pence Oh, it was just a dog. Did you let it out of the sack, Roxas?

cutscene.desc: The dog walks back to its owner

xml.sp: Pence This explains one of those seven wonders!

cutscene.desc: A Dusk appears

xml.sp: Roxas You know...that last wonder wasn't exactly wonderful.
Pence I understand, say no more. But this next one's gonna be really great! Wonder number Six!

cutscene.desc: Hayner and Olette run in

xml.sp: Hayner We got another lead!
Olette The Ghost Train Mystery...
Pence Everybody knows about Wonder number Six!
Hayner Yeah, well, I didn't.
Roxas Did you find out where the train runs?
Olette You can see it from Sunset Hill.

cutscene.desc: The four walk to Sunset Hill

xml.sp: Pence If the rumors are true, it'll be here any minute... For they say the train is empty. No driver, no conductor, no passengers... NO RETURN.

cutscene.desc: They eventually get tired waiting and end up lying on the ground

xml.sp: Olette We've gotta make it to the beach next year.
Hayner Yeah. We better get jobs the second vacation starts.
Seifer Good afternoon, slackers.

cutscene.desc: Roxas turns around to see Seifer

xml.sp: Seifer What are you doing out here?
Hayner What do you care?
Seifer I don't. Tell me anyway.
Pence We're waiting for the ghost train.
Seifer mockingly Waiting for the ghost train!

cutscene.desc: He laughs and Roxas stands up, annoyed

xml.sp: Seifer Why does looking at you always tick me off?
Roxas I dunno. Maybe it's destiny.
Seifer Destiny... In that case, let's be friends. I don't feel like cooperating with destiny.
Hayner When have you ever cooperated with anything?

cutscene.desc: Seifer turns around and pats his chest with his fist, then leaves

xml.sp: Olette Seifer!
Seifer I know. Tomorrow.
Roxas Look!

cutscene.desc: A mysterious blue and gold train decorated with stars and moons pulls through the underpass

xml.sp: Roxas It's really true... And there's really no one aboard! What's the catch? There's gotta be a catch, right?

cutscene.desc: The other three look at each other

xml.sp: Roxas Then it's real? Let's go to the station!

cutscene.desc: The four rush to the station to catch the train, Roxas leading the way. The train is there when they arrive

xml.sp: Roxas Let's go in!

cutscene.desc: Hayner stops Roxas

xml.sp: Roxas What?
Hayner Um...you'll get hurt.

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks back and the train has disappeared

xml.sp: Roxas Huh?
Announcement The train will be arriving shortly.

cutscene.desc: The usual orange train pulls into the station. A few passengers, including Fuu and Rai walk out

xml.sp: Hayner C'mon.
Roxas A train came from the beach. There was no driver, right?
Pence Let's go...
Roxas Right?!

cutscene.desc: He pleads to Olette with his hand. She shakes her head. Hayner groans and pushes Roxas onto the train. Later, after arriving back at the train station, they walk toward Market Street

xml.sp: Hayner Let's go home and work on the paper.

sp.speaker: Pence
sp.q: The rumors were bogus. The end.

xml.sp: Olette We can still make it sound good if we write about all the work we did.
Roxas But what about the last one---the seventh wonder?
Hayner Who cares?
Roxas I do. C'mon, Pence.
Hayner Whatever!
Olette Roxas...

cutscene.desc: Pence sighs at Roxas's determination

xml.sp: Pence It's at that haunted mansion.

cutscene.desc: Pence and Olette follow Hayner. Roxas proceeds to the Old Mansion

xml.sp: Pence You know something...

cutscene.desc: Roxas is startled and turns around

xml.sp: Pence We were gonna check the mansion out tomorrow. It IS the most suspicious place.
Roxas Right...
Pence Even Seifer's gang was gonna help.
Roxas Seifer?
Pence Yeah, Hayner asked him to.

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks up to the dusty window of the mansion. Naminé is in the window

xml.sp: Roxas So, what're we lookin' for?
Pence Well, they say there's a girl who appears at the second floor window even though no one's lived here for years.

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks back up to the window. Inside, there is a white room with a long table and pictures on the walls. Everything but the colors in the pictures is white. One of the pictures focuses on Kairi with a paopu fruit

xml.sp: Naminé Roxas...
Roxas Naminé?

cutscene.desc: Another of the pictures is of Roxas and Axel, both in the Organization cloaks. The camera has changed to Roxas's full point of view

xml.sp: Roxas This is...me? ...And Axel's here too.
Naminé You ARE best friends...
Roxas Very funny.
Naminé Don't you want to know the truth about who you really are?
Roxas No one knows me better than me.
Naminé Of course...
Roxas But...I don't get what's been happening lately.

cutscene.desc: Roxas sees a picture of Sora, Donald, and Goofy

xml.sp: Naminé You know these three, don't you?
Roxas Yeah. Sora, Donald, and Goofy. They're from the dreams.

Naminé About a year ago, some things happened, and I had to take apart the memories chained together in Sora's heart. But now... I'm putting them all back exactly the way they were. It's taken me a long time, but pretty soon Sora will be his old self again. The process has been affecting you, too, Roxas.
Roxas You mean...the dreams?
Naminé Yes... You and Sora are connected. And...in order for Sora to become completely whole again... He needs you.

cutscene.desc: Roxas sees a picture of himself with Sora

xml.sp: Roxas Me? What for?
Naminé You hold half of what he is... He needs you, Roxas.
Roxas Naminé?

cutscene.desc: Roxas and Naminé sit at opposite ends of the long white table

xml.sp: Roxas Naminé...who are you?
Naminé I'm a witch with power over Sora's memories and those around him.
Roxas A witch?
Naminé That's what DiZ called me. But I don't know why I have this power...I just do. I'm not even sure there's a right way for me to use it.

Roxas Hmm...I can't help you there. looking over at the drawing of himself and Axel It's funny... Suddenly I feel like I don't know myself at all... I guess I would like to know. What do you know about me...that I don't?
Naminé You...you were never supposed to exist, Roxas.
Roxas What...? How could you even say such a thing...even if it were true?
Naminé I'm sorry. I guess some things really are better left unsaid.

cutscene.desc: Pence shakes Roxas out of his staring contest with the window

xml.sp: Pence Roxas! Roxas!
Roxas Huh?
Pence Did you see her?
Roxas Yeah. Watch the window---closely.

cutscene.desc: Roxas points up to the window, where Naminé is gone

xml.sp: Pence Oh, lame. That's just the curtains moving. There must be a draft somewhere. I'm surprised this old place even has curtains.

cutscene.desc: Naminé has returned to the window

xml.sp: Roxas ...Yeah.
Pence Well, let's head back to the usual spot. Hayner and Olette are waiting.

cutscene.desc: The two boys return to their hideout

xml.sp: Olette Hey guys, how'd it go?
Pence The girl in the window turned out to be a curtain flapping in the wind.
Olette I figured as much. The report's already done.
Pence All right!
Olette So, wanna go find Hayner? He's probably at the station.

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks up

xml.sp: Olette You know...we only have two more days together.
Roxas Huh?
Olette Summer vacation, remember?
Roxas Oh...right.

cutscene.desc: The three walk to Central Station. Hayner is on the ledge eating ice cream

xml.sp: Hayner Tomorrow we search the town.
Pence Next day's the fair.
Olette The last day of summer.
Hayner Don't say that! You'll give me an ulcer!
Pence Not if you explode from all that ice cream first.

cutscene.desc: Everyone but Roxas laughs as the bells ring in the background. In a dimly lit room, DiZ is sitting in a large wooden chair as the cloaked Ansem walks in

xml.sp: Ansem Why did you show him the train?
DiZ Because he missed the trip to the beach.
Ansem Hmph...that's almost kind of you.
DiZ Now...what about you? Are the holes in your memory starting to fill in?
Ansem Yes...the haze is clearing.
DiZ The same thing is happening to everyone who had ties to Sora. Very soon, to them, he'll be like a good friend who's gone away for a year.

cutscene.desc: Ansem sits in an opposite chair

xml.sp: Ansem I've waited, and now I want to know. What is it that you want?
DiZ Revenge.
Ansem Revenge...

DiZ Now, for the finishing touches. First, we must dispose of Naminé. She did a splendid job with Sora, but it's high time she disappeared. Roxas isn't the only one who was never meant to exist. Take care of it, Ansem.

cutscene.desc: The screen becomes scrambled

xml.sp: Computer Restoration at 97%.

cutscene.desc: Sora's last memories flash through his mind. The trio stands in the Gate to the Dark in the End of the World

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, is that all that's left of the worlds taken by the Heartless?
Sora Those worlds will be restored if we beat Ansem, right? But, if we do beat him and all these worlds become restored and disconnected, what's gonna happen to this place? And to us?

cutscene.desc: Sora remembers fighting the Chernabog

xml.sp: Ansem All worlds begin in darkness, and all so end. The heart is no different. You see, darkness is the heart's true essence.

cutscene.desc: Sora remembers the final showdown with Ansem

xml.sp: Sora That's not true! The heart may be weak. And sometimes it may even give in. But I've learned that deep down, there's a light that never goes out!

cutscene.desc: Sora remembers Ansem's defeat

xml.sp: Ansem Kingdom Hearts! Fill me with the power of darkness!
Sora You're wrong. I know now, without a doubt, Kingdom Hearts is light!
Mickey Now, Sora! Let's close this door for good!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy help close the door of Kingdom Hearts

xml.sp: Riku Take care of her.

cutscene.desc: Sora runs to Kairi

xml.sp: Sora Kairi!
Kairi Sora!

cutscene.desc: Kairi falls but Sora catches her

xml.sp: Sora Kairi, remember what you said before? I'm always with you, too. I'll come back to you. I promise!
Kairi I know you will!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Kairi break away from each other. Sora, Donald, and Goofy walk down a winding path

xml.sp: Donald Well, now what do we do?
Sora We've gotta find Riku and King Mickey.
Goofy But, uh, where do we start lookin' for that there door to the light?

cutscene.desc: They see Pluto walking with a letter in his mouth

xml.sp: Donald Pluto?
Goofy Gawrsh, that's the king's seal!
Sora Hey, have you seen King Mickey?

cutscene.desc: Pluto turns to run down the path

xml.sp: Sora Let's go!

cutscene.desc: At nighttime, Sora is startled by a figure in black. He turns around to see it, but it is gone. He looks around for a second, then turns around again. The figure is slightly down the road. Sora runs to it, but it fades away. Sora finds Castle Oblivion at the end of the road. At the same dark beach, the two cloaked figures meet

xml.sp: ?????? I've been to see him. He looks a lot like you.
????? Who are you?

cutscene.desc: In a mysterious dark city, while the rain falls, hundreds of Neoshadows rise from the ground. They surround another figure in black, who takes out two Keyblades, the Oathkeeper and the Oblivion and swings them into position. He destroys several of the Neoshadows before looking up to the top of the main skyscraper of the city. The rain has stopped for a moment. An unhooded but blindfolded man stands at the top of the skyscraper. The duel-wielding person runs up the side of the building and tosses the Oblivion Keyblade to the man at the top, who dives off the edge of the building and catches the weapon in his hand, falling down past the running figure. They turn to look at each other as they pass. After they both have reached the bottom, they destroy the remaining Neoshadows, then turn on each other. The two exchange blows before the figure with the Oathkeeper knocks the other man to the ground

xml.sp: ???? Why!? Why do you have the Keyblade?
????? Shut up!

cutscene.desc: The boy brings down a final blow to the silver-haired one. Roxas wakes up in his bedroom and slides off the bed. He shifts from Sora to Roxas several times as he stands up. Roxas looks outside his window. Birds fly past as the words 'The 6th Day' appear on the screen. Hayner, Olette, and Pence are already in the Usual Spot when Roxas arrives there

xml.sp: Roxas Man, I could not sleep last night...

cutscene.desc: His friends have no response

xml.sp: Roxas Guys?

cutscene.desc: He reaches toward Hayner and his hand goes right through him

xml.sp: Roxas Huh?

cutscene.desc: Roxas takes a step back watching his friends laugh with no notion of his existence. Hayner turns around and runs right through him, Pence and Olette following. Roxas stops and sighs, his eyes closing. He picks up a picture nearby which includes Hayner, Olette, and Pence, and had previously included Roxas. Roxas leaves the Usual Spot and is cornered by Dusks. Then, Axel appears

xml.sp: Axel Look at what it's come to. I've been given these icky orders to destroy you---if you refuse to come back with me.
Roxas We're...best friends, right?

cutscene.desc: Axel scratches his head

xml.sp: Axel Sure...but I'm not getting turned into a Dusk for...Wait a sec! You remember now!?
Roxas Y...eah.
Axel Great! But, you know, gotta make sure and all. So, umm... What's our boss's name?

cutscene.desc: Roxas gives no answer, and Axel sighs sadly

xml.sp: Axel Can't believe this...

cutscene.desc: The stick in Roxas's hands becomes the Keyblade. He defeats the Dusks around him. Axel swings up his chakram to strike, and is frozen. Roxas notices and stops

xml.sp: DiZ Roxas, to the mansion! The time has come!
Roxas Hayner! Pence! Olette!

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs to Market Street

xml.sp: Axel The Roxas that I know is long gone. Fine, I see how it is...

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs to the Old Mansion. He turns around at the locked gates and more Dusks spring up behind him

xml.sp: Roxas Don't call me and then lock me out...

cutscene.desc: Roxas gets a vision of Sora holding out his Keyblade. Roxas steps back from the gate and unlocks the keyhole in it. The gates open and he runs inside. The Dusks try to follow but are stopped by a hooded figure holding a wing-like sword. Roxas enters the mansion and finds the White Room. Roxas walks past pictures he saw when he was in this room before and stops at one of him in an alleyway of the dark city he saw in his dreams. He gets a sudden headache. Thunder rumbles in the sky of the city as a cloaked Roxas walks through the dark streets. He passes Axel who is leaning on the wall, crossing his arms

xml.sp: Axel Your mind's made up?

cutscene.desc: Roxas stops

xml.sp: Roxas Why did the Keyblade choose me? I have to know.
Axel You can't turn on the Organization!

cutscene.desc: Roxas's vision stops and he sees Naminé in the White Room

xml.sp: Roxas Organization XIII... they're a bad group.
Naminé Bad or good, I don't know. They're a group of incomplete people who wish to be whole. To that end, they're desperately searching for something.
Roxas What?
Naminé Kingdom Hearts.

cutscene.desc: Roxas chuckles

xml.sp: Naminé Funny?
Roxas It's just, I think---I've been running away from the question I really wanna ask

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks to the table and leans against it

xml.sp: Roxas What's gonna happen to me now? Just tell me that. Nothing else really matters anymore.
Naminé You are...

cutscene.desc: Naminé flickers

xml.sp: Roxas Naminé!

cutscene.desc: The form of Naminé breaks into several pieces and disappears. DiZ appears in a flash of data

xml.sp: DiZ There's no knowledge that has the power to change your fate.
Roxas Even if it doesn't, I wanna know. I have the right to know!
DiZ A Nobody doesn't have a right to know. Nor does it even have the right to be.
Roxas But what IS a Nobody!?

cutscene.desc: Ansem still hooded appears

xml.sp: Ansem DiZ, we're out of time. Too many Nobodies!

cutscene.desc: A portal springs up behind DiZ containing Naminé

xml.sp: Naminé Roxas. Nobodies like us are only half a person. You won't disappear. You'll be whole!
Roxas I'll...disappear...?
DiZ No further outbursts!
Naminé No, you won't disappear! You'll--

cutscene.desc: DiZ grabs Naminé and covers her mouth

xml.sp: Roxas Wait!

cutscene.desc: Roxas tries to run to the portal, but is stopped by Ansem. Naminé stops DiZ's clench over her mouth

xml.sp: Naminé Roxas! We will meet again. And then we can talk about everything. I may not know it's you, and you may not know it's me. But we will meet again. Someday soon. I promise!

cutscene.desc: Naminé and DiZ begin to fade away through the portal

xml.sp: Roxas Let her go!

cutscene.desc: The portal vanishes along with Ansem. Roxas holds out his left hand

xml.sp: Roxas Naminé!

cutscene.desc: Roxas finds the Mansion Library. He draws a crown symbol in the missing place on the table and it reveals a hidden room beneath the floor. He walks into another basement room and finds a large set of monitors and an odd machine. Roxas's head aches again. He is reminded of a large white room with huge chairs, on which sat each of the Organization XIII. Roxas runs down a city street chased by Dusks. Hooded, he is confronting the silver-haired man

xml.sp: ???? Why!? Why do you have the Keyblade?
Roxas Shut up!

cutscene.desc: The blindfolded one quickly grabs his Keyblade and knocks Roxas away as he tried to slash with his Keyblade. The blindfolded one stands up and walks toward Roxas. Roxas is later lying underneath the odd machine as DiZ and Ansem appear

xml.sp: Ansem Will it work?
DiZ If we can maintain the simulated town until Naminé finishes chaining together Sora's memories.
Ansem What will happen to Roxas?
DiZ He holds half of Sora's power within him. In the end, he'll have to give it back.

cutscene.desc: DiZ turns and walks toward the set of monitors

xml.sp: DiZ Until then, he'll need another personality to throw off his pursuers.
Ansem Poor thing.

cutscene.desc: DiZ sits down and punches in some keys

xml.sp: DiZ It's the fate of a Nobody.

cutscene.desc: The machine starts up and changes Roxas into data and Roxas is gone. Roxas's headache stops and his anger rises. The Keyblade appears in his hands and he begins to hack away violently at the computer monitors. Once he's vented his anger, a door opens. Roxas enters the Basement Hall and is immediately surrounded by Nobodies. Roxas defeats them and Axel walks in with his arms crossed

xml.sp: Axel Simply amazing, Roxas.
Roxas Axel.
Axel You really do remember me this time? I'm SO FLATTERED.

cutscene.desc: Axel's anger causes the edges of the room to erupt in flames

xml.sp: Axel But you're too late!!

cutscene.desc: Roxas manages to conjure the Oathkeeper and Oblivion Keyblades

xml.sp: Axel Two!?

cutscene.desc: Axel makes his chakram appear and he smiles at Roxas

xml.sp: Axel Come here. I'll make it all stop.

cutscene.desc: Roxas fights Axel and wins

xml.sp: Axel Roxas...

cutscene.desc: The flames disappear. Roxas stares at Axel and remembers the last time he talked to him before, in the alleyway

xml.sp: Axel You get on their bad side and they'll destroy you!
Roxas No one would miss me.
Axel That's not true... I would.

cutscene.desc: As Axel begins to fade away

xml.sp: Roxas Axel...
Axel Let's meet again in the next life.
Roxas Yeah. I'll be waiting.
Axel Silly. Just because you have a next life...

cutscene.desc: Axel disappears. Roxas walks up to where Axel vanished. Later, Roxas walks through the basement corridor. He sees two capsules with familiar faces inside

xml.sp: Roxas ...Donald. ...Goofy?

cutscene.desc: He turns to the door at the end of the hall and enters. DiZ is standing a completely bright room in front of a single large capsule

xml.sp: DiZ At last, the Keyblade's chosen one.
Roxas Who are you talking to? Me? Or Sora?
DiZ To half of Sora, of course. You reside in darkness. What I need is someone who can move about the realm of light and destroy Organization XIII.
Roxas Why? Who are you?
DiZ I am a servant of the world. laughs And if I'm a servant, then you should consider yourself a tool, at best.
Roxas Was that... Was that supposed to be a joke?

cutscene.desc: He conjures the Keyblade

xml.sp: Roxas 'Cause I'm not laughing!

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs up to DiZ and strikes through him. The Keyblade creates a wave of data through DiZ. Roxas, surprised, stands straight

xml.sp: DiZ My apologies. This is only a data-based projection.

cutscene.desc: Roxas screams in anger, and futilely strikes DiZ repetitively with the Keyblade. DiZ vanishes and reappears behind him while Roxas catches his breath

xml.sp: DiZ Come, over here.

cutscene.desc: Roxas stares at DiZ

xml.sp: Roxas I hate you so much...
DiZ You should share some of that hatred with Sora. He's far too nice for his own good.
Roxas No! My heart belongs to me!

cutscene.desc: Roxas runs and cuts again through DiZ. DiZ disappears and the capsule glows. The mechanical petals open slowly and reveal what they contain

xml.sp: Roxas Sora...

cutscene.desc: Sora, still asleep, is floating inside

xml.sp: Roxas You're lucky. Looks like my summer vacation is...over.

cutscene.desc: The Kingdom Hearts II logo appears on the screen and fades in to the train station, where a hooded King Mickey exits the mysterious blue and gold train. Roxas turns around and fades to white

xml.sp: Roxas Sora?
Sora Who's there?
Donald Sora!
Goofy Sora, wake up.

cutscene.desc: Sora wakes up and the capsule opens again in front of Donald and Goofy. Sora stretches and the other two laugh at how small his clothes have gotten. Sora jumps out of the capsule in front of them and grabs them in his arms

xml.sp: Sora Donald, Goofy!

cutscene.desc: They laugh and hop in a circle. Jiminy Cricket climbs on Sora's shoulder, yawns, and stretches

xml.sp: Jiminy That was some nap!

cutscene.desc: Jiminy hops down to the floor

xml.sp: Sora You mean, we were asleep?
Jiminy I guess we musta been, or I don't think we'd be so drowsy...
Goofy When do ya think we went to sleep?
Donald Uhh...
Sora Let's see...we defeated Ansem...
Goofy Yep.
Sora ...restored peace to the world...found Kairi... Oh yeah, and then we went to look for Riku. I think that's right so far.
Donald Then what?
Goofy What does your journal say, Jiminy?

cutscene.desc: Jiminy takes out a book

xml.sp: Jiminy Gee, there's only one sentence... Thank Naminé. Hmm... I wonder who that is.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy look at one another and shake their heads

xml.sp: Donald Some journal that is.
Jiminy Well, what do ya say we find out where we are!

cutscene.desc: The group walks to Twilight Town and enters the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Sora You know, I think I've been to this town.
Donald What's it called?
Sora Hmm... Guess I must've imagined it.

cutscene.desc: Hayner, Olette, and Pence are boredly lying around the room

xml.sp: Hayner What do you want!?
Sora Uh, nothing. Just wondering what was back here.
Hayner Now you know. This is our spot.
Pence Umm...
Sora What?
Pence You're...new around here, right? I'm Pence.
Hayner Hayner. Nice to meet you, but we got stuff to do, so catch ya later.

cutscene.desc: Hayner leaves

xml.sp: Olette My name's Olette. Hey, did you finish up the summer homework, yet? Independent studies are the worst, huh?
Sora Homework?

cutscene.desc: Sora looks at Donald and Goofy who shrug

xml.sp: Pence Hey, what're your names?
Goofy Oh, sorry. We're Sora, Donald, and Goofy.
Sora Hey there.
Olette Sora, Donald, Goofy, we just met someone who was looking for you.
Pence He sure seemed in a hurry. He had a black coat on so I couldn't see his face, but he had these big round ears.
Donald The King!
Sora Where'd you see him?
Pence At the station.
Sora The station! Thanks!
Olette Well, we'd better get back to that assignment.
Pence Later.

cutscene.desc: Olette and Pence leave

xml.sp: Donald Oh boy! The King's trying to find us!
Sora Yeah, let's get to the station!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Sandlot and find Seifer, Fuu and Rai

xml.sp: Seifer Hey you, where'd you come from?
Sora Uhh...
Seifer You here to pick a fight with us or something?
Sora Fight? We're not here to fight.
Donald Yeah, you big palooka!
Seifer Okay, smartalecks... Time to teach you how to behave in my town. Bring it!

cutscene.desc: Seifer, Fuu, and Rai take defensive stances

xml.sp: Sora Man, what a jerk.

cutscene.desc: Donald nods and he and Sora also stand defensively

xml.sp: Producer One moment!

cutscene.desc: The tournament producer runs over to them

xml.sp: Producer If you're gonna fight, why not make it a proper Struggle?
Seifer What?
Producer You see, Seifer... I'm a really big fan.
Seifer Wh-what do you want?

Producer In other words, I want to see more of your super cool moves! You handled the tournament with real style, and you absolutely dominated the title match. But I just can't get enough. Don't you see? The matches are far too short!

cutscene.desc: He turns to Sora

xml.sp: Producer And what's your name?
Sora Sora.
Producer Sora, if you wanna fight a match, you just say the word.

cutscene.desc: They continue to Central Station and are suddenly surrounded by Dusks. They fight them, but are overwhelmed and become exhausted. Mickey appears on the ledge of the station. As the Dusks strike again and Sora holds up his Keyblade, Mickey swoops down and destroys the remaining Nobodies with his own Keyblade. Sora is amazed. Donald and Goofy push Sora down out of the way

xml.sp: Donald Your Majesty?
Mickey Shh! You gotta board the train and leave town! The train knows the way.

cutscene.desc: He holds out the munny pouch

xml.sp: Mickey Here.

cutscene.desc: Sora takes it and Mickey runs to Market Street

xml.sp: Donald Your Majesty...
Sora The King... Was that really him?
Goofy It coulda been... Yep, I know it was!
Donald Now we know he's okay!
Sora The King was locked in the realm of darkness, right?
Goofy Uh-huh.
Sora But we just saw him...
Donald Yep.
Sora And if the King is here, that means Riku's here!
Donald He's gotta be!
Sora Well, I'm gonna go look for Riku. Then he and I can go back to the islands together. Kairi's there waiting for us! What are you two gonna do?
Goofy Gawrsh, Sora. Do ya have to ask?

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs

xml.sp: Donald Hey! What's so funny!?
Sora Your face!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy look at each other and laugh along with Sora

xml.sp: Sora What do ya say, guys? Let's stick together for one more journey.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Sora To...where again?

cutscene.desc: Sora places his hands behind his head

xml.sp: Goofy We hafta board the train!
Sora Oh yeah.

cutscene.desc: Donald sighs

xml.sp: Sora C'mon!

cutscene.desc: They run inside the station

xml.sp: Hayner Wait up!

cutscene.desc: Hayner, Pence, and Olette catch up to them

xml.sp: Hayner Hey, Sora...
Sora What?
Hayner Nothing, but...
Pence We came to see you off. It just seemed like something we oughta do.
Sora Oh...really? Thanks!

cutscene.desc: A ringing sounds

xml.sp: Olette You should hurry and get your tickets.
Sora Right.

cutscene.desc: Sora takes out the Munny Pouch at the teller. Olette notices

xml.sp: Donald What is it?

cutscene.desc: Olette takes an exact copy of the Munny Pouch

xml.sp: Goofy They're the same.
Olette Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks to both pouches and shrugs

xml.sp: Sora Three tickets, please!

cutscene.desc: Sora gets three tickets from the teller

xml.sp: Sora I can't help feeling like we won't see this town again...
Donald Why not?
Goofy You're thinkin' too much.
Sora Yeah, you're right!

cutscene.desc: As they are about to leave

xml.sp: Sora Okay, let's go!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Sora Bye.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy wave as they enter the train

xml.sp: Hayner Hey, Sora. You sure we haven't met before?

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks

xml.sp: Sora Positive. Why do you ask?
Hayner I dunno.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles and a tear falls down his cheek. The other three are surprised and so is Sora when he starts to brush it away

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Olette You okay?
Sora Y-yeah. Don't know where it came from.
Hayner chuckling Pull it together.
Sora Right... See ya.

cutscene.desc: Sora waves and enters the train. He waves again as the door closes. The train leaves. Pence turns to Hayner and Olette. Sora, Donald, and Goofy watch outside as the train rolls on. Sora takes out the Munny Pouch and stares at it. The blue crystal ball is in it, and he holds that up to the light
