xml.sp: Sora You know...

cutscene.desc: Donald sits down

xml.sp: Sora I'm sad.
Donald We'll be back.
Goofy Yeah. We can visit Hayner and those guys again.

cutscene.desc: The train rolls out into the open sky. Axel and a hooded figure stand at Sunset Hill. Naminé sits on a nearby bench. Axel walks over to the wooden railing and leans on it, watching the train leave

xml.sp: Axel Guess that's that.
????? Let's go.
Axel Go where? It's not like we have homes to return to. We don't exist, remember?

cutscene.desc: He stands upright

xml.sp: Naminé Yes, it's true. We may not have homes. But there is someplace I want to go... And someone I want to see...

cutscene.desc: She stares at the notebook in her lap, which shows a picture of Sora holding hands with Roxas

xml.sp: Axel Same here.

cutscene.desc: He looks to the hooded man

xml.sp: Axel So, you think you might let us go? I know you're here to get rid of us, but...

cutscene.desc: Naminé looks at the hooded figure, pulls the notebook closer, and looks at it again

xml.sp: Naminé DiZ wants to get rid of me?
Axel You sure about this?

cutscene.desc: They both turn to look at Axel. The figure then looks at Naminé again

xml.sp: ????? I owe you both.

cutscene.desc: She stares back at him

xml.sp: Naminé For what?
????? Castle Oblivion. You helped us.
Axel Heh, you don't have to tell me twice.

cutscene.desc: He moves his arm and opens a dark portal. Naminé looks to Axel, then back to the man, then back to Axel, who nods. She faces the man, clutching her notebook

xml.sp: Naminé Thank you.

cutscene.desc: Naminé stands up walks slowly toward the portal, keeping her eyes on the hooded man. Eventually, she lets go and runs into the portal. Axel walks in after and it closes. The train pulls onto the base of a mysterious tower, emblazoned with moons and stars like the train. Sora, Donald, and Goofy leave the train, which then disappears, leaving only the tracks. Sora giggles nervously

xml.sp: Sora There goes our ride...

cutscene.desc: Someone is standing at the doorway of the tower

xml.sp: Donald What's goin' on?

Pete I sent some of my lackeys inside to see if the master of this here tower's as big and tough as they say. Word is, he's a real powerful sorcerer. Which would make him the perfect bodyguard for me. See, it don't matter how tough he is---once he's a Heartless, he'll do as I say!
Donald A Heartless?

Pete That's right. They're those things that come outta the darkness in folks' hearts. Why, with all those Heartless at her side, my dear friend Maleficent is gonna conquer everything! And since I got me a debt to pay, I'm goin' 'round to a bunch of different worlds and buildin' an army of Heartless, special for her. Why am I talkin' to you pipsqueaks anyway? Go on, scram! I'm behind schedule as it is.
Goofy You oughta find somethin' nicer to do.
Pete Says who?

cutscene.desc: Pete turns around and spots Donald, Goofy, and Sora

xml.sp: Pete Wha...AAAH! It's you!
Donald & Goofy Pete!
Pete What are you two nimrods doin' here!?
Donald What are YOU doing here?
Sora You know him?
Goofy We sure do! Pete's been causin' trouble for ages! His Majesty banished him to another dimension a long time ago. I wonder how he escaped.

cutscene.desc: Pete laughs

xml.sp: Pete You wanna know how, eh? Well, Maleficent busted me out, that's how! And now your world---no, no, no, all the worlds---are gonna belong to yours truly. Cause Maleficent's gonna help me conquer 'em!
Sora Maleficent...huh.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy giggle

xml.sp: Pete What are you laughing at!? Why, Maleficent's power is so great---
Sora She's toast!
Pete Huh?
Goofy Sorry, but Maleficent can't help ya now.
Pete Whaddaya mean!?

cutscene.desc: Donald snickers

xml.sp: Pete You! So you're the ones that did it!
Sora Well...we mighta had something to do with it.
Pete angry Heartless squad! Round up!

cutscene.desc: Some shadows come out of the ground. Sora conjures his Keyblade and fights them

xml.sp: Pete You just wait! Nobody, and I do mean nobody, messes with the mighty Pete!
Sora So, mighty Pete, who lives in this tower, anyway?
Pete Oh, ya don't know, eh? Well, it's old Yen Sid. 'Course he's probably a Heartless by now!
Donald Master Yen Sid lives here!?

cutscene.desc: Donald runs up the steps and into the tower

xml.sp: Goofy Yen Sid is the King's teacher!
Sora Wow. Sounds powerful!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy then run up the stairs, leaving Pete and his dropped jaw hanging. They ascend the stairs until they reach the top floor, fighting Heartless along the way.

xml.sp: Donald Heartless, Heartless, Heartless! Things haven't changed one bit!
Goofy Well, it's a good thing we're on the job, then.
Sora So the worlds aren't at peace after all?

cutscene.desc: They reach the Sorcerer's Loft where an old wizard is sitting at his desk. Donald and Goofy bow to him

xml.sp: Donald Master Yen Sid! It's an honor!
Sora Hey there!

cutscene.desc: Goofy and Donald are slightly shocked at Sora

xml.sp: Donald Sora! Show some respect!

cutscene.desc: The wizard calms Donald down

xml.sp: Yen Sid So, you are Sora. Now then, have you seen the King yet?
Goofy Yes, we did, Master. But we didn't get a chance to talk to him.

Yen Sid Yes...the King has been quite busy of late. Therefore, it would seem that the task of instructing you three falls upon my shoulders. You have a perilous journey ahead of you. You must be well prepared.
Sora You mean...we have to go on another quest? I was looking forward to finding my friend Riku, so we could go back to the islands.

Yen Sid Yes. I know. However, everything in your journey, Sora, is connected. Whether you will find your way home to the islands... Whether you will return alone or with your friend... And, whether or not the islands will still be there. And the key that connects them all is you, Sora.
Sora I'm...the key?

cutscene.desc: Sora holds out his hand and the Keyblade flashes into it

xml.sp: Yen Sid Chosen wielder of the Keyblade! You are the key that will open the door to light.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods. Yen Sid looks to Donald and Goofy who quickly stand up straight and nod. Yen Sid waves a hand over the table and a thick book appears. He makes it float into the air and spins it toward Sora. It opens and lands at the edge of the table

xml.sp: Yen Sid This book contains valuable knowledge you will need for your journey. Study it carefully. Once you have finished, we will speak of the enemies you will surely confront.

cutscene.desc:
Sora reads the book
The Beginning - Each journey gives rise to chance encounters, and each encounter brings forth a farewell. When a farewell leads to a journey, the worlds open their hearts. Those chosen by the light, or ensnared by darkness. Friends who share the same bonds, though their paths may differ. When you doubt the path trod thus far, when the hand you held is lost to you, gaze anew at the heart that once was...for all the answers are within.
Interlude - A long dream. A sad farewell, hanging in the air in that world between. What is reality? What is illusion? The path chosen by the young boy leads to his memories. When caught in the stream of the days and nights going past, gaze anew at your steps...for there all confusion will end.
The Future Story - Will the day come when this battle, born of confusion, will end? It is different things to different people. Can the reality be that which is hidden? The reason is mere existence. Still, memories can be believed. Be not afraid. Entrust your body to the soothing waves of your memories. By and by, your fleeting rest will be over...and everything will begin.

xml.sp: Sora But wait a sec---how come the Heartless are still running around?

Yen Sid Your past endeavors did prevent an immense effusion of Heartless from the great darkness; make no mistake about that. However, the Heartless are darkness made real---and darkness lingers yet in every heart. The Heartless are fewer. But while darkness exists in a single heart, it will be difficult to eliminate them.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy sigh

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, that must mean...if everybody's heart was full of light, them Heartless'd go away!

cutscene.desc: Yen Sid nods

xml.sp: Yen Sid Now it is time to speak of the enemies that you will encounter.

cutscene.desc: Yen Sid waves a hand and an image of Donald appears near the wall. This image then changes to a Shadow Heartless

xml.sp: Yen Sid If one such as you, Donald, yields to the darkness in their heart, they too will become a Heartless. But you know this. The Heartless are always lurking and ever seeking to capture new hearts. Never let your guard down! Now then...

cutscene.desc: Yen Sid waves his hand again and an image of a Dusk Nobody appears next to the Shadow

xml.sp: Yen Sid At times, if someone with a strong heart and will---be they evil or good---becomes a Heartless, the empty shell they leave behind begins to act with a will of its own.

cutscene.desc: The Shadow image disappears

xml.sp: Yen Sid An empty vessel whose heart has been stolen away... A spirit that goes on even as its body fades from existence---for you see, Nobodies do not truly exist at all. Nobodies may seem to have feelings, but this is a ruse---they only pretend to have hearts. You must not be deceived!
Sora Nobodies... They don't exist...

cutscene.desc: Two more images of Dusks appear around Sora

xml.sp: Yen Sid Now then...the being you see before you is known as a Dusk. They are the most common form of Nobody. But there are others---some larger, some with frightening and unique powers. Be vigilant! On your journey, you will meet an alarming number of Dusks. They will all attempt to do you harm.

cutscene.desc: The images vanish

xml.sp: Yen Sid Still, they are nothing but empty shells, destined to return to the darkness. But---

cutscene.desc: The wizard waves his hand again and images of figures in black appear in the Dusks' place. Sora, Donald, and Goofy look wary

xml.sp: Yen Sid The beings you see before you now are different. These powerful Nobodies have formed a group called Organization XIII. It commands the lesser Nobodies.
Sora Organization XIII...

cutscene.desc: He looks to Goofy and Donald, but they shake their heads

xml.sp: Yen Sid While Heartless act on instinct, Nobodies function in a higher manner. They can think and plan. And it seems they are working towards a goal. What that goal is, we do not know. The King sensed the danger, and journeyed forth to fight it. He found the dark realm's Keyblade, and with it, closed the door. Now he's traveling from world to world, fighting the Heartless as he seeks the answer to the riddle of the Nobodies and Organization XIII.

cutscene.desc: The cloaked figures disappear

xml.sp: Sora Then I guess we better go find the King first!
Donald But where could he be?
Goofy Well, we won't know 'til we look.
Sora Yeah. And the King must know where Riku is, 'cause the two of them were together in the realm of darkness when we closed the door. You know, after defeating Ansem.
Yen Sid So, before you go, you will need more suitable traveling clothes. Those look a bit too small for you.

cutscene.desc: Yen Sid motions toward the door

xml.sp: Yen Sid Through there, you'll find three good fairies. If you ask, they'll create for you appropriate garments.
Goofy Gawrsh, Sora, you sure are growing fast.
Sora Uh, I guess...

cutscene.desc: Sora giggles nervously and pulls at his clothes. They enter the Wardrobe. Three fairies, one red, one green, and one blue are chatting near the window

xml.sp: Sora Me, you guys, Riku, and the King. I don't care who this Organization is or what it's planning. With the five of us---I mean, six of us---there's nothing to worry about, right?
Donald Yeah!
Flora Well, look who's here, dears! Sora, Donald, and Goofy!
Merryweather Ooh, if you're looking for clothes, you've come to the right place!
Fauna I'll do the designing.

cutscene.desc: Flora and Merryweather pull Sora away from Goofy. Fauna sends out a spell which turns Sora's clothes green

xml.sp: Merryweather Oh, that will never do.

cutscene.desc: Merryweather flicks her wand and Sora's clothes turn blue

xml.sp: Flora Now, now, dears.

cutscene.desc: Flora turns Sora's clothes pink

xml.sp: Fauna But don't you like this better?

cutscene.desc: Fauna makes Sora's clothes green again

xml.sp: Flora Hold on!

cutscene.desc: Flora turns them pink again. By now, Sora is looking helpless

xml.sp: Fauna Are you certain?

cutscene.desc: Fauna changes them green again

xml.sp: Merryweather Blue!

cutscene.desc: Merryweather makes them blue again. The fairies exchange more spells, making Sora's clothes continue changing colors. A raven watches from the window, squawks, and flies away. A green clothed Sora finally decides to break the feud

xml.sp: Sora Aww, would you just decide?

cutscene.desc: The fairies gasp and slightly giggle

xml.sp: Flora All right, then. Together now, dears. And no more squabbling!

cutscene.desc: All three fairies turn their spells on Sora at once, and his clothes turn black with red and gold bands

xml.sp: Flora Oh, my!
Fauna Ooh, it's lovely.
Merryweather Oh, yes! He does look very dashing.

cutscene.desc: Sora is fine with it, and the Keyblade appears in his hand

xml.sp: Flora Now, those aren't ordinary garments.
Fauna They have very special powers.

cutscene.desc: Flora magics up a glowing orb which hovers in front of Sora

xml.sp: Fauna Take the orb, dear.

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs for the orb and takes it in

xml.sp: Merryweather And watch what happens.

cutscene.desc: Sora is struck with immense power. A light flashes and his clothes are suddenly red. Donald and Goofy look in awe. Sora now is holding a second Keyblade in his left hand

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!
Donald Wow!
Goofy Two Keyblades!
Merryweather This journey's gonna be twice as difficult as your last.

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs

xml.sp: Flora Your garments also have other powers---but you will have to discover what they are as you continue on your journey.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks at both of his Keyblades

xml.sp: Sora Okay, I'll do my best. And thanks a lot!
Fauna Oh, and there's something else for you---from Master Yen Sid.
Donald Oh boy!

cutscene.desc: They walk back into the hallway, where Yen Sid motions them over to the window. A gummi ship rises into view

xml.sp: Donald Hey! It's the Gummi Ship!
Sora So you guys ready to go?

cutscene.desc: They nod, then stand up straight in the wizard's presence

xml.sp: Yen Sid Now, now, just a moment.

cutscene.desc: The three relax a bit

xml.sp: Yen Sid Because of your previous endeavors, the worlds have returned to their original states. That means the pathways between them have disappeared.
Donald How do we get around?

Yen Sid Do not fear. If what the King suspected proves true, the worlds have prepared new pathways along which you may travel. These pathways may be utilized by unlocking special gates. How these gates are opened, I'm afraid I do not know... However, the Keyblade will serve as your guide. When a beam of light radiates from the Keyblade, return to the Gummi Ship. Though the worlds may seem far apart and out of reach, they nonetheless remain connected by invisible ties. As do our hearts.
Sora Our hearts are connected.
Yen Sid That is correct.
Sora Got it!

Yen Sid But be warned. As you proceed... The Heartless and the Nobodies will be using their own paths Corridors of darkness, to travel from world to world. They may be attempting to link these dark pathways to the gates between the worlds.
Donald Hey! That's not fair!
Yen Sid Now then, that is all the information I can give to you. Go forth, Sora, Donald, and Goofy. Everyone is waiting.
Sora Okay, let's get going!

cutscene.desc: They stand up straight again

xml.sp: Donald Master Yen Sid!
Goofy We sure do appreciate the help.

cutscene.desc: Each of them gives the wizard a salute and run down the corridor. Yen Sid disappears in a whisk of light. Back in the Wardrobe, the fairies have noticed a strange figure in the window

xml.sp: Merryweather My goodness, what's that!?

cutscene.desc: The raven has flown in with a long black dress. He sets it down on the floor and slowly hops off it

xml.sp: Merryweather Haven't we seen this somewhere before?
Fauna Yes, dear. I wonder whose it was...
Merryweather Oh, Malefi---

cutscene.desc: Merryweather clasps her hands over her mouth

xml.sp: Flora No! We mustn't remember her name! Oh dear...
Merryweather She was a mean ol' witch! Oh no! The memories are coming back! What'll we go!? Oooh---what'll we do!?

cutscene.desc: The cloak begins to change form and rise out of the ground. The fairies mumble to each other about the horridness of the situation

xml.sp: Fauna Perhaps we should tell Master Yen Sid.
Flora Yes. That's what we must do. Hurry!

cutscene.desc: Flora and Fauna leave the room. The darkened form of Maleficent rises

xml.sp: Merryweather Maleficent!

cutscene.desc: Merryweather also flees. Maleficent laughs at her return. In the Gummi Ship, Sora and company are hailed by Chip and Dale

xml.sp: Dale Howdy, Sora! How ya doin'?
Chip It's your favorite Gummi engineers here, ready for duty Chip...
Dale ...and Dale!
Chip 'n' Dale Happy flying!

cutscene.desc: Sora sees Hollow Bastion on the map

xml.sp: Sora Only one?
Donald That's no good!
Goofy Wait! I think it's a world we know!

cutscene.desc: In a room at the top of a dark tower in Hollow Bastion, Pete is searching around

xml.sp: Pete Maleficent! Maleficent!

cutscene.desc: Pete notices how empty the room is

xml.sp: Pete Maybe they really did finish her off.

cutscene.desc: Diablo flies closer to the tower

xml.sp: Pete And this castle sure ain't what I expected. No shine, no nothin'.

cutscene.desc: Diablo is almost at the room

xml.sp: Pete Now what's gonna happen to our plan?

cutscene.desc: Diablo the raven swoops onto the ledge and surprises Pete. On the other side of the world, the town is bustling with activity. Moogles are flying through the air selling items, and people are at work trying to rebuild the town. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run in and gaze at the castle in the midst of rebuilding

xml.sp: Sora It's Hollow Bastion!
Goofy Gawrsh, it looks kinda different now.
Donald I hope Leon and the gang are doing okay.

cutscene.desc: Goofy sees some Soldier Heartless on the roof of a nearby building

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-oh. Looks like we're gonna have to do some fightin'.

cutscene.desc: Sora and company walk through the Marketplace and spot an elderly duck holding some ice cream near a freezer

xml.sp: Donald Uncle Scrooge!?
Sora Er, who?
Goofy He's Donald's uncle---a business typhoon! Before the Heartless showed up, he traveled the worlds on a Gummi Ship with the King. He was helpin' to set up a traffic system.
Donald A transit system!
Scrooge What's all the racket?

cutscene.desc: Scrooge turns around and sees them

xml.sp: Scrooge Why, if it isn't Donald! And Goofy! Hello, lads! Aye, you all look hale and hearty!
Donald So do you, Uncle Scrooge.
Scrooge Ah, if only I were... I canna seem to recreate my favorite old-time ice cream. I'd make millions if I just got it right...

cutscene.desc: Scrooge looks at the ice cream bar in his hand, licks it, and looks disgusted

xml.sp: Scrooge Terrible...!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy make their way to the Borough, where some odd light pedestals appear and disappear, as if scanning for something

xml.sp: Donald Hey, what's going on?
Yuffie That's the town's defense mechanism.

cutscene.desc: The three look around and see Yuffie on top of a building

xml.sp: Sora Yuffie!

cutscene.desc: Yuffie waves slightly, and sees something behind them

xml.sp: Yuffie Look out!

cutscene.desc: Sora's Keyblade flashes into his hands as a Dusk swoops in to hit him. They are quickly surrounded by Nobodies. They dispose of them, and the defense mechanism also helps

xml.sp: Yuffie Hey, you guys!

cutscene.desc: Yuffie hops down to them

xml.sp: Yuffie I see you're still in top form.
Sora What'd you expect?

cutscene.desc: Sora pats his chest

xml.sp: Sora Looks like you're doing okay.
Yuffie Well, what did YOU expect?
Donald How are the others?
Yuffie Great!
Sora Hey, Yuffie! Have you seen the King and Riku?
Yuffie Nope.

cutscene.desc: She starts to walk off toward Merlin's House

xml.sp: Yuffie But I had a feeling I'd see you guys again.

sp.speaker: Sora imitating Leon
sp.q: We may never meet again, but we'll never forget each other.

xml.sp: Yuffie Is that supposed to be Leon?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy laugh

xml.sp: Yuffie Everybody's working on stuff over at Merlin's house. C'mon!

cutscene.desc: Yuffie runs around the corner. The others follow her and enter Merlin's House. Cid is typing at a computer, while Aerith and Leon watch

xml.sp: Yuffie Meet the Hollow Bastion Restoration Committee!
Aerith We missed you!
Cid Well, if you ain't in top shape.
Leon I knew it.
Sora Knew what?
Leon A while back, everyone suddenly remembered you guys, all at the same time.
Sora You...remembered? Wait! Does that mean you forgot about us!?
Donald annoyed Thanks!
Yuffie So where've you guys been all this time?
Goofy We were sleepin'.
Cid Where? In cold storage?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy act nervously

xml.sp: Aerith It doesn't matter. This is great. Everyone's together again!
Sora So, um...we're trying to find Riku and the King. Have you seen 'em?

cutscene.desc: Leon, Aerith, and Cid shake their heads

xml.sp: Sora Right.
Aerith Sorry. But let us know if there's anything we can do to help. Okay?
Sora Okay. Thanks.

cutscene.desc: Cid gets up in Sora's face

xml.sp: Cid Don't go thankin' us just yet.
Leon Hollow Bastion's got a problem. A big problem.
Sora You mean, like Nobodies? And Heartless?
Yuffie That's right!
Sora Sounds like you could use our help.
Leon Then let's cut to the chase. Sora, Donald, Goofy. We were hoping the three of you might give us a hand around here.

cutscene.desc: Sora pats his chest proudly

xml.sp: Sora Like we're gonna say, no?
Leon ...I forgot who I'm dealing with.
Donald Hey...what do you mean by that?
Aerith Just think of it as a sort of Leon compliment.

cutscene.desc: Leon opens the door

xml.sp: Leon Follow me to the bailey---there's something you need to see.

cutscene.desc: He leaves, and Merlin appears

xml.sp: Merlin Oh! I thought it was you. Right on time!
Donald It's Merlin!
Yuffie Sora and the gang said they're gonna help out!
Merlin Splendid! We'll count on you!
Sora, Donald, and Goofy Right!
Merlin Ah, yes. Did you give them the cards, dear?
Aerith Oh!

cutscene.desc: Aerith takes out three cards from her dress

xml.sp: Aerith Here...they're presents for you. Leon thought you might like to have them.

cutscene.desc: Sora takes the card and flips it so he can read it

xml.sp: Sora Hollow Bastion Restoration Committee Honorary Member!
Donald Membership cards!
Goofy Kinda cool, huh?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Sora nod

xml.sp: Sora Hey, thanks, Leahhh...huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around to the door and sees that Leon is gone

xml.sp: Sora Oh no! We're supposed to be at the bailey!
Merlin Just a moment, Sora. What about your magic?
Sora Huh? Oh, that's right...

cutscene.desc: Sora crosses his arms

xml.sp: Yuffie Maybe you forgot it while you were asleep!
Merlin Now, what am I to do with you? I suppose I'll have to lend you a few spells. But be careful with them!
Sora Thanks, Merlin!
Donald To the bailey, and fast!

cutscene.desc: Sora and company reach the bailey, and see Leon looking over the edge at the dark castle far in the distance

xml.sp: Leon Look at that.

cutscene.desc: Sora gasps

xml.sp: Leon We want to restore Hollow Bastion to what it used to be. Who knows---maybe even something better. There's still a lot to do, but I'm sure we can handle everything--- Except...for that...

cutscene.desc: He points to the castle, then points to two Dusks walking in the direction of the castle

xml.sp: Leon ...and that.
Sora We'll handle 'em!
Leon Well, that's good to hear. So Sora---do you know what's going on, then?
Sora There's this guy, Pete, who's been going around plotting with the Heartless. But he's not smart enough to tie his own shoes. The ones we need to worry about are the Nobodies.
Goofy And those Organization XIII guys in charge, too!
?????? You called?

cutscene.desc: All four of them look around and see no one. Sora runs out into an open area

xml.sp: ?????? You're doing well.
Sora Who's that!?

cutscene.desc: He unleashes his Keyblade

xml.sp: ?????? This calls for a celebration...

cutscene.desc: Several Dusks appear. Leon readies his Gunblade. Sora chases the Dusks through the bailey. The gate to the inside closes. Sora and Leon help keep the Nobodies away from the gate

xml.sp: ?????? The Keyblade...a truly marvelous weapon. Were it only in more...capable hands...

cutscene.desc: A group of six people laugh

xml.sp: Sora Show yourselves!

cutscene.desc: Six cloaked figures appear and the central one raises his arms

xml.sp: Goofy Organization XIII!
Sora Good! Now we can settle this!
?????? What a shame... And here I thought we could be friends.

cutscene.desc: They disappear in a laugh

xml.sp: Donald Stop!

cutscene.desc: Donald runs to a set of stairs and a single cloaked man appears before them

xml.sp: Donald What's the big idea!?
?????? Oopsy-daisy!
Sora Move!
?????? Now, do you think that's polite, shutting me down like that?
Sora I said get outta the way! ?????? As if! You can talk all you want, but that won't change a thing.
Donald Then we're gonna MAKE you move!
?????? See, that would work---if I were just any old dude. 'Cept I'm not. I'm with the Organization. Nothing any old about me.
Sora Ha! Tough talk for someone who stood on the sidelines while his Nobody flunkeys did the fighting!
?????? Oh, dear. I think you got the wrong impression.

cutscene.desc: The hooded man wags a finger at Sora

xml.sp: Sora You gonna cry?
?????? As if! Why don't I remind you how tough the crowd you're dealing with really is?
Sora Remind me?

cutscene.desc: Sora snaps out of it. The man laughs

xml.sp: ?????? That's RIGHT, he used to give me that same exact look.
Sora I guess you think you can psych me out by saying really random stuff!
?????? Gee... I just don't know.

cutscene.desc: The man spreads his arms open as if challenging them to strike him. He soon gives up

xml.sp: ?????? Be a good boy now!
Donald Wait!

cutscene.desc: He disappears as Donald tries to jump on him

xml.sp: Donald Nuts! He got away!
Sora That was weird. WHO gave him the same look?
Goofy Y'know, I think he was just tryin' to confuse ya.
Sora Yeah, you're right. Only one me!

cutscene.desc: Sora takes out his membership card and reads it

xml.sp: Sora The Hollow Bastion Restoration Committee Honorary Member---

cutscene.desc: The card begins to glow. Sora gasps and lets go of it. It floats in the air to everyone's amazement. The Keyblade glows

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Leon What's this?
Goofy Gawrsh, ya think...?

cutscene.desc: Light flashes from the Keyblade and the card. Wind blows through Sora's clothes and hair as a crown symbol appears on the ground beneath him. The card reveals a Keyhole and Sora locks it, opening a gateway

xml.sp: Sora Ohh...now I get it. That must've been the gate Yen Sid talked about.
Donald Oh boy!
Sora Sorry to run, Leon, but other worlds are calling.

cutscene.desc: Leon nods

xml.sp: Leon Organization XIII... They look tough. Be careful out there.
Sora See ya soon.

cutscene.desc: Leon salutes them. The cloaked members are now seated in a circular white room in various tall chairs

xml.sp: ?????? Do my eyes deceive me? Does he really have the power to wield the Keyblade. He's nothing but a boy.
?????? chuckling Give him a chance. It means he's straight as an arrow. pointing ahead He's pure of heart, unlike all of us here.
???? He'd better be, or else he's worthless.
?????? I truly hope he's enjoying himself on his adventure.

cutscene.desc: The man laughs softly, pulling out a deck of cards from his sleeve and choosing one, holding it between two fingers

xml.sp: ?????? Maybe he'd like a hand to determine his fate.
????? Hey, as long as it works in our favor! We can let him do what he wants for now. Then we'll all jump in if needed!
?????? Those are bold words coming from you. Are you saying you'll volunteer to take care of it if things go wrong?

cutscene.desc: The man abruptly sits up in his chair

xml.sp: ????? Huh? What?! Me?! No, you have the wrong guy... I'm not comfortable with that.

cutscene.desc: He waves his arms and shrinks back down

xml.sp: ?????? You act as though you have a conscience... When was the last time any one of us felt anything?
?????? Truer words were never spoken. He makes his card vanish into his hand Well, I suppose, the fun will have to wait.
???? Do you know what happens to those who lose their true purpose? Inevitably, they destroy themselves.
?????? Gentlemen.

cutscene.desc: They all look in toward the leader

xml.sp: ????? The hero of the Keyblade has embarked on a new adventure. Make sure it is one he will remember. Now, go.

cutscene.desc: All but the leader teleport away. Sora's group reboards the Gummi Ship and notices that their map has changed

xml.sp: Chip Hey! What happened to Twilight Town?
Dale It's gone!

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through the Asteroid Sweep to the Land of Dragons. A village is burning. A hawk flies through the air. A single man stands in the midst. The hawk lands on his shoulder and he smiles. A soldier watches from a bamboo grove

xml.sp: Mushu See that, Mulan? It's Shan-Yu, leader of the Hun army! C'mon, girl. This is your big chance!

cutscene.desc: The shadow of a large dragon surrounded by red smoke on a large rock is talking with the soldier

xml.sp: Mushu I can see it now Fa Mulan whups public enemy number one! You gonna be famous! I'm talkin' A-list!
Mulan Mushu, I'm not sure... I haven't even joined the army yet. I have to take my father's place to preserve the Fa family honor. I just hope I don't get discovered.
Mushu Whatever. You just scared---admit it.
Mulan Aren't you?

cutscene.desc: The dragon places a hand on his forehead. Sora, Donald, and Goofy are walking though the grove, when Goofy spots their conversation and stops. They see the shadow and become suspicious

xml.sp: Donald A Heartless?
Sora Let's get the jump on 'im!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald run ahead

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, maybe we better look before we leap.

cutscene.desc: Mulan gasps as they run in. Mushu jumps from behind the rock into Mulan's arms. He is definitely not a large dragon

xml.sp: Goofy Is that Mushu?

cutscene.desc: Mushu pops out from behind Mulan

xml.sp: Mushu That's right, I know you heard of me! I'm little, lethal, and legendary! Now y'all scram before I get my dragon dander up!
Sora Hey, Mushu! We missed you!
Mushu Yeah, well you better HOPE I miss YOU, or else you're---you're...Sora! Donald! Goofy!
Mulan Do you know them?

cutscene.desc: Mushu hops to the ground

xml.sp: Mushu Know them? Man, we used to kick all kinds of bad guy butt together! Yeah, you know, I helped these guys out of a lot of tight spots. 'Cause I'm a mighty dragon! Right?

cutscene.desc: Mushu leans against Sora's leg. Mulan is hesitant to show herself. Sora moves his leg and Mushu falls over

xml.sp: Sora Something like that. And...you are?
Mulan I'm Mulan. Um, no, I-I mean...

cutscene.desc: She quickly lowers her voice

xml.sp: Mushu Ping!
Donald Mulan Ping?
Mulan Just...Ping. I am Ping, son of Fa Zhou.
Sora You know Mushu?
Ping Mushu's one of my family's guardians.
Goofy We didn't know we were borrowin' somebody as important as a family guardian.

cutscene.desc: Mushu pops up

xml.sp: Mushu Yeah, that's right!

cutscene.desc: He scurries back up onto Ping's shoulders

xml.sp: Mushu And that puts you three up to your eyeballs in debt to Ping here.

cutscene.desc: Ping smiles awkwardly

xml.sp: Mushu Well, guess what, kiddies? It's payback time!
Mulan to the dragon Mushu...
Mushu Ah, they don't mind. Ain't that right?
Sora Hmm, sounds fair.
Mushu See, Ping here was just on his way to join the Imperial army.

cutscene.desc: Mushu switches shoulders

xml.sp: Mushu We gotta go find the other recruits over at the training camp.
Ping Would you join us? It'll be easier to fit in if I'm with guys, like you.
Sora What do you mean, fit in?
Mushu Well, um, uh, don't---don't worry about that.
Goofy You're pretendin' to be a boy, aren't ya?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald jump in surprise

xml.sp: Sora You're a...girl?
Mulan sheepishly You didn't notice?
Donald Uh-uh.
Sora Not me.
Mulan To Mushu I think it's working.
Mushu I don't know---those two would fall for anything.
Sora I'm right here!
Donald Hey!

cutscene.desc: They walk into the encampment

xml.sp: Mushu Remember, girl---manly!

cutscene.desc: Ping straightens up and does a very awkward strut into the camp. Sora joins a line of soldiers before being pushed from his spot by Yao

xml.sp: Yao 'Bout time we got some grub.
Sora Hey, no cutting!
Donald Get out!

cutscene.desc: Yao punches Sora in the face. Donald mumbles something and pounces on Yao

xml.sp: Yao Back off!

cutscene.desc: Yao and Donald exchange punches

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: Ling and Chien-Po come along

xml.sp: Ling Hey, a space in line!

cutscene.desc: Ling ends up pushing Yao farther from the line. Chien-Po accidentally knocks Ling and Yao away from the line

xml.sp: Chien-Po I wonder what they're serving for lunch today.

cutscene.desc: Yao gets Donald off him

xml.sp: Yao Knuckle sandwiches!

cutscene.desc: Yao punches Ling

xml.sp: Sora That does it!

cutscene.desc: Donald knocks Ling down and starts jumping on his back. Sora tries to grab Yao, but Yao knocks Sora's hands away. Chien-Po, Goofy, and Ping just stand there not really knowing what to do

xml.sp: Mulan Please!

cutscene.desc: They all stop fighting and turn to look at Mulan

xml.sp: Ling Please!
Yao What a girl!
Ping Uh...knock it off!
Yao Knock what off?
Sora You punched me!
Donald Cutting in line!
Ling What a shrimp!
Mushu popping out from Ping's armor Who you callin' a shrimp, panda lips? I'm a bona fide guardian dragon!

cutscene.desc: Ping shoves Mushu back inside

xml.sp: Ping L-let's just get back in line, okay?
Sora Whose side are you on? I just got slugged!
Yao Want some more?
Shang Soldiers! Get back in line!
Ling The Captain!

cutscene.desc: They all quickly regain the line formation. Donald peeks out for a second, then straights back up. The captain walks down the line staring at each of them. After he leaves, Sora makes a fist, glaring at Yao, before Shadow Heartless appear. Sora readies his Keyblade

xml.sp: Mulan What are they?
Sora Heartless!
Ling Oh yeah?

cutscene.desc: Ling, Yao, and Chien-Po ready their fists

xml.sp: Sora Ping, I hope you're ready!

cutscene.desc: They successfully get rid of the Heartless and the captain speaks to them

xml.sp: Shang You three. What are your names?
Sora Sora.
Donald Donald.
Goofy Goofy.
Shang You're welcome in my troop. Your battle skills are encouraging.
Ping I am the son of Fa Zhou---
Shang to Ping You should return home.
Ping B-but... That would dishonor my family!
Shang You'd rather dishonor my troops?
Ping trying to be tough Don't make me---!
Sora If Ping trains hard and does his best, he'll get stronger in no time.
Shang Hmm...
Sora Just give us an assignment! We'll show you how well we can work together.
Shang So...you want to be tested? Our orders are to ambush Shan-Yu's army on their way here. They should be coming through the mountain pass.
Donald We'll smash them!
Shang I doubt that. You four will be the advance party. Scout out the mountain for my troops.
Sora That's it? No problem. Right?
Ping R-right.
Shang I'll brief you on the details later. Return when you're ready to depart. Remember, the smallest mission may have the greatest purpose. Stay alert!
Sora, Donald, Goofy, & Ping Sir!

cutscene.desc: They talk to Captain Shang when they're ready

xml.sp: Shang Have you decided you're up for a mission? A strange figure was seen at the Checkpoint! Head there quickly and defeat the enemy!

cutscene.desc: After defeating the Heartless at the Checkpoint

xml.sp: Shang You've done a passable job. But stay alert! This is just the beginning. Shan-Yu has invaded our country. We must stop him at all costs. A mob is heading for the Checkpoint. Stop them while keeping an eye out for strange enemies!

cutscene.desc: After defeating the Heartless at the Checkpoint

xml.sp: Shang Hmm, not bad. Now brace yourself for the rest of your assignments. Our objective is to defeat Shan-Yu. Do not fail your mission. It seems the enemy has invaded the camp. Defeat every enemy you encounter!

cutscene.desc: After defeating the Heartless in the encampment

xml.sp: Shang Yes, that's exactly what I need from you. Now, you still have some tasks to do. Stay sharp. You did well.
Sora I knew it!
Ping Captain...
Shang to Ping I suppose you've made a little progress...
Donald Not a little---a lot!
Ping No. You're right, Captain. Please give me one more assignment. This time I'll show you what I'm truly made of!
Shang I'll give you one more chance. See me when you're ready to depart. Remember, this may be a test, but it's still an important mission. Be alert!
Sora, Donald, Goofy, & Ping Sir!

cutscene.desc: After readying themselves

xml.sp: Shang Your mission is to secure the path over the summit so our company can pass. I've authorized you to be let through to the summit. Don't let me down!

cutscene.desc: As the group enters the Mountain Trail, a hawk flies overhead. They fight their way to a village

xml.sp: Yao Hey, you ain't half bad.
Ling A man among men!
Ping Thanks!

cutscene.desc: Ling, Yao, and Chien-Po leave. Ping looks down

xml.sp: Ping But the Captain...
Sora Captain!

cutscene.desc: Shang arrives with two foot soldiers

xml.sp: Goofy Ping sure did great!
Donald You bet he did!
Shang Hmm...Fine. I'll let you join my troops... But I'm still not convinced you have what it takes to be a worthy soldier.
Sora Why not!?
Ping It's all right, Sora. I'll find a way to show him what I'm made of. Just give me a chance.
Shang That's the spirit, Ping.
Ping Sir!

cutscene.desc: Shang and the two foot soldiers continue into the summit

xml.sp: Ling Good going, Ping!
Ping Thanks!

cutscene.desc: They enter a small village near the summit

xml.sp: Mushu Okay, girl! Here's your chance! I just saw this real shady guy. And I know it's Shan-Yu.
Ping Shan-Yu!?
Sora That's the Hun leader! We've got to tell the Captain!
Ping Right!
Mushu Waaaait wait-wait-wait WAIT! Everybody use their heads a sec. Now, why are we here? To make the Captain see Mulan's---I mean, Ping's talents and bring honor to her family.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Mushu So, let's go find out where Shan-Yu is, by ourselves. Then, if we're lucky, we can fry him up good! Though just tracking the guy down should earn us our stars... Captain Musclehead will have to notice my girl!
Ping Okay. Let's go.
Sora We'll help out.
Mushu Now we're cookin'! Shan-Yu is in a cave outside the village!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Village Cave and find a small shrine

xml.sp: Sora Dead end.
Donald There's nobody here...
Mushu You're crazy. Check again!
Donald Oh, well...

cutscene.desc: Donald starts to leave

xml.sp: Goofy Wait for me, Donald!

cutscene.desc: Goofy follows Donald out of the cave

xml.sp: Sora Hey, wait up!

cutscene.desc: There is a strange shaking

xml.sp: Ping Huh?
Mushu What? What is it?

cutscene.desc: A barrier forms at the entrance blocking Donald and Goofy out

xml.sp: Donald Sora!
Goofy Ping!

cutscene.desc: Shan-Yu laughs and secretly leaves the cave. Several Heartless appear in the room, leaving Sora and Ping to take care of them

xml.sp: Sora Nice fighting, Ping! You were amazing.

cutscene.desc: The barrier vanishes

xml.sp: Goofy You okay?
Sora Yeah, thanks to Ping.
Mushu C'mon! Time to report to the Captain!
Ping But Shan-Yu wasn't here.
Mushu Please! That Hun is old news! We're gonna tell the Captain how thousands of Heartless stormed the cave, and Ping took out almost every one of 'em!

cutscene.desc: They return to the Village, which has been reduced to smoking ashes. They find Li Shang among the rubble clutching his side

xml.sp: Ping Captain!

cutscene.desc: Shang tries to stand, leaning against a blackened wall

xml.sp: Sora Don't overdo it, Captain!
Shang It's just a scratch.

cutscene.desc: Shang collapses to the ground slightly

xml.sp: Ping Captain, the enemy! Where did they go?
Shang They went toward the summit...
Ping We'll stop them!
Goofy It kinda is our fault.
Ping Right.
Mushu You mean MY fault.
Donald Uh-uh!
Sora Shan-Yu and the Heartless did this, not us! Captain, if you track down the villagers, we'll handle this.

cutscene.desc: They look toward the summit

xml.sp: Sora Let's go.

cutscene.desc: The group runs through the Ridge to the Summit. The hawk flies over them to land on Shan-Yu's shoulder at the top of the summit. Hundreds of Heartless hover over the edge of the cliff. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Ping get ready to fight. The hawk flies off Shan-Yu's shoulder as he cleaves the air with his sword

xml.sp: Shan-Yu Attack!

cutscene.desc: The Heartless charge down the mountain toward the group. Sora tries to fight them off until Shan-Yu speeds down the mountain with the group behind him. The hawk flies overhead as Yao, Chien-Po, and Ling enter the summit with a fire cannon

xml.sp: Yao Stand back!
Ling We'll handle this!

cutscene.desc: Yao places the fire cannon on the snow and aims it at Shan-Yu. Mulan sees how that's not going to help completely and buts Yao out of the way

xml.sp: Ping Sorry!

cutscene.desc: Ping grabs the fire cannon and runs higher up the mountain. She aims it at the peak above

xml.sp: Mulan Oh, a flint, flint, I need so---huh...

cutscene.desc: She looks at Mushu

xml.sp: Mushu Me, hey, whoa! Whoa! Wait a second! Ah!

cutscene.desc: Ping grabs Mushu and stretches him so his fire breath lights the fire cannon. Mushu ends up on the head of the cannon as it explodes, shooting him off to the mountaintop

xml.sp: Mushu You're going the wrong way!

cutscene.desc: The cannon hits the mountain, causing an immense avalanche

xml.sp: Ping Yes!
Sora Captain?

cutscene.desc: Shang enters with two foot soldiers. Ping looks from Shang to the avalanche, then back at Shang. She runs to the captain

xml.sp: Mulan Look out!

cutscene.desc: The snow races down the summit, plowing over the Heartless and Shan-Yu, heading straight for Sora and the others. Mulan runs to Shang and grabs him by the hand, pulling him around the rock corner away from the pummeling snow

xml.sp: Yao Run for it!

cutscene.desc: Sora and the rest of the troops quickly make a run for it around the rock formation as the snow falls off the edge of the summit. Shang and Ping catch their breath

xml.sp: Shang Thanks, Ping.
Ping It...was nothing.

cutscene.desc: They stand up

xml.sp: Shang I should never have doubted you. From now on, you have my trust.
Ping Thank you, Captain.

cutscene.desc: Mushu pops out of the snow

xml.sp: Mushu First she uses me as a lighter, then she turns me into a cannon ball. The head ancestor's gonna hear about this. You know, that's it! I give up! I can't take this no more. C'mon, Mulan. Let's quit this charade and go home, girl.
Mulan Mushu!
Mushu Huh?

cutscene.desc: Mushu sees that Shang is right there and clasps his hands over his mouth

xml.sp: Shang Mulan? A woman? It can't be!

cutscene.desc: Mulan says nothing. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run up to them

xml.sp: Sora Ping! Captain!
Goofy Oh boy, you're okay!
Shang You all knew, didn't you? You knew Ping was really a woman in disguise.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy are at a loss for words

xml.sp: Shang I can't believe you lied to me. The punishment for high treason and dishonoring the Army...is death. Get out of my sight...now. You're all dismissed.
Sora But Captain...
Shang My debt is repaid.

cutscene.desc: Shang walks back toward the Ridge

xml.sp: Shang The Emperor is waiting! Move out!

cutscene.desc: The troops leave the summit. Mulan sighs. Mushu hops onto her shoulder

xml.sp: Mushu Mulan... I blew it.

cutscene.desc: Mulan changes out of her armor

xml.sp: Mulan Thank you, everyone. Sorry I got you in trouble.
Sora It's no big deal. So Ping... I mean, uh, Mulan...what're you gonna do now?
Mulan Go back home.
Mushu You know, your daddy's gonna be steamed as a chicken dumpling.

cutscene.desc: Mulan sighs again. Sora takes Donald and Goofy into his arms

xml.sp: Sora Relax, we'll take our share of the blame.
Mulan Thanks. You're all wonderful friends.

cutscene.desc: They walk back to the Ridge. The hawk flies overhead to the Summit, where Shan-Yu bursts out of the snow and roars in anger. It rings throughout the mountain. The Heartless appear behind him and the hawk lands on his shoulder. Sora and Mulan see them

xml.sp: Mulan Shan-Yu!
Sora He's alive!
Mulan He's heading for the Imperial City! We've got to warn Shang!

cutscene.desc: They race to the city, where the troops have just entered the palace walls

xml.sp: Mulan ---Shang!

cutscene.desc: Shang stops

xml.sp: Mulan Shan-Yu is alive! He's headed this way!
Shang And why should I believe you this time?
Sora But...she's telling you the truth!

cutscene.desc: Donald spots the hawk flying high above the palace. Shang looks around onto several of the towers as Shan-Yu stands triumphantly upon one. He jumps down to get closer to a way in the palace

xml.sp: Shang Guard the palace! Do not let the enemy get anywhere near the Emperor!

cutscene.desc: Yao, Ling, and Chien-Po charge the palace, but the other soldiers remain where they are

xml.sp: Shang That's an order!

cutscene.desc: The soldiers stop in their tracks and change into Heartless. Shang is speechless. Sora and Mulan take action

xml.sp: Sora Captain! We'll secure the courtyard, and you can save the Emperor!

cutscene.desc: Shang stays where he is

xml.sp: Donald That's an order!

cutscene.desc: Shang nods and races to the main palace building. The Heartless surround the remaining group. They quickly decimate the Heartless

xml.sp: Mulan The Emperor's in danger!
Sora nodding No time to lose!

cutscene.desc: They run across Imperial Square to the Palace Gate, where Shan-Yu stands with his sword to the Emperor

xml.sp: Shan-Yu Now you'll bow to me!

cutscene.desc: Shan-Yu looks to Mulan, who looks worried. Shang jumps down in the middle of them and knocks Shan-Yu away. Shang helps the Emperor into the Palace and Chien-Po and Ling quickly close the gate. Shan-Yu gets back up as Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Mulan guard the gate, stopping Shan-Yu in his tracks

xml.sp: Mulan It ends now!
Sora Right now!

cutscene.desc: The hawk lands on Shan-Yu's shoulder as he glows with dark energy, laughing evilly. After the grueling fight, Shan-Yu clutches his side and falls over, losing the grip on his sword. Mushu jumps around happily

xml.sp: Mushu Now that's what I call burning some hunny-bun! Aw, yeah! Mulan's the best! Mulan's the best! No, wait a minute---I'm the best! Mushu's the best! Mushu's the best!

cutscene.desc: Sora and company stand in reverence to the Emperor, who walks out with Shang, a stern look on his face. There are hundred of people now in Imperial Square

xml.sp: Emperor I've heard a great deal about you, Fa Mulan.

cutscene.desc: Mulan bows to the Emperor

xml.sp: Emperor You stole your father's armor, ran away from home, impersonated an Imperial soldier. You deceived your commanding officer, shamed the entire Chinese army, and dishonored your family name.
Sora impatiently We get the picture...
Emperor You're a young woman. And in the end...

cutscene.desc: Donald looks hopeless

xml.sp: Emperor ...you have saved us all.

cutscene.desc: The Emperor bows to Mulan. She looks up and is completely speechless. The crowd in the square cheers. Sora, Donald, and Goofy congratulate Mulan

xml.sp: Mulan Your Excellency!
Emperor Captain Li?

cutscene.desc: Shang takes Shan-Yu's sword and hands it to Mulan

xml.sp: Emperor Take this, so the world will know what it is you have done for China.
Mulan Thank you.

cutscene.desc: She bows again

xml.sp: Shang Mulan.
Mulan Yes?
Shang Sora.
Sora Sir.
Shang Donald.
Donald Wak!
Shang Goofy.
Goofy Yes, sir.
Shang Thank you.

cutscene.desc: He bows to them slightly

xml.sp: Emperor Thank you? Is that all there is to say, Captain? If you wish to win the heart of Fa Mulan, China's bravest woman, you'll have to be a bit more eloquent than that!

cutscene.desc: Shang is surprised. The Emperor laughs, as does Mulan

xml.sp: Sora to Mulan Can I get an autograph?
Mulan Thanks for everything, Sora.
Mushu Now they GOTTA let me go back to bein' a guardian! They GOTTA!
Goofy But Mushu, I thought you already WERE a family guardian!
Mushu What? Oh, no, no---don't even worry about that, that's just real technical. Just for us guardians.
Sora You tricked us!
Mushu No, no no no, see I did---I just, uh...

cutscene.desc: Mushu turns to run away

xml.sp: Mushu You know, I just didn't wanna bog y'all down with all the Guardian-ese. See, it's very complex, a lot of fine print. You wouldn't understand.

cutscene.desc: Shan-Yu's sword glows and Sora stops chasing Mushu

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora gets out the Keyblade and opens another gate

xml.sp: Donald Okay!
Goofy Guess it's about time to be movin' on.
Emperor You shall be missed.
Sora Is it okay if we come back to visit?
Mulan Of course!
Shang We will look forward to your return.
Sora You two play nice.
Shang Whoa... Watch it, soldier!

cutscene.desc: Mulan blushes as Sora waves goodbye. They turn to look at each other. Mulan giggles. Mushu pops up onto her shoulder and laughs

xml.sp: Mulan Goodbye, Sora, Donald, Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy walk down the steps of the Imperial Palace and leave the Land of Dragons. Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through the Stardust Sweep to an enchanted castle in the midst of a dark forest. The three enter through large doors into a dimly lit and empty hallway

xml.sp: Sora Hey, what is this place?
Donald It's huge!
Goofy And sorta gloomy, don't ya think?
Sora I wonder who lives here.

cutscene.desc: A loud familiar roar rings through the castle

xml.sp: Goofy Hey, does anybody else recognize that?

cutscene.desc: They hear another growl

xml.sp: Sora Hey! That's the Beast!
Donald Yeah.
Goofy Maybe we should check up on him.
Sora Look!

cutscene.desc: A Shadow Heartless sneaks across the floor into the Parlor

xml.sp: Donald C'mon!

cutscene.desc: The three run to the room. Donald peeks around the doorframe

xml.sp: Donald Where did it go?

cutscene.desc: His eyes meet a mysterious glowing rose under a glass case sitting on a table in the corner of the room. He walks over to it when the Shadow pops out of the ground, snapping Donald from his trance

xml.sp: Donald Found it!

cutscene.desc: Many more spring up and surround them and Sora gets out his Keyblade. They try to fight them off, but more just keep coming

xml.sp: Sora Aw, c'mon! Enough already!
Donald Somebody help us!

cutscene.desc: The doors slam open and the Beast walks in with an angry scowl on his face. Sora, Donald, and Goofy look hopeful. The Beast knocks away the Heartless that attack him and growls

xml.sp: Sora Just in time!

cutscene.desc: The Beast walks over to the rose, knocking the trio away. He clenches the rose glass, almost fondling it, and walks out of the room. Donald, Goofy, and Sora watch him leave. Donald rubs his head

xml.sp: Goofy Gee, do ya think he maybe forgot who we are?
Sora With this many Heartless around, something must be up.
Donald Why'd he have to do that?

cutscene.desc: The three leave the room, but Donald stops

xml.sp: Sora What is it?
Donald I just know I saw a lady at the top of those stairs...

cutscene.desc: They look up to the long staircase branching to the east and west

xml.sp: Goofy Well... If the Beast is here in the castle, that lady musta been Belle, right?
Sora Yeah, maybe so. Belle might know what's happened to the Beast, too.
Goofy C'mon! Let's go find her!

cutscene.desc: The trio run up the stairs into the East Wing. Sora turns around and puts a finger to his lips

xml.sp: Sora Shhh!

cutscene.desc: Goofy clasps his hands over his mouth. They sneak closer to the door

xml.sp: Belle What am I going to do?

cutscene.desc: Sora points to the door quietly. Donald and Goofy nod. Donald steps back from the door

xml.sp: Donald Okay.

cutscene.desc: He gets ready to run

xml.sp: Sora Donald!

cutscene.desc: Donald blasts through the doors

xml.sp: Donald Hey! Who opened the door?
Belle Oh, I'm so happy you're here!

cutscene.desc: Belle grabs Donald and hugs him

xml.sp: Belle Donald! Sora! Goofy!
Sora Hiya!

cutscene.desc: He and Goofy wave

xml.sp: Donald Put me down! Put me down!

cutscene.desc: Belle finally realizes and sets the dizzy Donald down

xml.sp: Donald Where's the Beast?
Belle Oh, he must be in the west wing. We don't talk like we used to.
Sora Did something happen?
Belle Yes. Isn't that why you're here?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy look to Sora, who shrugs

xml.sp: Goofy Not exactly. But we can still help!

cutscene.desc: Donald nods

xml.sp: Sora Since we're here and all.
Donald The Beast won't talk to you?
Belle He's been acting strange lately. The only ones who might know why are locked up in the dungeon. I want to help them, but...
Sora Wait a second. Who locked who up?
Belle The Beast locked up his servants.
Donald But why?
Belle That's what I don't know.
Sora Hmm. Where's this dungeon?
Belle You can get to the undercroft from the west hall. The dungeon is down there.
Sora West hall. Got it.
Belle Be careful!

cutscene.desc: Sora gives her a thumbs up. They leave and enter the west hall past rows of armor

xml.sp: Sora There should be a way into the undercroft around here...

cutscene.desc: Sora finds a wardrobe down the hall that seems to be blocking something, so he tries to move it. Behind, he sees a door

xml.sp: Sora Here it is!
Wardrobe Do you MIND!?

cutscene.desc: The wardrobe moves back again, blocking the door. Sora again pushes the wardrobe slowly so as not to wake her up. Once he finally moves her completely out of the way, she wakes up

xml.sp: Wardrobe And I was just starting to get comfortable... May I help you?
Sora Huh? What? Oh, right---Belle needs us to go to the dungeon.
Wardrobe Goodness! You're here to help my friends? Well, why didn't you say so?
Sora Er...
Wardrobe I'm sorry I startled you. Oh, I used to be human, you know, until the enchantress cast her spell. I was turned into a wardrobe when the prince was turned into a beast.
Donald The prince is the Beast!?
Goofy The Beast is a prince!?
Wardrobe That's right. Although his behavior was far from princely at the time.
Sora What's this about a...spell?
Wardrobe Well, it was a cold winter's night...

cutscene.desc: The three nod, interested to hear more

xml.sp: Wardrobe And that's enough for now. You can hear the rest when you've rescued the others. It'll give you something to look forward to.
Donald Aww...
Wardrobe Hurry, now. The dungeon is damp and chilly. Certainly no place for a clock!
Goofy A clock?
Wardrobe You'll find out soon enough.
Sora All right. Let's get going.

cutscene.desc: They enter the door to the undercroft and find a strange door with two stone creatures on it

xml.sp: Sora This must be it.

cutscene.desc: Donald walks over to the door and places an ear against it. The eyes of the creatures glow. Donald backs away from the door as the creatures come alive and grab the keyhole of the door

xml.sp: Donald Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: Donald runs before one of the Heartless creatures slams a fist down on top of him. The creatures slam their fists together. Sora defeats the door and an odd dark spiked ball floats out of it. They watch it hover into the room and disappear. The door becomes unlocked

xml.sp: Donald You think the dungeon's past this door?
Goofy C'mon, we gotta set those servants free!
Sora He's right. Let's go.

cutscene.desc: They enter the door and find a small room with a few objects inside

xml.sp: Sora There's nobody here.
Donald You mean there's nobody to rescue?

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs

xml.sp: Lumiere Did someone say rescue?
Cogsworth Shhh! Keep quiet. It might be THEM.
Mrs. Potts Oh, they look like nice boys to me.
Goofy to the room We are nice. We're your friends.
Sora Yeah. Belle sent us to find you.

cutscene.desc: A clock, a candlestick, a teapot, and a teacup hop off their chairs and join Sora's group, who bend down to their level

xml.sp: Sora I'm Sora. Donald. Goofy.

cutscene.desc: Sora motions to them as he says their names. Donald reaches to grab Cogsworth, scaring the rest of the servants and Goofy and Sora. Donald picks up Cogsworth

xml.sp: Cogsworth ...D-don't touch! I-I am self-winding, sir!

cutscene.desc: Donald inspects the clock, who is waving about. Donald shakes him

xml.sp: Sora to Lumiere I'm glad you're okay.
Lumiere It is we who are overjoyed to see you!

cutscene.desc: Donald tickles Cogsworth's foot and pulls on his arm

xml.sp: Goofy Did somebody put a spell on you guys, too?
Cogsworth Yes, that's right! You've heard! It was the enchantress.
Lumiere It seems so long ago...

cutscene.desc: Sora puts Chip down

xml.sp: Mrs. Potts It was a cold winter's night... An old beggar woman came to the castle, and asked for shelter.
Cogsworth But the master of this castle, that is of course, the Prince...

cutscene.desc: Donald opens up Cogsworth’s window and plays with his pendulum

xml.sp: Cogsworth Stop that! Put me down this instant!

cutscene.desc: Cogsworth shuts his window, and Donald places him onto a box

xml.sp: Cogsworth Thank you!

cutscene.desc: Cogsworth dusts off and clears his throat

xml.sp: Cogsworth The master turned her away. All because of her, ahem, meager appearance.
Goofy That's awful!
Lumiere Oui. He was a spoiled prince, so selfish and...how shall I say...cruel.
Cogsworth Lumiere!
Mrs. Potts The old woman warned our master not to be deceived by appearances... Still, he would not take her in.
Cogsworth Then the old woman's ugliness melted away to reveal a beautiful enchantress.
Mrs. Potts She turned the Prince into a beast, a shape she thought fitting for his cold heart.
Cogsworth And to further punish him, everyone in the castle was enchanted, too.
Sora Wow... That's quite a story.
Goofy Is there anything we can do to help?
Donald Let's get the enchantress!
Mrs. Potts Oh no, dear.
Lumiere We already know what needs to be done, but with the master out of sorts...
Sora He sure is acting weird.
Mrs. Potts It's almost as if he's forgotten how to trust others.
Cogsworth You don't suppose he's been turned into a Heartless, do you?
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Heartless!?
Sora If they're a part of this, then it's a good thing we're here.
Donald Let's go find the Beast!
Cogsworth Splendid!

cutscene.desc: Lumiere hops down and reaches the door

xml.sp: Lumiere Follow me, messieurs. I know a shortcut.

cutscene.desc: They continue into the undercroft. On the upper level, two suits of armor guard a door

xml.sp: Cogsworth Allow our guests to pass!

cutscene.desc: The suits step aside and the doors open. Mrs. Potts, Chip, and Lumiere walk inside

xml.sp: Cogsworth to Sora After you.

cutscene.desc: They enter the

xml.sp: Lumiere I'm afraid we won't be marching out that easily. You see, the door leading to the other side is concealed by a sort of contraption.
Sora What kind of contraption?
Cogsworth Observe.

cutscene.desc: Cogsworth jumps onto a crank, which lowers a dark flaming lantern

xml.sp: Donald The lantern came down!
Lumiere Indeed it did. If we could but light all the lanterns in this passage the secret door would open...
Mrs. Potts But, as you can see, the lanterns are already burning---with an enchanted flame.
Lumiere You must put out this enchanted flame before I am able to light the lanterns properly.
Goofy Can't ya just throw some water on 'em?
Mrs. Potts I'm afraid that's not enough. But if you use the power of light...
Sora Hmm... How about I try using the Keyblade?

cutscene.desc: Sora points his Keyblade at the lantern. The enchanted flame dies down and Lumiere lights the lantern normally

xml.sp: Lumiere Bravo!
Mrs. Potts Only three lanterns left! If we work together, we'll have that door open in no time!
Sora Piece of cake!
Lumiere Again, it is not quite so simple, mon ami. Certainly you cannot expect Cogsworth to hang from that handle forever?
Cogsworth What? Why? Lumiere! You---
Lumiere If he gets tired and falls off, all the unlit lanterns will rise to the ceiling again.
Mrs. Potts Before you can continue, you must see to Cogsworth. Once he gets his strength back, he'll grasp the lever again for you.
Sora Let's give it a shot!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Cogsworth, Mrs. Potts, and Lumiere repeat this on each of the other lanterns to open the passageway

xml.sp: Sora Are we all set?
Lumiere Oui. The secret door should open now.
Goofy But I don't see any secret door.
Cogsworth No need to worry. Just push that block over there---the one that's sticking out.
Sora Got it.

cutscene.desc: Sora pushes the block into the wall and it reveals a set of stairs

xml.sp: Lumiere Now, I must check on the castle. I fear my absence has been too long.
Mrs. Potts I'd best be off, too, dears.
Sora Watch out for the Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Lumiere, Mrs. Potts, and Chip leave

xml.sp: Cogsworth The master's room is at the very end of the west wing. I shall go on ahead and wait for you.

cutscene.desc: Sora proceeds through the west wing into The Beast's Room. The Beast is talking with a hooded visitor in front of the enchanted rose

xml.sp: ?????? It's time you dealt with Belle. She's scheming to take everything you have. This castle, your precious rose. And then---your life. Trust no one. Feed your anger! Only anger will keep you strong.
Beast I've had enough of strength. There's only one thing I want---
?????? What? To love, and be loved in return? Who could ever love a beast?

cutscene.desc: The Beast turns around and roars angrily. The hooded man notices Sora, Donald, and Goofy's entrance. They are ready to fight

xml.sp: ?????? See? She has accomplices.

cutscene.desc: The man forms a barrier protecting the area of the room with the rose, and he vanishes. The four walk over to the Beast

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Prince!

cutscene.desc: The Beast roars, stopping them in their tracks

xml.sp: Cogsworth Oh dear! Master!

cutscene.desc: The Beast angrily slashes and growls at Sora and Donald, who leap out of the way. The Beast lets out another loud roar, and the fight ensues

xml.sp: Cogsworth Please, Master! Please! Compose yourself!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Cogsworth help the Beast regain his senses

xml.sp: Beast Cogsworth...what happened?
Cogsworth Well, Master...ah, you see...that is... How shall I say...ah, actually...mmm...
Donald Well, you put everybody down there in that dungeon!
Beast I did what?
Cogsworth Ah...you did!

cutscene.desc: The Beast looks at the floor, saying nothing

xml.sp: Sora Who was that guy you were talking to? The one in black?

Beast Xaldin... that's his name. He came from the darkness... He...used my anger to control me. He took all my sorrow, my sadness, my pain---and turned it all into rage. There was nothing I could do... I could no longer see the truth.
Goofy Well, I'll be. That must be why you threw all of your friends down there into the dungeon. You wanted to make sure that you didn't hurt 'em, right?
Beast Was that it? Was it to protect them?
Goofy Sure. We know you're good inside.
Cogsworth He's right, Master. We've all seen how kind you can be. After all... Belle can see the goodness in your heart, but I'm afraid you've yet to---
Beast Belle!

cutscene.desc: Beast sighs

xml.sp: Beast I've mistreated her... I've mistreated her and been so selfish.
Sora She didn't say anything about that.
Beast She'd never tell anyone of my cruelty... She's too good.
Cogsworth to Sora You see, I'm afraid he judges himself far too harshly.
Sora Why don't you just go talk to her?
Beast But...
Sora No excuses! C'mon, we'll go with you.

cutscene.desc: The group proceeds to Belle's Room in the East Wing

xml.sp: Wardrobe Master!
Donald Everybody's safe now.
Wardrobe Wonderful! Thank you!
Beast Where is Belle?
Wardrobe Why, she left in a hurry. Something about going after this...man in black.
Beast WHAT!? Why doesn't she do as she's told?
Wardrobe Temper, temper! Her spirit is what makes Belle so special.
Sora We'd better go find her!

cutscene.desc: They race to the Entrance Hall

xml.sp: Belle I'm warning you! You'll be sorry!
Beast Belle! Where are you?
Belle Beast! Help! I'm in the ballroom!

cutscene.desc: Belle runs across the ballroom floor, as Sora and crew enter

xml.sp: Beast Belle!
Belle I'm all right!

cutscene.desc: Belle runs to the balcony door and closes it before a large spiked ball in chains floats down in front of it, trying to go after her. It turns around and changes targets. It floats up to the large candelabra and drops down into the floor. Waves of darkness emanate through the ballroom, poisoning it. Donald jumps into Goofy's arms to get off the floor. The chained ball jumps back out of the floor as the dark pool climbs up the ballroom pillars. It covers the intricate painting on the ceiling and mutates the chandelier. After a short battle, the ball spasms and covers itself in dark webs. The webs burst, revealing a large violet creature with pink throbbing fins attached to its head. It roars and Sora moves into action. After a grueling battle with the monster, it roars and is obliterated. The ballroom returns to normal

xml.sp: Sora We did it!
Xaldin So you think.

cutscene.desc: The three look over at the door to the Entrance Hall and see Xaldin, still hooded

xml.sp: Beast Xaldin!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Beast run over to Xaldin, who disappears in a dark wave

xml.sp: Xaldin Farewell.

cutscene.desc: They stop running

xml.sp: Beast What does he want here?

Sora He must be with Organization XIII. Ever heard of the Nobodies? When a strong-hearted person turns into a Heartless, a Nobody's created, too. See, the Organization...they've got control of all the Nobodies.
Goofy That's right. And they were gonna make you into a Heartless. That way, they could get that Nobody of yours and have control over it.

cutscene.desc: Sora points at Goofy and nods

xml.sp: Belle You're alright!

cutscene.desc: Belle walks back in from the balcony doors

xml.sp: Beast Belle!

cutscene.desc: The Beast runs over to her. Mrs. Potts, Lumiere, Chip, and Cogsworth walk in

xml.sp: Beast Belle... I-I'm sorry---I...wasn't myself. I hope I haven't done anything to hurt you.

cutscene.desc: Belle smiles, making Beast smile back

xml.sp: Beast Forgive me.
Belle I know you weren't yourself. You don't have to apologize. But I had hoped...that you might have changed a little bit.

cutscene.desc: Belle wags a finger at Beast, who looks sheepish

xml.sp: Belle I wish you could start trusting me.

cutscene.desc: She crosses her arms. Beast looks down

xml.sp: Lumiere Oh, I am afraid time is running short.
Sora What do you mean?
Lumiere Remember the rose?
Donald From the Beast's room?
Cogsworth Precisely. You see, if the master can learn to love, and earn love in return, before the last petal falls...
Lumiere ...the spell will be broken.
Sora Really? You think he's gonna make it?
Mrs. Potts We think so.

cutscene.desc: She rubs up against Chip

xml.sp: Goofy Yep, I think you're right.
Sora I HOPE you're right...

cutscene.desc: Sora's Keyblade appears. The rose glass in Beast's room floats into the air. The Keyblade emits a bright light. Sora opens another gateway

xml.sp: Beast What happened?
Donald The gate is open!
Belle Do you have to go?
Sora Yeah.
Goofy Now, no more arguin', okay?

cutscene.desc: The Beast looks at Belle, then looks away

xml.sp: Lumiere bowing We'll see to it.
Mrs. Potts Take care, dears.
Cogsworth You're welcome here anytime.
Sora If you hear anything about Riku or the King, the Heartless, the Organization---anything at all---let us know!

cutscene.desc: Belle and Beast nod

xml.sp: Sora Okay, gotta go!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy wave

xml.sp: Donald Bye bye!

cutscene.desc: The trio leaves Beast's Castle and they notice something odd about the Gummi Ship once they're aboard

xml.sp: Goofy Huh?
Sora Hey, wait a minute... Is the ship moving all on its own?
Goofy Yup! Looks like we're headed toward Hollow Bastion.

cutscene.desc: The ship docks in Hollow Bastion and they get off at the Borough

xml.sp: Sora I wonder what's up.

cutscene.desc: They walk to Merlin's House and see the door is open. Several Soldier Heartless run out of it

xml.sp: Donald Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: The Heartless disappear

xml.sp: Sora C'mon!

cutscene.desc: They run into the house and see Merlin on the floor. Merlin adjusts his glasses and stands up as Sora runs over to him

xml.sp: Merlin Well, now...took your time, did you?
Goofy Oh, was it you who summoned us, Merlin?
Merlin Yes, yes... But it seems I used too much power in doing so, and those infernal Heartless...
Sora So, what's up?
Merlin Well, I happened to stumble across this in the Zero District.

cutscene.desc: A familiar book appears in Merlin's hand. He hands it to Donald

xml.sp: Sora Pooh's storybook!

Merlin That's right. I know you're a good friend of Winnie the Pooh, Sora---that's why I summoned you. And when I did, I was attacked by the Heartless. Of course, I fought back with some rather powerful magic, but then I began to fear the book would be damaged, so I... Oh! Now, just a moment. Leon and the others need to hear this too. I-I'd better go find them. Be back in a jiffy.

cutscene.desc: Merlin vanishes in a puff of smoke

xml.sp: Sora I wonder how Pooh's doing.
Donald Wanna find out?
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Donald opens the book and holds it up

xml.sp: Goofy Sora...
Sora Cover for me, okay?

cutscene.desc: Sora enters the book

xml.sp: Sora I wonder if Pooh's home.

cutscene.desc: He enters Pooh Bear's House, and sees Pooh sitting on a log. Pooh notices his entrance

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Pooh Bear! How you doing? Finding enough honey lately?
Pooh Oh, yes. In fact, I was just about to do my stoutness exercises. Would you like to join me, Sora?
Sora Sure, I'm game!

cutscene.desc: Pooh hops off the log, but somehow is caught midjump and everything freezes

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora tries to touch Pooh and is thrown back out of the Hundred Acre Wood. He lands on the floor in Merlin's House. The book, which is now on a desk, closes

xml.sp: Donald Sora! Hurry up!
Sora Donald?

cutscene.desc: Sora runs outside to join his friends in midbattle with the Heartless

xml.sp: Goofy Did ya bring the book, Sora?

cutscene.desc: Three Soldier Heartless run out of Merlin's House, one carrying the book

xml.sp: Sora Hey!
Donald Give that back!

cutscene.desc: They fight the Heartless, but the book's cover gets slashed in the process. Sora picks it up off the ground

xml.sp: Sora Think it's okay?
Goofy Gawrsh, maybe ya better go back and make sure Pooh's all right.
Donald But what about Merlin?
Goofy Well, I guess we could explain...
Sora Great!

cutscene.desc: Donald takes the book and holds it open again. Sora reenters and goes to Pooh's House. Pooh is still sitting on the log

xml.sp: Sora Pooh!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs over

xml.sp: Sora I'm so glad you're okay, Pooh.
Pooh And I'm glad you came to visit. But you see, I was just about to begin my stoutness exercises. Perhaps we could visit a bit later...Somebody-I-Don't-Know.

cutscene.desc: Pooh hops off the log

xml.sp: Sora Oh...sure.

cutscene.desc: Pooh begins to exercise, touching his toes and stretching his legs

xml.sp: Sora So...how's Piglet these days?
Pooh I don't think I know anyone by that name. Now where was I? Oh, yes. My stoutness exercises.
Sora Pooh? Hey! Pooh?

cutscene.desc: Pooh doesn't notice Sora and says nothing

xml.sp: Sora Something very weird is happening here. Maybe I'd better go back and ask Merlin about this.

cutscene.desc: Sora leaves the book

xml.sp: Merlin Couldn't be bothered to wait up for an old wizard, eh?
Sora Sorry about that...
Merlin How are things in there?
Sora Well... Pooh seems to have forgotten all about me. And not just me---all his other friends, too.
Merlin I was afraid of that...

cutscene.desc: Merlin walks over to the book and inspects it

xml.sp: Merlin I suspect it has something to do with those pages the Heartless stole. You'll have to collect the torn pages and repair the book to put things right. This book is one of the world's most cherished elements. I'd been meaning to tell Leon I'd found it, but perhaps we should keep it between us for now.
Sora, Donald, and Goofy We will!
Merlin Good, good... Now, the book isn't all that's cherished... This is for you, Sora.
Sora What is it?
Merlin Simply concentrate on it with all your heart, and you need only say the word to summon an ally who will help in times of need.
Goofy Like Simba and Mushu did, the last time we were here?
Merlin Precisely. Now go forth, with your friends by your side!
Sora Thanks, Merlin. We're worried about Pooh, so we'll be back once we've found those torn pages.

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through the Phantom Storm to a dark underworld, where above in the Olympus Coliseum, Hercules has just defeated the Rock Titan

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Goofy Are ya sure this is the coliseum?
Donald It's that way!

cutscene.desc: Donald points to a set of stairs leading upward

xml.sp: Sora Oh... Guess we were a little off.

cutscene.desc: They hear a scream and see a woman running from a bunch of Rabid Dog Heartless. The woman falls and the Heartless are upon her

xml.sp: Sora Heartless!

cutscene.desc: Sora and the others run over, scaring the Heartless away. Sora offers to help her up

xml.sp: Meg Thanks, but...I'm fine.

cutscene.desc: Meg stands up

xml.sp: Meg And you're supposed to be?
Sora I'm Sora, he's Donald, and that's Goofy. We came to see how Hercules is doing.

cutscene.desc: She looks at each of them in turn

xml.sp: Meg You know Wonderboy?
Donald Yeah, 'cause we're heroes, too!
Goofy Ya mean, junior heroes, Donald.
Meg Looks like we have a friend in common. Name's Megara. My friends call me Meg.
Sora So how's Herc?

Meg Wonderboy? Well, he's duking it out at the Coliseum every day. You know, a hero's work is never done and all that. He's ready to drop, but he keeps on fighting. Even Wonderboy has his limits, though. These opponents are bad news---special deliveries from Hades himself...
Donald Hades!?
Meg Right. Lord of the Underworld. I was on my way to see him. Maybe I can get Hades to give Wonderboy a breather. If anything happens to that kid...
Goofy Gawrsh... Sounds like you're more than just friends!
Meg Oh...uh, I mean...
Sora We'll go have a little talk with Hades. I'd hate for anything to happen to you on your way to see him.
Meg You really want to do that? Well, it looks like you know what you're doing. I guess I'll take you up on that offer. But...let's keep this whole chat-with-Hades thing our little secret, okay?
Sora Our lips are sealed!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter the Cave of the Dead. They see a cloaked man running through the cave

xml.sp: Donald The Organization!
Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: They continue through the passage into the Inner Chamber to find the cloaked man still running

xml.sp: ????? Run! Run away!

cutscene.desc: He eventually fades away

xml.sp: Sora Okay...?

cutscene.desc: Hades is speaking with Pete in Hades's Chamber

xml.sp: Hades Where do they dig these freaks up? Geez, Louise.

Pete Oh, they're nuttin' but trouble, the whole lot of 'em. So, uh...what're you gonna do about Hercules? He's made mince meat outta every fighter you sent at him. Pretty soon the Underworld's gonna be standing room only. Say, why don't you just pick somebody already dead and save him the trouble?

cutscene.desc: Hades gets annoyed at Pete and slams his fists on the edges of his chair. Pete covers his head, while Pain and Panic hide behind him. Hades thinks for a second

xml.sp: Hades Dead... Dead is good! And I know just the warrior.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter the Valley of the Dead. Donald shivers

xml.sp: Goofy I'm scared too, Donald.
Sora Hades, come out!

cutscene.desc: They walk across the bridge and up the stairs. Pete, Hades, Pain, and Panic are looking into Hades's giant swirling vortex

xml.sp: Pete By the by, uh... What's down there?
Hades Just the Underworld's deepest dungeon. This time I'm bringing out the mother of all bad guys.

cutscene.desc: Pete starts to back away from Hades. Pain and Panic have already hidden behind a stone pillar

xml.sp: Pete You don't say. Well... Maybe I should go.

cutscene.desc: Hades forms a ball of fire in each hand and toss them into the abyss. There's a large explosion, causing a pillar of smoke to rise out of the hole. Lightning courses through the red smoke as a figure emerges. Hades laughs

xml.sp: Hades Let's cut to the chase. Here's the deal I'm gonna offer you. I let you out of the slammer---no strings---you'll be free as a bird.

cutscene.desc: Auron listens as he looks over to Pete, who is against the wall near Pain and Panic. Pete, still afraid and not knowing what else to do, simply waves at Auron

xml.sp: Hades And all for one little job. Fight Hercules, in the Coliseum...to the death!
Auron This is my story. And you're not part of it.

cutscene.desc: Auron raises his sword

xml.sp: Hades Did you forget who you're talking to? I am the Lord of the Dead!
Auron No wonder no one wants to die.
Hades You are FIRED!

cutscene.desc: Hades turns red in a blaze and charges toward Auron, who blocks with his sword. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run in

xml.sp: Donald Hades!

cutscene.desc: Hades gets distracted and his fire turns blue again

xml.sp: Hades You again?

cutscene.desc: Auron knocks Hades back

xml.sp: Auron Fight! Auron strikes Hades, who stops the sword with his hand, and throws Auron back. Hades punches Auron to the ground. He conjures two fireballs aiming at the fallen Auron. Sora runs between them and they dissipate
Sora Get up!

cutscene.desc: They try to fight Hades

xml.sp: Donald Something's wrong!
Sora I feel kinda funny...
Hades That's right! See, that's the thing. In the Underworld, heroes are zeroes---comes with the territory.

cutscene.desc: The two fireballs appear again and Hades charges the group. Auron slices down with his sword, but Hades teleports in a puff of smoke

xml.sp: Auron Go now!
Sora But I've gotta talk to Hades!
Hades with his fingers in his ears What was that?

cutscene.desc: Sora tries to charge, but Auron stops him. Hades makes fireballs again as Donald and Goofy run out of the room

xml.sp: Auron We can't fight him here! We have to go---now!

cutscene.desc: Auron pulls Sora, who doesn't budge. Auron leaves Sora, who eventually runs as Hades throws the fireballs at them. They leave the chamber and run down the stairs. Sora and Goofy close the gates and try to catch their breath

xml.sp: Donald Is he gone?
Auron Don't count on it.
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Hades appears on their side of the door next to Sora

xml.sp: Hades Leaving so soon?

cutscene.desc: They hurry to the exit, evading Hades and the Heartless he conjures. When they reach the Inner Chamber of the Cave of the Dead, they catch their breath

xml.sp: Sora You're really good. Are you some kind of hero?
Auron shaking his head No, I'm no hero... I'm just an...
Sora Huh?
Auron Auron.
