cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy look at each other

xml.sp: Auron My name.
Sora I'm Sora.

cutscene.desc: Donald jumps onto Sora's shoulders

xml.sp: Donald Donald.

cutscene.desc: Goofy also jumps onto Sora's shoulders

xml.sp: Goofy Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Sora can't hold them up, so they fall in a pile

xml.sp: Auron It seems we were fated to meet. Maybe you need a guardian.

cutscene.desc: Sora pushes Donald and Goofy off him

xml.sp: Sora Guardian? Thanks, but no thanks.

cutscene.desc: Sora starts to walk to the passageway. Auron slightly chuckles. Pete meets with Hades

xml.sp: Pete I got Heartless all over the Underworld now. So you can leave those pipsqueaks to me. Look, pal, you just keep working on turning Hercules into a Heartless. Then he'll be all mine.

cutscene.desc: Hades stops and turns around angrily, turning red

xml.sp: Hades This is my underworld, you idiot!

cutscene.desc: Pete jumps back

xml.sp: Hades I'll handle this MYSELF!

cutscene.desc: Hades slightly cools down and snaps his fingers. Hades's giant three-headed dog shows up in the window

xml.sp: Hades Cerberus, go!

cutscene.desc: The dog leaves in a hurry. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Auron run to the entrance of the Cave of the Dead

xml.sp: Donald What? It's closed!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy try to push apart the doors

xml.sp: Sora Come on, open!

cutscene.desc: Donald looks up and sees a keyhole chained to the door. The Keyblade appears in Sora's hand

xml.sp: Auron Will that open it?
Sora Yeah. I think so.

cutscene.desc: Sora starts to point the Keyblade at the lock, when they hear a roar and look behind them

xml.sp: Auron Hurry!

cutscene.desc: Auron readies his sword. Cerberus jumps into the entranceway. Sora unlocks the door and the keyhole and chains vanish. Donald and Goofy open the doors as Cerberus runs up to them. Auron stops them by shoving his sword between one of the dog's teeth. He holds them there, until pulling the sword out and knocking them away. Sora runs to the door, but turns around and sees Auron fighting alone

xml.sp: Donald Uh...

cutscene.desc: Sora runs back into the fray

xml.sp: Donald Sora wait!

cutscene.desc: The dogs roar and Sora and Auron fights them. Cerberus, nearly beaten, struggles to stand

xml.sp: Donald Come on!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Auron run through the gates, which start to close. Sora, Donald, and Goofy make faces at Cerberus, as it runs to the closing doors. Meg speaks to Hercules in the Coliseum Foyer

xml.sp: Meg Come on, Wonderboy, play hooky for a day. For old time's sake?
Hercules They came to see me. They came to see a hero. I can't let them down.

cutscene.desc: Meg sighs, seeing his tired condition

xml.sp: Hercules Don't worry, Meg. I'll be fine. What does a hero need rest for, huh?

cutscene.desc: Hercules flexes his biceps and waves goodbye to Megara

xml.sp: Hercules See ya!

cutscene.desc: He leaves into the Coliseum to cheering crowds

xml.sp: Meg Sora, don't let me down.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy stand in the Underworld Entrance

xml.sp: Sora Whew...
Donald Huh?
Goofy What happened to Auron?
Sora He can take care of himself. Let's go find Meg. Then we can try this again.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. Hades sits in his Chamber with Pete, Pain and Panic watching anxiously

xml.sp: Hades Let me see if I got this right... That brat's Keyblade works on any lock?
Pete That's right.
Hades Have I ever told you about the killer coliseum we have right here in the Underworld? It makes the one upstairs look like an Olympic kiddie pool.
Pete Then that's the place we're gonna put an end to Herc the Jerk's winnin' streak.

cutscene.desc: Pete pounds his fist on the table making Pain and Panic jump

xml.sp: Hades Problem. Zeus locked it tight.

cutscene.desc: Pete looks annoyed. Hades chuckles, and Pete understands

xml.sp: Hades Bingo... All we gotta do is swipe that key...and then reopen the Underdrome!
Pete Hate to tell ya, but that key is kinda particular. It won't work for just anybody. And that kid ain't no pushover.

cutscene.desc: Hades taps a finger on the arm of his chair

xml.sp: Hades I think this calls for a woman's touch.

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers, and with a puff of smoke, a doll version of Meg appears in his hand. In the Foyer, Meg feels like she's being watched. Sora, Donald, and Goofy walk into the Coliseum Gates

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, this sure does bring back memories! They walk to the Lobby doors and see a tired Hercules walk out
Hercules Sora! Donald! Goofy! When'd you get here?
Sora Hey, Herc!
Donald waving Hi!
Goofy Howdy there!

cutscene.desc: Hercules walks down the steps closer to them. Meg appears in the doorway

xml.sp: Hercules You on another adventure?
Sora Yeah, trackin' down some friends, wipin' out some Heartless.
Hercules Junior heroes, always busy!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Hercules lock hands

xml.sp: Sora You know it!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Coliseum Foyer

xml.sp: Hercules So, did you find those friends of yours?

Sora Still working on it. When we got here, we ran into Meg---meg-mega trouble, I mean! So we had to help somebody out. We tried to go teach Hades a thing or two...but the Underworld drains away all our strength. Don't suppose you have any ideas?
Hercules Well, there is a stone that guards against the Underworld's curse. The gods on Mount Olympus use it whenever they have to go down there.
Sora Think we could use it?
Hercules Sure, why not! I'll go get it for you.
Donald Thanks!
Goofy Real nice of you!
Hercules But Hades is no pushover, even if you've got the Olympus Stone. And I have a match today, so I can't go with you... Know what you need? Training! Why don't you go talk to Phil?
Sora Hey, good idea!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Coliseum and see Phil, who's not looking in their direction

xml.sp: Phil Hey champ, how ya feeling? Better rest up for tomorrow's match. Nobody's gonna pay to see a worn-out hero...capiche? Remember what I told you. Victory in the games comes down to two simple words Eat, bathe, sleep!

cutscene.desc: Goofy is counting the words on his fingers. The three look at each other and laugh. Phil jumps around, and realizes who's laughing. He runs over to them

xml.sp: Phil Hey, if it ain't the junior heroes!
Sora Lookin' good, Phil.
Phil Never better! How you guys been? Have you earned your true hero wings yet?

cutscene.desc: They think it over for a second

xml.sp: Phil Nope, you ain't got what it takes.

cutscene.desc: They're surprised at this. Sora scratches his head

xml.sp: Phil So, what's up?

cutscene.desc: They tell him

xml.sp: Phil Ha ha ha! You three are gonna take on Hades?
Donald What's so funny!?
Phil You got nerve. I like that. Hey, you never know---stranger things have happened, right? Better get cracking, boys! So you want to train, eh? All right, I'm gonna work you hard!

cutscene.desc: Sora smashes pots and collects the orbs that come out of them

xml.sp: Sora How was THAT?
Phil It ain't over yet, kid! There's more on the menu. You can relax once you've finished ALL the training.
Sora No problem!
Phil Now get ready for the real thing. If a big one appears, don't let it get away.

cutscene.desc: Sora smashes more pots and collects the orbs. Hercules enters the Coliseum

xml.sp: Phil Listen, I gotta take off for a bit.
Sora Where to?
Phil None of your beeswax.

cutscene.desc: Phil leaves

xml.sp: Hercules Sorry, guys... The Olympus Stone has been stolen.
Sora & Donald What!?
Goofy By who?
Hercules We don't know who did it yet. All we're sure of is that it was a guy in a black-hooded cloak. And he had accomplices---a bunch of creatures in white.

cutscene.desc: Donald looks at Goofy, who nods

xml.sp: Hercules Someone you know?
Sora I think so. Hey, if we can get the Olympus Stone back, can we borrow it for a while?
Hercules Sure. By the way, you haven't seen Meg around, have you?

cutscene.desc: They shake their heads

xml.sp: Hercules Oh, okay...

cutscene.desc: Hercules sighs

xml.sp: Hades What's wrong, your hero-ness? Feeling under the weather?

cutscene.desc: Hades appears and places a hand on Hercules's shoulder. He ducks away from Hades

xml.sp: Hades You know, I though staying in perfect shape was part of the hero job description...you know what I'm saying?
Sora Oh, right... Hades, we gotta talk!

cutscene.desc: Hades flicks Sora to the ground

xml.sp: Hades I came to share a bit of mildly-interesting news

cutscene.desc: Hercules sneaks behind Hades for a punch

xml.sp: Hades Seems your dear, sweet little Nutmeg...

cutscene.desc: Hades teleports behind Herc

xml.sp: Hades ...went and got herself lost in the Underworld.
Hercules You mean you kidnapped her!
Hades Well, maybe... But why get caught up in the details?

cutscene.desc: Hercules whistles and a brilliant winged horse flies over the Coliseum walls, landing next to Hercules

xml.sp: Hades Uh-uh-uh! You can't leave now, okay?

cutscene.desc: Hercules is stopped from getting on Pegasus

xml.sp: Hades You've got a very important match today, against, um... the bloodthirsty Hydra! I mean, if you don't stick around, who knows what kind of accidents might happen.
Sora Yeah, accidents you cause.
Hades Like I said details, who needs 'em?
Hercules You're just a coward.

cutscene.desc: Herc and Pegasus look angry. The horse flaps its wings and shakes its head

xml.sp: Hades Ah well. Can't all be heroes.

cutscene.desc: Hades vanishes in a puff of smoke. Herc crosses his arms

xml.sp: Hercules to Sora Can you handle this?
Donald You got it! We're heroes!
Goofy Junior heroes, Donald.

cutscene.desc: Donald shakes his head and glares at Goofy

xml.sp: Sora You take care of the Hydra. We'll handle the rest.

cutscene.desc: Hercules puts his hands on Sora's shoulders

xml.sp: Hercules I'm counting on you.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods. Pegasus trots over. Hercules pets him

xml.sp: Hercules to Pegasus You gotta find Meg!

cutscene.desc: The horse nods and flaps his wings. It flies into the air and over the Coliseum walls. Hercules sighs. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Underworld Entrance and see Phil on the floor

xml.sp: Sora Phil!
Phil Ooh, ohh...

cutscene.desc: Phil stands up, as Sora, Donald, and Goofy run over

xml.sp: Sora What happened?
Phil I spotted this strange guy all dressed in black. I chased after him, but he turned on me. Next thing I know, I'm seeing stars.
Donald All dressed in black!?
Sora He's the one who stole the Olympus Stone.
Goofy Where did he run off to?
Phil To the Underworld. He's a bad apple, all right. And all I wanted was to find a backup hero. Just in case Herc needed to take a break.
Sora Heroes, eh? You could've just asked!
Phil You know someone!?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald get out their weapons

xml.sp: Phil Oh, good one...

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter the Underworld Caverns as Hercules does battle with the Hydra. He strikes it with his sword. It lifts his head high into the air after a chop from the sword on it's head. It collapses to the ground on top of Hercules. Herc walks out from underneath it

xml.sp: Crowd Hercules! Hercules! Hercules!
Hercules waving Heh, thanks! Thank you! Hope you enjoyed it!

cutscene.desc: Hercules runs back to the Foyer. After fighting a few Heartless, the three enter The Lost Road. Sora works out the kink in his shoulder

xml.sp: Sora Man... This Underworld curse is really getting to me.
Goofy We've got to get that Olympus Stone back fast!

cutscene.desc: They continue into the Atrium, where the find the hooded man, who turns around to face them

xml.sp: ????? Huh? Ah! You!

cutscene.desc: He takes off his hood

xml.sp: Demyx Wait a sec... Roxas?
Sora Excuse me?
Demyx Roxas? Oh, it's no use.
Sora Huh? What are you talking about?

cutscene.desc: Demyx pulls out a note

xml.sp: Demyx Let's see, here... If the subject fails to respond, use aggression to liberate his true disposition... Right. Did they ever pick the wrong guy for this one...
Sora You're bizarre...

cutscene.desc: Demyx takes out the Olympus Stone

xml.sp: Goofy He's gotta be the thief!
Demyx Now that's just plain rude!

cutscene.desc: He holds the stone up and glows with light. He takes out his sitar and begins playing it

xml.sp: Demyx Dance, water! Dance!

cutscene.desc: Demyx conjures water creatures and Sora defeats them all

xml.sp: Demyx Not bad, Roxas!

cutscene.desc: Demyx holds his shoulder

xml.sp: Demyx Roxas, come back to us!

cutscene.desc: He vanishes

xml.sp: Sora Guy's a broken record.
Donald Hey, look!

cutscene.desc: Donald picks up the Olympus Stone that Demyx had dropped. He gives it to Sora, who holds it up. They glow with light and feel their power return

xml.sp: Sora Let's go! Meg needs our help!

cutscene.desc: They enter The Lock, where they see a rock with an outline of Meg and a keyhole imprinted on it. Sora unlocks the gate and the rock vanishes. The pillar of energy behind the rock turns from black to light green

xml.sp: Donald Meg!
Sora Almost there.

cutscene.desc: Sora enters the pillar of light and ends up in the Well of Captivity. Hades is there with a chained up Megara

xml.sp: Hades laughing Now that's what I call a key. Gee, thanks for your help! Now have a nice day.

cutscene.desc: Hades vanishes in a puff of smoke. Meg is distracted by something

xml.sp: Meg Sora, behind you!

cutscene.desc: Pete appears behind them with several Heartless. He laughs

xml.sp: Pete What's wrong? Can't fight in the Underworld? Ohh, boo-hoo-hoo!
Sora Better think again!

cutscene.desc: Pete looks to his Heartless and points to Sora's group

xml.sp: Pete Charge!

cutscene.desc: Hook Bat Heartless charge at Sora, who bats them away with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora There's too many!
Donald Let's go!

cutscene.desc: Sora breaks Meg's chains with the Keyblade. Hercules arrives and knocks Pete down

xml.sp: Hercules Sorry I'm late.

cutscene.desc: He whistles. Pegasus flies in and hits Pete on the head as he tries to standing, knocking him over again. Hercules picks Meg up

xml.sp: Hercules Get Meg outta here. I'll meet you back at the Coliseum.

cutscene.desc: Hercules places Meg on Pegasus's back

xml.sp: Sora What about you?
Hercules I'm gonna show these guys what happens when they mess with a true hero.

cutscene.desc: Herc pats Pegasus on the behind and he takes off with Meg. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run to the pillar of light as Pete gets up

xml.sp: Pete Now, wait a sec!

cutscene.desc: Hercules blocks Pete. Pegasus flies out of the other side of the pillar of light back at The Lock

xml.sp: Meg Sora...I won't leave him.
Sora He'll be okay.
Meg Look, even Herc has his limits. He can't keep winning forever.
Sora Then we'll go back him up.
Donald to Pegasus Get Meg outta here!

cutscene.desc: Pegasus flies away. Sora returns to the Underdrome, where Pete has gathered even more Heartless. He and Hercules nod to each other. Fighting Pete is a piece of cake for them

xml.sp: Pete This place gives me the creeps. I'll deal with you nitwits next time!

cutscene.desc: Pete leaves. The cave begins to collapse and they run for the pillar of light

xml.sp: Hades Could today possibly get any better? This time Wonder-breath is going down for good.

cutscene.desc: The four race to the Underworld Entrance

xml.sp: Hades Well, if it isn't everyone's favorite hero washout. You really blew it this time.
Sora No one likes a sore loser, Hades.
Hades Can it, keyboy!
Hercules Then let me.

cutscene.desc: Hercules takes a step forward

xml.sp: Hercules No one likes a sore loser, Hades.
Hades Yeah, yeah, Styx and stones. Hey, maybe you should go check on that Hydra you neglected to finish off. I hear things are really FALLING APART up there, champ.

cutscene.desc: Hades vanishes in smoke

xml.sp: Sora Wait!
Hades Hate to run, but I've got another little diversion to attend to.

cutscene.desc: They run back to the Coliseum Gates

xml.sp: Hercules falling to his knees This can't be...

cutscene.desc: A large rock almost hits Sora as he enters. The Hydra roars out the smoke and rubble. Phil, Meg, and Pegasus approach Hercules. Phil shakes him

xml.sp: Phil Champ! You're safe!
Hercules I failed...

cutscene.desc: Hercules looks around to all the destruction. The great statues are sliced in half and the Coliseum is in ruins

xml.sp: Meg It's not your fault!
Hercules I left everyone unprotected.

cutscene.desc: Herc slams the ground

xml.sp: Hercules Hades was right. I'm just a...a washout.
Phil Aw, come on, champ! I didn't train you to think like that.
Meg Wonderboy...
Sora Phil's right. This is no time to beat yourself up.
Hercules I'm some hero...

cutscene.desc: The Hydra is running rampant. Meg heaves Herc over her shoulder and carries him away as the Hydra walks over the rubble of the Foyer into the courtyard

xml.sp: Donald Herc needs help!
Sora Yeah!
Phil Don't suppose you got room for one more?

cutscene.desc: Phil does a series of fighting moves. Meg and Pegasus join them, the horse making it's best fighting stance

xml.sp: Meg We're in!

cutscene.desc: The Hydra roars again. Sora fights until each of it's heads are cut off. Hercules's confidence is completely shot

xml.sp: Hercules I let you down. I'm just...no use.
Meg It's not your fault. Hey, even a god would be exhausted.
Sora She's right. Give yourself a chance to rest.
Goofy There won't be any games for a while, anyway.
Meg Don't worry about Wonderboy here. I'll look after him. Sora, Donald, Goofy, I owe you big time.
Sora Hey, it's no big deal. Just let us know if Hades or the Heartless start acting up. We'll take care of it.
Donald Yeah, that's what heroes are for!
Meg When did you three make hero?
Sora Let's save that for another time... We have to hit the road.
Meg Okay. Don't be strangers.
Goofy Gawrsh, I hope ya feel better soon, Hercules.
Hercules Yeah...
Donald Phil?
Phil Oh, well, take care you guys! Stay a little longer next time. We got some serious training to catch up on.
Sora Well, time to go. Oh, I almost forgot. The Olympus Stone.

cutscene.desc: Sora takes out the stone. Hercules weakly stands up. Before Hercules touches the stone, it glows brightly. Sora opens another gateway. In the dark tower in Hollow Bastion, Maleficent stands looking out past large spinning cogs

xml.sp: Maleficent And where is everyone else?
Pete Beats me. They musta had some other matters to deal with.
Maleficent Matters?

cutscene.desc: She turns around to face Pete

xml.sp: Maleficent You mean they have more important affairs to attend to than my return?
Pete Well, see, there's this Organization XIII that keeps gettin' in the way---
Maleficent Let those fools play their little game!
Pete But what about that runt with the Keyblade? He's been a real pain, too.
Maleficent Oh, has he? Very well then. I suppose you'd best tell me what's happened during my absence.

cutscene.desc: Queen Minnie stands in the Library of Disney Castle as several brooms walk around doing chores

xml.sp: Minnie Oh...hmm. Now I wonder where that old album could be.
Chip Queen Minnie!
Dale It's horrible!

cutscene.desc: Chip and Dale run in as the Queen faces away from the books

xml.sp: Chip Somethin's wrong in the Hall of the Cornerstone!
Dale There's real sharp thorns everywhere!

cutscene.desc: Chip and Dale lead Minnie to the Hall of the Cornerstone, where the Queen is amazed at what she sees

xml.sp: Minnie Oh, King Mickey, I wish you could hear me. The castle is in danger! We've got to do something soon! Donald... Goofy... Where are you?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy pilot their ship, ironically, to Disney Castle and dock in the Gummi Hangar.

xml.sp: Sora This is your castle... Must be nice to be home, huh? Well...

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy look around

xml.sp: Goofy Ya know, somethin' just don't feel quite right...
Donald Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Chip hops up onto the launch control ledge and jumps at seeing Sora, Donald, and Goofy. Dale jumps up and bumps into Chip, knocking him onto the next ledge. They both jump in the air, then slide down the slanting ledge to the group

xml.sp: Chip You're back!
Dale Move it! Let's go!
Chip Queen Minnie needs to see you!
Dale The castle's in danger! Hurry! To the library!

cutscene.desc: They walk through the exit and up the winding stairs into the courtyard, and enter the door into the colonnade. Fighting loads of Heartless down the hall, they arrive in the Library and speak to Queen Minnie

xml.sp: Donald Your Majesty! Queen Minnie! We're back!
Minnie You're here!
Goofy Your Royal Highness, did ya happen to summon us?
Minnie Yes.
Sora Where's the King?

cutscene.desc: Donald pulls Sora's ear

xml.sp: Donald Excuse him. This is our friend, Sora.
Minnie Oh, Sora! The King told me all about you in his letters. He said you're a very brave young man.
Sora So, do you know where he is?

cutscene.desc: She shakes her head and they sigh

xml.sp: Donald Your Majesty, what are Heartless doing in your castle?
Minnie Oh my... So those are the Heartless.
Sora Don't worry, we'll take care of 'em!
Minnie I know I can count on you, Sora. Now, there's something I'd like all of you to come and see. Would you please escort me to the audience chamber?

cutscene.desc: The three salute her. The Queen gasps

xml.sp: Minnie I forgot to warn everyone else in the castle about the danger! We must be sure they're hidden somewhere safe!
Sora Okay, we'll go tell them!
Donald The whole castle!?
Goofy We just gotta split up, Donald.
Sora I'll make sure that everyone knows what's going on.
Donald No, Sora, you'll just get lost!
Sora Okay. Then I'll stay with the Queen.

cutscene.desc: Minnie giggles

xml.sp: Donald Good.
Goofy All righty then, see ya later!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy leave the Library

xml.sp: Sora Um, the audience chamber, right, ma'am?
Minnie Yes, Sora. Let's be on our way.

cutscene.desc: They hurry back into the colonnade and reach the immense doors to the audience chamber, which are magically locked

xml.sp: Minnie Just one moment.

cutscene.desc: Minnie holds up her hand

xml.sp: Minnie As soon as the trouble started, I made sure to seal this room.

cutscene.desc: The magical barrier breaks apart and the room is unlocked. A small door appears through the larger one

xml.sp: Minnie Now then...shall we?

cutscene.desc: They enter the large audience chamber, which is completely empty, until a horde of Bolt Tower Heartless float down from the ceiling

xml.sp: Minnie Not here, too!
Sora I got 'em.

cutscene.desc: They race across the chamber, dodging the Heartless, reaching the throne. The Heartless are relentless

xml.sp: Sora Come on, gimme a break!

cutscene.desc: Minnie hurriedly reaches beneath the arm of the throne and presses a button. There is a loud rumbling and the throne starts to move

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: The throne recedes with a flash of light and the Heartless are gone. The floor contains a set of stairs to a lower room

xml.sp: Sora Whoa...
Minnie The room below is called the 'Hall of the Cornerstone.' Our castle has always been safe from worlds that are evil...thanks to the Cornerstone of Light which we keep down there.
Sora The Cornerstone...of light?

cutscene.desc: Sora follows the Queen down into the Hall of the Cornerstone and sees the unbelievable mass of thorns surrounding the walls. A giant ball of swirling light stands in the middle of the room

xml.sp: Minnie This is the castle's cherished Cornerstone. But look. The thorns... They must be the work of someone very evil. I wonder what this could mean...

cutscene.desc: A burst of green flames appears before the Queen and an image of Maleficent appears

xml.sp: Donald Maleficent!
Sora No way!
Maleficent Well, well, well. What have we here...? If it isn't the wretched Keyblade holder, and his pitiful lackeys!
Donald What!? Now you're gonna deal with me!

cutscene.desc: Donald leaps to attack but flies right through her

xml.sp: Maleficent All in good time. I promise you'll be able to partake of my vengeance. But you must be patient.
Minnie Just what are you doing here, Maleficent!?
Maleficent Ah, Queen Minnie. Radiant, as always.

cutscene.desc: Maleficent bows

xml.sp: Maleficent I'm here on a property venture. I want this castle for my own. However, it's a bit too bright for what I have in mind. I suppose I'll just have to fill every room with my personal touch of darkness.

cutscene.desc: She touches the Cornerstone of Light, but it rejects her hand

xml.sp: Minnie You'd better stop right now if you know what's good for you!
Maleficent Ooh, how frightening. Very well. I'll stop... Just as soon as the castle belongs to me!

cutscene.desc: She disappears and cackles evilly

xml.sp: Sora What a hag.
Minnie Nothing like this has ever happened before. I looked through all the records in the library, but I couldn't find a single clue.
Goofy Ohhh! We should go ask somebody who knows lotsa stuff that ain't in any book!
Donald Merlin the Wizard!
Minnie Yes! That's perfect! Merlin just might know something about this mess. Let's ask his advice!
Goofy We saw him in Hollow Bastion, right?
Sora Yeah. Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They fly to Hollow Bastion and enter Merlin's House

xml.sp: Sora Anybody home?
Donald Merlin!
Goofy The castle's in danger!

cutscene.desc: Merlin appears behind them

xml.sp: Merlin What is all that racket? Ho-ho! I thought---oh, it's you! It looks like you've learned a bit since the last time I saw you.
Sora Really!?
Donald Wait a minute! Let's talk about the problem! It's Maleficent! She's back!
Merlin Where? Inside the castle!?
Goofy Yep! And Heartless, too.
Merlin Oh, dear...
Donald Maleficent wants to take over the whole castle...

cutscene.desc: As Donald is talking, Merlin transports them all to the Hall of the Cornerstone, where Minnie is waiting

xml.sp: Donald There's Heartless in every part of the castle! The Queen is in danger! What!?

cutscene.desc: Donald notices he's back in Disney Castle

xml.sp: Merlin Perhaps, I'd better just see for myself.

cutscene.desc: Merlin walks over to Minnie and the Cornerstone of Light

xml.sp: Merlin Mm-hmm...interesting...
Minnie What's happening, Merlin?
Merlin This is not good. In fact, I'm afraid, it's quite serious.

cutscene.desc: The wizard clears his throat. He waves his arms and a door appears

xml.sp: Sora What's that?
Merlin My boy, that is a gateway to a special world. Someone in that world is responsible for what's going on in this castle. Of that, I'm certain.
Donald Oh boy!
Goofy We knew we could count on you, Merlin!
Sora Then we should go get him!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over to the door and places his hand on the handles

xml.sp: Merlin Wait a moment! The perpetrators must be stopped, of course. But there's something else to do first. Somewhere in that world, there should be another door that's identical to this one. I believe our enemies are utilizing that door. As long as it remains open, the castle will be in grave danger. Listen carefully, Sora. You must find that door. And when you do---lock it with your Keyblade.
Sora Got it.
Donald You can count on us!
Merlin Now, one more thing. You're heading into a very special world. While you're there, the nature of that world may tempt you to do something dark. You must resist that temptation at all costs!
Sora What do you mean?
Merlin You'll know soon enough. I have faith in you, my lads!

cutscene.desc: Sora opens the door after a small struggle and walks in. On the other side, the door jumps around making several honks and whistles, before spitting the three out onto the ground. Goofy shakes his head

xml.sp: Goofy Hey, look! There's the Cornerstone of Light!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over to it

xml.sp: Sora What's going on? Everything's black and white.
Donald Hey, this is kinda like...um...uh...
Goofy Deja vu?
Donald Yeah, that's it!
Sora Really? Have you been here before?

cutscene.desc: Captain Pete walks behind Sora in the direction of the Pier, but stops when he sees the three

xml.sp: Captain Pete Hey you! Seen any bad guys around here?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy all point to Captain Pete

xml.sp: Captain Pete Why I oughta... Bah! I don't have time to waste on punks like you! So, I guess I'll go easy on ya!

cutscene.desc: He walks off to the Pier

xml.sp: Sora Well, there's our villain.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod and they enter the Pier. Captain Pete is standing on the dock

xml.sp: Captain Pete What's with you squirts? You got some kinda bone to pick with me?
Sora More than one!
Captain Pete Them's fighting words!

cutscene.desc: They hear a boat whistle

xml.sp: Captain Pete Huh?

cutscene.desc: He starts walking toward Cornerstone Hill, when Sora, Donald, and Goofy block his way

xml.sp: Sora Not so fast!
Donald Yeah!
Captain Pete What's that for?

cutscene.desc: They fight Captain Pete, who ends up sitting on the ground

xml.sp: Captain Pete What's you punks' beef with me anyway? Hmm... Who are ya? You new around here?
Sora Cut the act.

cutscene.desc: They hear the boat whistle again

xml.sp: Captain Pete Whoa!

cutscene.desc: He stands up too quickly and his back cracks. He falls over again

xml.sp: Captain Pete Ooh, ow!
Goofy You know, somethin' doesn't seem quite right here. Are you sure you're Pete?
Captain Pete Well, of COURSE I'm Pete. I'm the captain of the steamboat. So stop botherin' me, see?

cutscene.desc: He waves his fist and his back cracks again

xml.sp: Captain Pete So hit the road! I gotta go find the little runt what stole my boat!
Goofy to Sora and Donald Gawrsh, maybe we made a mistake.
Sora I'm starting to think the same thing. He hasn't even called any Heartless.
Goofy Sorry we attacked ya like that, Capt'n Pete.

cutscene.desc: Captain Pete stands up

xml.sp: Captain Pete Oh yeah? Well, if you're really sorry, then go find my steamboat.
Sora Y-yes sir!

cutscene.desc: His back cracks again

xml.sp: Captain Pete Ooh, my achin' back.

cutscene.desc: He falls over again. The three walk back to Cornerstone Hill

xml.sp: Sora I thought for sure Pete was the bad guy.
Donald Aw, that would be too easy.
Goofy C'mon, fellas. Let's try to find that steamboat.
Sora I guess we DID say we would...
Donald Hey, we've got a door to find!
Sora Oh, yeah!
Donald I don't see any doors.
Sora Huh? What's this?

cutscene.desc: An odd window with a curtain floats in midair nearby. They walk over to it

xml.sp: Sora I can't see a thing...

cutscene.desc: Donald pulls the drawstring on the side and opens the curtains. They see a video of four small doors around the Cornerstone of Light, with a different pair of Heartless in front of each one. The doors open and the Heartless enter, another door bouncing in the background. Sora, Donald and Goofy are thrown out of the bouncing door, landing on the ground.

xml.sp: Goofy Hey, look! There's the Cornerstone of Light!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over to it

xml.sp: Sora What's going on? Everything's black and white.
Donald Hey, this is kinda like...um...uh...
Goofy Deja vu?
Donald Yeah, that's it!
Sora Really? Have you been here before?

cutscene.desc: The video ends with a flash and the curtains shutting

xml.sp: Sora What was that?
Goofy Heartless goin' out...
Donald ...and us, coming in.
Sora What does it mean?

cutscene.desc: Donald pulls the drawstring again, but nothing happens. They see the four doors the Heartless had gone through

xml.sp: Sora Let's get rid of those Heartless!
Goofy Then what'll we do?
Sora We'll worry about that later!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter a door with a construction building symbol on it and arrive at a Building Site

xml.sp: Sora What're they building?
Goofy Look out!

cutscene.desc: A Hammer Frame Heartless falls from a beam above. Mickey swings down on a rope and knocks the Heartless away

xml.sp: Donald The King!

cutscene.desc: Mickey waves to them from a beam up above

xml.sp: Goofy Gee, he seems kinda different somehow...

cutscene.desc: They see several more Hammer Frame Heartless on the top beams

xml.sp: Sora Heartless! I knew it! You really saved the day!

cutscene.desc: The Heartless fall down to their platform

xml.sp: Sora Now, let's get those Heartless!

cutscene.desc: They manage to defeat the Heartless before the scaffolding falls

xml.sp: Sora How'd you like that?

cutscene.desc: Mickey ran over to Sora, shook his hand, waved, and ran off

xml.sp: Goofy Hey, look!

cutscene.desc: Another curtain window was hanging on the corner of the scaffolding. Donald pulls the drawstring and they see Maleficent in the dark tower in Hollow Bastion talking to Pete

xml.sp: Maleficent You absolute idiot! You've managed to fail at everything! And what's more...you foolishly thought you could take my place while I was away. Well, as of now, you're finished. Mark my words, there'll be no place for you when our time comes!

cutscene.desc: She begins to walk away

xml.sp: Maleficent Useless imbecile...

cutscene.desc: She leaves

xml.sp: Pete But-but...but I...

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to Cornerstone Hill

xml.sp: Sora What---?
Goofy Somebody sure was angry.
Donald I don't understand.
Sora Let's just try to clear out the Heartless first. This place is okay, but we've got three more spots to check.

cutscene.desc: They enter a door with a symbol of someone being tied down. They step into a town called Lilliput which is slightly too small

xml.sp: Donald What!?
Sora The town's shrunk!
Goofy Or do ya think maybe we got bigger?

cutscene.desc: They see a tall tower with cannons sticking out of it

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Look at the toy cannons!

cutscene.desc: They walk over to the tower and see Mickey jumping up and down

xml.sp: Sora What's he saying?

cutscene.desc: Several Aeroplane Heartless flies into the sky

xml.sp: Sora Hey! There're Heartless!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the giant heartless while protecting the town

xml.sp: Sora Man, that was weird!

cutscene.desc: Mickey runs over to Sora, shakes his hand, waves, and runs away again

xml.sp: Goofy Look, Sora! Over there!

cutscene.desc: They see yet another curtained window. Donald pulls the drawstring and they see a video of Pete

xml.sp: Pete Aw, for cryin' out loud...she didn't have to go and say that. Okay, I mighta messed up every now and then. But I'm a lot more things than useless... Why, when I was startin' out...

cutscene.desc: Pete looks down

xml.sp: Pete Oh...I miss those good ol' days... What I wouldn't give to go back in time... sniff What I wouldn't give...

cutscene.desc: A white door appears behind Pete and he turns around

xml.sp: Pete Huh?

cutscene.desc: Pete walks closer to the door and opens it. Bright light pours out of it

xml.sp: Pete Hey! I think that's my...

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to Cornerstone Hill

xml.sp: Sora A door?
Donald It looks familiar...
Goofy Yup---it's the door Merlin magic'd up!
Sora So it should come straight here, right?
Goofy Sure! I think...
Sora Let's check it out!

cutscene.desc: They enter a door with a fire symbol on it and find a burning building wobbling around in mayhem. They hear fire engine sirens

xml.sp: Sora Fire!

cutscene.desc: Mickey runs out and tries to protect the building from more flames

xml.sp: Sora C'mon, he needs our help!
Donald Majesty!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Heartless there while protecting the building. The flames inside die down and the building stops moving. Mickey runs to Sora, shakes his hand, waves, and runs off again

xml.sp: Sora Well, that takes care of that!
Goofy Hey!

cutscene.desc: They see another curtained window. Donald pulls on the drawstring and they see Pete speaking with Maleficent in front of the door

xml.sp: Maleficent Fascinating... This appears to be a portal to the past!
Pete Yeah, it was the strangest thing!
Maleficent Stop gawking! And start thinking of a way we can use it to our advantage!
Pete Okay.
Maleficent Now, perhaps I could give you one more chance to redeem yourself.
Pete Oh, thank you, thank you! You can count on me...! So, what do I do?
Maleficent Patience, my dear...

cutscene.desc: She looks back at the open door

xml.sp: Maleficent What have we here? Well, if it isn't the Cornerstone of Light... Mmm... Now we can take the castle from those fools---but we'll have to proceed with the utmost of care...

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy leave the Scene of the Fire

xml.sp: Donald Maleficent!
Sora She must have known all along!
Goofy Let's see...if that door's connected to the past...
Donald No, no, no! It comes here.
Sora Huh?
Goofy Then that means we're in the past!
Sora Wow. If we're in the past...
Donald ...we can change the future!
Goofy Hold on, fellas! Remember what Merlin said? He's got faith in us. And we have to resist temptation no matter what!
Donald Aw, I was only joking.
Sora Who'd want to change the future, anyway? So...what are we gonna do?
Goofy Doors, bad guys... Gawrsh, my brain hurts!
Donald Well, we know we're on the right track!

cutscene.desc: They enter a door with a symbol of a house on it and find a large black hole in the middle of a living room. It starts pulling in much of the furniture. Mickey runs in and tries to find a way to stop it from completely overtaking his house

xml.sp: Sora C'mon! He needs our help!

cutscene.desc: Rapid Thruster Heartless appear and Mickey runs away. They protect the furniture as the defeat the Heartless. Mickey shakes Sora's hand, waves, and runs away again

xml.sp: Sora Whew!
Goofy Huh?

cutscene.desc: They see another curtained window floating in front of the fireplace. Donald pulls on it's drawstring and they see Maleficent and Pete again

xml.sp: Maleficent Listen well.

cutscene.desc: Pete nods

xml.sp: Maleficent On the other side of this portal, they're about to begin construction on that wretched castle. But until then, their treasured Cornerstone of Light lies unguarded, with all of its power still contained!
Pete The Cornerstone...of Light?

cutscene.desc: Pete looks from the door back to Maleficent

xml.sp: Maleficent Yes! That cursed sphere is the very thing that prevents us from entering the castle.
Pete Oh.
Maleficent You know what must be done?
Pete Uh...
Maleficent Go then. Time to prove your worth! And don't dare to fail me again!

cutscene.desc: She turns to leave

xml.sp: Pete Don't fail her again...let's see...

cutscene.desc: Pete's ears perk up

xml.sp: Pete That's it! I just gotta smash that Cornerstone to smithereens!

cutscene.desc: He laughs

xml.sp: Pete But first... I gotta go get my old boat back.

cutscene.desc: He opens the door. Sora, Donald, and Goofy are back at Cornerstone Hill

xml.sp: Sora It was Pete after all!
Donald Why, he tricked us!
Goofy Still, something doesn't seem right.
Sora Hmm... The Pete we met here had kind of an attitude, but he didn't seem like a bad guy...

cutscene.desc: Donald sees Pete near the sign to the Waterway

xml.sp: Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: Pete laughs

xml.sp: Pete Now that castle's as good as ours!

cutscene.desc: Pete runs to the Waterway

xml.sp: Sora That's the Pete we know!
Donald Bad, bad, bad!
Goofy Oh, no!

cutscene.desc: They see that something important is missing

xml.sp: Sora The Cornerstone's gone!
Donald But that means...
Goofy They're gonna fill the castle with darkness! We gotta hurry!

cutscene.desc: Captain Pete runs through Cornerstone Hill in the direction of the Waterway

xml.sp: Sora Hey, hold it right there!
Captain Pete No way, small fry! I finally found the pipsqueak what stole my steamboat!
Donald Yeah! It was you!
Captain Pete pointing to himself Right, me! realizing No! No! It wasn't me! It's just somebody who looks like me!

cutscene.desc: The Captain saunters to the Waterway

xml.sp: Sora Aw, which is it!?

cutscene.desc: They follow both Petes into the Waterway, where they're fighting over the steamboat. The Cornerstone of Light is in a cage on the raft it's tugging behind

xml.sp: Captain Pete Waaaait!
Pete Shuddup!

cutscene.desc: Pete shoves the Captain away

xml.sp: Pete Your future's on the line, pallie, so back off and give me the boat!

cutscene.desc: Pete punches Captain Pete, who goes flying

xml.sp: Donald The Cornerstone!

cutscene.desc: Pete jumps onto the cage

xml.sp: Sora After him!

cutscene.desc: The steamboat begins to float down the river, blowing smoke out of its stacks. Pete salutes them and laughs

xml.sp: Pete You mugs couldn't follow me if you wanted to!

cutscene.desc: Sora readies his Keyblade

xml.sp: Pete Later, losers!

cutscene.desc: Pete sends tons of garbage flying towards Sora, Donald, and Goofy

xml.sp: Pete I'll show you!

cutscene.desc: They manage to break open the cage and spill Pete into the water

xml.sp: Pete Oooh, I can't take anymore...
Sora Yes!

cutscene.desc: Pete surfaces right next to the raft

xml.sp: Pete You'll pay for this!

cutscene.desc: The raft hits him and he's knocked underwater. The steamboat stops moving

xml.sp: Donald It's the Cornerstone!

cutscene.desc: Pete climbs out of the water and shakes it off. He looks back to the boat, then sighs and runs to the Wharf

xml.sp: Sora Donald, we'll come back for it later!
Goofy Pete's headin' for the doorway!

cutscene.desc: They run to the Wharf and find Pete in a fight against Captain Pete. Pete punches the captain, who's knocked to ground, grabbing his face

xml.sp: Captain Pete Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
Pete Ha! You're still wet behind the ears!
Sora Then try us!

cutscene.desc: Captain Pete blasts through Donald and Goofy, heading straight for Pete. They manage to finish off Pete

xml.sp: Captain Pete It serves ya right!

cutscene.desc: Pete stands up

xml.sp: Pete Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!

cutscene.desc: He huffs away, stops, and holds out his arms. The door appears in the air and falls to the ground

xml.sp: Donald The door!

cutscene.desc: Pete opens the door to leave

xml.sp: Captain Pete Yeah...Annnd stay out!
Donald Sora!
Sora Yeah, I know!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs to the closed door and locks it with the Keyblade

xml.sp: Captain Pete Would somebody tell me what's been goin' on here? Who was that creep, anyways?
Sora Hello? That creep was you from the future!

cutscene.desc: Goofy covers Sora's mouth before the last three words

xml.sp: Goofy Sora, that's a secret!
Captain Pete Secret? What kinda secret? Oh, never mind. Sorry I put you guys through all that trouble.
Donald Yeah, well, just don't make a habit out of it!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy chuckle

xml.sp: Captain Pete And to show ya my appreciation, I'll let you pilot my steamboat. Best little craft on the river! My deck hand Mickey's late anyways.

cutscene.desc: The steamboat charges down the Timeless River towing the Cornerstone of Light with Sora at the helm. Donald jumps to blow the whistle, as Mickey lazily taps his foot at the back of the raft. They return the Cornerstone of Light to the hill

xml.sp: Goofy I betcha the castle's safe now.
Sora Guess we should head back.
Donald Wait! As long as we're here...
Sora & Goofy Donald!
Donald Huh? What? No, no, no!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy grab Donald and drag him to the door

xml.sp: Donald Hey! What's the big idea!? Let me go! Let me GO!

cutscene.desc: They swing and toss Donald into the doorway back to Disney Castle and walk in themselves. The Hall of the Cornerstone has become white again and the thorns shine with a bright light and vanish

xml.sp: Minnie The thorns have disappeared!
Merlin By george! The lads have accomplished their mission.
Chip Hooray!
Dale Let's have an acorn feast to celebrate!

cutscene.desc: Donald falls out of the door into the room, followed by Sora and Goofy

xml.sp: Minnie Welcome back! Because of your bravery, the castle is safe and protected again. Thank you so much for all you've done!
Chip 'n' Dale Good work, you guys!
Merlin Now boys, I hope you didn't do anything reckless while you were there?
Donald Of course not!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy giggle. Daisy Duck peeks into the room

xml.sp: Donald Daisy!

cutscene.desc: Daisy walks in

xml.sp: Donald Daisy, I'm back!
Sora Who?
Goofy Daisy is Donald's very special sweetheart.
Sora Really...

cutscene.desc: Daisy turns on Donald

xml.sp: Daisy Donald, you forgot about our date again! You'd better have a good excuse this time!
Donald But Daisy...I...
Daisy I know it's an important mission, but you could at least check in every once in a while.

cutscene.desc: Donald looks to Sora and Goofy for help

xml.sp: Donald Sora!

cutscene.desc: Donald looks over at the door, and snickers

xml.sp: Merlin Donald!
Donald bowing Just be a minute...

cutscene.desc: He runs to the door

xml.sp: Daisy catching him by the tail Going somewhere?
Donald Of course not!

cutscene.desc: He loosens Daisy's grip and runs away

xml.sp: Daisy Donald!

cutscene.desc: Daisy chases him around the room, while everyone else has a nice laugh

xml.sp: Minnie Oh, look!

cutscene.desc: They stop to see that Sora's Keyblade is glowing, as is the Cornerstone of Light. Sora opens another gate

xml.sp: Sora Daisy, we need Donald for just a little longer.
Daisy How much longer?
Sora Um, well...
Donald I'll be back soon, Daisy!
Goofy Don't you worry, Queen Minnie. We'll return.
Sora Please tell the King that we're still looking for him!
Minnie I will!
Chip 'n' Dale See you soon!
Merlin Think wisely!

cutscene.desc: At night after a storm, a mermaid named Ariel swims to the surface. She jumps in and out of the water before gazing upwards at the moon

xml.sp: Ariel Ah, the night sky is so beautiful right after a storm...

cutscene.desc: Some driftwood floats in front of her and she sees a man resting halfway in the water a few feet away. She gasps and swims to save him. After successfully bringing him to shore, she admires him, as he's a human

xml.sp: Ariel singing What would I give to live where you are... What would I pay to stay here beside you... What would I do to see you smiling at me... Where would we walk, where would we run if we could stay all day in the sun... Just you and me, and I could be part of your world...

cutscene.desc: She brushes her hand against his cheek and he slightly opens his eyes before she finishes singing. She noticed his regaining consciousness and quickly swims back into the water. The man drifts away again. Later, he wakes up and stands up

xml.sp: Eric The girl who rescued me...Her voice...

cutscene.desc: Two moray eels watch in the water. Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through Splash Island and into the sea. They enter the water with a burst of magic, scaring away a school of fish

xml.sp: Donald Oh boy! Under the sea again!
Goofy Uh-huh!
Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Ariel, Flounder, and Sebastian swim into the Undersea Courtyard

xml.sp: Ariel Sora! Donald! Goofy!
Sora Uh...hi there!

cutscene.desc: Ariel swims around him

xml.sp: Ariel You forget how to swim already?
Sora Kinda, I guess.
Sebastian Den you boys got to practice! You follow Flounder---he show you what to do.
Flounder C'mon, Sora, you can do it!

cutscene.desc: Flounder swims off. Sora swims to Flounder

xml.sp: Flounder Yes, that's it! You're a quick learner, Sora!

cutscene.desc: After a few more swimming reminders...

xml.sp: Sora That's much better!
Sebastian Now den... What brings you three into de sea? Is somethin' going on?
Sora Kind of.
Goofy But everything SEEMS peaceful.
Ariel Oh, everything's fine...as long as Daddy's in a good mood.

Sebastian Hey, we got us a concert very soon. Why don't you sing in my musical extravaganza? Please say yes! Ariel's been actin' strange lately. But she might settle down and practice if you're dere, too.
Donald That sounds fun!
Sora Let's give it a shot!
Sebastian Excellent! Now den, I teach you everything you need.
Sora Er, what do we have to do?
Sebastian It's easy! All you gotta do is feel de rhythm! Hear de beat and put a little shake in it! Ready? Let's go!

cutscene.desc: Sora dances for a little bit, then spins around with his arms outstretched and a smile on his face

xml.sp: Sebastian Dat's it! Okay, Donald. Your turn. You do it just like Sora. Den he see what you got.

cutscene.desc: Donald dances and spins around, with his arm outstretched

xml.sp: Sebastian Dat's it! Goofy, it's you, now. You think you can do better?

cutscene.desc: Goofy also dances as much a turtle can dance, and spins around happily

xml.sp: Sebastian Dat's it! Dis time you gonna dance with Ariel! Remember, don't miss de beat!

cutscene.desc: Sora dances with Ariel, who spins around him. They both pose

xml.sp: Sebastian Dat's it! Now we jammin' with de bubbles! De rules is de same---you gotta stick to de beat.

cutscene.desc: Bubbles form out of a hot air tube and pop on cue

xml.sp: Sebastian Dat's right! You got it! Dat's all dere is to it.
Goofy Gawrsh, I don't know...
Sebastian Any time you wanna sing in a music masterpiece you just come see me.
Sora Sure, I'll give it a try!

cutscene.desc: Chapter One: Swim This Way

xml.sp: Sebastian Break a fin!
Sora Here goes nothing!

cutscene.desc: Sebastian strikes up the band

xml.sp: Ariel & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Ariel dance inside the center shell on stage

xml.sp: Ariel & Sebastian singing It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!
Sebastian bouncing to the music Let the music move you! You can do it!
Ariel singing Don't be shy, let the music inside. And dance, dance, dance!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Ariel cross their hands over their heads and spread them out wide

xml.sp: Sebastian See, you can do it!
Ariel & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now. It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!

cutscene.desc: Ariel grabs Sora and they swim upwards

xml.sp: Sebastian Watch the stage, now! How exciting!

cutscene.desc: A brightly lit outershell opens revealing a smaller shell, that rises up above the stage

xml.sp: Ariel singing See the sign? Can you reach it in time? And tap, tap, tap?

cutscene.desc: Ariel shows off the shell. Sora taps the shell, and it opens, revealing a dancing manta ray

xml.sp: Sebastian Yeah, that's it, mon!

cutscene.desc: A pod of dolphins swim in

xml.sp: Ariel & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now. It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!
Sebastian And if you can't reach the target, use magic!

cutscene.desc: The dolphins swim in a circle in unison around the stalactite chandelier, slowly making the circle smaller, then swimming out from it

xml.sp: Ariel singing It's all the same, if you've got steady aim. Just zap, zap, zap!

cutscene.desc: Sora sends out two balls of lightning, which light up the chandelier

xml.sp: Sebastian There, you got the rhythm now!
Ariel & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now.

cutscene.desc: Some jellyfish do the wave back and forth as angelfish swim past

xml.sp: Ariel & Sebastian singing It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!

cutscene.desc: Donald dances next to an octopus. Goofy bops next to Flounder. An octopus plays drums, while the blowfish are on horns

xml.sp: Sebastian It's not over yet! You can do it---keep going!
Ariel & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now. It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!

cutscene.desc: Ariel dances in front of stage light. She twirls around and poses

xml.sp: Sebastian Now, what about the bubbles?

cutscene.desc: Sora swims to the center of a few bubbles, which pop on cue. Sora flips around and swims off

xml.sp: Sebastian Ha ha! On to the next one!
Ariel, Flounder, & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now. It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!

cutscene.desc: Donald, Goofy, and Flounder dance inside shells, as the band plays

xml.sp: Sebastian Drum solo! Here's the sign. Give him the cue! Sebastian points with his wand to the octopus on drums
Ariel singing Count him in so he'll know to begin to drum, drum, drum!

cutscene.desc: The octopus drums on cue

xml.sp: Sebastian Now the cues are up to you.
Ariel & Sebastian singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Ariel swim toward each other

xml.sp: Ariel & Sebastian singing It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!

cutscene.desc: They touch, dive, and spin

xml.sp: Sebastian Here's your big moment! Make 'em cheer!
Ariel singing Don't dilly-dally, it's your big finale! Sha-la-la!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Ariel turn around each other, dancing, and pose

xml.sp: Sebastian You made quite a splash! That was fantastic!

cutscene.desc: Sebastian joins Sora and Ariel in the middle shell

xml.sp: Everyone singing Swim this way, we'll dance and we'll play now. It's very easy, come on in! Just take a chance and shake a fin!
Ariel singing Swim along, just join in the song. A musical for everyone to have a lot of finny fun.

cutscene.desc: Everyone poses toward Ariel, who has her arms outstretched, as the song ends

xml.sp: Ariel Sora, you were amazing!
Donald Hey! I wanna sing more lines!

cutscene.desc: Ariel giggles, then swims away as King Triton arrives

xml.sp: Sebastian Your Majesty! We have visitors!
Sora King Triton!
Triton I certainly hope there hasn't been a need to use that Keyblade of yours.
Sora Nope. Everything's fine. Not a Heartless in sight.

cutscene.desc: The King nods

xml.sp: Sebastian Your Majesty, our guests, dey wanna sing in de musical.

Triton Well, that sounds like a splendid idea. We may need your help after all... You see, I'm afraid Ariel's still infatuated with the human world. A busy rehearsal schedule might be just the thing she needs to stop thinking about life up on the surface.

cutscene.desc: Prince Eric walks along the beach

xml.sp: Ariel singing Swim along, just join in the song. A musical for everyone to have a lot of finny fun.
Eric That's the voice I heard! I'm sure of it!

cutscene.desc: He starts to wade into the water

xml.sp: Eric Hello!? Where are you hiding? I know you're the girl who saved me. Please, come out so I can thank you.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian swims up to Ariel

xml.sp: Sebastian Ariel? to himself Dat girl's acting strange again. Probably been flittin' around on da surface... Ohhh, da Sea King's gonna have my claws for dis!
Sora to Ariel C'mon, we gotta keep rehearsing!
Ariel I'm sorry, but I don't feel like it.

cutscene.desc: Ariel swims away

xml.sp: Sebastian No! Ariel!
Flounder I've got an idea, Sebastian.
Sebastian You do?
Flounder I know how to cheer Ariel up! C'mon, follow me!

cutscene.desc: They follow Flounder to a sunken ship area

xml.sp: Flounder Over here!

cutscene.desc: They see a sunken ship with a large statue underneath it

xml.sp: Flounder See...
Sebastian Oh, no! Dis must be from de human world!
Flounder I found it after that storm--- And I bet it's from a shipwreck. Don't ya think Ariel's gonna love it?
Sebastian But if de Sea King finds out about dis...
Donald It's better than going to the surface!
Sora C'mon, help me move it.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy try to lift the rock off the statue

xml.sp: Sora It's no use.

cutscene.desc: They use Magnet to get the statue out from beneath the rock. Near the sunken ship area, Ariel sighs
Chapter Two: Part of Your World

xml.sp: Sora Ariel!
Goofy We'd like you to come with us, Ariel.
Sora Have we got something to show you!

cutscene.desc: They proceed to Ariel's Grotto, where Ariel sees the large statue of Prince Eric

xml.sp: Sora It's a pretty cool statue, huh?
Donald It looks like some kinda prince.

cutscene.desc: Ariel swims up to it

xml.sp: Ariel A prince!?

Donald finds a jack-in-the-box

Donald Yeah! You were gonna tell her dad about it!

Sebastian No. Nothing, Your Majesty.

xml.sp: Triton That's good. So, tell me---how is the song for the musical coming?
Sebastian It is finished, Your Majesty! And it celebrates all de wonderful things found here in de ocean. It will be my finest work.
Triton Will it get Ariel's mind off the human world?
Sebastian Er, yes...well... Probably... Possibly...

cutscene.desc: King Triton looks at him sternly

xml.sp: Sebastian I-I mean, most definitely! Excuse me, Your Majesty, but I must rehearse...you understand.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian swims out of the room. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Undersea Courtyard. Ariel is even more infatuated with the human world

xml.sp: Sora This is terrible! We've got to do something.
Goofy She can't be in the musical like that.
Donald I'll sing her part instead!
Sora No way! Not a chance!
Donald What? Why not!?
Goofy Hey, it's Sebastian.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian swims up with a scroll in his claw

xml.sp: Sebastian Dis will never work...
Sora What's up?
Sebastian I've composed a perfect song for de musical, but I think it's gonna be too complicated for you.
Sora Aw, c'mon! How hard can it be?

xml.sp: Donald Uh-oh...

cutscene.desc: Chapter Three: Under the Sea
Sebastian drums on a few bongo shells and starts up the hot crustacean band. He points to Sora, who swims in among fish

xml.sp: Sora singing The seaweed is always greener in somebody else's lake.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian swims over to Ariel

cutscene.desc: Ariel looks away

xml.sp: Sebastian singing Just look at the world around you, right here on the ocean floor. Goofy and Donald spin to the music
Sebastian singing Such wonderful things surround you. What more is you looking for?

xml.sp: Sebastian singing Under the sea. Under the sea.

xml.sp: Sora Darling, it's better down where it's wetter. Take it from me.

Snails singing Under the sea!
Sebastian singing Under the sea.
Snails singing Under the sea!

xml.sp: Sebastian singing Since life is sweet here, we got the beat here, naturally!
Snails singing Naturally-y-y!
Sora singing Even the sturgeon and the ray.

cutscene.desc: A manta ray swims up to Donald and they dance together

xml.sp: Ariel singing They get the urge and start to play.
Sebastian singing We got the spirit, you got to hear it... Under the sea.

cutscene.desc: He plays his bongo shells again. Sora spins and swims around. Bubbles pop on cue

xml.sp: Sora, Ariel, & Sebastian singing Under the sea.
Snails singing Under the sea.
Sora, Ariel, & Sebastian singing Under the sea.
Snails singing Under the sea.
Ariel singing When the sardine begin the beguine, it's music to me.

xml.sp: Sebastian singing We got a hot crustacean band.
Ariel singing Eat little clam here, know how to jam here...

xml.sp: Sebastian singing Under the sea.

xml.sp: Sora & Ariel singing Each little slug here, cutting a rug here, under the sea.

xml.sp: Sora singing That's why it's hotter...
Ariel singing Under the water.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian grabs onto a jellyfish and swims up with it

xml.sp: Sebastian singing Ya we in luck here, down in the muck here.
Sora, Ariel, & Sebastian singing Under the sea.

xml.sp: Sebastian So what do you think, Ariel?
Ariel Oh, I think it's a great song, Sebastian. It's just... it's not what I wanna sing.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian gasps

xml.sp: Ariel I wanna sing about...how our two worlds can live in harmony---land and sea together!
Sebastian De Sea King would make chowder outta me if you sang a song like dat!
Ariel If you won't listen, then I'm not going to sing at all.

xml.sp: Sora A-Ariel!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy swim after her

xml.sp: Sebastian Hmph! How do I get myself into dese situations? Ohh, man. Not only has dat girl fallen in love at da worst possible time, but wid a human!
Triton Ariel's in love with a human!?

cutscene.desc: Sebastian gasps

xml.sp: Sebastian Ohh, me and my big mouth...

cutscene.desc: Sebastian turns around and sees an angry King Triton. Ariel swims to the surface, Sora, Donald, and Goofy right behind her

xml.sp: Ariel Oh!

cutscene.desc: Prince Eric is walking toward the beach

xml.sp: Sora Is that him?
Ariel Uh-huh.
Donald Let's say something!
Ariel No, don't! He's a human and I'm a mermaid. I...I don't know what he'd think.

xml.sp: Ariel What's that?

xml.sp: Ariel Oh! It must be his!
Goofy But we can't reach it...
Sora Rats!

cutscene.desc: Donald helps retrieve the pendant with Magnera
Chapter Four: Ursula's Revenge
In Ariel's Grotto, she admires the pendant

xml.sp: Ariel This is great, Sora. I know he'll be happy to have this back.
Triton And just who is this he?
Ariel Daddy!
Triton Ariel, you know how dangerous humans are!
Ariel facing away from him You don't even know him! Oh, Daddy, you've told me that you don't trust humans. But they can't ALL be as bad as you say. And I'm---well, I'm going to prove it to you.
Triton So help me Ariel, I am going to get through to you.

cutscene.desc: He holds the trident with both hands

xml.sp: Triton And if this is the only way...

cutscene.desc: The trident glows. Ariel tries to stop him

xml.sp: Triton So be it.

cutscene.desc: He sends out a blast of energy from the trident, which completely destroys the statue. A rock flies right past Donald. Ariel can't meet her father's face and swims out. Sora and company follow her. In the Undersea Courtyard, Ursula appears to her

xml.sp: Ursula Ariel, you poor child!
Ariel You're Ursula---the sea witch! Didn't my father banish you?
Ursula That's right, angelfish. But how could I stay away, when I knew you were so miserable? What you need is a woman's advice.

cutscene.desc: Ariel starts to swim away

xml.sp: Ursula What if I could make all your dreams come true?
Ariel stopping and turning around My father would never allow it...
Ursula Oh, well. It mustn't be love, if you give up that easily.
Ariel Could...could you really help me? But how?
Ursula Well...the only way to get what you want is to become a human yourself.
Ariel unsure A human? Can you do that?
Ursula My dear, sweet child...that's what I do.

cutscene.desc: Sebastian and Flounder swim in and see them

xml.sp: Sebastian Dis is terrible! Flounder! You gotta go tell de King!
Flounder Okay!

cutscene.desc: Flounder turns around, but is stopped by Flotsam and Jetsam

xml.sp: Ursula Have we got a deal? I'll turn you into a human right now. All you have to do is sign a little contract.
Ariel A contract?
Ursula That's right, sweetcakes. And the price is just a token. A trifle. What I want from you is...your voice.
Ariel M-my voice?

Ursula I almost forgot---the magic only lasts for three days. You've got to get dear old Princie to kiss you before the sun sets on the third day. If he doesn't, you turn back into a mermaid, and belong to me! I suppose you might find my terms a little tough. After all, you ARE King Triton's daughter. Adored by all of a Atlantica! Why, you're practically guaranteed a happy life. Are you sure you won't listen to your daddy? All it'll cost you is your true love. Come on, sweetie pie. This is your last chance. But far be it from little old me to twist your arm.
Sebastian Don't listen to her, Ariel!

cutscene.desc: Ariel is still thinking it over

xml.sp: Ursula starting to leave Well, now. I won't intrude any longer. I'll be on my way. You obviously don't want my help. Too bad about your prince, though. He IS quite a catch...
Ariel Wait!

cutscene.desc: Ursula swims back over to her and a contract and pen appear with a flick of her wrist

xml.sp: Ariel All I have to do is sign?

cutscene.desc: She hesitantly, but quickly grabs the pen and writes her name, while looking away. The pen disappears and the contract flies back into Ursula's hands

xml.sp: Ursula We have a deal! Here you go!
Flounder Ariel! Don't!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy swim in

xml.sp: Sebastian Sora, please! You got to stop her, mon!
Sora Wait!

cutscene.desc: Ursula creates a large wind tunnel, blocking Sora from them. Ariel's voice glows and floats out of her mouth. She clutches her neck. Her voice travels into the shell in Ursula's hands. Sebastian and Flounder gasp. Sora braves the wind tunnel before it dissipates, and they see Ariel with legs trying to swim to the surface for air

xml.sp: Sora Oh, no! She can't breathe like that!

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs her arms and pulls her upwards. Ursula laughs as they swim to the surface. Prince Eric walks to the shore and sees Ariel lying half in the water. He runs to her

xml.sp: Eric Are you the girl? Please wake up!

cutscene.desc: She opens her eyes and sees him looking down at her. She stands up, trying to gain her balance. He catches her and she falls into him

xml.sp: Eric Whoa, easy there!

cutscene.desc: They look into each other's eyes. Ariel checks herself, and tries to speak, but can't. She touches a hand to her throat

xml.sp: Eric What's wrong? You can't speak? Oh... Well, where did you come from?

cutscene.desc: She looks out into the ocean. Sora, Donald, and Goofy are there. She jumps to distract him from seeing them. She remembers the pendant and holds it out to him

xml.sp: Eric gasping That's my pendant!

cutscene.desc: Ariel smiles

xml.sp: Eric I-I can't believe you found it.

cutscene.desc: Ariel nods and places it in his hand

xml.sp: Eric Thank you.

cutscene.desc: He looks at it, then back to her

xml.sp: Eric Please. Come with me. I want to help you.

cutscene.desc: She tries to walk. He catches her again and leads her back to his palace. Sora, Donald, and Goofy swim back to the Undersea Courtyard

xml.sp: Sora Looks like it's going pretty well!
Goofy Gawrsh, shouldn't we tell King Triton about this?
Sebastian Absolutely not! It would break his heart if he found out about dis!
Sora Then what do we do?
Sebastian We gonna stay right here and take care of Ariel. Dat's what we gonna do.
Sora I guess that's all we CAN do.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Sebastian decide to go check on Ariel. Ariel and Prince Eric walk along the seashore

xml.sp: Sora So we just float here and watch?
Sebastian Have you got a better idea?
Sora We could make Ursula fix all of this.
Sebastian Hah! She ain't gonna bother wid you.
Sora Hey, you never know until you try!
Sebastian Hmm... You may be right. It's gotta be better dan doing nothin'. Can I trust you to take care of Ursula?
Sora Of course!

cutscene.desc: Eric and Ariel talk for hours on the beach. At night, Flounder and Sebastian are still watching them. They're there when the two arrive on the beach the next day. Eric takes Ariel on a rowboat as Flounder watches. Sora, Donald, and Goofy arrive

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Where's Sebastian?
Flounder Uhh...oh...well... King Triton wanted him at the palace.
Goofy I wonder if it's about Ariel.
Sora If King Triton finds out what happened, we're in hot water. Especially since we kept it a secret.
Flounder What about Ursula?
Donald She disappeared.
Sora Well, how's Ariel doing? She's only got until sunset tomorrow, right?
Flounder turning around Hey, look!

xml.sp: Flounder I can't see!

xml.sp: Flounder They're okay!
Sora Man... they were so close.
Goofy Well, I think we oughta get back to lookin' for Ursula.
Sora Yeah, good idea.

xml.sp: Sora No sign of Ursula anywhere...
Goofy I wonder where that sea witch coulda gone.

xml.sp: Flounder Ariel's been crying for a long time.

xml.sp: Vanessa singing What would I give to live where you are? What would I pay to stay here beside you? What would I do to see you smiling at me?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy make themselves less noticeable

xml.sp: Vanessa singing Part of your world.

Sora Okay, that's it!

xml.sp: Eric What...what happened?
Ariel Eric!

cutscene.desc: He runs to her

xml.sp: Eric You...you can talk... You're the one... The girl who sang to me.
Ariel Oh, Eric, I wanted to tell you.
Eric Of course! It was you! You're the one who...who saved me that night in the storm! Oh, Ariel. I'm sorry I didn't figure it out sooner. You're the one I love.
Ariel Eric...
Ursula Not so fast!

xml.sp: Ursula Do you see what I see?

xml.sp: Ursula crawling towards them You're too late!

xml.sp: Eric Ariel!

xml.sp: Sora Stop!
Ursula Stay out of this, you fools!

xml.sp: Ursula Triton's precious little daughter signed a contract! Now, dearie...let's see how beautiful you are when I'm through with you!

xml.sp: Sora That contract's no good!
Triton Let her go!
Ursula Excuse me!?

xml.sp: Ursula Now, now---even the great King Triton can't go around breaking binding contracts. Why, it just wouldn't do, would it? Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some loose ends to tie up.

xml.sp: Triton Wait, Ursula... You win. Just promise you'll let my daughter go.
Ursula But we had a deal---unless, of course, you're offering to take her place?

cutscene.desc: She holds up the contract

xml.sp: Triton I'm afraid...I have no choice.

cutscene.desc: Triton's trident glows

xml.sp: Sebastian Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: King Triton signs his name on the contract. Ursula laughs as Triton is reduced to a shriveled monster. Ursula picks up the dropped trident

xml.sp: Ursula At last!
Ariel Daddy!
Ursula pointing the trident at Triton Who's the mighty ruler of the seas now?
Ariel You---you monster! Let him go!

xml.sp: Ariel Eric!
Ursula How dare you! Pitiful, insignificant human!

cutscene.desc: Ursula sends Flotsam and Jetsam after him, but Sora blocks

xml.sp: Sora Hey! That's enough!

cutscene.desc: The trident glows

xml.sp: Ursula Ha ha! Now you all bow to me!

Eric and Ariel huddle on the surface of the dark water as bubble appear around them. Their magnitude grows as Ursula blasts out of the water directly beneath them, splitting them from each other. They huddle again as the sea witch rises above the water, towering over them. She holds the trident in her hand and smiles evilly

xml.sp: Ursula singing This witch is back to bring her wrath upon the sea. Triton can't be rid of me, not that easily.

xml.sp: Ursula singing And like all who dare defy me, he will learn his lesson well Never toy with a girl like me.

xml.sp: Sora pointing at her You got what you deserved!

cutscene.desc: The two moray eels circle them. Sora dives underwater

xml.sp: Ursula singing Flotsam and Jetsam!

cutscene.desc: (The eels strike and capture Sora

xml.sp: Ursula singing Loyal darlings, strong as the tide. Sweetest poopsies, hasten to my side.

cutscene.sp: Ursula singing Crush those stupid fools, make them writhe!
cutscene.desc: (Sora, Donald, and Goofy dodge Ursula's tentacles. Sora swims through the eels, and obliterates them with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora All right!

cutscene.desc: Ursula swings her trident over the water. Eric tries to swim away

xml.sp: Ursula singing What a feeble human. No, I can't believe my eyes.

cutscene.desc: A tentacle knocks him out of the water. He lands in his boat and looks back at the sea witch

xml.sp: Ursula singing Such a stubborn royal who is fighting for his prize.

cutscene.desc: Ursula looks to Ariel

xml.sp: Ursula singing Without your precious mermaid, now you're crazy with revenge. I suppose I sympathize.

cutscene.desc: Ursula moves the trident over the water, but Ariel ducks underwater

xml.sp: Eric I'm not gonna lose her!
Sora Right! We're with you all the way!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy fly over the boat. Sora sends a beam at Ursula with his Keyblade, but she blocks with the trident

xml.sp: Ursula singing Flotsam and Jetsam! Loyal darlings, strong as the tide.

cutscene.desc: She tries to hit Donald and Goofy with her Keyblade, but they dodge, still flying for her head. Goofy hits her in the forehead, while Donald gets her chin.

xml.sp: Ursula singing Sweetest poopsies, hasten to my side.

cutscene.desc: (Donald and Goofy fall back into the water

xml.sp: Ursula singing Right now! Mommy needs you. Smash those stupid fools, make them writhe!

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps out of the water and waves at her

xml.sp: Sora Sorry, Mommy... Your poopsies are toast!

cutscene.desc: Ursula gasps and swings the trident around to hit him. Donald and Goofy come out of the water again. They descend as the trident swings around. The trident surges with lightning in Ursula's hand

xml.sp: Ursula singing This is not the end, my dears, I swear I've just begun. It's not over until Ursula has won!
Sora blasting out of the water That's what you think!

cutscene.desc: He knocks the trident out of her hand, as she tries to hit him. It swings through the air and lands on Eric's boat

xml.sp: Ursula No...it's not possible!
Sora It's over, Ursula!

cutscene.desc: He lands back in the water

xml.sp: Ursula That belongs to me!
Eric grabbing it from the boat All right, then---you can have it!

cutscene.desc: He throws it at her, shooting right through. Ursula screams in pain and sinks into the water. Things return to normal

xml.sp: Eric Please, Ariel... You can come out now---it's okay.

cutscene.desc: Ariel doesn't move

xml.sp: Eric Ariel?

cutscene.desc: She dives underwater, and jumps through the air, showing him that she has fins again. She rises to the surface

xml.sp: Ariel You see, Eric...this is why I went to Ursula.
Eric This can't be...
Ariel I would have told you sooner...
Eric To think...
Ariel Eric...goodbye.
Eric I had all that time and I didn't work on my swimming.

cutscene.desc: Eric jumps into the water and swims to her

xml.sp: Eric Well, I guess it's never too late to learn, right? Will ya teach me?
Ariel I'd love to!

cutscene.desc: They embrace

xml.sp: Sora All right!

cutscene.desc: King Triton swims away. Sora, Donald, and Goofy meet in the Undersea Courtyard

xml.sp: Sora Prince Eric's a great guy---and he's really brave, too.
Sebastian swimming up Yes. But he IS a human.
Donald Oh brother. Not again...

cutscene.desc: Ariel and Flounder arrive

xml.sp: Sora How'd it go with your father, Ariel?
Ariel Great! Thanks for your help. I gotta go. I'll see you later!

cutscene.desc: She swims up to the surface

xml.sp: Sora Hey, wait...
Flounder I almost forgot, Sebastian! King Triton said this year's festival is so important that the music better be your best ever!
Sebastian My best ever? Hmm...
Sora All right, what's going on?
Sebastian You gotta do me a favor.

cutscene.desc: The crab whispers his idea to Sora, Donald, and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora What?
Donald Huh?
Goofy But how?
Sebastian And it was gonna make de perfect song, too...

cutscene.desc: After checking Thundaga, they speak to Sebastian again

xml.sp: Sebastian Looks like you can handle dis now! Now our musical will be perfect! This is it. Are you ready to start?
Sora I'm ready! Let's do it!

The stage is ready. Sebastian swims up to his sheet music and taps his wand on the book. The curtain of bubbles dissipates and three shells rise from below. The right and left shells open and Atina and Andrina are inside each

xml.sp: Atina & Andrina singing Welcome the dawning of a happy age of new beginnings.

cutscene.desc: The center shell opens and inside is a dancing manta ray

xml.sp: Atina & Andrina singing Land and see have come together, joined in peace and harmony. Fairy tales and miracles are what we're singing of.

cutscene.desc: Atina flips around. Andrina swims across the stage and twirls around. They start to dance together

xml.sp: Atina & Andrina singing Our dear princess, Ariel, truly fell in love. With a prince, a human prince, who lived so far above.

cutscene.desc: Another shell rises above the stage and the princesses show it off. It opens, revealing Ariel

xml.sp: Ariel singing Wishes really can come true, if you want them to.

cutscene.desc: Atina and Andrina join her

xml.sp: Ariel singing And this happiness inside, I owe to ev'ry one of you.

cutscene.desc: The three sisters swim upward

xml.sp: Atina & Andrina singing How about you introduce us to these lovely friend of yours?

cutscene.desc: Atina and Andrina swim around Ariel and swim offstage

xml.sp: Ariel singing Come take a bow Donald, Goofy, and Sora.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy swim in, spinning around

xml.sp: Donald singing Congratulations, dear princess, to you...
Goofy singing You found your first love and he found you, too.
Sora singing We were glad to help you out, and very proud, it's true.
Sora, Donald, & Goofy singing Seeing how we made you grin just makes us want to twirl a fin.

cutscene.desc: Sora swims and flips to the center shell. Atina and Andrina swim around Ariel

xml.sp: Ariel singing Wishes really can come true, if you want them to. And this happiness inside, I owe to ev'ry one of you.

cutscene.desc: Atina swims around a pillar, and her and Andrina come out the other side

xml.sp: Atina & Andrina singing Be so kind to introduce the King, and these his loyal friends.

cutscene.desc: King Triton swims in on a sleigh, tugged by three dolphins

xml.sp: Ariel singing Please say hello Daddy, Sebastian, Flounder.
Triton Ariel, I'm so happy for you.
Sebastian singing Yes, happy endings are so rare and so few.
Flounder singing We were glad to help, and very proud, it's true.
Sebastian & Flounder Seeing how we made you grin just makes us want to twirl a fin.

cutscene.desc: Flounder flips around as the King rides over the stage

xml.sp: Atina & Andrina singing Any other friends of yours that might be waiting in the wings?

cutscene.desc: Atina and Andrina swim into the orchestra pit and make a circle around Sebastian and Flounder

xml.sp: Ariel singing Come say hello All my friends from ev'ry corner of the world.

cutscene.desc: A manta ray swims in with red fish and glowing jellyfish

xml.sp: Everyone singing A new day is dawning on a happy age of new beginnings.

cutscene.desc: Andrina and Donald swim to the right shell

xml.sp: Everyone singing Land and see have come together, joined in peace and harmony.

cutscene.desc: Atina and Goofy swim to the left shell

xml.sp: Everyone singing Fairy tales and miracles are what we're singing of.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Ariel swim over the center shell

xml.sp: Everyone singing Our dear princess, Ariel, Prince Eric from above. A happy end forever after, full of joy and love.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Ariel spin around in the center shell, and everyone poses to thunderous applause. They bow as a curtain of bubbles comes up
Sora opens another gateway

xml.sp: Ariel Sora, what's happening?
Sora A new pathway has opened.
Sebastian What? You gonna go? Dis is goodbye?
Donald I won't do it! We'll never say goodbye!
Goofy That's right! A-one, two, three, four
Sora, Donald & Goofy singing Even though we're hittin' the road, our worlds are all connected.
Sora Which means...
Sora, Donald & Goofy singing We are free to come and go.
Donald And sing!
Sora, Donald & Goofy singing So don't be sad, and always know, we'll come back soon to say hello!

cutscene.desc: They swim around Ariel, who smiles. Then, they return to their Gummi Ship. Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through Floating Island to a port town in the Caribbean

xml.sp: Donald Wow!
Sora This place is...
Goofy Kinda different.

cutscene.desc: They walk through the Rampart and hear screams coming from the town

xml.sp: Sora Something's up!
Goofy Organization XIII?
Donald Or the Heartless!
Sora Only one way to find out.

cutscene.desc: Pete is talking to several pirates

xml.sp: Pete Aztec treasure, eh?
Barbossa Aye! And thanks to the curse put on it, we are neither among the livin' nor the dead.
Pete Really? 'Cause ya look like regular pirates to me.
Barbossa Ah, but in the moonlight...

cutscene.desc: The moon comes out from behind a cloud. The pirates change into their cursed skeletal forms

xml.sp: Pete Whoa! Now I get what you were sayin'... Well, if you see two doofuses and a brat holdin' a Keyblade, steer clear. They got a kinda magic that don't belong in this world, see? And nobody knows what it'd do to ya. 'Specially when the moon's showing whatcha really are.

cutscene.desc: They lose their skeletal forms as the moon disappears

xml.sp: Barbossa A match for Barbossa, you say?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy run into the Harbor

xml.sp: Sora Hey!
Pete See there? I knew it! Those are the punks I was tellin' ya about.
