Sora Who are you calling punks? It's Sora, Donald, and Goofy to you! And don't you forget it!
Barbossa That we won't. And we'll engrave it on your tombstone, to be sure.
Pete Whoa! I like your style.
Barbossa Men---half of you stay here and indulge these cullies. The rest---bring me that medallion!
Pirate Crew Aye!

cutscene.desc: The pirates split in different directions, some staying behind

xml.sp: Sora Aw, we only get to stomp on a few of you?

cutscene.desc: Barbossa laughs. They try to fight, but their attacks aren't hurting the pirates

xml.sp: Sora It's no use! We can't beat them!
Bo'sun Aye, whaddya expect?

cutscene.desc: The moonlight transforms them again

xml.sp: Bo'sun You'd best be sayin' your prayers!
Pete Hey, watch out! They can see ya! Stay away from their magic!
Bo'sun What for?
Pete Weren't you listenin' to me before?
Sora Hey, Pete, thanks for the tip!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the pirates and confront Pete

xml.sp: Pete Hey! This ain't over!

cutscene.desc: Pete leaves

xml.sp: Sora If Pete's here, that must mean we have work to do.
Goofy Yep. And that pirate captain looked pretty mean, too.
Sora Man, I'd hate to see him turn into a Heartless.
Donald Well, we ARE here...
Sora Hey, maybe we can take a pirate ship out for a spin!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy look surprised

xml.sp: Sora Just kidding! Weren't those guys headed into town?
Goofy Yeah. I think they were looking for treasure.

cutscene.desc: They run into Town. The governor's daughter is being carried off by a pirate. She angrily beats on his back to be let go

xml.sp: Elizabeth Where are you taking me!? Let me go!

cutscene.desc: A blacksmith sees the girl being taken away

xml.sp: Will Elizabeth!

cutscene.desc: He runs after them

xml.sp: Will Stop!

cutscene.desc: He is stopped by Heartless

xml.sp: Will What are they?
Donald It's the Heartless! Watch out!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy get ready to fight

xml.sp: Sora We'll deal with them! Go! Take cover!

cutscene.desc: Will runs ahead to save Elizabeth. Sora and company fight the Heartless. Will returns

xml.sp: Will Well done! My own fencing skills are not to be ashamed of...but I've never faced foes such as that before.
Sora You really think we're that good?
Goofy Did you find your friend?
Will I was too late. But I must rescue her! Would you help me?
Sora Of course! I'm Sora. This is Donald and Goofy.
Will And I'm William Turner, but call me Will.
Sora Okay, Will. Let's go!
Will Right. We've got to get to the docks!

cutscene.desc: They run to the harbor, but the Black Pearl has already left Port Royal

xml.sp: Will We're too late!
Sora Huh?
Will Those pirates kidnapped Miss Swann and took her to their ship. Now they've sailed, and I'll never be able to find her!
Jack Sparrow Then she's long gone. The Black Pearl is nigh uncatchable. Best find yourself another girl, mate.

cutscene.desc: They see Jack Sparrow climbing aboard the Interceptor

xml.sp: Will You... What are you doing aboard the Interceptor? She's off limits to civilians.
Jack Sparrow Ah, fortunate that I'm going to commandeer her, then. She'll make a fine pirate ship.
Sora A pirate!

cutscene.desc: Jack appears on the deck

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Captain Jack Sparrow, if you please.
Will Take me with you. Help me hunt down the Black Pearl and save Miss Swann. I got you out of that jail cell, Sparrow. Do this and your debt's repaid.
Jack Sparrow You'll have to win fair lady's heart alone, mate. I see no profit in it for me.
Sora C'mon, Captain!
Will Are you sure you can sail her, all on your own?

cutscene.desc: Jack contemplates his plan

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow You've a point there.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Will, Donald, and Goofy climb aboard the Interceptor as Jack descends the ramp

xml.sp: Will Thanks, Sparrow.
Jack Sparrow CAPTAIN Sparrow.
Sora I'm Sora. This is Donald and Goofy.
Will I'm Will Turner.
Jack Sparrow That would be short for William, I imagine. No doubt named for your father, eh?
Will Yes.
Jack Sparrow Well, then, Mr. Turner. You get us ready to make way. I've some effects to liberate.
Will Aye-aye! But hurry.
Jack Sparrow Naturally.
Donald Sora!
Goofy You really wanna be a pirate?
Sora Of course not!
Jack Sparrow What do you make of this Will?
Sora I don't know. We just met him.
Jack Sparrow Hmm... I think my luck's about to change.

cutscene.desc: They cast off. Barbossa offers to have dinner with Elizabeth

xml.sp: Elizabeth You can release me. You have your trinket; I'm of no further value to you.

cutscene.desc: Barbossa holds up the gold medallion between his fingers

xml.sp: Barbossa This is no trinket, missy. This is cursed Aztec gold. One of eight hundred and eighty-two identical pieces they delivered in a stone chest to Cortez himself.
Elizabeth I hardly believe in ghost stories anymore, Captain Barbossa.

Barbossa That's exactly what I thought. Buried on an Island of Dead what cannot be found 'cept for those who know where it is. Find it, we did. There be the chest. Inside be the gold. And we took 'em all! We spent 'em and traded 'em and frittered 'em away on drink and food and pleasurable company.

cutscene.desc: Barbossa stands up

xml.sp: Barbossa The more we gave 'em away, the more we came to realize... the drink would not satisfy, and food turned to ash in our mouths. We are cursed men, Miss Turner. Compelled by greed, we were, but now... we are consumed by it.
Elizabeth How very sad for you.

Barbossa There is one way we can end our curse. All the scattered pieces of the Aztec gold must be gathered and restored to the stone chest. And the blood of every soul who touched a piece o' the treasure must be repaid.

cutscene.desc: He walks to the window and looks out at the waves

xml.sp: Barbossa Miss Turner! For ten years we've searched every league of these waters, every town and village---preying on sailors and settlers alike! Eight hundred and eighty-one pieces we found, but despaired of ever finding the last. All those years, you been safe in your bed, readin' your pirate stories, dreamin' of adventure on the high seas---we've endured torments worse than death itself!

cutscene.desc: He turns around to face her

xml.sp: Barbossa But now, thanks to ye, we have the final piece---at last. When this medallion is restored to the chest, we'll be free to roam the seas as men. No longer will we be ghosts!
Elizabeth And the blood that's to be repaid?
Barbossa That's why there's no sense to be killin' ye...yet.

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth gasps and runs out of the room, slamming the doors open. The undead pirates are waiting for her on deck

xml.sp: Barbossa Ye see, the moonlight shows us for what we really are.

cutscene.desc: He approaches Elizabeth, and enters the moonlight, turning skeletal before her eyes

xml.sp: Barbossa We are not among the livin', and so we cannot die. But neither are we dead. I've suffered too long! You'd best start believin' in ghost stories, Miss Turner. For, you see, tonight---you're in one!

cutscene.desc: He laughs and opens a bottle of wine, tossing the cork to the floor. He takes a long swig, the drink pouring down between his bones. Jack Sparrow sets a course for the Black Pearl

xml.sp: Will to Jack Why are you so fixated on that compass?
Jack Sparrow It'll be she that leads us to the Isla de Muerta---where Barbossa's headed. Savvy?
Sora How do you know?

cutscene.desc: Jack closes the compass and puts it away

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Ah, lad... He and I once had our eyes on a treasure---Aztec gold. 'Twas hidden on the Isla de Muerta. But he turned traitor and stole my ship.
Sora So he's after that treasure, then.
Jack Sparrow Treasure's already his. So's the curse upon it. I've no desire for such treacherous spoils. But I will have back what's mine---the Black Pearl.

cutscene.desc: The Interceptor docks at the Rock Face at Isla De Muerta

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow You lads wait here. Young Turner and I will rescue the lady.
Sora Hey! What about us?
Jack Sparrow You're to guard the ship, o' course. It's a task given only to the bravest of pirates.
Sora All right...
Jack Sparrow Guard her well!

cutscene.desc: He and Will turn towards the entrance

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Shall we?

cutscene.desc: Jack and Will enter the cave. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Interceptor and wait

xml.sp: Sora I think he was just trying to fast-talk us...
Donald And you fell for it.
Sora What's keeping those two?
Goofy They sure are taking their time...
Sora If Pete's hanging around, there must be Heartless here, too. And Jack and Will aren't used to fighting Heartless... Let's go see.

cutscene.desc: Jack and Will sneak into the Moonlight Nook and see Barbossa and the other pirates upon mountains of treasure. Elizabeth stands frightened behind a large chest. Barbossa holds up the medallion

xml.sp: Barbossa Every last piece that went astray we have returned, save for this! And now, the blood will be repaid to free us from this curse forever!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter the Cave Mouth. Will and Elizabeth run out of the Powder Store

xml.sp: Will Quick, they're after us!

cutscene.desc: Pirates come running through the cave

xml.sp: Sora We'll hold them off! Give us a sign when the ship's ready to sail!
Will Right! We'll light the signal flare!

cutscene.desc: Will and Elizabeth run to the Interceptor. Sora, Donald, and Goofy fight off the pirates for one minute before the signal flare shoots up into the sky from the ship

xml.sp: Sora The signal!

cutscene.desc: They run out of the cave back to the Interceptor

xml.sp: Sora Where's Jack?
Will Well...

cutscene.desc: In the Moonlight Nook, Barbossa turns to Elizabeth, who's standing behind the chest

xml.sp: Barbossa And now, the blood will be repaid to free us from this curse forever!

cutscene.desc: Will is anxious to save Elizabeth and looks for a way to secretly get her out of there

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow No! Not yet. We wait for the opportune moment.
Will When it's of greatest profit to you?
Jack Sparrow May I ask you something?

cutscene.desc: Jack stands very close to Will

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Have I ever given you reason not to trust me? Stay here...and try not to do anything stupid.

cutscene.desc: Jack walks off, but is hit in the back of the head by an oar. He slumps to the ground. Will tosses the oar to the ground. Barbossa grabs Elizabeth's hand and slices a fair cut on her palm. He presses the pirate medallion to her skin, staining it with her blood

xml.sp: Barbossa Begun by blood...by blood undone.

cutscene.desc: The gold piece drops into the chest with the other medallions. Barbossa waits with his arms outstretched for any sign of change. Nothing happens and he forcefully grabs Elizabeth's arm

xml.sp: Barbossa You! Maid! Your father. Was your father William Turner!?
Elizabeth defiantly No.

cutscene.desc: Barbossa knocks Elizabeth over the pile of treasure, dropping the medallion

xml.sp: Pirate I don't understand!
Pirate What's going on?
Barbossa Who brought this wench to us?
Pirate She said her name was Turner!
Pirate Come on!
Pirate Why isn't it working?
Pirate Get on with it!

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth grabs the medallion and Will finds her

xml.sp: Will Hurry!

cutscene.desc: They run out of the Moonlight Nook behind the pirates. Barbossa sees Will carrying the medallion

xml.sp: Barbossa You there! The medallion! After them, you ingrates!

cutscene.desc: Back on the Interceptor

xml.sp: Will I had to. Jack's no fairy-tale pirate. The real ones aren't to be trusted.

cutscene.desc: They set sail to return to Port Royal. Will and Elizabeth are in the Ship's Hold

xml.sp: Will Is it true? You gave Barbossa my name instead of yours. Why choose my name?
Elizabeth I don't know.

cutscene.desc: Will sees the medallion in Elizabeth's hand

xml.sp: Will Elizabeth...where did you get that?
Elizabeth It's yours. From that day we found you---drifting at sea.
Will After all this time... I thought I'd lost it. It was a gift from my father...he sent it to me.
Elizabeth I'm sorry.

cutscene.desc: She hands him back the medallion

xml.sp: Will Why did you take it?
Elizabeth Because I was afraid that you were a pirate. That would have been awful.

cutscene.desc: Will paces away from her

xml.sp: Will Of course... Don't you see? It wasn't your blood they needed... it was my father's blood--- My blood. The blood...of a pirate.

cutscene.desc: On the Black Pearl, Jack is tied up between Barbossa and the pirates

xml.sp: Barbossa How the blazes did you get off that island, Jack?

Jack Sparrow When you sailed away in my ship and marooned me on that godforsaken spit of land, with naught but a pistol and a single shot, you forgot one very important thing, mate. I'm Captain Jack Sparrow.
Barbossa I won't be makin' that mistake again.
Jack Sparrow Then what say you to puttin' the past behind us, untying these ropes, and letting me negotiate the return of your medallion, eh? What say you to that?
Barbossa Seein' as how the Black Pearl's mine now, Jack, lettin' you go doesn't seem to fall within my interest.
Jack Sparrow Odd, I'm not actually concerned with YOUR INTEREST. Give me back the Pearl!

cutscene.desc: Barbossa laughs

xml.sp: Barbossa All right! Lock him in the brig!

cutscene.desc: The Bo'sun pushes Jack, who doesn't move. He keeps pushing him, and Jack just looks at him

xml.sp: Barbossa We're comin' up on the Interceptor.
Pirate What do we do, Captain?
Barbossa Whaddya think, you idiot?

cutscene.desc: Aboard the Interceptor, the wind blows through Elizabeth's hair and she notices something in the distance

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will, look!

cutscene.desc: Will, Sora, and Goofy rush over to see what she's pointing at. It's the Black Pearl

xml.sp: Donald What now?
Sora I wonder what Jack would do?
Will I'm not sure. I suppose...he'd run for it.

cutscene.desc: A cannon is shot

xml.sp: Sora Sounds good to me.

cutscene.desc: The Interceptor is hit by the cannon and everyone loses their balance. Will falls backwards over the edge of the ship. He grabs hold of a small ledge, but loses his grip and falls into the water. Elizabeth runs to the edge of the ship

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will!

cutscene.desc: They hear another cannon shot

xml.sp: Goofy Everyone hit the deck!

cutscene.desc: The cannon hits the Interceptor again and everyone falls over. Sora sees the pirate medallion and picks it up

xml.sp: Sora We're just gonna have to fight!

cutscene.desc: The Interceptor turns around and runs alongside the Black Pearl. Several pirates jump aboard. Sora clenches the medallion as he simultaneously fights the pirates and returns fire with the cannons. Afterward, the Black Pearl is left in a smoky haze

xml.sp: Donald Hooray!
Sora We beat the pirates!
Barbossa Well, did you now, laddie?

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around and sees Barbossa, Elizabeth, Jack, the bo'sun, and a few pirates

xml.sp: Sora Jack!

cutscene.desc: Jack giggles nervously. More pirates arrive

xml.sp: Barbossa Now then, I'll be having back that medallion. Unless it's more important than their lives?
Will Barbossa!

cutscene.desc: Will aims a pistol at the pirate captain

xml.sp: Will She goes free!
Barbossa Go ahead boy---shoot! We can't die.
Will You can't... But I can!

cutscene.desc: Will points the gun at his own head

xml.sp: Will My name is Will Turner! My father was Bootstrap Bill Turner! His blood runs in my veins!

cutscene.desc: Barbossa is surprised

xml.sp: Will On my word, do as I say, or I'll pull this trigger and be lost to Davy Jones' Locker.
Barbossa Name your terms...Mr. Turner.
Will Release Elizabeth...and Sora, and Donald, and Goofy, too!
Barbossa Anythin' else?

cutscene.desc: Jack tries to get Will's attention to set him free

xml.sp: Will Leave now!

cutscene.desc: Jack sighs. Barbossa bows

xml.sp: Barbossa Agreed. Leave we shall...but the Heartless stay!

cutscene.desc: Pete laughs and Sora sees that he has taken hold of Will, knocking him out with an oar. Several Air Pirate Heartless appear. Pete, with Will in hand, runs off

xml.sp: Sora No fair!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, Goofy, Elizabeth, and Jack are confined to the Ship's Hold

xml.sp: Pete Good work, Barbossa! Who knew it'd be this easy?
Elizabeth Barbossa, you coward!
Sora That's the last time I trust a pirate!
Pirate The powder kegs are ready, Captain!
Barbossa Then I bid ye farewell!

cutscene.desc: Barbossa and Pete leave the Interceptor

xml.sp: Donald What are we gonna do!?
Goofy We'll be blown to smithereens!
Jack Sparrow Why struggle, mate? A pirate knows when to surrender.
Sora Are you serious, Jack?
Jack Sparrow Your average pirate, anyway.

cutscene.desc: Jack cuts his ropes with his knife and stands up

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow First, we've got to see to the gunpowder. I'm not about to lose this ship!
Sora I still don't plan to trust pirates again.
Jack Sparrow Wise policy, lad.

cutscene.desc: After being untied, they race to the deck, where there are five kegs of gunpowder close to explosion. Sora quickly knocks each one into the water

xml.sp: Sora All clear!

cutscene.desc: Jack runs to the helm

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow That's the second time I've had to watch that man sail away with my ship. But I'll be havin' her back soon enough.

cutscene.desc: They return to Isla de Muerta

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow to Elizabeth You stay with the ship, lass!
Elizabeth I'll do no such thing! Will could die in there.
Jack Sparrow Dear William is fine. Trust me.
Elizabeth I am not a fool, Jack.
Sora Then trust me instead!
Elizabeth Sora, Donald, Goofy---bring Will back safely!

cutscene.desc: They run into the cave. In the Treasure Heap, Barbossa and the other pirates stand around the chest

xml.sp: Barbossa Now, let's be tryin' this again! The last of the Aztec treasure has been returned.

cutscene.desc: He points a knife at Will

xml.sp: Barbossa And now, the blood will be repaid to free us from this curse forever! This time for sure!

cutscene.desc: The pirates cheer. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Jack run in

xml.sp: Sora Ahoy! Treasure, mateys!
Barbossa Not possible.
Donald Not probable! We're alive and we're pirates!
Jack Sparrow Captain Jack Sparrow!
Sora Sora!
Donald Donald Duck!
Goofy Goofy, too.
Barbossa So you want to play pirate? Best save the playacting for the nursery. After them!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy fight the pirates. Jack takes care of his own business

xml.sp: Sora No more playacting now!
Will Thank you, Sora!
Goofy Uh, where's Jack?

cutscene.desc: They hear the clang of sword and see that Jack and Barbossa have crossed swords

xml.sp: Sora Jack! Get him!
Jack Sparrow Huh?

cutscene.desc: As he's distracted, Barbossa plunges his sword into him. Sora gasps

xml.sp: Sora Jack!
Barbossa You're a fool, Jack Sparrow.

cutscene.desc: Jack stumbles back into a patch of moonlight and his skeletal form is revealed. Jack holds his hand up and looks at it. His other hand contains a pirate medallion, which he rolls on his knuckles

xml.sp: Will Jack...
Barbossa Show yourself, Pete! The tide has changed.

cutscene.desc: Pete appears

xml.sp: Pete See? I told ya you'd be needin' ol' Pete!

cutscene.desc: Pete whistles and an Illuminator Heartless crawls down on the walls, its eyes glowing and its tongue lolling about. It hops from rock to rock and moves behind Barbossa on the rock wall. They fight the pirate captain. Pete looks worried

xml.sp: Pete This ain't over!
Jack Sparrow Right! Care to surrender, Barbossa?

cutscene.desc: Barbossa's sword is drawn

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Well, enough of this, then...

cutscene.desc: Jack drops his sword and takes out his pistol

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow What say you we call it---a draw?
Barbossa Jack, how many times do I have to tell ya---

cutscene.desc: Jack tosses the medallion and shoots Barbossa with the only bullet left in his pistol. Barbossa laughs

xml.sp: Will Laugh while you can, Barbossa!

cutscene.desc: Will, holding the knife, drops the two medallions he has in his hand, stained with blood, onto the large pile in the chest. Barbossa is lifted of the curse

xml.sp: Barbossa I feel...cold.

cutscene.desc: The pirate falls to the ground. Later, they leave the cave

xml.sp: Will What now, Jack?
Jack Sparrow Whatever I want, now that the Pearl is mine again.
Will That she is. Thank you, Jack.

cutscene.desc: Will holds out a hand to shake Jack's hand, but Jack flinches with his arms over his head

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow I didn't want ye hittin' me again, mate.
Sora Hey, Jack---good luck.
Donald And remember to be good!
Jack Sparrow I'm off.

cutscene.desc: Jack backs away, then looks in her direction as Elizabeth runs toward them

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will!

cutscene.desc: Jack opens his arms but she runs right past him and hugs Will

xml.sp: Sora Good for them.
Goofy Uh-huh! Hey, Sora---how come your face is all red?

cutscene.desc: Goofy points. Sora covers his face

xml.sp: Sora What? It is not red!
Donald Aw, I know who you're thinking about.

cutscene.desc: Goofy and Donald laugh. Jack takes out his compass and it glows brightly as he opens it. It floats into the air, and Sora opens another gateway with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora You know...for a minute there...I was afraid we were gonna lose Donald to the curse of the treasure!
Goofy Yup. Me, too.
Donald What!?

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through the Ancient Highway and lands in an Arabian city. An orange parrot flies through the streets and lands on a wall as Sora, Donald, and Goofy walk in

xml.sp: Donald Agrabah! We made it!
Goofy Gawrsh, I wonder how Aladdin 'n' Jasmine are doin'?
Sora Hey, maybe Riku's with them!
Goofy Yeah, and the King!

cutscene.desc: The parrot flies into the air in their direction

xml.sp: Donald Keep dreaming, you two.
Sora C'mon, Donald, you were thinking the same thing.
Donald No, I wasn't!

cutscene.desc: The parrot flies up to them and around Goofy

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-oh, it's uh...um... It's Iago!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald whirl around and take out their weapons

xml.sp: Iago Wait! You got me all wrong.
Donald You're Iago all right!
Iago No! I mean, it's not the old me. I turned over a new feather. I'm legit! No more scams. Promise!
Sora Bet that's your new scam.
Iago Ya gotta believe me!
Donald Sora, let's go!
Iago I was stuck inside that lamp with Jafar. Remember? Well, I finally escaped. But then some things happened and...

cutscene.desc: He lands on the ground

xml.sp: Sora So. Free as a bird, huh?
Donald Have fun!
Goofy Gawrsh, fellas. He looks pretty sad.
Iago quickly flies over to Goofy I wanna apologize to Aladdin and Jasmine.

cutscene.desc: Goofy catches Iago in his hands

xml.sp: Iago Could you guys maybe put in a good word for me?
Goofy Sure, we can do that, can't we?

cutscene.desc: Some Luna Bandit Heartless sneak up behind them

xml.sp: Iago Watch out!

cutscene.desc: They fight wave of Heartless

xml.sp: Sora Where are they all coming from?

cutscene.desc: Two run after Iago, who flies into the air, knocking the Heartless into each other. Iago flies into an urn and knocks it over. He flies past some crates, which crash on top of the Heartless

xml.sp: Sora This way!

cutscene.desc: They run into a sidestreet, Iago following, and end up inside the Peddler's Shop

xml.sp: Goofy Aw, we'd've been goners if Iago hadn't helped us. Ain't that right, fellas?
Sora I guess we owe you one.
Iago Perfect!
Sora But you'll have to win over Aladdin and Jasmine yourself. Be on your best behavior, got it?
Iago Yeah, I got it.
Goofy Where IS Aladdin, anyway?
Iago I betcha he's at the palace.
Sora Then let's go!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Iago proceed to the Palace Gates and find Princess Jasmine

xml.sp: Sora Jasmine!
Jasmine Sora! Donald! Goofy!
Donald bowing Your Majesty.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy also bow. Jasmine giggles

xml.sp: Jasmine I never had the chance to thank you for before. You helped Aladdin defeat that awful Jafar and saved Agrabah.
Sora All in a day's work. But uh... it looks like the Heartless are up to no good again.

cutscene.desc: Iago peeks out from behind Goofy, waves, and hides again

xml.sp: Sora Is there any way we can help you out?
Jasmine I think we're all right for now.
Goofy And ya always got Aladdin.
Jasmine He...hasn't been himself lately.
Donald Is it because of the Heartless?

Jasmine I'm not sure. Usually, he's the same cheerful Aladdin. But sometimes...he just seems sad. He leaves the palace and goes off by himself all the time. I've asked him about it, but he says nothing's wrong. He's gone again today. What if he doesn't come back this time?
Iago Hey, maybe he's got a secret girlfriend. I know! I'll go find out who she is!
Jasmine Iago! Quick, Sora, catch him!

cutscene.desc: Iago flies around Sora and hides behind him

xml.sp: Jasmine And I'll warn the guards and everyone in the palace!
Sora That's the thing, Iago's not...

cutscene.desc: Jasmine has already run off to the gates of the palace. Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora Nice move.
Goofy Maybe it's something you said. Gee, maybe we should go talk to Aladdin. He's gotta be somewhere in town, right?
Sora Good idea. I wonder what he's been doing.

cutscene.desc: They walk back into town

xml.sp: Peddler Stop, thief!

cutscene.desc: A monkey carrying a black oil lamp runs past Sora, Donald, and Goofy. Aladdin runs in afterward

xml.sp: Aladdin Hi, Sora!

cutscene.desc: The Peddler races after them

xml.sp: Peddler Come back here!

cutscene.desc: Iago flies after them, as Sora, Donald, and Goofy try to catch up. Aladdin and Abu reach a wall. Abu clutches the lamp tightly

xml.sp: Peddler If you can't control that fur ball...put a leash on him!
Aladdin Look, I'm sorry... You should be ashamed of yourself, Abu!

cutscene.desc: Abu gives Aladdin the lamp

xml.sp: Aladdin No hard feelings?

cutscene.desc: The Peddler snatches it out of Aladdin's hand with a huff and walks away

xml.sp: Aladdin Abu!

cutscene.desc: Abu covers his head with his arms, until seeing Sora, to whom he runs

xml.sp: Aladdin Hey guys, sorry about earlier. I was kinda in a hurry.
Sora What happened?
Aladdin You know Abu. He couldn't keep his paws off that lamp.

cutscene.desc: Abu tries to make an excuse

xml.sp: Aladdin No talking your way out of this one!

cutscene.desc: They laugh

xml.sp: Sora I guess you can't be THAT down in the dumps, huh?
Aladdin Who said I was?
Goofy Princess Jasmine. She's worried 'cause you're always in town.
Donald Got a new girlfriend?
Aladdin No way! Still... I guess there's no foolin' Jasmine, huh? See, Genie and Carpet took off to see the world. It's what Genie always wanted, so I wished him the best and all, but...
Goofy You miss him.
Sora Man, things must be REALLY quiet with Genie gone.
Aladdin Yeah. That's why I come here. The action---the people. There's always something goin' on. I mean, c'mon! I met you guys here today, right? This place is full of surprises.
Goofy Uh, Sora?

cutscene.desc: Iago is on the ground, shivering

xml.sp: Sora Iago!? Oh, right... He wants to apologize for all the trouble he caused.
Aladdin Oh, he does?
Goofy Gawrsh, he's so sorry, he's shakin'!
Iago Th-th-that lamp!
Aladdin What about it?
Iago It was THE lamp!
Aladdin C'mon. There're a million like it.
Iago Hey! I was locked up in that thing FOR MONTHS! There's no way I'd mistake it!

cutscene.desc: Abu grabs his hat and squawks

xml.sp: Aladdin Then we'd better go back and talk to that peddler.
Sora Right behind you.

cutscene.desc: They return to the Peddler's Shop

xml.sp: Sora Is there any way we can buy that lamp from you?
Peddler Of course. That is...IF you can afford it.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks to the entrance and Aladdin gives him a signal

xml.sp: Sora No worries!
Donald Yeah, we can pay you in royal treasu---
Sora & Goofy Donald!
Peddler Might I be able to interest you in another fine lamp?
Sora No, that's the one we need.
Peddler Ah, well---perhaps I can be persuaded...IF you bring me a treasure beyond even my imagination. Something, say, fit for a sultan...

cutscene.desc: They leave the Peddler's Shop

xml.sp: Aladdin Treasure? That could be tricky...
Donald There's lots at the palace.
Aladdin But it's not mine to take. And I can't ask. I don't want to worry Jasmine or the Sultan.
Iago flying in Hey, I know... What about the treasure in the Cave of Wonders?
Aladdin All right, Iago. You lead the way! And after we get the treasure, I might even believe your apology.
Iago You can count on me!

cutscene.desc: They proceed to the Cave of Wonders. Pete enters the tiger's head before they arrive

xml.sp: Iago This is it!

cutscene.desc: They enter the cave, passing through the Valley of Stone. They arrive at an area with waterfalls on each side. A jewel floats in midair in the center of the hall. Abu jumps off Aladdin's shoulder and grabs the jewel. The waterfalls vanish and several stone guardians appear from the walls, their eyes glowing. Ice crystals appear in the air above Abu and he runs around dodging them. Sora guides Abu over the moving floor to set the stone in the pedestal and soothe the wrath of the Stone Guardians. The pedestal at the end of the hall vanishes into dust and an entrance is opened. They enter the Chasm of Challengers and see a stone plaque

sp.speaker: Plaque
sp.q: Complete your task within the time allotted.

cutscene.desc: Sora activates it and they fall through several floors fighting Heartless. On the final floor, a set of stairs appears with a temple and another plaque

sp.speaker: Plaque
sp.q: Victor of the trial... You possess great strength!

cutscene.desc: The doors to the Treasure Room open and they are greeted with mountains of treasure. They see a jeweled trophy

xml.sp: Aladdin There. That one should do it.

cutscene.desc: Pete walks in and sees them. He hides and peeks out at them

xml.sp: Donald Oh boy. It's perfect. That guy's gonna like this.
Sora Sure looks valuable.
Aladdin Great! Now let's go get that lamp.

cutscene.desc: Pete's ear perks up at the mention of the lamp and he snickers

xml.sp: Aladdin We gotta keep Jafar bottled up, or he's gonna destroy Agrabah!

cutscene.desc: Abu and Iago try to hoist up a jeweled statue

xml.sp: Donald Stop!

cutscene.desc: He stamps his foot yelling and they drop it. The jewel then entices Donald

xml.sp: Aladdin Hey, snap out of it, Donald!

cutscene.desc: Donald shakes his head vigorously. Pete leaves with a smile on his face and a plan in his head. He snaps his fingers and Heartless appear in the Treasure Room, which has grown darker

xml.sp: Donald Why does this always happen?

cutscene.desc: They fight the Heartless and the room lights back up

xml.sp: Sora Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They run out of the Cave of Wonders and return to the Peddler's Shop

xml.sp: Aladdin Hello!

cutscene.desc: They hear two voices from outside

xml.sp: Pete Stop your whining and hand it over!
Peddler Ohh no! I'm trading it for treasure. This lamp is going to bring me riches!

cutscene.desc: They leave the shop and see Pete chasing the Peddler

xml.sp: Pete Oh no, you don't! Get back here, you!

cutscene.desc: They chase them to the Palace Gates. Pete catches up to the Peddler

xml.sp: Pete Thank you.

cutscene.desc: He grabs the lamp from the Peddler's hands and runs ahead. The Peddler catches back up to Pete

xml.sp: Peddler It's mine!

cutscene.desc: The Peddler grabs it back and keeps running. Pete realizes it's gone and runs faster. They chase each other around the courtyard

xml.sp: Pete Lamp hog!
Peddler Go away!
Pete Gotcha!

cutscene.desc: Pete grabs the Peddler and takes the lamp, holding the Peddler down with one hand. The Peddler tries to jump, but can't

xml.sp: Peddler No fair!
Pete Heh heh, I win!

cutscene.desc: Iago flies in and snatches the lamp away. Pete's ears perk up and he realizes his hand's lighter. He looks up and sees no lamp. The Peddler has caught on and tries to jump at Iago to get the lamp, but he's too short

xml.sp: Sora Nice one, Iago!
Aladdin Way to go!
Donald Don't drop it!
Goofy Look! Behind you!

cutscene.desc: Pete and the Peddler both chase Iago, who turns swiftly. They both crash into a wall. The Peddler falls to the ground. Pete rubs his head and turns to see Iago. Iago looks back and also crashes into a wall, dropping the lamp. Iago tries to get up, but can't. Pete picks up the lamp and laughs

xml.sp: Pete Nice try, bird brain. Just wait till Jafar's free! He's gonna make one beauty of a Heartless!

cutscene.desc: The ground shakes and a large blue something flies around in the sky

xml.sp: Genie among bells and whistles I'm HOME!

cutscene.desc: He flies past Pete

xml.sp: Genie Al! It's been eons!

cutscene.desc: Genie flies back and hugs Pete

xml.sp: Genie Al, you princely little muffin, you!

cutscene.desc: Genie teleports back into the air

xml.sp: Genie Cosmic travel can get so lonely without a friend.

cutscene.desc: He places an arm on Pete's shoulder, then teleports and places his other arm on Pete's other shoulder

xml.sp: Genie To think I left you forlorn and Genie-less... Oh, the HUMANITY!

cutscene.desc: Genie shakes Pete, then comedically rubs his eyes. He's still completely oblivious to Aladdin, Sora, Donald, Goofy, Iago, or the Peddler

xml.sp: Aladdin Genie?
Genie Hey, Al, you've been puttin' on weight?

cutscene.desc: Genie grows several feet wider, then teleports right to Pete's face. Pete is completely disheveled

xml.sp: Genie Aw, of course, what am I saying? You're living at the palace now.

cutscene.desc: Genie spins around and a second Genie appears

xml.sp: Genie in Jasmine's voice Aladdin!
Genie in Aladdin's voice Jasmine!

cutscene.desc: The two Genies hug and fireworks shoot out from behind them. One makes a heart shape in the sky. Genie appears again next to Pete

xml.sp: Genie I can just picture it...

cutscene.desc: He slaps a hand on Pete's back, slightly hard. Genie next to Pete, but a smaller version of him

xml.sp: Genie Wait, tell me. Am I being a pest? Just a big blue pest? Aw, who cares, Al! I'm just so glad to SEE you!

cutscene.desc: Genie poofs big again and shakes both of Pete's hands. Pete has almost lost his balance. Aladdin walks up

xml.sp: Aladdin Genie!

cutscene.desc: Genie looks from Aladdin to Pete and lets go

xml.sp: Genie Oops!

cutscene.desc: Pete is snapped back into reality

xml.sp: Pete I'll teach you to make a fool out of me!

cutscene.desc: Genie picks Aladdin up, laughs, and hugs him

xml.sp: Pete Time for Plan B! I'm finishin' you mugs off right now!

cutscene.desc: Pete slams his fist on the ground. A large geyser appears and destroys a wooden cart. The Blizzard Lord Heartless appears. Bushes lining the courtyard burst into flame as the Volcanic Lord Heartless rises up. They engage in a battle

xml.sp: Pete You! You've messed with me for the last time! I'm gonna get you yet!

cutscene.desc: Pete leaves. Genie hugs Aladdin

xml.sp: Genie Yeah! All right!

cutscene.desc: He gives Aladdin a thumbs up, which he returns. Carpet flies in with Abu on him. Iago follows with the lamp. In the dungeon, they place the lamp in a stone coffin and close it. They meet up with Jasmine in front of the palace

xml.sp: Iago I promise---you won't regret givin' me another chance. Honest!
Genie Uhhhh... Princess Jasmine, you sure that you want that pigeon in the coop?
Jasmine Oh, I think Iago's shown that he means well.
Genie Aw, sure. You're probably right.
Sora And how much trouble can one noisy bird cause?
Genie You might just have a point there, kid.
Jasmine What happens next, Sora?
Sora Well, it was great seeing you all...but we still need to find Riku and the King. I guess we'll be moving on.
Genie I hope you find 'em.
Sora Me, too.
Donald Hey, where's Aladdin?
Jasmine He ran off toward town, looking for Abu. But he should be back by now.
Genie Al can't miss Sora's big farewell party! I'll have him back in a jiffy!

cutscene.desc: Genie spins around and disappears in a tornado of magic

xml.sp: Aladdin Abu!

cutscene.desc: Abu runs in with a large red jewel

xml.sp: Aladdin Catch him!

cutscene.desc: Abu stops suddenly, when Sora, Donald, and Goofy all jump for him. They crash on top of the little monkey, who loses the jewel

xml.sp: Aladdin He must've secretly stolen it from the Cave of Wonders.
Donald Abu!

cutscene.desc: Donald snatches the jewel away and looks at it

xml.sp: Donald Wow!

cutscene.desc: Donald stares transfixed

xml.sp: Goofy I guess some things are just hard to resist.

cutscene.desc: Donald shakes it off

xml.sp: Donald Aw, who needs it!

cutscene.desc: He makes that he's about to throw it, and everyone looks, while he puts it behind his back. Abu sees it and squawks, alerting everyone else

xml.sp: Donald Oh... I guess it got stuck!

cutscene.desc: The jewel glows

xml.sp: Donald What!?
Everyone Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Sora opens another gate

xml.sp: Aladdin Sora... What is it?
Sora I think it's time for us to go.
Jasmine Will you be back?
Sora We will, I promise!

cutscene.desc: Aladdin gives them a thumbs up. They look toward the sky. In a dark city, neon lights brighten an alleyway where a dog is wandering through. The dog sees a red-haired man in a black cloak and follows him around the corner. Pluto runs up to Axel as he disappears. Pluto hears a whistle and another portal appears behind him, which he runs inside. Kairi waits on the beach of the Destiny Islands, looking at the small island she used to play on

xml.sp: Kairi Maybe...waiting isn't good enough.
Axel My thoughts exactly! If you have a dream, don't wait. Act. One of life's little rules. Got it memorized?

cutscene.desc: Axel appears near the water

xml.sp: Kairi Who are you?
Axel Axel. I happen to be an acquaintance of Sora's. Why don't we go see him?

cutscene.desc: Axel holds out his hand

xml.sp: Kairi ...Sora?

cutscene.desc: Pluto barks, snapping Kairi back to reality. The dog bounds over and barks, spinning in circles and wagging his tail. Dusks surround them and Pluto snarls. They hear a whistle and a portal opens. Pluto leaps towards it, stops, and turns around. He barks at Kairi

xml.sp: Axel We've got something in common, Kairi. You and I both miss someone we care about. Hey, I feel like we're friends already.

cutscene.desc: The Dusks are closing in on her. She decides to run into the portal

xml.sp: Kairi You're not acting very friendly!

cutscene.desc: Kairi and Pluto arrive in a strange abyss with Nobody symbols in every direction moving along the walls and floor

xml.sp: Kairi Hey, what is this place?

cutscene.desc: They hear another whistle and see a bright light at the end of the abyss. Pluto runs inside it. Kairi enters and looks back, seeing a cloaked figure. The portal of light closes before she can find out more. She wakes up laying on the floor

xml.sp: Hayner You okay?

cutscene.desc: She groans and sits up. She is in the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Kairi What...?

cutscene.desc: She sees Hayner, Pence, Olette, and Pluto

xml.sp: Pence You and that dog came flying out of a hole in the wall. You nearly gave us heart attacks!

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship through the Broken Highway to a land of holidays. Jack Skellington walks through a dark forest, his pet, Zero, trailing behind. He comes to a clearing. Several trees are adorned with various doors. The center one depicts a Christmas Tree. Jack turns the golden doorknob and swings open the door. He leans against the tree and looks in. A small breeze carrying snowflakes wafts from inside the tree. However, Jack sees nothing inside. The wind wraps around Jack and pulls him into the tree. Sora, Donald, and Goofy arrive at a signpost attached to a scarecrow with a pumpkin head. The sign reads Halloween Town

xml.sp: Sora Hey, this is Halloween Town, right?
Donald Well, it sure does look like Hallowee...Wha?

cutscene.desc: Donald looks over to the entrance into town. It's decorated in orange Christmas lights. Goofy looks as well. Sora looks at Donald, and then to the entrance. Zero flies in and scares Goofy, who scares Donald and Sora

xml.sp: Sora Hey, it's Zero! How've you been, boy?

cutscene.desc: Zero flies into town and they follow. They enter Halloween Town Square and see a long launchpad

xml.sp: Sora What's that for?

cutscene.desc: They hear the sound of bells

xml.sp: Donald It's Jack!

cutscene.desc: Jack flies down in a trashcan sleigh led by three skeletal reindeer

xml.sp: Jack Sora, Donald, and Goofy! Welcome back, and Merry Christmas!
Sora Merry Christmas? Don't you mean, Happy Halloween?
Jack Of course. Halloween greetings from Jack Skellington, the Pumpkin King.

cutscene.desc: He makes a scary face, which to him doesn't seem up to his standards

xml.sp: Jack Forgive me. I'm in a Christmas mood. You see, I'm running the show again this year---but I need Sandy Claws's blessing, so I'm off to Christmas Town.
Sora Sandy Claws?
Goofy I think he means Santa Claus.

cutscene.desc: Jack stands up on the edge of the fountain

xml.sp: Jack Aren't these decorations wonderful? This year Halloween Town's going to handle Christmas too! But first! We have to visit Sally. She's working on something no self-respecting Santa Claus can do without. Come along---I'll show you!
Sora A Halloween Town Christmas...

cutscene.desc: They look around the Square and see the guillotine, a jack in the box, a scary duck with teeth, and the reindeer, which squawk. Donald and Goofy shiver

xml.sp: Sora Wanna go check it out?

cutscene.desc: Jack walks to Dr. Finkelstein's Lab

xml.sp: Jack C'mon, hurry!

cutscene.desc: In the Lab, Dr. Finkelstein is working on his latest creation with Lock, Shock, and Barrel. The doctor opens his head and scratches his brain. Jack enters gleefully

xml.sp: Jack Hello, Doctor! Where's Sally?
Finkelstein Can't you see...that I'm in the middle of an experiment?

cutscene.desc: He slams his head shut and turns around in his wheelchair. He rides it over to the table. Lock, Shock, and Barrel carry over a machine part as Sally enters

xml.sp: Lock Hey, this is way too heavy!
Shock Then let's toss it!
Finkelstein You do and you'll be sorry! Now bring it over here.
Lock, Shock, & Barrel Heave-ho!

cutscene.desc: They throw the part onto the table. It sparks and pulses with electricity, then exploded. Sora and Jack cover their faces. The table is covered with smoke. Lock, Shock, and Barrel take off their masks and laugh. They start to leave, Barrel tripping, and they put their masks back on as they run past Sally

xml.sp: Finkelstein Imbeciles! Now my experiment is ruined!
Jack Sally! Did you finish it? I want to show my good friends.
Sally I'm sorry, Jack. I...I need a little bit more time.
Jack Ohh... Well, that's all right. Just as long as it's ready for Christmas!

cutscene.desc: He pats her shoulder and starts to leave

xml.sp: Sally But... Jack...
Jack I'd best be off. I've got to go get Sandy Claws, right away! Wonderful to see you again. Good-bye for now!

cutscene.desc: Jack leaves

xml.sp: Sora Go get Santa Claus...?

cutscene.desc: He thinks

xml.sp: Sally Please, Sora. I'm afraid something terrible will happen if Jack goes through with this.
Donald You can say that again!
Goofy Sora?

cutscene.desc: Jack returns, snapping Sora out of his daze

xml.sp: Jack Are those strange-looking fellows in the town square with you?
Sora Huh? What fellows?
Jack You know, the ones who wanted to spoil Halloween AND Christmas? What are they called again... Heartless?
Sora They're definitely not with us. But Donald, Goofy, and I can get rid of them for you. And then we can go see Santa!

cutscene.desc: Donald taps his foot. Sora looks over at him

xml.sp: Sora But first, the Heartless!

cutscene.desc: They leave the lab and see several Wight Knight Heartless and The Mayor

xml.sp: Mayor Now hear this, you...you things! Leave Halloween Town at once...by order of the mayor! Jack? Where are you? I'm only an elected official---I can't handle this by myself.

cutscene.desc: Jack walks up to him

xml.sp: Mayor Jack!
Sora We're on it!

cutscene.desc: They successfully get rid of the Heartless

xml.sp: Jack How is Sandy Claws supposed to relax with all this going on? That's it, fellows! Sandy Claws needs bodyguards. Are you up to the task?
Donald Us?
Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Lock, Shock, and Barrel ride their walking bathtub into the Graveyard

xml.sp: Lock What should we bring along next time?
Shock A bucketful of caterpillars!
Barrel Or something even worse!

cutscene.desc: They come across a woman in black holding a staff

xml.sp: Lock Who's that?
Barrel Some old hag!
Maleficent Silence!
Shock A witch?

cutscene.desc: Maleficent lifts her arm and conjures up magic threateningly. The three are scared and shrink close together in their bathtub, shivering

xml.sp: Maleficent Hmm...perhaps you three could be of use to me. Come along, all of you. I'll show you the true meaning of mischief.

cutscene.desc: Back in Halloween Town Square, Jack is getting them prepared

xml.sp: Jack All right, bodyguards! Christmas Town is this way! The doorway is in the woods just past the graveyard!

cutscene.desc: They pass through the Graveyard and into the Hinterlands. They see the area with doors on the trees

xml.sp: Jack Here it is! The door to Christmas Town. The spooks of Halloween can get so tiresome year after year. I wanted something new. And I found this! Beyond this door is a world filled with wonders...the likes of which you've never seen! As first I couldn't believe my eyes! Everything was so fresh and exciting!

cutscene.desc: Sora is getting anxious

xml.sp: Sora C'mon! Just open it!

cutscene.desc: Jack opens the door. Sora runs and jumps inside. Donald and Goofy look in after him, watching him fall. They look at each other and jump in. They're transported to Christmas Town. Sora comes out of the tree on the Yuletide Hill. Donald falls on top of him, and Goofy on top of him. Sora pushes them off and looks down to the city below

xml.sp: Sora Cooool!
Donald Wow!

cutscene.desc: Jack appears

xml.sp: Donald So where's Santa?
Jack pointing In his workshop. Shall we?

cutscene.desc: They walk into Candy Cane Lane and Heartless appear

xml.sp: Sora Here too!?
Jack En garde, loyal bodyguards!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Heartless

xml.sp: Donald Christmas is in big trouble!
Goofy Gawrsh, we can't let anything bad happen to Christmas.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald nod

xml.sp: Jack pointing That's where Sandy Claws lives.

cutscene.desc: They enter Santa's House, where Mr. Claus is looking over his list. A few elves are walking about

xml.sp: Sora & Donald Whoa!
Santa Well, hello everyone. Did you come to see if you're on my nice list?

cutscene.desc: They walk closer

xml.sp: Santa Your name?
Sora Um, Sora, sir.
Santa checking his list Let's see...Sora...Here you are. Well, according to my list, Sora...seven years ago you told everyone you did not believe in Santa Claus... Oh, that is unfortunate.

cutscene.desc: Sora holds his head

xml.sp: Donald How about Donald and Goofy?

cutscene.desc: Santa checks his list and smiles

xml.sp: Donald jumping Oh, boy!
Jack Am I on your list, too, by any chance? It's me, Jack!
Santa Jack Skellington!?

cutscene.desc: They hear a smash from inside the Toy Factory

xml.sp: Santa walking to the door What sort of trouble did you bring this time?
Sora This time?
Jack It's a long story!

cutscene.desc: They follow Santa into the factory

xml.sp: Lock Why do we have to hide?
Maleficent Silence! Well, this is a pleasant surprise. That fool Jack brought Sora and the others with him. Now we can deal with all of them at once!
Shock What do you want us to do?
Santa Who's there?
Lock, Shock, & Barrel Busted!

cutscene.desc: Maleficent disappears, as Barrel swings a clamp through the window. Jack sees them and gasps. The three miscreants leave through the window

xml.sp: Jack It's Lock, Shock, and Barrel!
Santa Not those three...
Jack I assure you, they're not with us.
Santa Well, whatever the case, they've been quite naughty. Catch them and bring them back here. They're going to get a lecture.

cutscene.desc: He starts to walk back to his house

xml.sp: Jack Uh...Mr. Claws? I wanted to talk to you about Christmas first.
Santa stopping It'll have to wait. I need to see how things are progressing in my workshop.
Sora C'mon, Jack---let's catch those little pranksters.
Jack Oh, all right, then.

cutscene.desc: They leave Santa's House and see footprints going all the way up Yuletide Hill. They follow them back to the Graveyard. Maleficent is standing at the base of Curly Hill with Lock, Shock, and Barrel in their walking bathtub

xml.sp: Maleficent I was so looking forward to destroying that ridiculous Christmas Town. But now that Sora and those imbeciles are here I think a change of plan is called for. Revenge before pleasure, after all.
Shock What kind of revenge?
Maleficent The magnificent, malevolent kind, of course.
Lock That sounds really bad.
Shock Like Oogie's kinda bad!
Barrel And that's super-duper bad!
Maleficent Oogie Boogie? That bag of incensed insects? How intriguing. And where might I find him?
Shock Jack and his dumb, stupid friend destroyed him.
Maleficent Ah yes, now I remember. More intriguing still! I believe I'll bring your master back for you.

cutscene.desc: In a torrent of green flame, Maleficent works her magic as Lock, Shock, and Barrel have a laugh. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Jack continue through the Graveyard. Back in at Curly Hill, Oogie Boogie has returned

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie laughing I feel like a million bugs! I really owe you one for this, Maleficent.
Maleficent Indeed you do, Oogie. Do you remember Sora, Donald, and Goofy?
Oogie Boogie Do I remember them? Ha! You're too much! I'll never forget what they did to me... Uh...What was it they did to me?
Shock Squashed you like a bug!
Oogie Boogie That sounds bad!
Lock And Jack helped!
Oogie Boogie Even worse!
Barrel They creamed ya!

Oogie Boogie That's right, that's right! That's one thing I won't be forgetting any time soon! It's the last thing I remember. And it's the only thing I remember until I teach those clowns not to mess with Mr. Oogie Boogie!
Maleficent Yes...that's right. That's the spirit. And I have the perfect plan already in mind.

cutscene.desc: She turns her back to him

xml.sp: Maleficent Have you ever heard of Christmas Town?

cutscene.desc: She gets no response, and looks back toward him. Oogie is slumped forward, not moving

xml.sp: Lock Mr. Oogie!
Shock Wake up! Wake up!
Barrel We want to see how bad you are!
Maleficent sighing It seems he needs more time to recover. You three---stay here and keep Sora and the others occupied.

cutscene.desc: She waves her staff and Oogie disappears. She follows suit

xml.sp: Maleficent My Heartless will help you. But do not fail me!

cutscene.desc: The Prison Keeper Heartless appears, as Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Jack enter Curly Hill

xml.sp: Sora There they are!

cutscene.desc: Lock, Shock, and Barrel jump into the Heartless's cage. The Heartless closes it with a bony finger

xml.sp: Shock Stop them!
Lock Tie 'em down!
Barrel Get 'em!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Heartless

xml.sp: Barrel Ah ha ha ha!
Lock That was fun!
Shock Let's go see if Mr. Oogie's ready!
Jack Oogie!?
Sora Isn't he the one who tried to take over Halloween Town before?
Jack That's him. Fellows, I hope you're ready for trouble...
Goofy Don't we have enough trouble already?

cutscene.desc: They all nod. Santa Claus has entered the Hinterlands

xml.sp: Santa Confound it. Now I've lost my way.

cutscene.desc: He looks around and sees nothing but bare trees

xml.sp: Santa Oh, this is utter foolishness. I should be getting ready for Christmas.
Sally Is that you... Mr. Sandy Claws?

cutscene.desc: He gasps and she walks out from behind a tree

xml.sp: Santa Yes, but...please, call me Santa Claus.
Sally Of course. Mr. Santa Claus, I was hoping I'd find you here. You see... It's very important that you go back to Christmas Town. I'm afraid something terrible is going to happen if you don't.
Santa Well, I am behind on my preparations... All right. Tell Jack I'll be waiting for him at home. He had something to say to me about Christmas.
Sally But that's just it. Please, go home and lock the door. And if Jack knocks, don't open it!

cutscene.desc: Maleficent and Oogie Boogie watch them from a distance

xml.sp: Maleficent There. The large one in red.
Oogie Boogie All I gotta do is kidnap him?
Maleficent That's right. Lock him up at once! Then begin destroying Christmas Town. That's sure to make Sora and the other fools come running.
Oogie Boogie And then they're all mine!
Maleficent Yes. And in the meantime, I'll turn Santa Claus into Santa Heartless!

cutscene.desc: They laugh

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie Are we done?
Santa Who's there?

cutscene.desc: Oogie Boogie runs at them and Santa moves in front of Sally. Later, Sally runs through the graveyard, running into Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Jack

xml.sp: Jack What's wrong, Sally?
Sally Jack! Oogie's kidnapped Santa Claus!
Jack Oh, no!
Sally And he's headed to Christmas Town!
Sora C'mon, Jack---let's hurry!

cutscene.desc: Jack nods, and they proceed through the door in the Hinterlands. Oogie Boogie walks around laughing inside the Toy Factory. Santa Claus is tied up on the conveyor belt. Oogie jumps onto the belt

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie I've done a little redecorating!

cutscene.desc: The Toy Factory is definitely not as cheery as it once was

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie Wait... Something's not quite right. I know what it is! We just need a little more of that Oogie flair!
Maleficent I do hope our jolly old friend is looking forward to becoming a Heartless.

cutscene.desc: Santa, gagged, cannot speak. Maleficent starts to perform a spell, when Oogie accidentally bumps her from behind

xml.sp: Maleficent tapping her staff Clumsy oaf!
Oogie Boogie Are you still here? Why don't you Oogie on back where you came from. You're crampin' my style!
Maleficent Have you already forgotten who brought you back, you insolent bag of bugs?
Oogie Boogie Sorry! Can't remember a thing!
Maleficent Very well, you ingrate. You'll rue the day you spurned my help!

cutscene.desc: Oogie walks into the conveyor and fiddles with it. There is an explosion and a large billow of smoke rises out of the factory. Sora, Donald, Goofy, Jack, and Sally enter Yuletide Hill

xml.sp: Donald That's Santa's house!

cutscene.desc: They rush to the Toy Factory. Oogie Boogie reveals himself with a laugh. He jumps from the high ledge and grabs Sally. He releases her and turns around

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie Jack Skellington!
Jack Oogie!
Oogie Boogie You and I have a score to settle, Jack! Same goes for your little sidekicks!
Jack What are you planning to do with Sandy Claws?

cutscene.desc: Sally sneaks around the conveyor belt, holding one of her legs

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie scratching his head Who? Sandy Claws? I don't know what you're talking about!

cutscene.desc: He jumps down to the conveyor belt, where Santa is still tied up

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie And why is this roly-poly red guy here? Time to go, grandpa!

cutscene.desc: He motions with his arms, and gets up Santa. Sally gasps. Oogie laughs and Sally throws her leg to Oogie

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie Eh?

cutscene.desc: Santa gets away as Oogie is distracted

xml.sp: Sally Mr. Santa Claus!

cutscene.desc: Santa runs to the corner where Sally is. Oogie storms after them, but is blocked by Jack, Donald, Goofy, and Sora

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie Why, you...

cutscene.desc: He runs back and into the conveyor. They run up as Oogie comes down on a scaffold-like contraption. He presses a button and laughs, as the conveyor belt starts moving and sharp spikes appear at the other end, where Sora and company are headed

xml.sp: Donald Stop!

cutscene.desc: Donald runs up the center belt into the conveyor. He then runs out on the left belt

xml.sp: Donald Huh?

cutscene.desc: He runs back into the conveyor, then back out on the center belt

xml.sp: Donald Not again!
Oogie Boogie Nice view from up here!

cutscene.desc: The conveyor belt starts moving backwards

xml.sp: Oogie Boogie That's right, away you go!

cutscene.desc: After getting Boogie down from the scaffold, his stitching starts to come undone, and bugs spill out. He holds it closed and it stops. He sighs, but then his other side starts to rip. He yells helplessly as the bugs spill out of him and he disappears. Donald steps on a stray insect. Sora sighs in relief

xml.sp: Sora All right, Christmas is safe again!
Jack Perfect! I'd better get down to business!
Donald Leave that to Santa!
Goofy Yup, you oughta stick to Halloween and spooky stuff!
Sally Jack?

cutscene.desc: She walks out with his outfit

xml.sp: Sally Here, it's done.
Jack Wonderful! Why, I love it! Thank you, Sally!
Sally Jack... Do you really have to do this?

cutscene.desc: Jack starts putting on his outfit

xml.sp: Jack But I make a splendid Sandy Claws!
Santa walking in Listen here, Jack Skellington. You saved me, and Christmas as well. And for that, I'm very grateful. But please promise you won't cause any more trouble! And about that suit!

cutscene.desc: Jack spins around, showing off his outfit

xml.sp: Santa Don't even think about taking over for me again!
Jack I just thought you could use a little help this year, Mr. Claws. You must be exhausted from all the preparations. And---I wouldn't mind a second chance to get this Christmas thing right.

Santa Yes, being Santa Claus can be tiring. But let me tell you something, Jack. Seeing the happy faces of little children when they discover the presents I've brought them makes it all worthwhile, year after year after year. And you, Jack---you love to make them gasp and see them shiver with fright. What if someone tried to take all of that away from you?

cutscene.desc: Jack looks down and scratches his head

xml.sp: Santa We both have very important jobs to do, Jack. Mine is to take care of Christmas, and yours is to take care of Halloween. So we each have to do the very best we can. After all, you're the face of Halloween---Mr. Jack Skellington! The Pumpkin King! The Knight of Nightmares! And even though you're fascinated with Christmas, Jack...Halloween is your true specialty. Don't you see? Children rely on both of us to do our jobs. Halloween needs your attention...and I know Christmas needs mine---urgently.

cutscene.desc: He turns around

xml.sp: Jack You're right! I am the master of terror! And if Halloween has become too routine, all I have to do is think of something new that'll really make them scream!
Mayor running towards them Jack! Oh, Jack! I've been looking for you everywhere! We must go over the plans for next Halloween! I can't do a thing without your approval!
Jack So true.
Santa Good luck, Jack Skellington.

cutscene.desc: Jack walks away with the Mayor, seemingly excited with new ideas for Halloween

xml.sp: Sora Well, there he goes.
Santa Yes, and I've got lots of names to check and preparations to finish!

cutscene.desc: Jack's Sandy Claws outfit glows brightly

xml.sp: Mayor Jack, this is no time for joking!
Jack What's this? Perhaps a bit too festive for our Halloween needs.

cutscene.desc: Sora's Keyblade opens another gateway

xml.sp: Sora We better get going.
Santa Before you do, Sora... I believe there's a friend of yours...who---if I recall correctly---was the one who told you there's no such thing as Santa Claus?
Sora Oh yeah... He did say that.
Santa Be sure to give him my very best wishes.
Sora I will, but... Do you know where I can find Riku?
Santa No...but don't give up! Remember, if you believe in Riku, you will find him. Just as you found me.
Sora Right!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy leave Halloween Town. They pilot the Gummi Ship through Sunlight Storm and land in an African savannah. A lone lion cub stands in a large rocky gorge. He looks around a bit and sees tiny stone rattling on the ground. He feels the vibrations getting stronger and looks up. Over its steep edge, hundreds of wildebeest storm the gorge. The cub looks at it frightfully. He runs as they're upon him, until he comes to a single tree in the center and climbs on. He hangs onto the branch. A wildebeest knocks into it and sends the cub flying. A large lion runs against the flood of wildebeest and catch the cub in his mouth. He climbs up the side of the gorge and lets the cub down, but is pulled back in by the other animals. The cub looks down in horror watching for a sign of his father. The lion springs up out of the fray and grabs onto the rock face. The cub watches expectantly as the lion creeps up the side of the gorge. He slips slightly and the cub runs around to find a higher viewing point. The lion looks up to see a darker-colored lion approaching the edge of the gorge. Simba turns around just as his father gets thrown back into the horde of wildebeest with a loud roar

xml.sp: Simba Nooooo!

cutscene.desc: Simba wakes up from his nightmare

xml.sp: Simba Nooooo!

cutscene.desc: He gasps and looks over to see Timon and Pumbaa snoring. He gets up and walks to the edge of the cliff. He looks up into the stars. Sora, Donald, and Goofy appear in the Gorge

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Check us out.

cutscene.desc: They look around

xml.sp: Sora This place is kinda creepy, though.
Donald Uh-huh.

cutscene.desc: They're surrounded by hyenas. Ed laughs then snarls

xml.sp: Sora Heartless?
Goofy I dunno, Sora. I get the feelin' they might live here.
Donald Don't mind us! Just passing through. We won't be any trouble.
Sora Yeah, that's right!
Shenzi Don't be silly. We'd love you to stick around for lunch.
Sora Um...we didn't bring anything to eat.
Banzai That's not gonna be a problem!
Goofy Gawrsh, Sora---I think WE'RE the lunch!

cutscene.desc: Ed laughs and licks his lips. Donald yells and they split in three directions. Sora trips and is stopped by Banzai

xml.sp: Banzai Going somewhere?

cutscene.desc: They corner Donald and Goofy. They hear a lion roar

xml.sp: Banzai Man, that Scar's got the worst timing.
Shenzi Just let him roar.
Banzai Nah, we better go see what he wants. Sounds like he's grumpy enough already.
Shenzi sighing Fine.

cutscene.desc: The hyenas leave

xml.sp: Sora I dunno what that was about, but I'm glad it's over!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy sigh with relief

xml.sp: Sora Everything's harder on four legs...
Donald Better start practicing!
Goofy I found a trick to it. Here, lemme show ya.

cutscene.desc: They leave the Gorge and find a lioness in the Elephant Graveyard running from some Living Bone Heartless

xml.sp: Sora Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
Donald Heartless!?
Goofy What do we do?

cutscene.desc: Sora runs up to the lioness

xml.sp: Sora Stay back!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Heartless

xml.sp: Sora Definitely Heartless.
Nala Thank you. You really saved me.
Goofy We're just glad you're okay.
Sora Did you see any other Heartless around here?
Nala Heartless... Is that what they're called? I'm not sure if there are any others... I don't usually hunt outside the Pride Lands.
Donald Pride Lands?
Sora Hey, do you know if a guy named Riku is there? Or some bad guys in black hoods? Or maybe this really big bully named Pete?

cutscene.desc: Nala shakes her head and Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora Oh well, we might as well go take a look, anyway.
Nala Wait---the Pride Lands are dangerous. Scar and the hyenas have made things unbearable for everyone. There's no food left. They've driven off the prey. We're about to starve.
Sora We can handle a little danger. You just saw us beat those Heartless, didn't you?
Nala I guess you're right... You could be just what the kingdom needs. Maybe you can help us.
Goofy Ya mean take on this Scar guy and all those hyenas?
Donald Scar?
Nala He took over when our last king, Mufasa, died.
Sora So you're saying this guy is your king. You want us to take down your king?

cutscene.desc: Nala nods

xml.sp: Sora hopping back over to Donald and Goofy Wait just a minute. We can't just go around knocking kings off their thrones. Then again, if they see that I'm stronger than their king, maybe they'll ask me to be their next king!
Goofy Sora...
Sora chuckling I'd have to refuse, of course. Still, I'd like to see the Pride Lands, so you guys don't mind lending 'em a paw, do you?

cutscene.desc: Sora hops over to Nala

xml.sp: Donald Uh-oh, there he goes again...

cutscene.desc: Nala nods and leaves

xml.sp: Sora She's gonna go on ahead and tell the other lionesses. We're supposed to meet her at a place called Pride Rock.

cutscene.desc: They run across the Savannah and reach Pride Rock. Nala walks out to them with a mandrill named Rafiki

xml.sp: Nala That's him.

cutscene.desc: Rafiki inspects Sora closely

xml.sp: Sora Uh....what?

cutscene.desc: Rafiki looks to Goofy and Donald. A few lionesses awake. Rafiki whispers something in Nala's ear, then walks away

xml.sp: Sora What is it?

Nala I told Rafiki you might be able to help us force Scar and the hyenas out of the Pride Lands. But he says it won't work. You see, whoever saves the Pride Lands will be our next king...and he has to have the right qualities.
Sora Meaning...
Goofy I think she means you're not cut out for the job, Sora.

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs

xml.sp: Nala I'm sorry you came all this way.
Sora Hey, no---it's okay.
Nala softly You'd better go before Scar finds out you're here. I'm really sorry.

cutscene.desc: They try to leave, but are cut off by Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed

xml.sp: Banzai Hey---a snack.
Shenzi Snack? Nah, we got us a three course meal.

cutscene.desc: Ed laughs. They hear a growl

xml.sp: Banzai Look at that, here comes Scar---the king.

cutscene.desc: A fat, ugly lion is standing next to Scar on Pride Rock

xml.sp: Sora And Pete!

cutscene.desc: Scar runs down the rock. Pete tries to follow, but his large stomach makes him lose his balance, and he falls down. Sora looks at him pitifully as he stands up

xml.sp: Pete My back...
Sora What are you doing here!?
Pete Aww, the cute li'l kitty's worried about me. If I were you, I'd be more worried about my friends!
Donald Sora!
Goofy We're surrounded!

cutscene.desc: The hyenas are almost upon them

xml.sp: Scar Go on, ladies---you've got some hunting to do.
Nala The herds have moved on, Scar. We can't hunt in a land with no prey.
Scar No prey? Then what do you call this?
Sora We're not prey!
Scar Oh. Nice and fresh, too.
Pete Well, they're all yours, Scar.

cutscene.desc: Scar moves closer, but Nala jumps on him. Sora gasps

xml.sp: Nala Run!

cutscene.desc: They run down the hill evading the hyenas. Nala leaves Scar and runs ahead

xml.sp: Nala Follow me!

cutscene.desc: They lose the hyenas in the Savannah

xml.sp: Nala I'm sorry I got you involved in this.
Sora It's no big deal.
Donald Aw, it's not your fault. Sora wouldn't be a good king.
Sora Hey! I had to give it a try, right?
Goofy So you DID want to be king!
Sora Well...you know... Uh, Nala, isn't there anybody else who could be king?
Nala There was... but he died... when he was just a cub. He was the son of our last king, Mufasa. If only Simba were here...
Sora Simba!? But Simba's just fine! He was fighting right beside us not that long ago.
Nala You mean Simba's alive!? But where is he?
Sora That... I don't know.
Nala Still... Simba's alive! I can't believe it... Please---tell me more about him.
Sora Of course!
Nala But first, we should get away from Scar. We'll go through Wildebeest Valley. He won't follow us there.

cutscene.desc: In the Oasis, Timon wakes Simba up

xml.sp: Timon Hey, why the long face, Simba? You gotta lighten up and live a little!
Simba Y-yeah...
Pumbaa What were you thinkin' about?
Timon Lemme guess. The past, right?

cutscene.desc: Simba nods slightly

xml.sp: Timon & Pumbaa Hakuna matata!

cutscene.desc: Simba smiles and walks off

xml.sp: Timon Would you look how he's grown, Pumbaa. Why, when I rescued the little guy, he was only this big.

cutscene.desc: Simba walks to the edge of the cliff, looks upward, and collapses, sending leaves into the sky. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Nala approach a wide crevasse. Nala takes a few steps backward and jumps over the crack

xml.sp: Sora, Donald, & Goofy Wow!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks down to the bottom, which is a long way down

xml.sp: Nala What's wrong?
Sora We're never gonna make it.
Nala I guess Rafiki was right.
Sora What?
Nala Never mind. It's not important. Here, I'll show you how. You can do it!

cutscene.desc: Eventually, Sora, Donald, and Goofy get to the other side of the crevasse. The leaves sent by Simba fly to Pride Rock and are caught by Rafiki. He smells them and hops down into the Stone Hollow. He places them into a large turtle shell made as a bowl and sifts them around. He is told that they come from Simba. The mandrill takes some red paint and adds it to the lion drawing on the wall. Sora, Donald, Nala, and Goofy come to the end of Wildebeest Valley

xml.sp: Nala When Simba's father, King Mufasa, died, we were told that Simba died alongside him.
Sora Who told you that?
Nala looking down Scar.

cutscene.desc: Rafiki catches up to them

xml.sp: Rafiki It is time.
Nala It must be Simba! Sora! Hurry!

cutscene.desc: She runs ahead

xml.sp: Sora Wait up!

cutscene.desc: They run after her through the Wastelands and enter the Jungle. In the Oasis, they see Aerial Knocker Heartless surrounding Simba. He roars and they disappear

xml.sp: Sora Simba!

cutscene.desc: Simba gets defensive

xml.sp: Sora I-it's me---Sora! Donald and Goofy are here, too.

cutscene.desc: Simba walks closer to them, and sees the resemblance

xml.sp: Simba Sora! Donald! Goofy!

cutscene.desc: He happily pounces on Sora and rubs his stomach, while Donald and Goofy laugh

xml.sp: Simba What happened to you?

cutscene.desc: They hear Timon and Pumbaa scream

xml.sp: Timon Help! Simba! Heeelp!
Pumbaa She's gonna eat us!
Simba Timon? Pumbaa!? Something must have happened in the jungle! I have to go help my friends!

cutscene.desc: He speeds off

xml.sp: Sora Okay, we'll back you up!

cutscene.desc: They leave to help him. Timon and Pumbaa are huddling in fright as Nala approaches. She leaps, but is pounced on by Simba. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run up

xml.sp: Sora Simba! Wait!

cutscene.desc: Simba and Nala battle it out

xml.sp: Donald Stop!
Sora It's Nala! Don't you recognize her?

cutscene.desc: He charges at her, making them both spin, and she pins him to the ground

xml.sp: Simba Nala?

cutscene.desc: Nala gets off him and looks him over

xml.sp: Simba It's me, Simba!
Nala Simba!

cutscene.desc: They bump heads together, walking in circles around each other

xml.sp: Nala You are alive!
Timon Hey! What's goin' on here!?

cutscene.desc: Timon and Pumbaa turn around and see Sora, Donald, and Goofy. They scream and run away. Timon hides behind Simba's leg

xml.sp: Simba Don't worry. They're all friends of mine.
Timon So that means...nobody's planning to eat anybody else for lunch, right?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald nod

xml.sp: Pumbaa shivering Are you sure they don't wanna eat me like I'm some kinda pig!?
Sora We won't...but you are a pig, right?

cutscene.desc: Pumbaa gets up and whirls around

xml.sp: Pumbaa Call me Mr. Pig!

cutscene.desc: They laugh

xml.sp: Simba Could you guys excuse us for a few minutes?
Timon Why am I not surprised?

cutscene.desc: Simba and Nala walk off together to the Oasis

xml.sp: Nala Simba, you've got to come back to Pride Rock. I thought Sora might be able to help, but you're the only one who can save us from Scar.
Simba I can't go back.
Nala Why?
Simba Hakuna matata. It's something I learned out here. Sometimes bad things happen and there's nothing you can do about it.
Nala Simba...

cutscene.desc: Timon and Pumbaa are showing Sora, Donald, and Goofy the way of the Jungle, swinging their heads as they walk

xml.sp: Timon Hakuna!
Sora, Donald, Goofy, & Pumbaa Matata!
Timon Hakuna!
Sora, Donald, Goofy, & Pumbaa Matata!

cutscene.desc: Nala walks past them

xml.sp: Nala He's not the Simba I remember. Something about hakuna matata...

cutscene.desc: Simba leaves afterward. At night, he gazes up into the sky

xml.sp: Simba My father's dead. And it's because of me... It's my fault. I can't go back... It won't change anything.

cutscene.desc: Simba remembers a similar night spent with his father. Young Simba is nestled on Mufasa's back

xml.sp: Mufasa Look at the stars. The great kings of the past look down on us from those stars. So whenever you feel alone, just remember that those kinds will always be there to guide you... And so will I.

cutscene.desc: Simba looks into the stars

xml.sp: Simba Father...are you there?

cutscene.desc: Several clouds appear and take the form of Mufasa. He shines with a holy light

xml.sp: Mufasa Simba... you have forgotten who you are. You must take your place in the Circle of Life.
Simba How can I go back? I'm not who I used to be.
Mufasa Remember who you are.

cutscene.desc: Mufasa disappears and the clouds roll away. Simba takes a moment to gaze at the sky

xml.sp: Simba You can all come out now.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, Goofy, Timon, and Pumbaa enter

xml.sp: Simba I'm going back to face my past. I could use your help.
Timon He really is a king...

cutscene.desc: The morning sun shines behind him. They leave for the Savannah. Simba looks over the barren ground and gasps

xml.sp: Timon Wait a minute. We're gonna fight your uncle for THIS?
Simba Yes, Timon. This is my home.

cutscene.desc: Scar looks out over Pride Rock. Most of the lionesses are sleeping. He look up and sees Simba, who leaps down to him

xml.sp: Scar Simba! You're...alive!
Simba This kingdom doesn't belong to you.
Nala Simba's the rightful king.

cutscene.desc: Simba presses forward, pushing Scar backwards

xml.sp: Simba The choice is yours, Scar. Either step down or fight.
Scar Must this all end in violence? I'd hate to be responsible for the death of a family member, Simba...
Simba I've put the past behind me.
Scar But what about your faithful subjects? Have they?
Nala Simba, what's he talking about?
Scar pacing around Simba Go on. Tell them who's responsible for Mufasa's death!
Simba sadly I am.

cutscene.desc: Scar presses forward onto Simba, who backs away slowly

xml.sp: Scar He admits it! Murderer! If it weren't for you, Mufasa would still be alive. Do you deny it?
Simba No! But it was an accident!
Scar You're in trouble again. But this time, Daddy isn't here to save you. And now everyone knows why!

cutscene.desc: Simba trips on the edge of Pride Rock and hangs by his arms off the ledge

xml.sp: Scar Now this looks familiar. I think I've seen this before. Oh, yes! I remember. This is just the way your father looked...before he died.

cutscene.desc: Scar plunges his claws into Simba's paws

xml.sp: Scar And here's my little secret... I killed Mufasa.

cutscene.desc: Simba remembers how his father fell from the ledge and his scream for him afterward. He shoots up off the ledge and pounces on Scar

xml.sp: Simba with a paw on Scar's neck Murderer! Tell them the truth!
Scar All right. All right! I did it.
Simba Louder!
Scar I...killed...Mufasa!

cutscene.desc: Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed run out of the Den and attack Simba. Scar runs away into the King's Den

xml.sp: Sora Simba! You get Scar! We'll handle these guys!

cutscene.desc: Simba nods and runs after Scar, as hyenas surround Sora. Timon and Pumbaa rush up, spilling hyenas into the air

xml.sp: Timon 'Scuse me! Pardon me! Comin' through!

cutscene.desc: Timon hops off Pumbaa and they stand firm. Then, the hyenas all glare at them and they run into the King's Den, Sora, Donald, and Goofy following. They fight the hyenas while protecting Timon and Pumbaa. The hyenas run out of the Den

xml.sp: Sora Where's Simba?
Nala He went up there.

cutscene.desc: They run up to the Peak, and find Simba and Scar circling each other

xml.sp: Donald Simba!

cutscene.desc: Sora stops him

xml.sp: Sora This is his fight, Donald.

cutscene.desc: Simba claws at Scar, and Scar claws back, knocking Simba away. Scar makes to pounce on Simba, but he lifts his legs, and tosses him over the edge of Pride Rock

xml.sp: Simba You're okay!
Pete Aw, that was just a sneak preview! 'Cause this ain't over---not by a long shot!

cutscene.desc: Pete points to the edge, where a claw rises up

xml.sp: Pete Anger and jealousy turned the king of Pride Rock into a Heartless! Oh, your kingdom's gonna rise again...

cutscene.desc: Scar climbs back onto the Peak

xml.sp: Pete But this time, as the Pride Lands of Darkness!
Simba That's what you think!
Scar I am the king!

cutscene.desc: They fight a gruesome battle with Scar, but ultimately, he is defeated.

xml.sp: Scar Simba...

cutscene.desc: Later, everyone watches as Simba ascends the promontory. As he reaches the edge, he lets out a loud roar. The lionesses roar in unison. Mufasa's image appears in the clouds once more, and a sunbeam shines down upon the new king of Pride Rock. Sora's Keyblade opens another gateway

xml.sp: Timon Hey, what's with the light show?
Simba We have to say goodbye for a little while.
Pumbaa I'll go tell Simba.
Goofy Aw, he's prob'ly busy. Just tell him we'll be back soon.
Timon Oh, that's right---he's king now. He's gonna be so busy he'll prob'ly forget all about his two best buddies.
Sora Well, you always got hakuna matata, right?
Pumbaa Guess so...
Timon Whaddaya mean, Guess so!? What if he forgets to tell the carnivores who we are? One look at you, and you're a pig roast.
Donald That's MISTER Pig Roast.
Pumbaa Same thing! And I'm not sticking around to be anybody's pork dinner!

cutscene.desc: He runs off wildly

xml.sp: Timon Pumbaa!
Sora You can never forget your true buddies.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy leave the Pride Lands. A previous world has appeared on the map

xml.sp: Chip Looky there! Twilight Town!
Dale Yep, I can see it! It's back again!

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship back to Twilight Town and they enter the Tram Common. Vivi runs past them

xml.sp: Vivi H-Help! The sandlot! It's Seifer! Somebody please help us!
Sora Sound like we've got trouble!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod and they run to the Sandlot. Seifer, Fuu, and Rai are lying on the ground surrounded by Dusks. Seifer tries to get up

xml.sp: Sora We'll take it from here!

cutscene.desc: They fight off the Nobodies

xml.sp: ???? Impressive.

cutscene.desc: A cloaked figure stands beside them clapping his hands

xml.sp: ???? By the way, have you seen a man named Axel? I expect he's here somewhere.
Sora Like I care.

cutscene.desc: Sora readies his Keyblade

xml.sp: ???? You see, Axel's no longer acting in our best interest.
Goofy Is he with the Organization, too?
Donald You havin' a fight?
Sora Not a very organized Organization...

cutscene.desc: The man points at Sora warningly

xml.sp: ???? Don't let your guard down. Axel will stop at nothing to turn you into a Heartless.
Sora Gee, thanks for looking out for us, mister. But I'm sure we can take care of ourselves just fine.
???? Glad to hear it. Axel aside, it would break our hearts to hear something happened to you.
Donald Hearts? You don't have any hearts!
???? True, we don't have hearts.

cutscene.desc: He takes off his hood, revealing his long blue hair and x-shaped scar on his face

xml.sp: Saïx But we remember what it was like. That's what makes us special.

cutscene.desc: A portal appears behind Saïx

xml.sp: Goofy Whaddya mean?
Saïx We know very well how to injure a heart. Sora, you just keep on fighting those Heartless.
Sora to Donald Let's jump in after him!
Donald How come?
Sora I'm not sure, but maybe he'll lead us to the Organization's world.
Saïx Don't be reckless. Do you want to end up like Riku?
Sora What!?

cutscene.desc: Saïx bows out through the portal, which disappears

xml.sp: Sora Hey, wait! ...What did he mean, end up like Riku?
Seifer Hey, how 'bout you get out of my town now? You've caused enough trouble.
