Sora Riku...
Donald to Seifer Have it your way! C'mon, guys.
Seifer Hold it!
Donald Make up your mind!
Seifer holding up the Four Crystal Trophy This goes to the strongest guy in Twilight Town.

cutscene.desc: Sora points to himself questioningly

xml.sp: Sora Thanks, but...we don't really need it.

cutscene.desc: Seifer runs up and thrusts it into Goofy's arms

xml.sp: Goofy Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Seifer smirks at Sora and leaves, Rai and Fuu following. Pence runs in from the other direction

xml.sp: Pence Oh! Sora!
Sora Um...Pence, right?
Pence Do you know a girl named Kairi?
Sora K...Kairi!? I sure do!
Pence Then you better come to the station!

cutscene.desc: Pence, Sora, Donald, and Goofy run to the Station Plaza. Hayner and Olette run up to them

xml.sp: Hayner He-ey!
Sora Hey, so how do you guys know Kairi?

cutscene.desc: Olette and Hayner look at each other sadly. They explain what happened to Sora

xml.sp: Sora Kairi was really here!?
Hayner Yeah. And...she said she was looking for you.
Sora Tell me where she is!
Hayner Well...

cutscene.desc: They remember the events of the short time with Kairi in the Usual Spot

xml.sp: Olette What a romantic story!
Pence If you stick around, Sora's bound to show up.
Hayner Yeah, he said he's coming back.
Kairi Okay!
Axel What took you so long, Kairi?

cutscene.desc: Axel walks in through a portal. Pluto breaks into a defensive stance

xml.sp: Axel Somehow I just knew you'd be here. I tell ya, Kairi, you've got a lot of guts, jumping right into the darkness like that.

cutscene.desc: Axel walks out of the portal. Hayner runs for a punch, but passes right through him. Pence does as well. Axel grabs Kairi by the arm and drags her back to the portal

xml.sp: Kairi Let go of me! Let go!

cutscene.desc: Pluto runs in after them. Pence and Hayner get up and the portal disappears. Sora holds up the Oathkeeper keychain

xml.sp: Sora Kairi...

cutscene.desc: Sora pockets the charm

xml.sp: Goofy Ya think it mighta been Axel?
Hayner Sorry...
Sora Hey, it's not your fault. C'mon, cheer up! Like I can even say that...

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora I gotta help Kairi!

cutscene.desc: Sora's outburst scares Goofy, who drops the trophy

xml.sp: Goofy Whoa!

cutscene.desc: The crystals spill in different directions. Hayner, Olette, and Pence pick them up

xml.sp: Pence That was close!

cutscene.desc: Sora picks up the blue one and holds it up to the light. Goofy takes a blue one out of the munny pouch and holds it up also. Hayner, Olette, and Pence hold theirs up. Sora's image is that of Roxas

xml.sp: Donald Sora!?
Goofy Sora! Are you okay?
Sora Huh? What...?

cutscene.desc: Goofy scratches his head, while holding the munny pouch. Sora's crystal starts to glow, and it floats into the air. Sora opens a gateway with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Pence Wh-what just happened?
Sora A new road is open. And Kairi and Riku are waiting somewhere along it.
Olette You'd better hurry, then.
Hayner You comin' back?
Sora Promise!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. A figure is sitting alone in the white room in the tallest chair. Saïx appears

xml.sp: Saïx I passed on the message as you so desired. I told the young Sora to keep defeating the Heartless.
?????? Good. Not only have you the power to inflict pain, you also have the power to plant seeds of doubt in one's receptive heart.

cutscene.desc: Saïx lowers his head

xml.sp: ?????? Sora will soon begin to doubt himself. It will cause him to hesitate and that hesitation will turn to anger. That anger will fuel him to get rid of his apprehension and move forward. He will pave the way for the future we desire.

cutscene.desc: Saïx turns his head up to face Xemnas

xml.sp: Saïx There's something I've meant to ask.
?????? About Axel?

cutscene.desc: Saïx nods

xml.sp: ?????? The poor fool. How long will he keep chasing the illusion of friendship, when he himself lacks emotion? Trying so hard to retrieve what he has lost, when it may never have existed in the first place. He deserves nothing more than our pity.

cutscene.desc: Sora's group returns to the gummi ship. Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora The King, Riku---and now I've lost Kairi again, too.
Donald Don't be sad!
Goofy Donald's right, you know! Why, you're the key that connects everything!
Sora So it's all MY fault.
Goofy Gawrsh, I didn't mean that. Just do what comes natural to ya and we're sure to find 'em.
Donald You said it!
Sora Thanks, guys.
Chip Oh no! Hollow Bastion! It's all covered in darkness!
Dale You're right, Chipper! I wonder what's goin' on.
Chip Sora! We better hurry and check it out right away!

cutscene.desc: They hurry to Hollow Bastion and enter the Marketplace. A large troupe of Heartless ascend the stairs and vanish, to their surprise

xml.sp: Sora Do you think...
Goofy Looks like there's more Heartless now.

cutscene.desc: A few Dusks float in above the stairs, again to their amazement

xml.sp: Donald Uhhh....
Sora Let's go check in with everyone.
Goofy I think they're at Merlin's.

cutscene.desc: On the way to the Borough, they spot Scrooge McDuck

xml.sp: Scrooge Ach! I was so close to recreating that flavor, too...

cutscene.desc: The three walk over to him

xml.sp: Scrooge What, lads? Leon and his friends are in the borough. Aye, Merlin's house.

cutscene.desc: They see a yellow-haired man leaning against the wall next to Scrooge's ice cream shop

xml.sp: Sora Oh, Cloud!

cutscene.desc: Cloud notices them

xml.sp: Donald Whatcha doing?
Cloud I'll get him. This time we settle it. Me, and the one who embodies all the darkness in me.
Donald I thought you looked kinda different, Cloud.
Cloud If I do, it's his fault.
Sora Whose?
Cloud Sephiroth. Tell me if you see him.
Sora Okay. What's he look like?
Cloud Silver hair. Carries a long sword.
Sora Sure. Well, be seeing you, Cloud.
Cloud Be careful. He messes with your head, makes you think darkness is the only way.
Aerith Is something wrong?

cutscene.desc: Aerith walks in as Cloud walks out

xml.sp: Sora Uhh...

cutscene.desc: Cloud turns around

xml.sp: Cloud It's nothing.

cutscene.desc: Aerith leans closer

xml.sp: Cloud I don't want you involved.
Aerith You mean you don't want me there when you go away again?
Cloud I just--- Listen, even if I go far away, I'll come back.
Aerith Do you mean it?
Cloud Yeah.
Aerith See? You don't look so sure. Well, okay, I understand. Go---get things settled.
Cloud Huh?
Aerith No matter how far away you are...once you find your light...I'm sure it will lead you back here again. Right?
Cloud I suppose.
Aerith So I'll stay here---and I'll cheer for you--- Okay, Cloud?
Cloud Okay.

cutscene.desc: Cloud walks away

xml.sp: Aerith Wonder if he'll be okay.
Sora He'll be fine. I'm sure there's some light in him somewhere.
Aerith You're right.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy continue into the Borough and enter Merlin's House, where Cid is typing at the computer

xml.sp: Cid Hey, fellas---you're just in time. Got some good news for ya, so get yourselves over to Leon's.
Sora What kind of news?
Yuffie We found the computer Ansem was using!
Donald Oh boy!
Cid Yep. Should be able to get all kinds of info on the Heartless and the Organization.
Sora And maybe something on the dark realm, too? It looks like that's where Riku and Kairi are.
Donald And the King.
Cid Go see for yourselves!
Yuffie It can't hurt!
Sora What do you mean?
Cid Nothin'. Just get to the computer room through the castle postern. Watch your step!

cutscene.desc: They walk to the Bailey

xml.sp: Yuna Excuse me, are you with the Restoration Committee?

cutscene.desc: Sora stops and turns around. He doesn't see anyone until three small fairies appear

xml.sp: Yuna What's Leon's gang up to?
Sora They've got stuff to do over by the castle postern.
Rikku Scoop!
Sora Huh?
Paine Let's report.
Donald To who?
Yuna Our leader, of course!
Rikku Yeah, you know, Malefi---

cutscene.desc: Paine quickly covers Rikku's mouth
Sora, Donald, and Goofy have suspicious and confused looks on their faces

xml.sp: Paine Don't mind her. I assure you, we come in peace.

cutscene.desc: Rikku nods, Paine's hand still over her mouth

xml.sp: Yuna You're kidding...
Paine Problem?

cutscene.desc: She lets go of Rikku

xml.sp: Paine Okay, fine. You do the talking.

cutscene.desc: Paine crosses her arms and disappears. Yuna turns around and bows

xml.sp: Yuna So sorry about this!

cutscene.desc: Yuna disappears. Rikku poses happily and vanishes. Goofy and Donald look to Sora, who shrugs. They walk on to the Postern

xml.sp: Sora Leon!
Aerith Over here!
Sora You guys found Ansem's computer?
Aerith Uh-huh. The King is very interested in it.
Donald The King?
Aerith He's with Leon.
Donald We get to see the King!
Goofy Hooray!
Sora Er... Is Riku with them?

cutscene.desc: Aerith shakes her head and Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora Well, at least I can ask the King about him. And that computer might be able to tell us something.
Aerith Good idea! They're right through there.

cutscene.desc: They walk into the Corridors. A small blue creature crawls along the ceiling. Sora, Donald, and Goofy whirl around but see nothing. They find Ansem's Study, and see a large portrait of Ansem hanging on the wall

xml.sp: Sora Ansem...
Goofy Gawrsh, I guess this must be his room.
Donald Where's the King?
Sora calling Hello?
Tifa Hey, you!

cutscene.desc: She looks around the room

xml.sp: Tifa I'm looking for somebody. Have any of you seen a guy with spiky hair?

cutscene.desc: Sora pulls one of his own spiky hairs. Tifa giggles

xml.sp: Tifa Spikier.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy shake their heads, and Sora shrugs

xml.sp: Tifa I'll just take a look around.

cutscene.desc: Tifa walks around the room, knocking on the walls, looking under the desk, and inspecting the books. She kicks one of the walls hard with her foot. Sora, Donald, and Goofy are amazed at how strong she is

xml.sp: Tifa Sorry to bother you.
Sora, Donald, and Goofy standing up straight No bother, ma'am!

cutscene.desc: Tifa leaves and closes the door

xml.sp: Leon So you made it.

cutscene.desc: They see Leon leaning against the wall

xml.sp: Sora Leon!

cutscene.desc: Leon nods

xml.sp: Sora Isn't the King with you?

cutscene.desc: Leon holds a finger to his lips

xml.sp: Leon You'll see him soon enough.
Donald Hey!
Leon Here, this ought to tide you over.

cutscene.desc: Leon presses a part of the wall, and the wall disappears

xml.sp: Leon Ansem's computer room.

cutscene.desc: They enter the room and Sora runs up to the large keyboard

xml.sp: Sora This is it! Where's Kairi? Where's Riku?

cutscene.desc: Sora starts pressing buttons, gently at first, then harder

xml.sp: Leon Easy... You wanna break it?

cutscene.desc: The small blue creature crawls up the wall and onto the ceiling

xml.sp: Sora Oh, sorry. Guess I got a little carried away.

cutscene.desc: Goofy looks up to the ceiling and sees Stitch

xml.sp: Goofy Whoa!
Stitch Hmm?

cutscene.desc: He loses his grasp on the ceiling

xml.sp: Stitch Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Stitch falls down onto the keyboard

xml.sp: Donald Get offa there!

cutscene.desc: Donald jumps onto the keyboard to get Stitch, who jumps on Donald and scurries away laughing. Donald turns around, accidentally pressing buttons, and an alarm sounds. Donald looks afraid

xml.sp: MCP Attention current user. This is a warning. Further misuse of this terminal will result in immediate defensive action.
Sora Who's there?
MCP I am the Master Control Program. I oversee this system.
Sora Where are you?

cutscene.desc: Donald presses another button with his feet. The alarm sounds again

xml.sp: Sora, Goofy, & Leon Donald!
Donald I'm sorry...
MCP Decision gate reached. You are now under arrest.
Sora Arrest!?

cutscene.desc: Donald is stuck standing on one foot, so Goofy picks him up off the computer. Leon notices that the power system behind them has started to glow

xml.sp: Leon Run!

cutscene.desc: The three look to Leon, then to the power system, Donald still in Goofy's arms. The system shoots out beams of light and confines them into grids. Leon can only watch as the three of them are digitally written into the computer by the beam scanner. Sora wakes up on the floor of a very strange room. He stares at himself and sees that he is covered in blue-lit lines

xml.sp: Donald Sora!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy, who are also covered in the lines, are being led over by Strafer Heartless

xml.sp: Sora Go one, show 'em who's boss!

cutscene.desc: Commander Sark appears next to him

xml.sp: Sora Who're you?
Sark I am Commander Sark.
Sora A Heartless commander?
Sark Observe.

cutscene.desc: Sark presses a button on his data emitter and Donald and Goofy are shocked with data

xml.sp: Sora Okay, you're the boss! I get it.

cutscene.desc: Sark puts the data emitter away and smirks. Sora, Donald, and Goofy are confined to a Pit Cell. They look out onto a huge landscape

xml.sp: Sora Man, what kind of world is this, anyway?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy shake their heads

xml.sp: Tron You're inside a mainframe computer system.

cutscene.desc: A man is sitting near a terminal

xml.sp: Sora A what system?
Tron A computer system---for processing data. This system is a copy of one created by a corporation called ENCOM. The original program was destroyed.

cutscene.desc: Tron stands up

xml.sp: Tron But this copy was acquired by another User. The new User updated and customized the programs, renaming the system Hollow Bastion OS. He used the system for town maintenance, and to advance his private research. My name is Tron. I'm a security program. But now I'm under arrest, same as you.
Sora to Donald and Goofy Did you guys get any of that?
Goofy Gawrsh... You know...maybe we should just introduce ourselves.
Sora I'm Sora.
Donald And I'm Donald.
Goofy Nice to meet'cha, Tron. I'm Goofy.
Tron With that configuration, you must be Users.
Sora Users?
Tron You'd better get out of here quickly. Who knows what the MCP will do to you?
Sora MCP?
Tron The Master Control Program. It controls the whole system. If you idle here, you will be de-rezzed.

cutscene.desc: They're all shocked

xml.sp: Donald De-rezzed!?
Sora So, how do we get outta here!?
Tron This terminal could've gotten you back to the User world. But the MCP cut the power 50 microcycles ago.

cutscene.desc: The three sigh

xml.sp: Tron If we could bring the energy core in the canyon online, we could power it back up. The problem is---we're stuck in this cell. We're not going anywhere unless we unlock the energy fields.

cutscene.desc: They see a large power grid with a keyhole blinking in the center. Sora calls his Keyblade out and unlocks the energy field. Sark meets with the MCP

xml.sp: Sark Master Control. Why not just de-rezz Tron?
MCP I still haven't located the password to the dataspace.
Sark What about a logic probe? With all your processing power...
MCP Out of the question. The current environment hampers the processing power needed for such an analysis.

cutscene.desc: An alarm sounds

xml.sp: MCP You're dismissed, Sark. Stop any remaining anomalies in the system---or else. End of line.
Sark Acknowledged.

cutscene.desc: Back in the Pit Cell, Tron walks up to Sora

xml.sp: Tron Remarkable... It seems you have some unique functions. I'll go with you to the canyon. You'll need someone who can interface with the energy core, right?
Sora If you say so... Thanks, Tron.

cutscene.desc: They leave the Pit Cell and take a transport to the Canyon. In a side room, Tron accesses a large machine

xml.sp: Tron This is the energy core.

cutscene.desc: Sora uses his Keyblade to install the missing part to the core and restore energy to the console in the Pit Cell

xml.sp: Sora Mission accomplished?
Tron Yes. Now...will you do something for me?
Sora You got it!
Tron Don't you want to hear what it is first?
Donald You helped us! Now it's our turn.
Tron You guys really are Users. Your actions are totally illogical.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy glance at each other

xml.sp: Tron Let's hurry back to the pit cell.
Sora Where's that again?
Tron That's the sector where we met.
Sora Roger!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. They all return to the Pit Cell. Tron configures the computer terminal

xml.sp: Sora So what did you want us to do?
Tron Find my User. He'll give you the password to access the DTD.
Donald You bet!
Sora So, um...

cutscene.desc: Tron stops working and stands up

xml.sp: Tron DTD is the name my User gave to the dataspace. Copies of all the original system programs are stored there, along with anything that's sensitive or restricted.
Goofy Is there stuff about the Heartless, or Organization XIII?
Tron Hmm...Most likely.

cutscene.desc: Tron turns around and begins to work back on the terminal

xml.sp: Tron A number of my functions were appropriated when I last took on the MCP. That's why I need the password. If I can get inside the DTD, I can access my original backup program and restore all my functions. Then, I'll be able to put this system back the way it was before the MCP got control and changed everything. The way it was supposed to be---a free system for you---the Users.
Goofy Gee, Tron, ain't the MCP one of those programs, too? Do ya know who it was who made it?
Tron Actually...I don't know.
Sora Okay, we'll just have to find your user and ask him. What's his name?
Tron You mean you don't know? My user is the user of this system Ansem the Wise.
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Ansem!?

cutscene.desc: The three look at each other, as the terminal flashes

xml.sp: Tron Looks like the MCP's on to us. I'll keep this terminal up and running. You better exit the system, now!
Sora Sure... But Tron...Ansem is...
Donald We'll get ya the password!

cutscene.desc: After fixing a few things with the computer

xml.sp: Tron Okay. You're good to go. Hurry!

cutscene.desc: Tron stands aside and watches, as they are teleported out of the system. Leon has been busy typing at the computer when the power system behinds him whirs on and Sora, Donald, and Goofy appear. They're happy they're back out again

xml.sp: Donald We did it!
Leon Where have you been?
Sora Well, uh... There's a...world inside this computer, where these, um...programs live, and...

cutscene.desc: Sora explains everything to Leon, or at least tries to

xml.sp: Leon So in other words...Ansem's research data is off-limits unless we know the password.
Sora I think that's right.
Leon But you've already defeated Ansem...
Goofy Gawrsh, maybe we'll never find the password.
Leon That means...this is all a wild goose chase.
Tifa You're chasing what, now? Well, well! A hidden room! Guess I'd better take another look around.

cutscene.desc: Tifa returns to Ansem's Study, Sora, Donald, and Goofy following. Tifa makes several adjustments to the room

xml.sp: Sora She just won't give up...
Donald And neither will we!
Goofy C'mon, we've gotta look for that password!
Sora Right. We made a promise to Tron.

cutscene.desc: After searching and coming up short, they stand in front of Ansem's portrait

xml.sp: Tifa Excuse me.

cutscene.desc: She proceeds to pick the extremely large portrait off the wall with strength that shocks the other three. She places it aside on the floor, revealing a hidden diagram written on the wall. She punches the wall, sending dust everywhere. Nothing happens, and she sighs and leaves. The three examine the wall

xml.sp: Sora What's this doodle?
Donald reading Hollow...Main...Security...Tron... Door to...
Goofy Looks like a diagram or somethin'.
Donald Door...to...darkness?
Sora Oh!

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps up to the letters imprinted on the wall

xml.sp: Sora D---T---D!
Donald & Goofy DTD!

cutscene.desc: Leon walks in

xml.sp: Leon What's up?
Sora Look at this! This must be the dataspace! The DTD. See? The Door To Darkness!

cutscene.desc: Leon walks closer

xml.sp: Leon What do you know. But...that still leaves the password.
Mickey Say, fellas, did somebody mention the Door To Darkness?

cutscene.desc: Mickey stands by the door with his hood up

xml.sp: Sora, Donald, & Goofy Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: Mickey shushes them, looks into the hallway, then quickly closes the door. He takes off his hood as Donald rushes to hug him. Goofy picks up the both of them

xml.sp: Sora Long time no see!
Mickey Shh!

cutscene.desc: He glances over at the computer room entrance for a second

xml.sp: Mickey The Organization might be listening!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods, putting a finger to his lips. Goofy puts Mickey and Donald down. Donald hugs Mickey one more time, before Mickey pushes him away and looks right and left

xml.sp: Mickey You mentioned the Door To Darkness?
Goofy Uh, yes, sir! Ya see, we're lookin' for the secret password.
Mickey Password?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy sigh

xml.sp: Mickey Oh, I guess you mean like a code.

cutscene.desc: Leon smiles

xml.sp: Mickey Well, the Door To Darkness can only be opened by the seven princesses. There's Snow White, Jasmine, and Belle...
Leon Of course...

cutscene.desc: Leon walks back into the computer room

xml.sp: Mickey What're you trying to do?
Sora With that password, we can get access to Ansem's research data.
Mickey So that means you might be able to find out where he is!
Sora Stop jokin' around, Your Majesty. We already defeated Ansem. You know that.

cutscene.desc: Mickey crosses his arms

xml.sp: Mickey Looks like I've got a lot of explainin' to do.
Donald We're listening, Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: Leon returns

xml.sp: Sora Okay...but first, I've got a question...
Leon Hey, isn't Tron waiting for you guys?

cutscene.desc: The three look from Leon to the King, and back again

xml.sp: Mickey Don't worry, I'm not goin' anywhere. If those Heartless attack, I'll stand and fight with everybody here.
Sora Yeah...we will, too.
Mickey Then let's talk more later.
Donald That's a promise!
Mickey I'll see ya when you get back. Oh! One more thing. Let me give your clothes some new powers, Sora.
Sora Really!?
Mickey You bet! You've done so much---just consider it a thank-you present.
Sora Thanks, Your Majesty! We're heading off to see Tron now, so wait here for us, okay?
Mickey I will, Sora. And remember---be careful!

cutscene.desc: They nod. Sora returns to the computer and accesses the transfer system. They are transported to the Pit Cell again. Goofy walks over to the computer terminal

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, I wonder where Tron is.
Donald Don't touch that!

cutscene.desc: The terminal flashes

xml.sp: Goofy Huh?
Sora Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald disappear in a flash of light

xml.sp: Goofy Uhh...I didn't do it!

cutscene.desc: Goofy also disappears. They arrive at the game grid, a large area of flat land and high walls. The ground is laced with a blue-lit grid pattern

xml.sp: Goofy I didn't touch nothin'!
Sark Welcome to the game grid.
Sora Game grid?
Sark That's right, you've been chosen to play a few games. Lose, and you will be subject to immediate de-resolution. Win? Well, chuckle no one wins.
Donald We're not gonna play your games!
Sark You have no choice.
Sora Well then, get on with it!

cutscene.desc: Sora rides the lightcycle, dodging walls and defeating heartless. A large Devastator Heartless appears and shoots an energy ball at Sora. Sora dodges, and the ball creates a giant crack in the wall

xml.sp: Sora All right! It looks like we can escape through there!

cutscene.desc: Sora rides the lightcycle, while dodging walls and heartless, and races through the hole in the wall. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Pit Cell, where they find Tron lying on the floor

xml.sp: Sora Tron!

cutscene.desc: Tron stands up, though weakly

xml.sp: Tron I don't understand. Why are you here?
Sora We came to give you the password.
Tron Why didn't you just transmit the data?
Donald Transmit?

cutscene.desc: Tron almost falls, but Sora catches him

xml.sp: Sora Hey, are you okay?
Tron I'll be all right...once we access the DTD.

cutscene.desc: The group returns to the Canyon and enters the Dataspace. Tron accesses the computer

xml.sp: Tron All right, what's the password?
Donald Well...Belle, Snow White...
Goofy Aurora, Alice, Jasmine, Cinderella...
Sora Kairi.

cutscene.desc: Tron types in the password

xml.sp: Tron Kairi, got it.

cutscene.desc: There's a small rumble

xml.sp: Tron That did it!

cutscene.desc: An alarm sounds

xml.sp: Computer Now switching DTD over from hibernation to active mode. This process will take some time. Please enjoy a game while the process is running.
Tron Oh, no!

cutscene.desc: He types at the computer

xml.sp: Sora Not another game!
Tron No, it's the DTD's final security routine. This isn't a game. Stay focused!

cutscene.desc: A Heartless symbol appears on the three walls of the Dataspace, and Heartless appear in front of them

xml.sp: Computer Warning! You will be de-rezzed!

cutscene.desc: Sora fights the Heartless and unlocks each of the monitors. Tron places his hand on the scanner on the keyboard and energy flows into him

xml.sp: Tron I'm as good as new! All my functions have been restored!
Donald Oh boy!

cutscene.desc: An alarm sounds and the keyboard flashes. A beam of energy shoots down at the group, who duck away from it

xml.sp: MCP Finally. I have full access to the DTD. My takeover of the system is now complete. I might have anticipated such a simple password. What's this? An emergency destruct program for the town. Let's see how it performs.

cutscene.desc: Sora gasps

xml.sp: Tron No!

cutscene.desc: Tron places his hand on the scanner and restores power to it. Tron types a few keys and the alarm stops

xml.sp: MCP Program! You changed the password!
Tron There, that should buy us some time.
Sora Tron! Tell us what's going on!
Tron The MCP's loading a hostile program into the I/O tower.
Donald What do we do?
Tron We've got to protect the User town.

cutscene.desc: They nod

xml.sp: Tron Let's head to the tower!

cutscene.desc: They return to the Canyon and ride the transport to the I/O Tower. In the Communications Room, they see a large transport beam

xml.sp: Tron It must be total chaos outside.
Donald I think there's gonna be trouble INSIDE, too...

cutscene.desc: They look and see another computer terminal. They run back into the Hallway. A large hostile program appears and whirls gears

xml.sp: MCP I'm disappointed in you, Program. Why do you insist on allying with these selfish Users?
Tron Because I want to help them. Something written into my code commands me to do what is right.
MCP Really? And what command would that be?
Tron I can't really say for sure.
Sora Friends--- They help each other, that's all.

cutscene.desc: They nod. The program makes a move

xml.sp: Sora Uh-oh---look out!

cutscene.desc: The program sends out data beams that barricade the walls. After defeating the program, it collapses to the floor and explodes in a burst of light. They return to the Communication Room and Tron configures the computer terminal

xml.sp: Tron I really owe you one. With all my functions up and running, I think I've got a chance of getting system control away from the MCP. Now I'd better get to work. It's what my User would want.
Sora What Ansem would want...

cutscene.desc: Sora looks over at Donald and Goofy, who nod

xml.sp: Sora Listen, Tron. We didn't get the password from Ansem. We just sort of found it, back in the User world. By accident. And one more thing...Ansem---he was our enemy. I mean...he still is...I guess.
Tron Well, actually...he's my enemy, too.
Sora What do you mean?
Tron Ansem took ENCOM's original system and customized it for his own use. I was part of the original system, and Ansem modified me, too. So that makes him my User.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Tron But Ansem is also the one who brought back the MCP. The Ansem I first knew wouldn't do that. I'm sorry I didn't tell you.
Sora That's okay...but now I REALLY don't get it.

Tron I don't...understand it either. But I think Users, like you, are going to be the ones who will finally figure it out. You have the ability to take illogical routes and still arrive at the answers you seek. Now go---before the MCP starts acting up again! Any data you need from the DTD can be accessed directly through my User's terminal. I'll keep a dedicated access channel open for you. I changed the password, so you won't have to worry about the MCP for a while.
Sora Access channel?
Tron chuckling I knew you'd ask.

cutscene.desc: Tron presses a button on the terminal

xml.sp: Tron It's a very important link between our worlds. It's how we stay connected.

cutscene.desc: Grid beams appear around Sora, Donald, and Goofy

xml.sp: Tron You...my friends...are the new password.
Sora Thanks Tron! Take care!
Tron You too! And give my best to the Users!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy are transported back to Ansem's computer room

xml.sp: Sora Well, that's that!

cutscene.desc: Leon points to the monitor behind him

xml.sp: Leon Look.

cutscene.desc: They see small moving sprites of themselves on the screen with the words 'Thank You!' typed underneath

xml.sp: Sora Tron...hang in there.
Leon So, where do we start?
Sora I know! Let's access the DTD!

cutscene.desc: Leon begins typing on the keyboard

xml.sp: Leon The King's checking the situation in town. He'll be back soon, so don't worry. Hey, look, it's asking for a password.
Goofy That's easy. It's...
Sora Sora!

cutscene.desc: Leon types in 'Sora'

xml.sp: Donald Donald!
Goofy Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Leon continues to type

xml.sp: Leon That's...to the point.
Sora Well?
Leon That did it. We're in. I have to go into town. Need to see what that last shakeup did.
Sora You're not gonna check out the data? It wasn't exactly easy to get!
Leon I'm coming right back. Hey, Sora---why don't you get started on loading the data and copying it down?

cutscene.desc: Sora looks hesitant

xml.sp: Leon It's just a few keystrokes. Easy, right?

cutscene.desc: He starts to walk out and places a hand on Sora's shoulder. He waves back as he leaves the room. Sora tries something on the computer

xml.sp: Donald Did it work?
Sora Hey, these things take time, okay?

cutscene.desc: Sora types some keys on the keyboard. Some flashes on the screen

xml.sp: Sora Whoa... It's doing something!
Donald Huh?
Goofy I think it wants to know what we wanna know.
Sora Riku and Kairi!

cutscene.desc: Sora presses a few more buttons and a red window appears on the screen with the words Data Error.

xml.sp: Sora No way... Even Ansem's computer doesn't know...

cutscene.desc: Sora sadly walks away. Goofy moves to type something

xml.sp: Donald Whatcha doing?
Goofy I thought I'd ask the computer if it can tell us about them Nobodies.

cutscene.desc: He types several keys and a gray window with the Nobody symbol comes on the screen

xml.sp: Sora What's this?

cutscene.desc: The red windows appears again

xml.sp: Computer The data is corrupt.
Donald What!?
Goofy How about the Organization?

cutscene.desc: He types more keys. A progress window appears

xml.sp: Goofy There!

cutscene.desc: The red windows appears again

xml.sp: Computer The data is corrupt.

cutscene.desc: Sora slams his fist on the keyboard

xml.sp: Sora Stupid computer!

cutscene.desc: He continues to slam keys and the windows on the screen jump around wildly

xml.sp: Goofy Sora!

cutscene.desc: A golden window appears with a picture of an elderly blond man wearing a red scarf

xml.sp: Sora Who's this guy?
Mickey Well, I see ya got things workin'!

cutscene.desc: They notice his entrance

xml.sp: Sora, Donald, & Goofy Oh, Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: Mickey shushes them again and walks over to them

xml.sp: Mickey Good goin'. The computer should tell us the things we need to know.
Goofy But it keeps on sayin' the data inside's all ker-skuffled.
Sora All we got is a picture of some guy we don't know.

cutscene.desc: Mickey jumps

xml.sp: Mickey Ansem the Wise!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy look at each other

xml.sp: Sora Come on, are you teasing us again?
Donald Did you forget what Ansem looked like, Your Majesty?
Mickey Of course I do! And this is him! I'm positive!
Donald Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs Mickey

xml.sp: Sora Excuse me? Could you come this way, please?

cutscene.desc: Sora drags him into Ansem's Study. Donald and Goofy walk behind. Sora shows him the large portrait of Ansem

xml.sp: Sora Look, THIS is Ansem. You know, the guy we all worked reeeally hard to defeat?
Mickey Oh, that's right---I never finished explaining.
Donald What?
Mickey Well, the man in the picture is definitely the one who tried to take over Kingdom Hearts---the one you fellas defeated.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy have flashbacks of the final confrontation with him at the End of the World

xml.sp: Mickey But, what you actually fought was his Heartless. Ya see, he wasn't really Ansem. He just went around telling everybody that he was.
Sora You mean...
Donald Ohh...
Goofy Hmm...
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Whaaaat?
Sora We went through all that trouble to defeat an impostor?
Mickey Yep. A fake. But he still had to be stopped.
Donald Aw, I can't believe it...
Goofy Uh, I'm kinda confused. If he's a fake, then what happened to the real Ansem?

Mickey Well, that's just what I'm tryin' to figure out. Ansem the Wise should know all about Organization XIII's plans, and what's been happening to the worlds. I'm pretty sure he'll give us some help. Ya know, I came close to finding him once...
Goofy Hmm?
Sora Don't tell me there's more...I'm lost enough as it is!
Goofy Well, let's see. Some feller named Ansem, who wasn't really Ansem, became a Heartless. Does that mean a Nobody got created when that happened, too?
Mickey Yup! And that Nobody is the leader of the Organization.
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Whaaaat?
Mickey looking at the painting I know I've met this fake Ansem before, and I've seen the leader of Organization XIII, too. Hmm, kinda felt like bein' around the same fella.
Sora So, where did you meet this guy?
Mickey Gosh...I can't remember. Ansem the Wise---the real Ansem---must know the imposter's true identity. That's why I've got to find him and ask him about it.
Sora glaring at the painting You...! You started all of this! Because of you, Riku and Kairi... Oh! Your Majesty, do you know where Riku is?
Mickey looking away from Sora He's... I'm sorry. I can't help.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks to Mickey's front

xml.sp: Sora Really, Your Majesty? Are you sure?
Mickey turning away I'm sorry, Sora.
Sora What about Kairi? Organization XIII might've kidnapped her.

cutscene.desc: Mickey whirls around

xml.sp: Mickey Oh, no!

cutscene.desc: He looks at the painting

xml.sp: Mickey Sora, Donald, Goofy. I was plannin' to go get help from Ansem the Wise. But---now I know I forgot the most important thing. Helping others should always come before asking others for help. We're safe and sound---and free to choose! So there's no reason we shouldn't choose to help our friends.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod

xml.sp: Mickey Let's look for Riku and Kairi together.

cutscene.desc: A huge explosion knocks Mickey off his balance

xml.sp: Sora Outside!
Mickey looking serious Sounds like we gotta start by helpin' out here!

cutscene.desc: Mickey runs into the corridor and they follow him. A horde of Heartless is pacing its way through the site. A group of Heartless is fighting several Nobodies at the Postern, while Maleficent and Pete watch. The Nobodies seem to be winning

xml.sp: Maleficent Here me, my Heartless! Attack the white husks! Sweep them away!
Pete What, are you nuts? We're never gonna win! I don't know about you, but I'm outta here, sister!

cutscene.desc: Pete runs away

xml.sp: Maleficent You pathetic coward!

cutscene.desc: The Nobodies seem to have overtaken the Heartless to Maleficent's disdain. She sees Sora, Donald, and Goofy race from around a corner. She vanishes in a flash of green flame, as the Heartless and Nobodies continue to fight

xml.sp: Maleficent Heartless! Leave the white ones. Turn your attention to Sora and his friends!

cutscene.desc: The Heartless stop fighting the Nobodies

xml.sp: Goofy Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: They successfully defeat both groups of enemies. Yuna, Rikku, and Paine fly in from down the hall

xml.sp: Yuna Where's Maleficent?
Sora Looks like she ran away.
Rikku Well, that was PRET-ty lame of her.
Paine I guess we picked the wrong side.

cutscene.desc: The fairies turn to each other and start babbling amongst themselves. Sora, Donald, and Goofy wait for them

xml.sp: Sora Umm, hey...if you're looking to pick sides, why don't you pick Leon's? They can always use help.

cutscene.desc: They turn around

xml.sp: Yuna Does this Leon have any treasure?
Donald Yeah, lots of stuff!
Rikku Perfect!
Paine Come on.
Sora Who ARE you?
Yuna Oh, we're nothing worth mentioning.
Paine Just three treasure fanatics.
Rikku Later, taters!

cutscene.desc: The three fairies disappear like magic

xml.sp: Sora Did Leon...really have any treasure?

cutscene.desc: Donald snickers and runs ahead to the Postern. Dusks appear after they arrive

xml.sp: Sora We don't have time for you!

cutscene.desc: They strike them down and run around the bridge. A large beam of light slams into the ground in their way

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: A man with long gray hair and three large wings stands up as the light dissipates. He turns around to face them

xml.sp: Donald Sora, it's Sephiroth!
Goofy Ain't Sephiroth the one who's supposed to be the dark part of Cloud's heart?
Sephiroth Did Cloud tell you that? Then he must understand now.
Sora Just what are you gonna do to him?
Sephiroth Nothing. Cloud is the one who hungers for Darkness.
Sora He said he's got a score to settle with you.
Sephiroth I see... He wants to meet me again.

cutscene.desc: He turns around and walks away

xml.sp: Sephiroth Then I should give him what he wants. That last bit of light is always the hardest to snuff out.

cutscene.desc: He flies into the air and disappears. The three race to the Restoration Site, where Leon is slicing down Heartless. Aerith is there for support. She turns around as they enter

xml.sp: Aerith Sora! Behind you!

cutscene.desc: They whirl around and several Dancer Nobodies appear. They defeat the Nobodies and run to catch up with Leon

xml.sp: Leon The King's in the bailey. You better head over there!
Sora Got it!

cutscene.desc: They leave the Restoration Site and enter the Bailey, seeing no one. They approach a rock formation and look out over the expanse

xml.sp: Sora Whoa...

cutscene.desc: He sees literally thousands of Heartless storming the cliffs. Yuffie is fighting in the fray. Her shuriken swings back to her and she falls to the ground, tired. She suddenly is healed, and stands up as Aerith runs over. They continue to enter the fight. Stitch, meanwhile, jumps down and shoots at several Heartless with his plasma shooters. One attacks him from behind. He jumps out of the way, and shoots at it. Paine is chased to the edge of a ridge by an Armored Knight Heartless, and dodges as it swipes at her. She jumps up on it's head and over it. Yuna and Rikku attack from above, kicking it and spiraling to the ground. The Heartless stumbles over the cliff, as Yuna and Rikku jump into the air with a high-five. Paine flies back over and more Heartless chase after them. Cloud and Leon are surrounded on both sides by multitudes of Heartless, who are pushing them towards the edge of the cliff. The two stand back-to-back with their swords out and ready

xml.sp: Leon Think you can handle this many?
Cloud Well... Might be tough if one more shows up.
Leon Then that'll have to be the one I take care of.
Cloud What, you're fighting too?

cutscene.desc: They jump away from each other and begin decimating Heartless as they move in, sending a number of hearts floating into the sky. Cloud cleaves two and more surround him, cutting him off from Leon. Before he can blink, they are gone. He sees Sephiroth, standing on the edge of the cliff, his sword out, having just cleaved through nearly twenty Heartless surrounding Cloud. Cloud stares him down

xml.sp: Cloud Sephiroth!

cutscene.desc: He clutches his buster sword. Sephiroth walks forward and points his masamune at Cloud. The thin blade just barely touches Cloud's.

xml.sp: Sephiroth I understand that you've been looking for me.
Cloud Yeah. Once I get rid of you, the darkness will go away.
Sephiroth Can you do it? That darkness comes from your own dark memories. Do you think you can erase your past?
Cloud Shut up!
Sephiroth Face it---you turn your back on the present and live in the past. Because the light of the present is too much!
Cloud You don't know me!
Tifa Cloud!

cutscene.desc: Cloud tries to look, but flashes of light make him wince

xml.sp: Sephiroth I know. Because...I am you.

cutscene.desc: Sephiroth vanishes in a flash, spouting feathers. Cloud looks around him and runs, as Tifa runs to where he was standing

xml.sp: Tifa Cloud! Wait!

cutscene.desc: She is quickly surrounded by Heartless. One comes up behind her, she quickly gives a backfist to it, then power punches a second from the front. Another comes at her from her right, and she delivers a crescent kick

xml.sp: Sora Leon, everybody---hang in there!

cutscene.desc: Mickey drops from the sky and holds his arms out, his back to them

xml.sp: Mickey Okay, fellas, you've gotta go find Riku and Kairi!
Sora But Leon and the others are friends too!
Mickey Don't worry. There's already lotsa help here. We'll take care of this fight.
Sora But...I promised Leon!
Mickey Donald! Goofy!

cutscene.desc: The two of them straighten up at their names

xml.sp: Mickey Take Sora and get goin'!
Sora Riku, Kairi...give me a little time, okay?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy look toward each other and nod, then straighten back up

xml.sp: Donald Your Majesty!
Goofy We understand. We'll go search for Riku and Kairi!
Mickey Right. Watch for danger!
Donald You be careful, too!
Sora Wait, you guys!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks back at Mickey, who's scouting the area, still looking away from them

xml.sp: Donald Sora, do as you're told!
Goofy You're comin' with us whether ya want to or not!
Donald C'mon, Sora! Ya gotta be good!

cutscene.desc: Donald winks at him. Sora catches on

xml.sp: Sora Gotcha.
Goofy Well then, skedaddle!

cutscene.desc: Sora mouths the words Thank you

xml.sp: Donald Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They run right past Mickey and down into the cliffs

xml.sp: Sora I'm sorry, Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: They salute the King

xml.sp: Goofy Hope you can forgive us!

cutscene.desc: They leave over the rock face, and Mickey sighs. A camera in Ansem's computer room scans the area. It moves to the door, where a hooded figure stands, and scans for data. The word 'unknown' flashes on the screen and the figure points to the camera. There is a flash of light and the camera is knocked into static and turns off. The hooded one walks over to the computer and inserts a disk. The monitor displays the words Now Loading before switching to an entry bar. The man types in Another and the computer brings him to another screen with six entry bars gathered around an inner circle symbol. He types passwords into each of these and the screen switches to System Start. The computer returns to the normal screen and the disk is ejected. The figure takes the disk and pockets it, walking toward the now open door at the edge of the room. He walks down the long stairs in the Heartless Manufactory and steps onto a lighted panel. The floor before him slides open from the center and lights up. He walks through and the floor closes. He walks down the ramp, which disappears, and steps down a spiral hallway. His thoughts travel back to several years ago

xml.sp: ???????? Master Ansem. Regarding the experiment I presented the other day... With your permission, I'd like to proceed---
Ansem the Wise I forbid it! Forget this talk of doors, and the heart of all worlds. That place must not be defiled!
???????? But, Master Ansem! I've been thinking...
Ansem the Wise Xehanort...Those thoughts are best forgotten.

cutscene.desc: The figure gets to the end of the staircase and stops. The door in front of him opens with a flash and he enters a white hallway. He walks past several barred and diamond-windowed cells with digital locks and comes to another door. The door slides open. He enters a while room with black chains and Nobody symbols lining the walls and floor. The door closes behind him and he places his hand on the chair in the center of the room before sitting down. The chains and symbols glow white, eminating from the central chair. The glow crawls toward a blue figure lying on the floor

xml.sp: ?????? It has been far too long...friend. A pile of blue armor lay on the floor next to a keyblade. The scene flashes back to a previous event in time. Zexion walks through Twilight's View in a mysterious castle
Vexen Zexion! Zexion!

cutscene.desc: Vexen runs down the stairwell towards Zexion

xml.sp: Zexion Right here! What is it?
Vexen Where is Lord Xemnas?
Zexion His usual spot.
Vexen The Chamber of Repose.

cutscene.desc: Vexen starts to turn away

xml.sp: Zexion Yes. Go and see for yourself.

cutscene.desc: Vexen has trouble focusing

xml.sp: Vexen That isn't funny! I suppose I have no choice but to wait.

cutscene.desc: He walks past Zexion and mutters to himself

xml.sp: Vexen But the clock is ticking. Time is running out! What to do... Why is he never around when I need him? It's almost as if he knows I'm looking for him. The whole world is...

cutscene.desc: Zexion continues walking

xml.sp: ?????? Y'know, I don't like that place either.

cutscene.desc: Zexion stops and turns around. He sees another member sitting on top of a pipe

xml.sp: ?????? What about you, Zexion? What do you think?
Zexion I think eavesdropping is intrusive. Why are you even here? You and Xaldin were tasked to recruit new members.

cutscene.desc: The man jumps to the floor

xml.sp: Zexion Have you forgotten? Or were you procrastinating?

?????? As if! I'm doing my job. I'll have you know I found one just yesterday. Mar- something. That puts the Organization's count at 11. And since I've been working so hard, I had Lexaeus take my place for the day. I want to rest up for tomorrow, so I can wake up feeling nice and refreshed.
Zexion Is that so? Well then, I will leave you to it. I've work to catch up on. Good day.

cutscene.desc: He waves the man off and starts walking. He runs up and places a hand around Zexion's shoulder

xml.sp: ?????? Don't be like that. C'mon, stay and talk.

cutscene.desc: Zexion looks at the hand on his shoulder

xml.sp: ?????? Isn't it time you told me about Xemnas's secret?

cutscene.desc: He lets go and walks away

xml.sp: ?????? How long ago was it... When a bunch of warriors wielding key-shaped swords appeared and unleashed a spectacular battle. And when it was all over, all that was left was a man lying unconscious without his memories. Xemnas--Uh, I mean Xehanort, was found by Ansem right around then, wasn't he?
Zexion Your point?

cutscene.desc: The man stops

xml.sp: ?????? The Chamber of Repose. If you recall, that's where we spent our time researching the darkness that resides within people's hearts. It's a graveyard that was sealed by order of Ansem the Wise. The first thing Xemnas did once he got rid of him was to undo the seal and build a room in the back. Ever since then, he holds himself up in that room when he can, and he talks to someone.

cutscene.desc: He turns back around to face Zexion

xml.sp: ?????? But who? For all I know, he's the only one in that room.

cutscene.desc: He walks back down the stairs towards him

xml.sp: Zexion Need I repeat myself about eavesdropping.
?????? Not eavesdropping. Couldn't hear what they were saying. Dying to find out what it was though. You wouldn't know anything about it, would you?
Zexion I know I would very much like to focus on my own duties...

cutscene.desc: He walks past the man

xml.sp: Zexion ...as you should with yours. For we need to prepare the new facility immediately. But there are only eleven of us in the Organization. We're going to need a few more hands on deck.
?????? What new facility? Oh, you mean Castle Oblivion. What does Xemnas plan on doing with that place anyway?
Zexion He already shared his intentions with us.

cutscene.desc: The man turns around

xml.sp: ?????? But did you know there's something he didn't share?

cutscene.desc: Zexion stops

xml.sp: ?????? The Chamber of Repose is part of a pair. The Chamber of Waking is the other. Another graveyard, if you want to call it that. It was constructed by someone other than Xemnas himself.

cutscene.desc: Zexion turns around

xml.sp: ?????? And that's where he'll find it... That's where he'll find his other friend.

cutscene.desc: They stare at each other. Sora, Donald, and Goofy race to catch up with the others, but are stopped at the Castle Gate by Demyx, who hesitantly readies himself. He doesn't seem sure how to react

xml.sp: Demyx Hey, you guys are looking lively.
Donald Scram!
Sora Didn't we catch you messing around in the Underworld? How'd a wimp like you get into Organization XIII?

cutscene.desc: Demyx acts all scared

xml.sp: Sora crossing his arms I bet you can't even fight.
Donald Yeah, but we can!
Demyx wagging a finger You shouldn't judge anyone by appearance.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy ready their weapons. Demyx turns around, looking worried

xml.sp: Demyx I told them they were sending the wrong guy...
Sora Who is this kook?
Goofy Remember, the Organization's made up of Nobodies.
Sora Right---no hearts!

cutscene.desc: Demyx turns back around

xml.sp: Demyx Oh, we do too have hearts! Don't be mad...
Donald You can't trick us!

cutscene.desc: Demyx turns around again, and puts on another face

xml.sp: Demyx pointing at Sora Silence, traitor.

cutscene.desc: A dome of water appears around him. He stretches his hand up to the pinnacle and the dome turns into a bubble in his hand. The bubble explodes and forms his sitar. He grabs it and spins it around, pointing at them with a smirk on his face

xml.sp: Demyx Dance, water! Dance!

cutscene.desc: After a very wet battle, Demyx slumps to the ground

xml.sp: Demyx Aw... booed again."

cutscene.desc: His sitar disappears and he is devastated

xml.sp: Demyx screaming No way!

cutscene.desc: He fades away in a wave of water

xml.sp: Sora Anyone from the Organization who'd like to be next?
Donald Hey, Sora! Don't antagonize them!
Goofy Yeah, we gotta go help our friends out first.
Sora Oh. Sorry.
Donald Then let's go!

cutscene.desc: They start to walk off

xml.sp: Mickey Aha! There you are!

cutscene.desc: They stop, wide-eyed and turn around. Mickey walks up to them and crosses his arms. Sora, Donald, and Goofy look down at the ground

xml.sp: Mickey You sure have lotsa friends to help. So, I guess we better all pull together and finish this battle for good!
Sora, Donald, & Goofy straightening up Yes, Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: Mickey walks ahead. A Surveillance Robot Heartless is fighting a Dusk on the ledge above. It shoots out a beam, which missed the Dusk and sends debris in all directions. Goofy notices a large rock heading straight for the King

xml.sp: Goofy Look out!

cutscene.desc: Goofy pushes Mickey out of the way, and is knocked in the head by the rock. He falls to the ground and slides against the cliff. Sora, Donald, and Mickey run over to him. Goofy lies unconscious

xml.sp: Mickey No...

cutscene.desc: Donald tries to wake him up

xml.sp: Donald Hey! You're the King's Captain! You gotta get up!
Sora C'mon, wake up!
Donald I'm sorry about the ice cream!
Mickey Goofy...?
Donald Ohhhh...Goofy...

cutscene.desc: Donald lays his head on Goofy's chest

xml.sp: Sora This is not happening... It can't be happening... It can't...

cutscene.desc: Mickey makes a fist and looks toward their objective

xml.sp: Mickey They'll pay for this.

cutscene.desc: He whips off his cloak, summons his Keyblade, and runs ahead. Donald feels a surge of anger and runs after him. Sora stands up, takes one more look at Goofy, and follows them. They fight through the Ravine Trail and find Yuffie

xml.sp: Yuffie Sora, did you miss me? Yuffie is on the scene!

cutscene.desc: They defeat several Heartless

xml.sp: Yuffie All right! Get going!

cutscene.desc: Sora continues through the cliffs and finds Leon.

xml.sp: Leon I'll help out!

cutscene.desc: They fight more Heartless

xml.sp: Leon Go!

cutscene.desc: Progressing further, he finds Tifa

xml.sp: Tifa I'll help!

cutscene.desc: They continue fighting

xml.sp: Tifa Hurry! Go on ahead!

cutscene.desc: Sora follows the cliffs. Cloud jumps down, shoving his buster sword into the ground, knocking out several Heartless

xml.sp: Cloud Sora!

cutscene.desc: The fight the last round of Heartless and continue into a Crystal Fissure

xml.sp: Mickey Are you okay?
Sora Yeah, I'm fine, but...
Donald Ohh, Goofy...
Goofy Hey, fellas!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Mickey can't believe their ears. Goofy is jumping at the entrance to the Crystal Fissure. He waves

xml.sp: Sora, Mickey, & Donald Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Goofy runs over to them

xml.sp: Goofy Ya know, that really hurt!
Mickey jumping into a hug Aw, Goofy!
Goofy Gawrsh, Yer Majesty, I get bumped on the head all the time.

cutscene.desc: Sora chuckles. Donald walks over to Goofy and slams his staff into Goofy's shin. Goofy jumps on one foot in pain

xml.sp: Goofy That hurt, too.
Donald Don't you ever do that again!

cutscene.desc: They continue deeper into the Great Maw, where tons of Heartless stand idle. Mickey slides to a stop

xml.sp: Mickey Huh?
Sora What's with them?

cutscene.desc: Goofy sees something up on the cliff

xml.sp: Goofy pointing Hey!

cutscene.desc: A man appears in a black cloak. He takes his hood off, revealing his silver hair and orange eyes

xml.sp: Donald It's the guy who's NOT Ansem!
Goofy You mean it's his Nobody!
Sora The leader of Organization XIII...
Mickey Wait a minute. Now I know!

cutscene.desc: Mickey has a flashback to several years ago. He is standing in Ansem's Study, while Ansem the Wise is sitting in his large chair eating sea-salt ice cream. There are several tanks around the room containing hearts

xml.sp: Mickey Wise Ansem. I'm here to seek your advice.

Ansem the Wise I'm glad we have the opportunity to speak like this, my friend. I'm intrigued by your hypothesis...and I'm finding it difficult to stave off the urge to test it. Still, I'm concerned about the stability of the worlds.

cutscene.desc: He sits back in his chair

xml.sp: Mickey Yep, that's what worries me too.
Ansem the Wise The doors that appeared. The place the Heartless seek. I fear my research may have brought this upon us...

cutscene.desc: He rests his arm on the table, his hand on his forehead. There is a knock on the door. Ansem looks up and Mickey turns around. A man in a lab coat with white hair opens the door and walks in. He bows slightly

xml.sp: ???????? Master Ansem. Regarding the experiment I presented the other day... With your permission, I'd like to proceed---
Ansem the Wise standing up I forbid it!

cutscene.desc: He pounds on the table

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Forget this talk of doors, and the heart of all worlds. That place must not be defiled!
???????? But, Master Ansem! I've been thinking...
Ansem the Wise shaking his head Xehanort...Those thoughts are best forgotten.

cutscene.desc: Xehanort restrains himself, bows again, and leaves, closing the door. Xehanort's Nobody stands on the cliff-face, and smiles down at them

xml.sp: Mickey Now I remember! Xehanort! Ansem's apprentice! The leader of Organization XIII is Xehanort's Nobody!

cutscene.desc: Mickey gets out his Keyblade and runs up the cliff

xml.sp: Sora Let's go!

cutscene.desc: Heartless quickly surround them. Sora's Keyblade appears with a flash of light

xml.sp: Sora Move it!
Donald We can't let Xehanort get away!
Sora Right!

cutscene.desc: Sora glances behind him at Donald and Goofy, who give him a thumbs up. They each run to their own group of Heartless to defeat, as Sora turns around and blazes through his 1000. After the Great Maw is cleared of Heartless, Sora continues through the cliffs. He catches his breath as Donald and Goofy run up

xml.sp: Sora Where's the King?

cutscene.desc: Donald sees Mickey defeating an Armored Knight Heartless in a clearing ahead

xml.sp: Donald There he is!
Sora C'mon!

cutscene.desc: Xehanort's Nobody stands facing Maleficent's dark castle. Mickey stands behind him

xml.sp: Donald Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: The three run up to them

xml.sp: Mickey Xehanort!
?????? How long has it been since I abandoned that name...
Sora Out with it, Nobody! Where's Kairi? Where's Riku!?
?????? I know nothing of any Kairi. As for Riku...Perhaps you should ask your king.

cutscene.desc: He turns around to face them. Sora looks from him to Mickey

xml.sp: Mickey Stop!

cutscene.desc: The man starts to disappear, Mickey runs up and jumps into the portal afterward

xml.sp: Sora He's gone...

cutscene.desc: Sora slumps to the ground and slams his fist into it. Goofy puts a hand on his shoulder

xml.sp: Donald Sora, Goofy.
Goofy What's goin' on?
Axel Way to fall right into their trap.

cutscene.desc: They see Axel leaning against a rock

xml.sp: Axel C'mon, it's a set-up by Organization XIII. Xemnas is using you to destroy the Heartless---that's his big master plan.
Donald Xemnas?
Axel The guy you just saw. He's their leader. Got it memorized? X-E-M, N-A-S.
Goofy Organization XIII wants to get rid of the Heartless?
Axel Man, you're slow.

cutscene.desc: Axel points to the Keyblade

xml.sp: Axel Every Heartless slain with that Keyblade releases a captive heart. That is what the Organization is after.
Donald So what are those guys gonna do with the hearts?
Axel I'm not telling.
Donald Tell us!
Sora You...you're the one who kidnapped Kairi!
Axel Bingo. The name's Axel. Got it memorized?
Sora Where is Kairi?

cutscene.desc: Axel scratches his head

xml.sp: Sora Please. Just tell me!
Axel Look, about Kairi...I'm sorry.
Saïx Axel!

cutscene.desc: Saïx appears between Axel and Sora

xml.sp: Axel Uh-oh!

cutscene.desc: Axel starts to vanish. Sora tries to run to him, but Saïx holds out his arms and stops him

xml.sp: Saïx We'll ensure he receives the maximum punishment.

cutscene.desc: Axel is gone

xml.sp: Sora I don't care about any of that! Just let me into the realm of darkness, okay!?
Saïx If it's Kairi you're worried about, don't. We're taking very good care of her. Sora Take me to her.
Saïx Is she that important to you?
Sora Yeah. More than anything.
Saïx Show me how important.

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks, then kneels on the ground

xml.sp: Sora Please.
Saïx So, you really do care for her. In that case...the answer is no.

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps up in anger

xml.sp: Sora You rotten...!
Saïx Are you angry? Do you hate me? Then take that rage, and direct it at the Heartless.

cutscene.desc: Saïx snaps his fingers and several Armored Knight Heartless appear behind him. He looks toward the sky

xml.sp: Saïx Pitiful Heartless, mindlessly collecting hearts. And yet they know not the true power of what they hold. The rage of the Keyblade releases those hearts.

cutscene.desc: He holds up his hands

xml.sp: Saïx They gather in darkness, masterless and free...until they weave together to make Kingdom Hearts. And when that time comes, we can truly, finally exist.
Maleficent What in the world do you think you're prattling on about?

cutscene.desc: Maleficent appears behind Sora, Donald, and Goofy

xml.sp: Maleficent Kingdom Hearts belongs to me! The heart of all kingdoms, the heart of all that lives. A dominion fit to be called Kingdom Hearts must be MY dominion!
Sora Maleficent, no! No more Heartless!
Maleficent I do not take orders from you!

cutscene.desc: She raises her staff and Soldier Heartless surround Saïx

xml.sp: Saïx Fool...

cutscene.desc: Saïx snaps his fingers and Nobodies appear and take down the Heartless. The Nobodies then turn their attention to Sora

xml.sp: Sora Oh no!

cutscene.desc: Maleficent appears between Sora and the Nobodies. She glows with a green aura and spreads her arms out. A wall of flame blocks her from Sora

xml.sp: Maleficent While I keep these creatures at bay, you devise a way to vanquish them---forever!
Sora Maleficent...
Maleficent Do not misunderstand me. I shall have my revenge on you yet.

cutscene.desc: The Dusks overtake Maleficent and she is pulled down beneath their weight

xml.sp: Sora Maleficent!
Maleficent Leave! Now!
Sora I don't take orders from you!

cutscene.desc: Donald grabs Sora

xml.sp: Donald Sora! C'mon!
Sora But...what about...

cutscene.desc: The flames die down and Maleficent is gone

xml.sp: Saïx Now then. Where did we leave off?

cutscene.desc: Saïx snaps his fingers and the Nobodies disappear and Heartless take their place

xml.sp: Sora Which side are you guys on anyway?
Saïx The Heartless ally with whoever's the strongest.

cutscene.desc: Saïx flicks out a hand toward Sora, and the Heartless attack. Sora knocks them away, releasing hearts into the air. Saïx smiles

xml.sp: Saïx Yes, Sora! Extract more hearts!

cutscene.desc: Saïx vanishes and the hearts are sent to Kingdom Hearts

xml.sp: Sora No! The hearts!

cutscene.desc: They are still surrounded by Heartless. An Armored Knight slams its saber down at Sora, who blocks with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora Maybe everything we've done... Maybe it was all for nothing. What am I supposed to do if I can't use the Keyblade!?
Maleficent Imbeciles! You can't be trusted to do anything!
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: There is a great flash of light, which Leon and Cloud see from the outskirts of town

xml.sp: Leon Sora! Donald! Goofy!
Cloud Relax. Those three aren't going down that easily.

cutscene.desc: Cloud starts to walk off

xml.sp: Cloud The Keyblade's chosen one... He's a lucky kid.

cutscene.desc: The light turns into a long beam shooting into the sky

xml.sp: Leon See you soon.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy are back in the Gummi Ship

xml.sp: Sora I guess sometimes help comes from unexpected places.
Donald Sure does!

cutscene.desc: Sora reflects on what happened to them at the rock clearing

xml.sp: Sora Maybe everything we've done... Maybe it was all for nothing.

cutscene.desc: An Armored Knight slams its saber down at Sora, who blocks with his Keyblade

xml.sp: Sora What am I supposed to do if I can't use the Keyblade!?

cutscene.desc: Sora knocks the Heartless away

xml.sp: Maleficent Imbeciles!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks up at hearing Maleficent's voice

xml.sp: Maleficent You can't be trusted to do anything!
Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: A black pool of darkness appears underneath the three of them and they are pulled down into it. They find themselves surrounded by blackness

xml.sp: Goofy What's this place?
Sora It must be the Realm of Darkness!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks around, seeing nothing

xml.sp: Sora Kairi! Riku!

cutscene.desc: Donald spots someone in a black cloak holding a white box

xml.sp: Donald Who's there!?

cutscene.desc: Donald runs over, but the person disappears, leaving the box. Donald picks it up

xml.sp: Donald What is it?
Goofy Are ya sure you wanna open...

cutscene.desc: Donald opens it

xml.sp: Goofy ...that?

cutscene.desc: Inside are a photograph and a sea-salt ice cream bar. Donald hands the photo to Sora

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, it's the gang from Twilight Town. There's Hayner, Pence, Olette...and, uh, um...
Sora Roxas.
Donald You know him?
Sora No... The name just popped into my head... This is Roxas.

cutscene.desc: Donald holds the ice cream bar

xml.sp: Goofy Are you sure you wanna eat...

cutscene.desc: Donald tastes it

xml.sp: Goofy ...that?

cutscene.desc: Donald pulls it out of his mouth

xml.sp: Donald Salty... No...sweet!

cutscene.desc: The ice cream bar flashes and rises into the air. Sora's Keyblade appears. Sora opens another gateway

xml.sp: Sora Not yet! I gotta look for Kairi!

cutscene.desc: In the white room, Xemnas sits with three hooded Organization members. Saïx appears

xml.sp: Saïx Sora knows the truth now. The more Heartless that he defeats, the closer he is to becoming our perfect puppet. This new knowledge will make him that much harder to control.
?????? What does it matter, really? Whatever his circumstances, Sora has never been able to help himself from saving people from the Heartless. It's what his pure little heart wants.

cutscene.desc: Another man tosses a pair of dice into the air

xml.sp: ?????? There. The dice have been cast. Things are in motion. He can't stop this.
Xaldin Nothing is set in stone. If the dice aren't in your favor, you will share Demyx's fate.
?????? The fun is in not knowing, isn't it? What is the point of betting on something if you already know the outcome?
?????? Are you sure that defeating him won't derail the Organization's plan?
Xemnas If he is to die so easily, he is of no use to us.
Xaldin That's exactly what I wanted to hear. It's not in my nature to hold back.

cutscene.desc: In the Gummi Ship, Goofy contemplates

xml.sp: Goofy A photo and some ice cream? Hmm. Wonder if they're some sorta clue. And who woulda left 'em for us, anyway?
Sora Riku?
Goofy Ya think?
Sora Just this feeling I got.
Donald Look! We're almost there!
Sora Hey, what if the Heartless are back again? I can't use the Keyblade---that would only help the Organization.
Goofy But Sora, I think ya have to use it. If we don't fight 'em, the Heartless'll keep on hurtin' folks.

cutscene.desc: They arrive back at the burned village in the Land of Dragons and walk through town

xml.sp: Goofy I wonder how everybody's doin'?
Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: They see someone in a black cloak at the edge of the town. He runs

xml.sp: Sora Wait!

cutscene.desc: Sora starts to run after him

xml.sp: Mulan Sora!
Sora Mulan, hey. No time to talk. We gotta catch that guy!
Mulan I'm following him, too!
Donald Then let's go!

cutscene.desc: They run to the Ridge and look around. Mulan taps Sora's shoulder and points. The cloaked man runs farther up the mountain. They follow him to the Summit

xml.sp: Mulan Looks like he got away.
Goofy How come you're after somebody from Organization XIII?
Mulan What is that?
Sora The guy in black.
Donald One of the bad guys!
Mulan I knew it! There's a rumor in the Imperial City about a spy in black, lurking in the mountains. I'd been up here tracking him, but when you arrived, I lost him.
Goofy Sorry!
Mulan Don't apologize. But I do wonder where he went.

cutscene.desc: A multitude of Rapid Thruster Heartless appear over the edge of the summit

xml.sp: Donald Again?
Sora Okay, first things first!

cutscene.desc: Sora starts to run, but stops. Donald, Goofy, and Mulan continue ahead. Sora turns around and sees the cloaked figure standing in the snow. He points his Keyblade at him

xml.sp: Sora Hey! You! Quit sneaking around!

cutscene.desc: The figure points past him. Sora turns around and knocks away a Heartless floating near him. The man takes out a wing-like sword. After fighting him, they stand apart. The man holds up a hand to Sora, then runs back down the mountain. Sora chases him

xml.sp: Sora That guy... No... Why...would he? Riku?

cutscene.desc: Sora continues to run, but sees no one. Donald and Goofy find him

xml.sp: Donald Are you okay, Sora?
Goofy Did ya get 'im?
Sora Hmm... Oh---he's gone.
Donald What!? You lost him?
Sora Anyway... What now?
Goofy I think that we better get rid of all the Heartless first.

cutscene.desc: Donald nods and there is a rumble in the mountain

xml.sp: Mulan What was that? Come on, we better get off the mountain.
Sora Okay.

cutscene.desc: Before leaving, Sora takes one more look at the Summit, then turns around and walks to the Ridge. The mountain shakes again and a gigantic Storm Rider Heartless bursts out of the snow and into the air. It roars and flies away from the mountain

xml.sp: Mulan It's heading for the city! We've got to warn Shang!

cutscene.desc: They run down the mountain. In the city, Captain Li Shang is knocked to the floor by the figure in black. His winged sword vanishes from his hand and he walks toward the Emperor. They run through the Mountain Trail, past the Checkpoint, and into Imperial Square

xml.sp: Sora Huh? Everything's fine.
Yao Well, now... Look who decided to show up.
Donald What? Is that a problem?
Ling Nah!
Chien-Po We're just glad you're not in black cloaks.
Mulan You saw him?
Yao Yeah---he's in the palace.

cutscene.desc: Mulan runs to the palace, and Sora, Donald, and Goofy follow. They are stopped by several Heartless, but they are soon defeated

xml.sp: Mulan To the palace! Hurry!

cutscene.desc: They run to the Palace Gate, which is locked. Sora, Donald, and Goofy bang on the doors

xml.sp: Sora Open up!

cutscene.desc: Sora pulls on the door handles, placing a foot on the door to pull it open. Mulan looks to the pillar next to her

xml.sp: Sora banging on the door Open up!
Mulan Over here!

cutscene.desc: Mulan runs to the pillar

xml.sp: Goofy Huh?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Sora follow Goofy to the pillar. Goofy jumps onto it and starts climbing. Donald jumps on, slides a few inches, then creeps up behind Goofy. Sora tags along behind. Mulan climbs last. Sora looks down to see she's climbing alright and continues. Mulan trips and falls back down the pillar. Sora reaches to catch her, but she finds a hold and starts climbing again. They reach the Antechamber and drop down to the floor. Donald lands on his stomach, but then gets up. They see a cloaked figure at the end of the hall before two doors

xml.sp: Mulan Wait!

cutscene.desc: The person flinches at the sound and turns to face them. Sora walks slowly toward him

xml.sp: Sora ...Riku?

cutscene.desc: Goofy and Donald look at each other in confusion. The man takes off his hood, showing his scar, eyepatch, and long striped hair in a ponytail

xml.sp: Xigbar No. Never heard of him.

cutscene.desc: Sniper Nobodies appear around the group and Sora is distracted. When he looks back to the doors, he sees no one. Xigbar runs from behind him to the Palace Gate in secret. After successfully defeating the Nobodies...

xml.sp: Goofy Guess it wasn't Riku.
Mulan Sorry, Sora. I can't stay. I'm worried about Shang.
Sora Oh! Right!

cutscene.desc: They enter the Throne Room and see the Emperor sitting upon his throne, Shang standing nearby

xml.sp: Mulan Your Excellency! Shang! Something terrible has happened! We saw a huge monster fly out of the mountains and toward the city!
Emperor Ahh. So it is as the young man said. Isn't that right, Captain?
Shang Y-yes, Your Excellency.
Emperor You see, a young stranger visited us not long ago. The Captain fought the visitor, but was quickly defeated.
Shang To my dishonor.
Emperor It seems that young man was the one in black that I have heard whispers about.
Sora Did he mention the name Riku?
Emperor He didn't offer his name. He was rather rude.
Sora Rude? Then it WAS Riku!
Donald to Goofy Riku's in the Organization?
Goofy Gawrsh...
Mulan But why would he come here?

cutscene.desc: A huge rumble shakes the palace

xml.sp: Mulan I'll check outside.

cutscene.desc: They turn to leave

xml.sp: Shang Mulan!
Mulan Shang---guard the Emperor! I'll be fine---with them!
Sora Th-that's right!
Emperor Indeed. That is true We need not worry while you protect us.
Donald Hurry!

cutscene.desc: They return to the Antechamber. Mulan opens the gate and the Storm Rider flies up to it, frightening her. She backs away from it. Sora places a hand on her shoulder as it flies away from the gate. They run outside, where it's gliding in the sky above the Square. It gathers strength and swoops down over them. They dodge to the ground

xml.sp: Goofy Whoa!

cutscene.desc: Sora gets up and races toward it, grabbing onto its tail. Mulan, Donald, and Goofy do the same. The Heartless flies high into the air. After a long battle, the Storm Rider Heartless starts to fall to the ground directly over Mulan

xml.sp: Shang Mulan!

cutscene.desc: Shang runs to Mulan, just as the Heartless comes down. A giant heart flies out of the creature and disappears into the sky. The Heartless vanishes, leaving Shang holding Mulan.

xml.sp: Sora Way to go!

cutscene.desc: (Shang helps Mulan up and they smile at each other. They look over at Sora, Donald, and Goofy, then back at each other. Realizing they're still holding hands, they look away embarrassed. Fireworks blaze above the palace. They return to the Throne Room

xml.sp: Emperor Once again, you have served China well. It would please me to reward you.

cutscene.desc: Donald shakes his hands together gleefully

xml.sp: Emperor What is it that you wish?

cutscene.desc: Goofy's stomach rumbles

xml.sp: Sora Well... You say a guy in black came to see you. What did he say?
Emperor That is all you request?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy try to say something

xml.sp: Sora Yes.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy hang their heads

xml.sp: Emperor Dragons have crossed our land and left a great web of paths. These dragons wield much power, and they are the source of many gifts to both man and nature. But it would seem someone of evil intent disturbed one of our dragons, and transformed it into what you call a Heartless. It is my belief that this young man came to warn me of that danger. Then, I could alert and prepare my troops.
Sora Did you?
Emperor chuckling I was about to, but he told me the situation had changed.
Shang He said three wise guys had arrived, and they would take care of things.
Sora That's gotta be Riku!
Goofy But what's he doin' hangin' out with Organization XIII?
Sora No idea. But at least I finally know he's okay. That's good enough.
Donald Yeah, that's good!
Emperor Now then, Fa Mulan. Do you have a request?
Mulan I'd like Shang...I-I mean... well... The Captain...
Emperor Yes, yes, my dear. What is it?
Mulan Could the Captain have a vacation, please?

cutscene.desc: Shang is surprised

xml.sp: Emperor chuckling I hardly expected such humble requests. In this case, I'm afraid I must refuse. Captain Li's responsibility is to protect the Emperor. And yet, Mulan... Would you like to serve alongside him and protect me?
Shang Huh?
Mulan What?
Emperor Two reeds together are stronger than one. But the choice is yours alone.
Mulan Thank you, Your Excellency!

cutscene.desc: Shang walks up to her and smiles. Sora seems to be just a little teary-eyed. He wipes his eyes, as Donald and Goofy walk over to him. He stops them and looks to Mulan and Shang. Shang places an arm around Mulan's shoulder, and they look into each other's eyes and nod. Sora, Donald, and Goofy leave the Land of Dragons and arrive at Beast's Castle. Belle is preparing for a night of ballroom dancing in her room. She hums to herself as she finishes putting on her dress

xml.sp: Wardrobe I hope tonight goes well.
Belle So do I. But I wonder why he's so nervous.
Wardrobe The master does have his shy side, you know.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter the castle and see the Beast pacing in the Entrance Hall, wearing a fancy suit

xml.sp: Sora Hey there!

cutscene.desc: Donald looks around

xml.sp: Donald No Heartless and no Nobodies!
Goofy I think they're close, though...
Sora Better watch out!

cutscene.desc: The Beast sighs in frustration

xml.sp: Donald What are you so mad about?
Beast Why are you here?
Sora The Nobodies' world has to be out there somewhere. We're looking for a way in.
Beast Hmph.

cutscene.desc: Belle walks down the east staircase

xml.sp: Beast Tonight is very important.

cutscene.desc: Beast walks up the stairs and meets her at the entrance to the Ballroom. They bow to each other. She takes his arm, and he leads her into the Ballroom

xml.sp: Goofy Uh, maybe we came at a bad time.
Donald Well, there's only one way to find out.

cutscene.desc: Donald runs up the stairs

xml.sp: Sora Donald!

cutscene.desc: They have no choice but to run after him. The Beast and Belle walk to the middle of the Ballroom and stare into each other's eyes

xml.sp: Lumiere Now then, Monsieur, Mademoiselle. Please, enjoy the evening.

cutscene.desc: They notice Sora, Donald, and Goofy by the door

xml.sp: Lumiere And of course, our honored guests are welcome, too.
?????? A welcome indeed.

cutscene.desc: Belle is surprised and hugs the Beast close. Beast looks up at the railing above the dance floor. Sora runs further into the ballroom and turns around to see a cloaked man standing behind the railing

xml.sp: Sora The Organization!
Xaldin You don't know when to quit.
Donald Oh yeah! We'll show you!
Beast Get out!

cutscene.desc: The Beast leaves Belle and runs toward Xaldin. Belle glares

xml.sp: Belle Not tonight!

cutscene.desc: Xaldin snaps his fingers and several Dragoon Nobodies appear. The Beast runs and swipes through them with a roar

xml.sp: Xaldin I've come to take something you hold very dear.

cutscene.desc: Beast lets out a loud bellow

xml.sp: Xaldin Yes. Let your anger grow...

cutscene.desc: Xaldin disappears, leaving the Nobodies to take care of them

xml.sp: Sora Beast! We have to get rid of these guys first!

cutscene.desc: They fight the Nobodies. The castle staff quickly hurries Belle out to the balcony away from the fight

xml.sp: Sora Where's Belle!?
Belle Over here!
Sora Whew, she's okay.
Goofy Guess Xaldin didn't take anything after all.

cutscene.desc: The Beast realizes something and races out of the Ballroom

xml.sp: Sora What's wrong?

cutscene.desc: Belle quickly runs after him

xml.sp: Sora Belle? What's with them?
Goofy Maybe Belle isn't the only thing precious to the Beast.
Donald C'mon!

cutscene.desc: They hurry to the Beast's Room in the West Wing, where the Beast is pacing around the room. He roars and slams the floor

xml.sp: Belle What's wrong?

cutscene.desc: She walks closer to him

xml.sp: Belle Please, calm down!

cutscene.desc: The Beast swing to face her, she holds up her hands

xml.sp: Beast Calm down!? You just had to have a party, didn't you? Don't you see what's happened?
Sora Hey. What's with you?
Beast The rose... My rose...
Sora What, that? He took it?
Belle But surely, you can find another rose...
Beast Silence! You don't know anything!

cutscene.desc: The Beast swipes slightly at her. Sora stands between them

xml.sp: Sora That's not fair, Beast. Don't take it out on Belle. It's not like she stole it!

cutscene.desc: The Beast holds a hand to his forehead

xml.sp: Belle I'm sorry.
Sora You don't have to apologize.
Belle But...

cutscene.desc: The Beast looks away

xml.sp: Beast Belle... Sora... I want you to leave the castle.

cutscene.desc: Belle doesn't know what to say

xml.sp: Beast Look at me. Look. This is what I am. When you first got here, I tried to change.

cutscene.desc: He looks at his hands

xml.sp: Beast But I was only fooling myself. I can't be any different. I'll always be a beast. So, I should live like a beast. With no one, alone. Goodbye, Belle.
Belle You can't mean that...

cutscene.desc: The Beast says nothing further. Belle reaches a hand out to him

xml.sp: Goofy to Sora I think he's mind's all made up.
Sora Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Belle turns away

xml.sp: Sora Look, Belle. Leave this to us. If we can get the Beast's rose back, he'll calm down.

cutscene.desc: She nods, turns to look at the Beast one more time, then leaves. Mrs. Potts, Cogsworth, and Lumiere are in the West Wing. Belle waves solemnly at them as she walks by and down the stairs

xml.sp: Mrs. Potts Poor child...

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy meet with them

xml.sp: Cogsworth How could it have come to this?
Lumiere And they were so looking forward to this evening...
