Mrs. Potts Now, now---no need to be so sad. Once the rose is back safely, this will all be over.
Sora What's so special about one rose, anyway?
Cogsworth If the master can love and be loved in return, the spell will be broken. We'll all be human again.
Donald Yeah. You told us.
Lumiere But there is a time limit. He must find his true love before the last petal falls from that rose.
Cogsworth Ah, but that is not all... Over time, caring for that rose has become a cherished part of the master's daily life.
Mrs. Potts It's as though all his hopes and dreams are tied to that single bloom...
Sora Poor Beast! Then we have to get it back.
Mrs. Potts Please do!
Sora We can't without the Beast, though. If it's that important to him, he's got to do it himself.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. They return to the Beast's room

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Beast.
Beast sighing Leave me alone.

Sora C'mon, you need to hear this. You used to be fearless. You would have given your life to save Belle. Don't you know what that meant to us? You gave us all courage. Hmph, maybe you should have kept some for yourself. I mean, are you really gonna throw your happiness away? The rose is your only hope, isn't it? Well, it's the only hope for Cogsworth and the others, too. So, don't throw away your last chance. Remember what it was like before Belle lived here?

cutscene.desc: The Beast remembers

xml.sp: Sora See? You can't give up. Not now.
Beast I know one thing.
Sora What?
Beast turning around This castle belongs to me. Xaldin will never be welcome here.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy nod. They return to the Entrance Hall

xml.sp: Xaldin So, Beast...you came after all.

cutscene.desc: Xaldin stands high at a stained-glass window, holding the enchanted rose

xml.sp: Xaldin You had me worried. I was afraid you'd given up for good.
Sora What do you guys really want?
Xaldin ...Kingdom Hearts.

cutscene.desc: Xaldin takes off his hood

xml.sp: Xaldin When Kingdom Hearts is ours, we can exist fully and completely. So you see, Beast---that's why we need your Heartless AND your Nobody!

cutscene.desc: They fight the group of Nobodies that appear. Xaldin floats down from the high pedestal. He looks back at them and leaves through the front door. The four walk to the Courtyard. Goofy looks up and sees Belle on the balcony outside her window

xml.sp: Goofy Huh?

cutscene.desc: Belle sighs and looks to the Courtyard. She sees Sora, Donald, Goofy and the Beast, and gasps, about to head back inside. She looks to the spot on the balcony next to her

xml.sp: Belle Is that...

cutscene.desc: She picks up the rose and calls down to them

xml.sp: Belle Look! It's the rose!

cutscene.desc: Beast looks up. A gloved hand covers her mouth. She struggles against Xaldin, but he holds her firmly

xml.sp: Beast Belle!

cutscene.desc: Xaldin grabs Belle, who's still holding the rose, and jumps from the balcony. He lands at the Bridge

xml.sp: Sora Hurry!

cutscene.desc: They run through the arc, Beast shoving the door open with his shoulder. The stars glimmer in the night sky, as Beast runs ahead down the Bridge towards Xaldin and Belle. He stops as he gets nearer

xml.sp: Beast You! Get out of my castle, now!
Xaldin With pleasure, but I'd rather travel light...

cutscene.desc: He looks to the rose and to Belle

xml.sp: Xaldin What shall I leave behind? Belle? Or the rose?

cutscene.desc: The Beast growls. Belle looks worried

xml.sp: Beast Belle!

cutscene.desc: The Beast begins to run. Catching Xaldin off guard, Belle elbows him in the stomach and grabs the rose. She runs past the Beast and Sora

xml.sp: Sora Good one, Belle!

cutscene.desc: The Beast charges at Xaldin and swipes at him with his claws. Xaldin leaps backwards out of the way. He throws up his hands creating six small pillars of dust. Lightning thunders through them. Xaldin releases his arms and the dust clears, leaving six naginata. They teleport into the air above him. He catches two in each hand, and creates a wind tunnel that holds the other two

xml.sp: Xaldin Where's the fun in this?

cutscene.desc: They fight a cruel battle against Xaldin

xml.sp: Xaldin Is this the end?

cutscene.desc: Xaldin is shoved back, his six staves sharp in the ground. They disappear in shafts of white light. Xaldin screams in agony and fades away. Afterwards, the castle staff arrives. Belle hands the rose to the Beast

xml.sp: Belle Here. It's yours again.

cutscene.desc: The Beast takes it

xml.sp: Beast Belle...
Belle I know. You want me to leave the castle.
Beast What matters is... You weren't hurt by Xaldin... You're safe. And... I'm very grateful to you...for bringing the rose back to me. Thank you.
Belle smiling It's the least I could do. You've been good to me. And you didn't have to be.

cutscene.desc: The Beast places the rose on the ground

xml.sp: Beast Listen, Belle...
Belle Yes?

cutscene.desc: The Beast is having a hard time forming words, and he glances at the group

xml.sp: Sora Say it!
Lumiere Go on!
Donald C'mon!
Mrs. Potts You can do it!
Cogsworth We have confidence.
Goofy Don't be bashful, now.

cutscene.desc: The Beast looks back at Belle

xml.sp: Beast Belle, I'd like you to stay... With me... Please?

cutscene.desc: Belle smiles and holds her hand out. The Beast understands and places a hand on her waist and around her hand

xml.sp: Belle I will.

cutscene.desc: The Beast smiles

xml.sp: Lumiere Maestro---music!

cutscene.desc: They start to dance as the music plays. The Beast twirls her

xml.sp: Sora Hey, did you see the look on Belle's face when she grabbed that rose?
Goofy Yep, she sure was havin' fun, all right.
Lumiere She is rather unique, isn't she?
Mrs. Potts Always ready for a little adventure.
Cogsworth The two of them do seem made for each other.
Sora Yeah, they sure do!

cutscene.desc: The two continue to dance. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Gummi Ship

xml.sp: Chip Hey, everybody! I'm picking up a strange reading.
Dale Are you sure? Let me see!
Chip Look---it's all cloudy and kinda fuzzy.
Dale Prob'ly just a glitch.
Chip I don't know...

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship back to Port Royal. A man with a black cloak enters Isla de Muerta and walks toward the large treasure chest full of medallions. Sora, Donald, and Goofy walk into the Rampart

xml.sp: Goofy That's coming from the port.
Sora Let's check it out.

cutscene.desc: They run to the Harbor and find Jack chased by several cursed pirates

xml.sp: Sora Jack!
Jack Sparrow Zola! Some assistance!
Sora That's SORA, Donald, and Goofy!
Jack Sparrow Will ye leave a mate to perish?
Sora Aye aye...

cutscene.desc: They fend off the pirates

xml.sp: Sora Those pirates were cursed. I'd thought we'd seen the last of the curse of the Aztec gold... What gives?
Jack Sparrow Some scallywag must've got greedy. Oh, I see... You don't trust me, do you?

cutscene.desc: They nod

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Likely a wise choice, I AM a pirate, mates.
Elizabeth Jack! Sora!

cutscene.desc: Elizabeth runs up to them

xml.sp: Sora Elizabeth!
Jack Sparrow thinking Some sticky business is afoot, I fear.

cutscene.desc: He starts to leave

xml.sp: Elizabeth Wait, Jack! I need your help. The cursed pirates have returned. Will had to find out why, so he went to Isla de Muerta---to check on the Aztec treasure. I fear something's happened. You have to take me to him.
Jack Sparrow Aye, there it is. If you'll be wanting him rescued, best do it alone, lass.
Elizabeth Alone? Really, Jack? Sail to the island and take on the cursed pirates?
Jack Sparrow Well, if any lass could...
Sora Are you sure he's in trouble?
Elizabeth No. Not certain. But he's been gone too long. I wanted to go with him, but he insisted I stay here. I can't just sit and wait! I've got to know if he's all right.
Jack Sparrow Lucky man...
Elizabeth Please, Jack! Take me to him!
Jack Sparrow Hold a moment. I see no profit in it for me.
Elizabeth I shall reward you. Of course...you do owe Will. He has saved your life before.
Jack Sparrow Right. Shall we?

cutscene.desc: They board the Black Pearl and set sail for Isla de Muerta

xml.sp: Goofy Interceptor off the starboard bow!

cutscene.desc: They run over and see Will knocked out on the railing of the ship

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will!

cutscene.desc: Jack places a hand to his chest

xml.sp: Elizabeth Stop that, Jack. We've got to rescue him!

cutscene.desc: After they save Will, Elizabeth kneels in the Captain's stateroom with Will in her arms

xml.sp: Elizabeth Will, wake up.
Will Elizabeth...
Elizabeth What happened?
Will The medallions...and...the stone chest---someone's taken them... Next thing I knew, we were attacked...but I couldn't see who it was---his face was shrouded...in a black hood.
Sora The Organization!
Will We found a way out of the cave...but the villain sent a horde of terrible creatures after us... I've never seen their likes before... I think I'm the only one who made it back to the ship...
Elizabeth Will...
Will Elizabeth... I feel rather...

cutscene.desc: He falls asleep in her arms. She lays him down

xml.sp: Sora Our turn, guys.
Elizabeth standing up You'd best go prepared. We've no idea what's out there.
Jack Sparrow Pardon me, lads and lass, but your captain will have no monsters today. Thank ye. We're turning for home.

cutscene.desc: Jack turns to leave

xml.sp: Elizabeth Just like that?
Jack Sparrow Just like that!

cutscene.desc: Jack returns to the deck

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Don't remember invitin' you.

cutscene.desc: A figure in a black cloak appears. The treasure chest is beside him

xml.sp: Sora So it was the Organization. We'll handle this!

cutscene.desc: The figure holds out a hand

xml.sp: ?????? The Darkness of men's hearts---drawn to these cursed medallions; and this Heartless---a veritable maelstrom of avarice

cutscene.desc: The large Grim Reaper Heartless appears swinging his pendulum-like axe

xml.sp: ?????? I wonder, are they worthy to serve Organization XIII?
Jack Sparrow And you want an answer now?
?????? Precisely!

cutscene.desc: The man disappears, leaving them to fight the Heartless. After the battle on deck, it is knocked into the water

xml.sp: Donald Oh, boy!
Sora Not over yet!

cutscene.desc: The man has appeared again and it standing behind the treasure chest. He takes off his hood, revealing his blond hair. He smirks

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Throw him overboard!
Sora Aye aye!
Luxord Parley!
Jack Sparrow 'Scuse me?
Goofy Barley?
Jack Sparrow It's a bit of a pirates' code. Anyone who invokes parley must not be harmed 'til negotiations are complete.
Sora This is no time for rules!
Jack Sparrow True. But as we're honorable pirates we should always stick to the Code. to Luxord All right, you. Out with it!
Luxord I surrender the chest with my humblest apologies.
Jack Sparrow Rather accommodating of you, mate. And for that you want...?
Luxord Just a few souvenirs...for the memories.

cutscene.desc: Luxord grabs four medallions

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Huh?

cutscene.desc: Luxord throws the medallions into the air and several Gambler Nobodies appear and snatch them away

xml.sp: Goofy Oh, no! We can't stop the curse unless we got all the medallions!
Jack Sparrow Our friend's about to learn what it means to cross a pirate.
Luxord Oh?

cutscene.desc: The Grim Reaper Heartless floats out of the water, cursed by the medallions. It swings it's axe and makes a large wind current that blows Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Jack onto the deck of the Interceptor

xml.sp: Luxord Fire!

cutscene.desc: The cannons on the Black Pearl let loose on the Interceptor. Will and Elizabeth run out of the stateroom and watch as the Interceptor is destroyed. Luxord laughs evilly as the Black Pearl sails on. Sora wakes up in the Interceptor's Hold

xml.sp: Sora after seeing Jack You stole a medallion again?
Jack Sparrow Were I only that fortunate...
Donald Fortunate?
Goofy So, uh, how come you're all skeleton-y?
Jack Sparrow Perhaps I got a tough o' somethin' from that monster what attacked us. Yet, why's the skin restin' right on you three?
Donald 'Cause we're not greedy!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Goofy stare at Donald

xml.sp: Donald What're you looking at?
Sora That still doesn't solve the mystery.

cutscene.desc: Jack walks out of the moonlight and regains his human form

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh... Maybe the reason we're all okay is because we're not from this world.
Donald There must be different laws.
Sora Yeah... we're always just passing through... Wonder when we'll see home again...
Donald Sora...
Sora Just kiddin' you. Lucky we didn't get cursed, huh?
Jack Sparrow Quit yammerin', mates! We've got to find ourselves a ship that'll float.

cutscene.desc: They continue to the Seadrift Keep

xml.sp: Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: He points to a Gambler Nobody who's flipping a medallion in its hand

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow A medallion! Get it!

cutscene.desc: After defeating the Nobody, it vanishes and the medallion falls to the ground. Jack picks it up

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Three more to go!
Sora How do you know?
Jack Sparrow A pirate must have a keen eye. Else he won't be sailin' free for very long. Savvy?
Donald Huh? What's that?

cutscene.desc: He points to a ship coming in. Elizabeth is standing on deck

xml.sp: Elizabeth Ahoy, mateys!
Jack Sparrow Ridiculous imitation---and yet, I'm flattered.

cutscene.desc: They arrive on the Black Pearl and Jack's skeletal form is shown

xml.sp: Elizabeth Jack, what happened? This is horrible!
Jack Sparrow Ah, but who's to blame for it, eh?
Will Well, it certainly isn't Elizabeth.
Sora It's Organization XIII. They're the ones behind it all.
Goofy Wonder where they went.
Will The hooded man took the pirates and his creatures with him into some strange hole. We saw them leave from inside the captain's stateroom.
Jack Sparrow Didn't occur to you to fight them, mate?
Will I'm no fool. I knew I was no match for them.
Jack Sparrow That I believe.
Will Sora, I think we'll need your help.
Sora Got it.
Will First, let's find all the medallions. Otherwise, the curse can't be broken and the creatures will remain invincible.

cutscene.desc: They set a course for Isla de Muerta. They find the final three Nobodies and take back the medallions. They then return to the ship

xml.sp: Sora That's four medallions! We got 'em all!
Jack Sparrow But where's the chest?
Will If we find the hooded man, we'll find it.
Sora Prob'ly in Port Royal.
Elizabeth Why's that?
Sora Organization XIII is after people's hearts. So they're gonna go where there's lots of people.
Will They'll hurt the townsfolk?
Jack Sparrow No, they're bringin' 'em flowers, mate. I don't know who these Organizers are, but I will say they're makin' we pirates look like proper gents.

cutscene.desc: Jack walks up the stairs to the helm

xml.sp: Will Well, Jack...then...we have to help!
Jack Sparrow Then let go and haul to run free!

cutscene.desc: They leave for Port Royal. When they arrive, the Grim Reaper Heartless is waiting at the Harbor

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Go! He's for me.

cutscene.desc: Jack leads the Grim Reaper away from the treasure chest. Sora, Donald, Will, and Goofy approach it

xml.sp: Sora Now to break that curse!

cutscene.desc: Sora adds the four medallions to the chest. The Grim Reaper returns to normal

xml.sp: Donald The curse---it's gone!

cutscene.desc: Jack looks at himself

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Then what's this?
Goofy Aw, I understand. Jack musta been cursed by that monster, not from takin' the gold.
Jack Sparrow Oh, I've no worries, then.
Sora It's okay, Jack. We'll just have to defeat the monster, that's all.

cutscene.desc: The Grim Reaper swings at the group, who dodge out of the way. It's swinging axe slashes into the chest, scattering the medallions. The Heartless regains it's skeletal form

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Get the gold!

cutscene.desc: They manage to return the gold to the chest and defeat the Heartless. Jack becomes fully human again

xml.sp: Sora All better.
Jack Sparrow Ah, not quite, mate.

cutscene.desc: Luxord appears and takes the heart from the Heartless, sending it to Kingdom Hearts

xml.sp: Luxord Sora, bravo.

cutscene.desc: He vanishes as they run up to him

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Just who was that chap?

Sora He's part of an Organization that's collecting hearts. First they release Heartless into different worlds. We defeat those Heartless. Then they get the hearts. We're never gonna stop 'em like this.

cutscene.desc: Will and Elizabeth walk over

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow What's the plan, then?
Sora We gotta find their stronghold and finish them off once and for all.
Jack Sparrow Sailin' these waters, I've heard some tales, but not a one like this.
Will Is there any way we can help?

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks

xml.sp: Elizabeth Anything at all?
Jack Sparrow There is.

cutscene.desc: The treasure chest is dropped into the sea to rest forever in Davy Jones's Locker. They board the Black Pearl again

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow It's certain we don't need the likes of that hooded fellow and the Heartless about. They'll ruin the market for us true pirates.
Elizabeth So that's why you went to Port Royal. And we thought you actually wanted to save everyone.
Jack Sparrow A pirate always looks to profit, Miss Swann.
Sora Too bad. You had us going there, thinking you'd turned over a new leaf.
Jack Sparrow The question is, what's beyond the leaf? Savvy?
Elizabeth Oh...oh, yes---a reward. And what'll it be?
Jack Sparrow That lovely blade of Sora's.
Sora & Donald Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Sora Okay. Sure.

cutscene.desc: Sora flips the handle around and offers the Keyblade to Jack Sparrow

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow Hold on! That was far too easy. What's the rub?

cutscene.desc: Jack, slightly hesitant, takes the Keyblade and holds it up. The blade vanishes from his hand and reappears in Sora's. Jack points at him with both hands

xml.sp: Jack Sparrow There, you see?
Sora Well, you've always got the Pearl, Jack.

Jack Sparrow That I do. But someday, I'll gather a blood-thirsty crew, and come to take that blade. Chance by then I'll have the way to wield it. And if I succeed, I'll ask you two to join me. That'd be reward enough.
Elizabeth Done.
Goofy Maybe someday, Jack'll be able to use the Keyblade after all.
Donald Why's that?
Goofy A-hyuck! He and Sora are kind of alike, dontcha think?
Sora & Jack Sparrow Are not!

cutscene.desc: They look at each other, then everyone laughs. Later, Jack sails away in The Black Pearl

xml.sp: Will Some say Jack Sparrow's the worst pirate ever to sail the Spanish Main.
Elizabeth No one could really mean that.
Will Right. We know he's the best.
Sora I hope we'll get to see him again.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Gummi Ship

xml.sp: Chip It's that weird reading from before. See, I knew it wasn't a glitch.
Dale Yeah! But it's still all cloudy and kinda fuzzy.
Chip Hmm... Well, we know one thing for sure.
Dale What's that?
Chip Whenever Sora, Donald, and Goofy go out and help folks, the reading gets stronger!
Dale Gee, I wonder why.
Chip Hey, Sora. We're gonna try to find out more about this reading.
Dale And while we do, you fellas just keep on questin'!
Chip 'n' Dale We really are countin' on you, guys!

cutscene.desc: Sora pilots the Gummi Ship to the Underworld

xml.sp: Sora Well?
Goofy The coast is clear!
Sora No sign of the Nobodies or the Heartless...for now, anyway.

cutscene.desc: They see a stadium across the Styx river that is all lit up

xml.sp: Donald What's that?
Auron The Underdrome. Fiends of the Underworld once clashed there---battle after battle. But Zeus didn't like the senseless violence, so he locked the place up.
Sora How did it get UN-locked?
Auron Some fool must have broken the seal.
Sora What an idiot.
Auron Hmph.
Sora Where are you going, Auron? We should catch up!
Auron If you need something to do, go help your friends.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks over at the entrance to the Olympus Coliseum and sees Hercules and Megara. He looks back and Auron is gone. They walk up to Hercules

xml.sp: Hercules Hey.
Sora Herc! You feeling any better?
Meg Well...same routine. Wonderboy here thinks his hero days are over. And Phil thinks it's all in his head.
Goofy Gawrsh, Herc. We know you're a hero!
Hades That's right...Blunderboy. How can you mope on a momentous day like today?

cutscene.desc: Hades appears in a puff of smoke

xml.sp: Hades The Underdrome's back, and you are gonna fill the stands. After all, your fans won't settle for anything less than a certified hero.

cutscene.desc: Hercules starts to get angry, then quits

xml.sp: Hades placing an arm on Herc's shoulder I mean, if you're not up to it, you could always just, I dunno, LOSE?
Sora I bet you'd like that!

Hades Excuse me? Hey, I'm not a selfish guy. I'm not like those high and mighty snobs up on Olympus. I stand for the masses! And have I got a massive idea! The games, ladies and gentlemen...are back! Yours truly, Hades---the one and only Lord of the Dead---brings you the ultimate games, to celebrate the re-opening of the ultimate coliseum! We'll finally answer the age-old question Who deserves the title Ultimate Hero? These games are gonna settle the debate once and for all! The winner reigns supreme. Of what? You guessed it! The Hades Cup! And I assure you that the Great Hercules will be there. Otherwise...

cutscene.desc: Hades looks to Meg, Hercules covers her

xml.sp: Hades You'll never see your girlfriend again.
Sora as Hades vanishes Lowlife.
Hades You're too kind, kid.
Panic Just talk to me if you wanna enter a tournament.
Pain His Most Perniciousness is feeling kinda charitable, so don't worry about dying or anything. You should consider yourself lucky!
Panic And if you win, you'll get lots of fabulous prizes!
Pain There are a bunch of tournaments, so make sure you check back often.
Panic Yeah, it's a great way to spend some time.
Pain I'm handling registration for the Hades Cup. Don't go to Panic for that one!

cutscene.desc: They sign up for the Hades Cup with Hercules and look at the tier board

xml.sp: Hercules Who do we face first?
Sora Let's see...
Goofy It's Spin Strike.
Donald Look! Auron's in the tournament, too!
Goofy Uh-oh! We might have to fight him in the finals!
Hercules I bet he's a real hero, huh?
Sora Well, I don't think he's a bad guy... But you're the only hero around here, Hercules. You know that.
Hercules Maybe before... Now I'm just a washout...
Sora Stop that!

cutscene.desc: They win in the first round

xml.sp: Sora How'd it go out there, champ?
Hercules I'm just not what I used to be. Sorry to drag you down, guys.
Sora Don't throw in the towel yet, Herc! We need you in the semifinals!

cutscene.desc: They choose to continue the tournament

xml.sp: Pain Next are the Hades Cup semifinals. Try not to lose too quickly.
Sora Bring it on!

cutscene.desc: They look at the tier board

xml.sp: Goofy We're at the semifinals...
Donald Wak! Against Bad Alert!?
Hercules Are they any good?
Sora It sounds like they're bad... but we can't chicken out now!

cutscene.desc: The second round names them as winners

xml.sp: Sora We made it to the finals!
Donald If we win, we'll all be heroes!
Goofy Oh, that's why you're so happy.
Sora We can't stay junior heroes forever, you know.
Hercules I'll try not to mess things up.
Donald Enough already...
Hercules Look. Over there.

cutscene.desc: They see Auron standing near the door

xml.sp: Hercules He's our final opponent, right?
Sora Auron!

cutscene.desc: Auron has a reddish glow to him. It fades away as he turns around

xml.sp: Auron And you are?
Sora Huh?
Donald Auron...?
Auron I must defeat you and atone for my crimes.

cutscene.desc: He turns around and leaves

xml.sp: Sora Hey! What was that all about?

cutscene.desc: Auron enters the Cave of the Dead as Sora returns to the Underworld Entrance. Sora, Donald, and Goofy follow him. Sora enters, but quickly hides when he sees Auron and Hades. Donald walks in, and Sora pulls him to his hiding spot

xml.sp: Hades Okay, let's review. State your crime, prisoner.
Auron I exist. That is my crime. It is...inexcusable.
Hades Ooh, good, very good.
Sora What's wrong with Auron? He's never acted that way before.

cutscene.desc: Donald shushes him

xml.sp: Hades Okay, so you made one lousy mistake you exist. But hey, I'm a forgiving guy. You keep your end of our little deal, and I'm willing to overlook a transgression or two.
Auron I understand. Defeat Hercules.
Hades And his meddling friends.
Auron What? No, only Hercules.
Hades leaning an elbow on Auron's shoulder Oh, don't tell me you've forgotten who's in charge?

cutscene.desc: He places a hand on Auron's shoulder and several pyreflies swirl around it. Auron groans in pain. Hades pulls out a figurine of Auron

xml.sp: Hades Hercules and the other three. Are we clear?
Auron We're clear, Hades.
Hades Lord Hades.
Auron Lord Hades...
Hades stopping Good. Now go.

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald duck from where they're watching them as Auron turns around

xml.sp: Sora So that's how he's controlling Auron!
Donald What a jerk!
Goofy He'd probably think that was a compliment.
Sora I can't stand seeing Auron do that lowlife's bidding... We've got to help him!

cutscene.desc: Auron leaves the cave

xml.sp: Sora C'mon, let's go after him!

cutscene.desc: Auron gets into a boat with Pain and Panic, which sails to the Underdrome. Panic waves goodbye to them, then Pain stares at him, and he stops.

xml.sp: Hercules What's wrong, Sora?
Sora Auron's in trouble! It's like Hades brainwashed him!
Goofy He's using some kind of a statue.
Hercules You know something? That sounds kinda familiar... Hades may be using the statue to hold Auron's free will hostage.
Donald What do we do?
Hercules See if you can find that statue. It's gotta be somewhere in the Underworld.
Sora Right. I'm on it!
Hades Tell me you're not thinking of leaving. You've got a match coming up.
Hercules I'll fight Auron in the final. One on one.
Hades Oh, you will?

cutscene.desc: Hades turns around looking worried. He tries to think of a plan

xml.sp: Hercules to Sora I'll draw things out to buy you time.
Sora But---
Hercules Just hurry back. I know you can do it!
Hades Congratulations! You've got a deal.
Hercules Thanks.
Hades On one condition! The Keyblader, here, and his trusty friends have to meet the winner in one final clash, whaddya say?
Hercules That'll drive the crowd wild...
Hades It'd better. I promised the crowd the event of their afterlives.

cutscene.desc: Pain and Panic arrive back with the boat. Hercules gets in with Hades and they sail off, Hercules waving to them

xml.sp: Hades Sucker! You know for me, the rest is smooth sailing.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy travel through the Cave of the Dead. Auron and Hercules are fighting in the tournament. Auron slices at Hercules who dodges back and stops the blade

xml.sp: Hades Now that is entertainment!

cutscene.desc: Meg and Phil watch as Hercules struggles to keep Auron's sword at bay. Sora and the others enter Hades's Chamber and find the Auron figurine on the stone table

xml.sp: Sora Got it!

cutscene.desc: Sora touches it, but is shocked by energy. Goofy touches him and is also shocked

xml.sp: Donald Huh?

cutscene.desc: Donald touches Goofy and he also gets shocked

xml.sp: Donald What's going on!?

cutscene.desc: They hear Auron's thoughts and memories

xml.sp: Auron It is not too late! Let us turn back! Yes, but I...I cannot accept it. Where is the sense in all this? But...there must be another way! Your deaths will mean nothing! You must live!
Sora I get it. This is what belongs in Auron's heart.
Goofy Gawrsh, he musta had a pretty rough life.
Sora Yeah...but in the end, that's really what made him stronger.
Donald Let's give it back!

cutscene.desc: Dusks surround them

xml.sp: Sora Nobodies? Where did they come from?

cutscene.desc: They fight the group, but more appear

xml.sp: Donald Hey, go away!

cutscene.desc: The Nobodies slowly walk closer to them. Heartless begin attacking them

xml.sp: Sora Not what I had in mind, but I'll take it!
Goofy We'd better skedaddle!

cutscene.desc: They run out of the Cave, leaving the Heartless and the Nobodies to their battle

xml.sp: Pain Ha! Hercules must be screaming for mercy by now! What? Did you come to see Hercules lose, too?

cutscene.desc: They swim over in the boat to help Hercules. His fight with Auron is still going on. Auron cleaves downward with his sword, but Hercules dodges. He spins around, letting the sword swing. Hercules dodges underneath it and swings back up. Hercules realizes he is right on the edge of the platform, when Auron runs up and clasps the sword down onto Hercules, who blocks with his hands. He struggles to keep the sword up, falling to one knee

xml.sp: Hades Now! Finish him!
Sora Auron, no!
Donald Hey, Auron! This belongs to you!

cutscene.desc: Sora holds out the doll and throws it onto the field. It bursts over Auron, and his free will returns to him. He stops fighting and sets his sword down. Hercules catches his breath

xml.sp: Auron Sora. Donald. Goofy.
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Auron!
Hades turning red Why those little---Ugh, prisoner! What happened to our mutual agreement? I can give you a clean slate, but you gotta work with me.
Auron Maybe you didn't hear me. This is my story, and you're not part of it.

cutscene.desc: Hades in a fury bursts into a pillar of flame and disappears from his chair. He reappears down on the platform

xml.sp: Hades That's it! This game is over. I've played by the rules so far. Okay, I confess! I was hoping Wonderboy would lose, but it was still a fair fight. C'mon, is that really so wrong? Huh?
Sora Really? A fair fight?

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy laugh

xml.sp: Hades Laugh, laugh, laugh all you want! laughs weakly Because the laughing is about to stop. Wanna know why? Because now we're gonna play by my rules.

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers and the stone gate behind him lifts up to reveal a swirling green vortex. They hear a scream as Hades teleports Meg to the pool. She is suspended by clouds of smoke

xml.sp: Hercules Meg!
Meg Hercules!
Hades Hey, I warned you right at the get-go.
Hades You don't compete, you lose the girl.

cutscene.desc: He snaps his fingers again and she is lost to the river of death

xml.sp: Hercules No!

cutscene.desc: Hercules runs past Hades, pushing him away

xml.sp: Hercules Meg! Hang on!

cutscene.desc: He jumps in to save her. Hades looks to make sure he's in

xml.sp: Hades Looks like Wonderboy has dropped out of the standings.

cutscene.desc: The stone gate behind him closes. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Auron glare at him

xml.sp: Sora Well, you've still got us to deal with!

cutscene.desc: Hades teleports behind them

xml.sp: Hades Oh, yeah. This is gonna be good.

cutscene.desc: Hades turns red

xml.sp: Hades Hmph...That's it!

cutscene.desc: They start to fight, but Hades barely feels a thing. He laughs

xml.sp: Sora We can't win.
Donald How come?
Auron Because it's his Underworld.
Goofy Gee, then how do we beat him?

cutscene.desc: Hades gets ready to throw something else at them, when the stone gate opens. They look and see no one

xml.sp: Hercules I think a true hero should be able to help.

cutscene.desc: They see Hercules holding Meg. Herc now has a bright glow to him

xml.sp: Hades But...you...
Hercules smiling I owe you one, Hades. I didn't hesitate to give my life for Meg's. And then, I remembered

cutscene.desc: Pegasus flies down

xml.sp: Hercules A true hero is measured by the strength of his heart.

cutscene.desc: Herc puts Meg down

xml.sp: Hercules I'll never forget that again.
Sora Just no more crazy stunts.
Hercules to Sora People always do crazy things when they're in love.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy chuckle as Meg flies away on Pegasus

xml.sp: Hades What is so funny, you imbeciles! How dare you get a happy ending! How DARE you!

cutscene.desc: They fight an unbelievable battle against Hades

xml.sp: Hades This...isn't...happening!

cutscene.desc: Hades clutches his heart. Sora strikes one more time, but Hades teleports to the edge of the river of death. Hades backs away

xml.sp: Hades It's...not over...yet...

cutscene.desc: He trips over the edge and falls into the river. Later, they see Auron off in the Underworld Entrance

xml.sp: Donald What'cha gonna do now?
Auron I lived my life defending others. But now...there's no one left to protect. Maybe...it's time I shaped my own story.
Sora Yeah... You deserve it, Auron---after everything you've been through.

cutscene.desc: He chuckles

xml.sp: Auron I suppose I should thank you.
Sora proudly Not at all.
Auron Fine.

cutscene.desc: Auron turns to leave. Sora, Donald, and Goofy slump in irony

xml.sp: Sora I mean, sure, you could thank us a little...
Auron You should say what you mean.

cutscene.desc: He turns back around

xml.sp: Auron I guess I could spare a few words. Thanks for meddling.

cutscene.desc: They slump again

xml.sp: Sora Hey, what's that mean?

cutscene.desc: Auron walks away with a smirk. Later, they all meet under a full moon night sky

xml.sp: Hercules Thanks again, guys! You're the best.
Donald Excuse up for meddling...
Meg Aw...sounds like somebody's feathers are a little ruffled. I'm kidding. Thank you, Sora, Donald, Goofy.
Hercules So where you guys headed next?
Sora Aw, you know... You two lovebirds seem to be getting along just fine without us hanging around.

cutscene.desc: Hercules and Meg look at each other, then separate, slightly embarrassed. Though, they can't stop looking back at each other and smiling

xml.sp: Donald Yeah, we gotta go.
Goofy Uh-huh, before we start meddlin'. A-hyuck!
Sora Right.
Phil walking over Are you turkeys trying to put me out of a job? If you keep acing every challenge, Champ, who am I gonna train?
Hercules Aw, you can't abandon me now, Phil! I gotta be at the top of my game in case Hades shows up again.
Donald enthusiastically Hey, are we true heroes yet?
Sora Yeah! C'mon, Phil, how 'bout it?

cutscene.desc: Sora points to himself. Phil strokes his goatee

xml.sp: Phil Lemme see now... Well, you're not wise enough...

cutscene.desc: Donald and Sora glare at him

xml.sp: Phil Not quite...seasoned enough...
Sora Okay, okay, we get the hint!
Phil Look, kid, it's not my call!
Donald Aw, phooey.
Phil Course if it was, you'd have no problem. I'd make you all heroes, in a heartbeat!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks at Donald, then back at Phil

xml.sp: Sora Really?
Donald Say it again!
Phil On second thought, if those are your true hero faces, you still got a lotta work to do.

cutscene.desc: He starts to walk away

xml.sp: Donald walking up alongside him Hey, what do you mean?
Phil Go away!

cutscene.desc: Phil starts to run back to the Coliseum, Donald in pursuit

xml.sp: Sora following behind Phil!
Phil Leave me alone!

cutscene.desc: Meg and Hercules look into the stars

xml.sp: Meg pointing See that?
Hercules Well, whaddaya know...

cutscene.desc: Donald and Sora stop and look. Phil stops running and is amazed at what he sees in the sky. Sora, Donald, and Goofy jump for joy as tears run down Phil's face. The stars in the sky have formed constellations of Sora, Donald, and Goofy, signifying them as true heroes. In the dungeon of Agrabah, the Peddler watches fearfully as large bouts of red smoke appear. The lamp is laying next to him and the coffin is open. Iago flies in and watches as Jafar emerges from the smoke, laughing

xml.sp: Iago Oh, NO!

cutscene.desc: The Peddler runs back to his shop, where Sora, Donald, and Goofy appear. Donald knocks into a vase, almost breaking it

xml.sp: Donald Wak!
Peddler You break it, you buy it! Oh! Hello there, friends.

cutscene.desc: They notice there's plenty of gold behind him

xml.sp: Sora Wow! You made out like a bandit!
Peddler Please...I am but an honest merchant. What you see is merely the reward for my hard work.
Goofy Gawrsh, they sure are nice.
Peddler And they're on sale! Interested?
Sora No thanks. Listen, have you seen a guy in a black coat? Someone from Organization XIII?
Peddler Who me? Most certainly not...
Sora Okay. We'll keep asking around, then.

cutscene.desc: Iago, Aladdin, and Abu enter the shop

xml.sp: Aladdin Sora! Don't let him get away!

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around and the Peddler has disappeared. Aladdin sighs

xml.sp: Sora What's going on?
Aladdin Can't believe it... That stupid peddler let Jafar out of the lamp!
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Jafar!?

cutscene.desc: They remember the events of fighting Jafar before

xml.sp: Jafar Give me the magic lamp, Aladdin.

cutscene.desc: He points his snake staff at Aladdin

xml.sp: Jafar And now, street rats, I bid you farewell.

cutscene.desc: He leaves with a swish of his cloak

xml.sp: Jafar commanding several Bandit Heartless Crush those urchins!

cutscene.desc: They remember his psychotic laugh

xml.sp: Aladdin You guys better be careful.
Donald Huh?
Aladdin I'm sure Jafar wants to take over Agrabah again, but I know he's out for revenge, too.
Sora I guess he's still sore about that whole lamp thing, huh.
Aladdin Iago was there when Jafar was released. Okay, Iago. Spill it.
Iago Hey! I told you everything I know!
Aladdin This is your one and only chance, Iago. If I find out later that you've been lying or hiding things from us, we're through. I'll never speak to you again!
Iago I can't take it! I know where Jafar is!
Goofy Where?
Iago Uh, er, I mean, that is, I, um... Ack! I really shouldn't...
Aladdin Iago!
Iago sighing He's in the desert ruins.
Sora Let's get the jump on him. Lead the way!

cutscene.desc: They proceed to the Palace Walls and see a windstorm at the desert ruins

xml.sp: Iago What a disaster! We're just gonna hafta turn back.
Aladdin There's gotta be a way...
Genie Aw, c'mon, kid, that's an easy one!

cutscene.desc: Genie flies through the air

xml.sp: Genie Al, ol' buddy, ol' pal!

cutscene.desc: He swings around Aladdin

xml.sp: Genie This is what having a genie for a best friend is all about! I mean, how can you leave me on the sidelines in a time like this!?

cutscene.desc: Genie vanishes, then reappears almost as big as the palace wall

xml.sp: Genie Live large! Wow 'em, Al!

cutscene.desc: His eyes bug out. He teleports back to Aladdin, but small this time

xml.sp: Genie Give 'em the old razzmatazz! What do ya say, kid?
Sora Hey, Genie!
Genie Sora!

cutscene.desc: Genie teleports again

xml.sp: Genie Wanna see a little something I call Sandstorm Sweep?
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Uh-huh!
Aladdin Take it away, Genie!
Genie Alakaza---uh... You know? One lousy sandstorm is just too easy.

cutscene.desc: He points a finger and magic twirls around to the sandstorm and it goes away. They're still amazed. Genie is missing

xml.sp: Genie How about giving me a challenge next time, eh Al?

cutscene.desc: They walk to the Sandswept Ruins, which are in a gigantic hole in the ground

xml.sp: Aladdin Now what do we do?

cutscene.desc: The carpet flies in and points to itself

xml.sp: Sora Nice timing, Carpet!

cutscene.desc: Sora board the carpet and Jafar's shadow appears near a ruin on the other side of the hole. He heads toward it. The shadow vanishes in red smoke and Heartless appear. He defeats the Heartless and the shadow reappears in an archway. He chases the shadow to the roof of a tower. The shadow vanishes in smoke again and more Heartless appear. He defeats the Heartless and a monument appears on the tower. Sora examines it and it shows three switches around the ruins. Sora triggers all the switches and the tower opens. Sora flies into the tower window. Sora, Donald, Goofy, Aladdin, and Iago proceed into the Ruined Chamber

xml.sp: Sora The game's up, Jafar!
Aladdin You sure this is it?
Donald Iago?

cutscene.desc: Iago flies to a stone

xml.sp: Iago Ya gotta understand. It wasn't my idea! It was Jafar. He made me bring you here. You don't know him like I do! He can be VERY convincing! He said if I didn't cooperate, he was gonna---
Aladdin Where is he?
Iago C'mon Al, you've gotta forgive me.
Aladdin scaring Iago Where's Jafar!?
Iago flying Well...um, let's see...right about now, he's probably attacking the palace. I had no choice! His eyes, they got all creepy and WEIRD!
Sora Whatever. Iago, you're supposed to be our friend. But you've been playing both sides, just to make sure you save yourself.
Donald I knew you were still a bad guy.
Iago I'm SORRY!

cutscene.desc: He flies into an urn, and triggers the ruins to collapse. The carpet flies in

xml.sp: Aladdin Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They fly out of the collapsing ruins and back to the Palace Walls. The carpet slumps to the ground

xml.sp: Aladdin Get some rest, Carpet. You earned it.
Iago C'mon, let's get Jafar!
Sora And who asked you?
Aladdin The palace is through there. Hurry!

cutscene.desc: They run into Agrabah and interrogate the Peddler

xml.sp: Peddler I guess you know everything now, eh?
Sora You can't keep shady stuff secret for long.

Peddler So true. I had just snuck into the Palace to, er, borrow some treasure when I heard this...voice. It said Release me, and I will give you an even greater reward. Who are you? I asked. The voice spoke again. The true Sultan of Agrabah, he said. Imprisoned by villains. Oh! Why did I believe such a tall, tall tale? Perhaps I was under Jafar's spell. Yes! That must be it!
Sora And I'm sure the treasure had nothing to do with it, right?
Peddler Maybe a bit. But Jafar, he never gave me a thing...
Sora So where did you get all your treasure?
Peddler Why, the man in the black coat, of course.
Sora Organization XIII!? I KNEW it!
Peddler The treasure was a gift, so I would tell no one about Jafar's return. He said he would destroy Jafar after turning him into a...Heartless. So there was no need to upset Agrabah.
Sora And you bought that?
Peddler I'm a merchant. And a good one, at that. I'll buy anything if the price is right. It would have been a successful transaction if I hadn't been seen...
Iago Oh, you're so kind...

cutscene.desc: They look at Iago, who looks down. They race to the Palace, where Jafar has Jasmine in chains

xml.sp: Jasmine Just wait, Jafar! You'll get exactly what's coming to you!
Jafar Indeed I will, Princess. All of Agrabah will belong to me, while you... You, my queen, shall weep at my side for all eternity!

cutscene.desc: She struggles at her chains

xml.sp: Jafar Oh, please...

cutscene.desc: He touches her chin

xml.sp: Jafar Right about now...your precious Aladdin is whispering your name, with his last breath.

cutscene.desc: Jasmine sees the group and gasps expectantly. Jafar turns around

xml.sp: Aladdin What was that you were saying, Jafar?

cutscene.desc: He looks away from them, as if disgusted. He sees Iago on Goofy's shoulder

xml.sp: Jafar You dare defy me! You useless bird!

cutscene.desc: His snake staff's eyes glow. He threatens Iago, Goofy covering him with his shield. Jafar switches his target to Aladdin shoots a beam of energy at him

xml.sp: Iago flying into the way Al!

cutscene.desc: Iago takes the hit and falls to the ground, unmoving

xml.sp: Goofy Iago!
Jafar You'll all be joining him...VERY soon!

cutscene.desc: Jafar glows with magical energy. Red smoke billows from behind him. He lifts up his hands and enters the smoke. Jafar changes into his genie form and grows enormous
Jafar rips off a tower from the palace and drops it over Sora and Aladdin

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!
Aladdin Run!

cutscene.desc: The carpet catches them and sweeps them away from the debris

xml.sp: Jafar All shall bend to my will! The world is mine to control!

cutscene.desc: Sora rides the magic carpet and fights Jafar

xml.sp: Jafar No... How can I be defeated again, by a pack of filthy street rats?
Sora Don't mess with street rats!

cutscene.desc: Jafar explodes in a burst of magic and his lamp melts away. Genie appears

xml.sp: Genie You went mano a mano with Jafar, and you didn't invite me, Al?
Aladdin Sorry, Genie. Things happened kinda fast.
Genie turning around And I had some new moves to show off, too...
Donald But, Genie, we still need your help!
Sora Who's gonna fix Agrabah?
Genie Oh, yeah! One super-duper spruced-up Agrabah comin' right up! You won't even recognize the place when I'm through with it!
Aladdin Just like it was, please.
Genie Really? Same old same old?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Aladdin nod

xml.sp: Genie All right.

cutscene.desc: He swings his arms

xml.sp: Genie Ooh, yeah!

cutscene.desc: Magic flies around everywhere restoring the buildings of Agrabah

xml.sp: Genie Et voila! Next time let me put in a few swimming pools, 'kay?

cutscene.desc: Aladdin stretches

xml.sp: Sora I guess Agrabah's all right now.
Aladdin Yeah! Thanks, guys.
Sora to Iago Hey, you behave yourself, got it?
Iago I most definitely got it! No more lookin' out for number one. I'm reformed! I wanna be a good friend, like Genie, but I can't do anything to help you. What kind of a friend is that?
Sora Oh, no---it's not like that, Iago. Friends don't have to do stuff. As long as you have fun hanging out together, that's all that matters.
Aladdin So...what do you guys do for fun?
Donald making a funny face with Goofy We do this!
Aladdin Uh...that's not quite what I meant...
Sora Well, anyway...
Iago Ow, my beak...
Goofy Gawrsh, Iago. I hope ya didn't hurt yourself.
Iago Well...at least I can still fly.

cutscene.desc: Goofy walks beneath Iago to catch him if he falls, but he doesn't watch where he's going

xml.sp: Donald Look out!

cutscene.desc: He crashes into a market stand

xml.sp: Genie Ooh! Was that my cue? Am I on? C'mon, Al, lemme build a freeway or something!
Aladdin Everything's fine. Don't panic...

cutscene.desc: They see magic flying around

xml.sp: Aladdin Genie!
Genie But I can't hold it any longer!

cutscene.desc: Genie spins around in the air

xml.sp: Genie laughing Oh, that's good! Sora! Donald! Goofy! You guys are too much! If you're ever in the mood for some more cosmic razzle dazzle, gimme a shout, okay?
Donald You got it!
Aladdin Well, you've done it again, Sora. Don't forget about us, okay?
Sora I won't.
Aladdin And Sora...about that friend of yours, the one you're looking for... You'll find him. Trust me.

cutscene.desc: He places his hands on Sora's shoulders as magic falls everywhere. In his lab, Dr. Finkelstein is still working on his latest creation. He pulls the switch and the lab table erupts with electricity. It swirls around inside his robot, but the machine just sits there. The doctor spins around in his wheelchair

xml.sp: Finkelstein There's nothing wrong with my design---it's flawless. There must be something wrong with the parts those imbeciles brought me. I need to find better assistants.

cutscene.desc: He rolls over to the desk, where the familiar heart-shaped container is located. The experiment's head turns to look at him. The doctor thinks he hears something and considers moving his wheelchair. He whirls it around suddenly when something attacks him. Sora, Donald, and Goofy arrive in the Hinterlands and see dozens of presents scattered around the forest floor

xml.sp: Donald Huh?

cutscene.desc: Jack, still in his Sandy Claws outfit, is picking them up

xml.sp: Jack Perfect timing, gentlemen! Lend me a hand, won't you? These presents must belong to Sandy Claws. So I thought I'd better return them.
Sora crossing his arms You just happened to find them?
Jack Of course, Sora. I'm finished with Christmas fantasies. You know that.
Sora But...You thought you'd hold on to the suit?
Jack What, this? It's just a costume. And Sally worked so very hard making it! Come on. We've got work to do!

cutscene.desc: They walk to Santa's House with the presents

xml.sp: Santa Oh!

cutscene.desc: They place them on the table

xml.sp: Santa Wherever did you find these?

cutscene.desc: He takes the present from Jack's hands

xml.sp: Jack In Halloween Town. You'll be needing them for Christmas, right, Sandy?
Santa Of course. But these are just a few of the Christmas presents that were stolen.
Sora Stolen!?

cutscene.desc: They look at Jack, who scratches his head

xml.sp: Jack Oh, Sandy... You don't think it was ME?
Santa Still wearing the outfit, I see.
Jack I just thought I'd dress for the occasion. But if you don't believe me, then we'll just have to find out who really did it!
Santa Very well, I'll leave it to you.
Jack All right, Sora, Donald, Goofy! We're off!

cutscene.desc: He points to the door and starts to leave. Sora, Donald, and Goofy slump in defeat. They hear a crash from the Toy Factory. They run to the second floor Wrapping Room and find Lock, Shock, and Barrel in amongst the toys

xml.sp: Shock No!

cutscene.desc: Lock tosses away a sailboat. Barrel looks at a stuffed bear

xml.sp: Barrel This looks good.
Shock No!
Lock Boooring!

cutscene.desc: Barrel tosses the bear away

xml.sp: Lock This one?
Shock No!
Barrel No way!
Donald Hey!

cutscene.desc: The three miscreants look up and see them

xml.sp: Sora So YOU three took them!
Shock Took what?
Jack You stole the presents, didn't you!
Lock It wasn't us!
Barrel But...
Shock taking off her mask It really sounds like fun!

cutscene.desc: She puts her mask back on and they start to run away

xml.sp: Lock, Shock, & Barrel Run for it!

cutscene.desc: Sora quickly locks the kids in boxes, then interrogates them

xml.sp: Sora Where'd you put the presents?
Shock We told you! We don't have 'em!
Donald Then why are you in here!?
Lock We're looking for parts for the experiment.
Jack Experiment?
Lock Dr. Finkelstein's making us a friend!
Barrel One we get to boss around!
Jack It's true the doctor's been hard at work making SOMETHING lately...
Lock Besides, Christmas presents are boring. Not scary or gross... So what good are they?
Barrel Yeah!
Lock There's nothing fun here. Let's go back to Halloween Town!

cutscene.desc: The three of them leave. Sora, Donald, Jack, and Goofy meet with Santa Claus

xml.sp: Santa So, were those pranksters responsible for taking the gifts?
Jack It doesn't look like it.
Santa Then that means...

cutscene.desc: Sally runs in

xml.sp: Jack Sally!
Sally Oh, thank goodness! You're all here.
Sora Is something wrong?
Sally The Heartless are back in the town square. I thought you should know.
Sora That's our cue!
Donald Back to Halloween Town!

cutscene.desc: They start to leave

xml.sp: Jack But wait! What about finding the gift-napper?
Sally Actually... The Heartless were playing with some presents when I saw them...
Jack pointing Aha! We have our culprits!

cutscene.desc: They run to Halloween Town Square and find the Mayor yelling at the Heartless

xml.sp: Mayor You! You can't be here! Leave Halloween Town, by order of the mayor!

cutscene.desc: The Heartless are busy playing with presents

xml.sp: Mayor Somebody? Anybody! I'm only an elected official---I can't handle this by myself.
Jack Sally was right. We've got to get the presents!

cutscene.desc: Sora gets out his Keyblade and defeats the Heartless, retrieving the presents. Jack sees an open present lying on the ground, though, he steps on the doll and picks up the box

xml.sp: Jack What a shame! It looks like it was such a nice present.
Sora seeing the doll beneath Jack's boot Uh, Jack---

cutscene.desc: The door to Dr. Finkelstein's lab opens and the doctor wheels himself out, rubbing his head

xml.sp: Finkelstein Oh, help! Someone help me! My latest experiment is gone---it's been stolen!

cutscene.desc: They follow the doctor inside

xml.sp: Finkelstein I was just sitting here brainstorming, when all of a sudden I was attacked! I collapsed! And when I awoke, my experiment was gone!
Jack Don't worry, Doctor---we know who took it.
Finkelstein Who!?
Sora The Heartless.

cutscene.desc: Donald nods

xml.sp: Finkelstein What, those wretched things? Preposterous! This was nothing like a Heartless.
Sora Not the Heartless, huh...
Donald Who else could it be?
Jack Say, I have an idea. The thief must like Christmas presents. So... We place irresistible gifts about to draw him into a trap.
Finkelstein And this miscreant is the same one who stole my experiment?
Jack That's right.
Sora How will we know for sure?
Jack Well, now, that's easy! We'll scare a confession right out of him!
Goofy Gawrsh...
Sora What do you say we go with Jack's plan...just for now?
Jack Let's get to Sandy's house posthaste! We've got to make some Christmas presents, quickly!

cutscene.desc: They return to Santa's House

xml.sp: Santa Have you found the presents yet?
Jack Almost, Mr. Claws!
Sora We're going to reel in the thief with Christmas presents as bait.
Jack Would you mind if we used your factory to create a few presents?
Santa Presents as bait? Goodness...I don't like the sound of that.

cutscene.desc: Jack scratches his head

xml.sp: Santa Just this once, I suppose. It's for a good cause... All right, use the second floor. And put some heart in it.

cutscene.desc: They ascend the stairs in the Toy Factory to the Wrapping Room and find an elf

xml.sp: Elf You're going to make presents, right? You can use this machine.
Sora Let's make it!

cutscene.desc: They quickly make 100 decoy presents

xml.sp: Donald All done!
Jack Not quite.
Goofy There's more?
Jack Don't worry, I'll take care of the rest.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to Santa's House

xml.sp: Santa Did you finish making the presents?
Sora Yup, just waiting for Jack.
Goofy So, uh, where do you think we oughta leave them?
Santa Oh, I know a good spot. Whenever you're ready just say the word.
Jack walking in I'm back!
Santa Now then, are you all set?
Sora Yes. Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They walk outside to Candy Cane Lane, where Santa unlocks the doors to the Christmas Tree Plaza

xml.sp: Santa This plaza should work well for your plan. Now, Jack...what IS your plan?
Jack I've got it all figured out.
Santa You do...
Jack Of course! And I also have a wonderful idea. If we catch the thief for you, I would be honored to deliver the---
Sora covering Jack's mouth And on that note, we'll be going.
Jack What are you doing? Let me go!

cutscene.desc: They lead Jack to the plaza. Sora let's go of Jack's mouth and pats Jack's shoulder. Jack looks unhappy. After they enter the Christmas Tree Plaza...

xml.sp: Donald Stop kicking!
Goofy It's not me, Donald.
Jack Patience, friends.
Sora Shhh!

cutscene.desc: There are dozens of presents scattered around one giant present with a bow. Donald scuffles around inside the box

xml.sp: Donald I said cut it out!
Goofy Gawrsh, was that you?
Sora How come we have to be the bait?
Jack Good plan, eh?
Donald Ouch!

cutscene.desc: Dr. Finkelstein's experiment seems to be walking on it's own towards the presents. It picks up one and sees the giant one. It walks closer. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Jack pop out of the box

xml.sp: Sora Gotcha!

cutscene.desc: They see only the experiment

xml.sp: Jack Huh?

cutscene.desc: It twirls it's arm around

xml.sp: Jack Doctor Finkelstein's experiment did it!

cutscene.desc: They fight the doctor's experiment

xml.sp: Jack We did it! The mystery is solved!

cutscene.desc: Santa arrives in his sleigh

xml.sp: Santa Did you catch the thief?
Jack Naturally!
Sora I just can't figure out why the doctor's experiment would go around stealing Christmas presents.
Santa His experiment?
Jack The thief! It was a moving puppet made by Doctor Finkelstein.

Santa walking up to it Hmm... The doctor's made a moving puppet? I see... He is always tinkering with things. Now listen, Jack. I'd like to thank you, and while delivering presents is something only I can do, I can give you an idea of what it's like.
Jack ecstatic Sandy Claws!

cutscene.desc: He leaps into the sleigh

xml.sp: Santa Yes, all that poor puppet wanted was a heart.

cutscene.desc: Jack rides off in the sleigh

xml.sp: Jack Ho! Ho! Ho!

cutscene.desc: They return to Halloween Town Square

xml.sp: Finkelstein Interesting! So the puppet wasn't stolen after all! It ran away on its own! In other words, my experiment was an overwhelming success!
Sora Santa Claus thinks maybe it left because it was trying to find a heart.

cutscene.desc: Donald nods

xml.sp: Finkelstein That's quite possible. Unlike my Sally, it wasn't equipped with a heart.

cutscene.desc: The doctor spins his wheelchair around and rides off

xml.sp: Sora But if it wanted a heart, why was it going around stealing all those Christmas presents?
Sally Maybe because...presents are a way to give your heart to someone special.
Sora Hmm...when you put it that way, I feel sort of bad for it.

cutscene.desc: The hear the sound of ringing bells and Jack drops out of the sky. They see Santa in his sleigh flying up near the moon

xml.sp: Santa Happy Halloween!

cutscene.desc: It starts to snow

xml.sp: Sally What a nice present.
Jack I don't understand. There's no box! No ribbon tied in a bow!
Sora Jack, it's not about the box or the ribbons. It's about what's inside the box!
Sally No, Sora. What really counts---what's really special---is the act of giving the gift. To wish deep in your heart to make someone else happy.
Jack Right...of course! Thank you, Sally, you're absolutely right. Wait! What's this? I feel so strange...so very happy!
Goofy Jack, that must be Sally's present!
Jack Really? This wonderful feeling?

cutscene.desc: He takes her hands in his

xml.sp: Jack Oh, Sally! You've given me the nicest present in the world! And I've nothing to give you in return. What would you like? Just name it. Absolutely anything.
Sally The nicest present I could ever ask for, Jack, is just to be with you.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy are feeling a little bashful

xml.sp: Jack You don't even have to ask for that.

cutscene.desc: Jack picks Sally up and jumps. They dance, hand in hand

xml.sp: Sora Maybe I never gave her a real present after all.
Donald Who?
Goofy Aw, I bet Kairi would like most anything you gave her.
Sora I know. That's what made it so hard to decide.
Donald It's not the gift, it's what's in your heart!
Sora My heart...
Donald You bet, Kairi's like Sally!
Sora How?
Goofy Well, as long as she can be with you, what else does she need?

cutscene.desc: They watch as Jack and Sally dance. Sora pictures himself and Kairi dancing, Kairi laughing. Sora smiles and chuckles. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Gummi Ship. Sora pilots the Gummi Ship back to the Pride Lands. They walk through the Savannah and run into Shenzi, Banzai, and Ed

xml.sp: Shenzi Oh, it's you guys. Man, we were hoping you were a meal.
Sora Hiya!
Banzai Don't gimme any of that hiya stuff! Thanks to you clowns, we're back to scavenging scraps for a living.

cutscene.desc: Ed laughs

xml.sp: Shenzi C'mon, it's not that bad. I enjoyed that week-dead elephant we had yesterday.
Sora Hey, how's Simba?

cutscene.desc: Shenzi laughs

xml.sp: Banzai We gotta laugh every time we hear that dude's name.
Shenzi Ooh. Say it again!
Banzai Simba!
Shenzi laughing One more time!
Banzai Simba!

cutscene.desc: Shenzi laughs

xml.sp: Banzai Simba!

cutscene.desc: All three laugh

xml.sp: Sora That's enough!
Shenzi Go on then, see for yourself. Simba is one wishy-washy king.

cutscene.desc: They walk away

xml.sp: Banzai Yeah, I bet about now, even some of those high and mighty lionesses were wishin' they'd gotten themselves a different king.
Goofy Gawrsh, whaddya think coulda happened?
Sora Well, let's go find Simba and see.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy reach Pride Rock and see a large darkness. An image of Scar appears through the darkness

xml.sp: Sora Scar!?

cutscene.desc: He runs to it, but it disappears

xml.sp: Sora Huh?
Donald A ghost?
Goofy We better tell Simba about this. Wonder if he's up there...

cutscene.desc: They proceed up Pride Rock

xml.sp: Lioness Have you come to see Simba?
Sora We saw Scar's ghost!

Lioness An omen like that could only be foretelling the end of our pride. Yet... King Simba won't do a thing. I guess just being the son of the great King Mufasa doesn't necessarily mean he's ready to rule the kingdom himself.
Sora Trust me, Simba will think of something.
Lioness The time for thinking is past. We need him to take action---as his father would have done. He ruled with courage and pride. I remember it like yesterday... The mighty Mufasa...
Sora Simba'll do all that, too. You'll see!
Lioness I'm not so sure.

cutscene.desc: The lioness leaves

xml.sp: Sora Wait here. I want to talk to Simba.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy enter the King's Den

xml.sp: Simba You came back...
Donald Are you okay?
Goofy You don't look so good.
Sora Hey, Simba. Why don't we team up and do something about that Scar ghost? Seems like everybody's worried about it. So, now's your big chance to show 'em what you're really made of!
Simba growling That doesn't concern you!

cutscene.desc: He calms down when he sees their worried faces

xml.sp: Simba Sorry...
Sora It's okay.
Simba I just wish I knew what my father would do.
Goofy But he's not here, Simba. It's all up to you now. And that means the important thing is what you're gonna do being the king. Not what your father woulda done.
Simba So you're saying...it's all up to me...
Sora See, there ya go!
Timon & Pumbaa Exactly!

Timon We know your dad was a great king, and all. But now it's your turn. Remember what I taught ya. You gotta put the past behind you. It's time to go out there and show everybody things are gonna be just fine!
Sora Yeah, you can do it!
Timon You gotta live for today!
Pumbaa swinging his head And find your own path!
Simba Live for today... And find my own path... not my father's...
Sora That's it!
Nala walking up to him I'm glad to hear you say that, Simba.
Donald Nala!
Nala Promise me you'll help Simba any way you can.
Timon As long as Sora handles the dangerous parts!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Nala I'm counting on you, Simba...and so is our baby.

cutscene.desc: Simba and the others stand defiantly

xml.sp: Timon Great! Now we're going to have to babysit!

cutscene.desc: They laugh

xml.sp: Simba Let's go see Rafiki first. I'm sure he'll be able to tell us something about that ghost.

cutscene.desc: They walk to the Stone Hollow

xml.sp: Rafiki Oh ho ho! The king---he is ready to be king?
Simba I think so.
Sora Can you tell us about Scar's ghost?
Rafiki Oh, yes...the ghost. A being with no body. It is created when the evil heart of Scar meets the hesitating heart of Simba.
Simba Hesitating?
Rafiki Ohhhh... You thought you were not?
Goofy Gawrsh, that ghost sounds just like a Heartless.
Sora Hmm, I don't know.

Rafiki You're right, you don't. But you do know it is upsetting. And it is upsetting the hearts of everybody in the Pride Lands. You may not know what it is, but it still IS. This world, it is full of many such things. And these things, a king must face. It is the test that has been set for you, Simba.
Simba That's all? Come on. You have to tell us more about the ghost...
Rafiki No, not today! But the hyenas in the elephant graveyard may know more. Does not matter, though. There is little the Simba of late can do.
Sora Aw, don't say that! Not when he's ready to try!
Rafiki In his head, perhaps...but what about his heart?
Simba Forget it, Sora. Let's head for the elephant graveyard.

cutscene.desc: They run across the Savannah and enter the Elephant Graveyard and see several fires and the hyenas

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!
Donald Hey you!
Banzai Aw, c'mon, can't you guys just leave us alone?
Simba Do you three know anything about Scar's ghost?
Shenzi Huh? Scar's ghost?

cutscene.desc: Ed laughs

xml.sp: Banzai Maaaybe.
Sora You DO know.

cutscene.desc: The hyenas run throughout the graveyard, just waiting to be caught

xml.sp: Banzai Oh no... I guess you caught us ALL.
Shenzi What're we gonna do?

cutscene.desc: Ed laughs

xml.sp: Simba Tell me about Scar's ghost!
Banzai Sorrrry. We don't know nothin'.
Shenzi Ooh, wait! It's coming back to me! That's the one who only hangs out around fraidy cats. Right, Banzai?
Simba Enough!

cutscene.desc: Ed laughs as the ghost appears behind them

xml.sp: Banzai And there it is.
Shenzi Must be a fraidy cat around here somewhere!
Sora Simba! Do something!
Scar How does it feel to be king, hmm? Why, you must be a truly inspiring ruler by now.

cutscene.desc: Simba starts to back away

xml.sp: Scar After all, you ARE the son of the great Mufasa.

cutscene.desc: Simba runs away

xml.sp: Sora Where are you going?
Scar Ah, Simba...running away as always.
Sora Simba!

cutscene.desc: The ghost vanishes. The three hyenas laugh and leave

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, Rafiki was right.
Sora You mean, Simba's still unsure?
Goofy Seems like. Do ya think there's some way we can help?
Sora Hmm... We should start by talking to Simba some more. Let's head back to the Pride Lands.

cutscene.desc: They return to Pride Rock

xml.sp: Nala Where's Simba?
Sora Well, uh...
Rafiki Oh ho ho! He ran away! I knew it would not be easy for him. To face his fears, he must go somewhere where the only thing to think of is what to do, not what others think of him.
Sora Why didn't you just say so?
Donald But where's Simba now?
Timon Hey, I know! He's at the oasis. It's our favorite hangout!
Sora Got it! Let's check it out.
Pumbaa I'll lead the way!
Timon Oh, no you won't! Simba'll smell you coming a mile away. And if he's smart, he'll run for the hills!
Pumbaa Oh...right.

cutscene.desc: They hurry to the Jungle. Simba is dreaming in the Oasis. He wakes up suddenly

xml.sp: Simba Father...
Scar Hmm. It seems even your daddy's abandoned you. How sad.

cutscene.desc: Simba whirls around and growls. Sora, Donald, and Goofy walk in and see Simba with the ghost. Simba is backing away toward the cliff, the ghost pressing forward. A very familiar scene

xml.sp: Sora Simba!

cutscene.desc: They run up and the ghost vanishes

xml.sp: Simba It's no use. I'll never be the king my father was.

Sora But Simba... That's not what you're supposed to be. You can't be Mufasa. You can only be you. Everybody believes in you as a king. They just want to see what you'll do. And if anyone's saying they liked your father better, it's because you haven't done much yet. That's all.
Simba I know that.
Sora Then stop moping and DO something!
Simba I can't!
Sora ...Fine.
Donald Let's go, Sora.
Sora Yeah. Why stick around if he's not even gonna try?

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald start to leave. Goofy stays there

xml.sp: Sora C'mon Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Goofy slowly follows them. The ghost appears again. Sora, Donald, and Goofy hide behind a log

xml.sp: Sora as the ghost The hesitant king will one day lose all his friends.
Donald as the ghost King Simba the doubtful...
Goofy as the ghost Worried by a silly ol' ghost...
Sora as the ghost Ooh, Simba the do-nothing king...

cutscene.desc: Simba glares at the ghost

xml.sp: Simba No!
Donald as the ghost Try and stop me!

cutscene.desc: Simba leaps at Scar's ghost and it vanishes. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run in

xml.sp: Sora You did it! The ghost is gone!
Donald We knew you could do it!
Goofy Hooray for Simba!
Simba You know, I'm really lucky to have friends who'll stand by me...and help me see clearly. My father...wasn't so fortunate.
Sora There you go again.

Simba I mean... Everyone here, and in the Pride Lands, wants me to succeed. Sora, Donald, and Goofy. Pumbaa, Timon, Rafiki...Nala. You all want what's best for me. But my father always had Scar lurking behind his back, trying to cut him down. I've got to make the most of my blessings, and rebuild this kingdom.
Sora Are you gonna say it, or do it?
Simba Wait and see.
Timon Simba!

cutscene.desc: Timon runs in

xml.sp: Timon Simba! Come quick! There's a bazillion ghosts of Scar haunting the Pride Lands! Everybody but Nala high-tailed it out of there. And now she needs your help.

cutscene.desc: Simba starts to run back to Pride Rock

xml.sp: Timon Our little Simba...all grown up and finding his place in the world...
Simba Nice try. You're coming, too!

cutscene.desc: The rest of them join Simba and they run back to the Pride Lands. Pumbaa is standing between Nala and Scar's ghost in total fright

xml.sp: Sora We're here!
Nala Where's Simba?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy turn around, bowing as Simba walks through them

xml.sp: Simba I've come back, Nala.

cutscene.desc: The ghost walks toward Simba and stares at him

xml.sp: Simba Get out!

cutscene.desc: The ghost disappears

xml.sp: Sora Way to go, Simba!

cutscene.desc: Simba and Nala embrace, until dark energy clashes in the Savannah

xml.sp: Simba Are you with me?
Sora Now and forever, Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy bow. They run to the Savannah. The dark energy gathers and forms an unbelievably large Heartless, the Groundshaker. Sora and Simba defeat the large Heartless and it disappears. Later, they meet on Pride Rock

xml.sp: Sora Simba seems fine now.
Rafiki Ha! The king has returned! The Pride Lands will not forget King Simba's courage. Or the courage of those who fought beside him.
Simba Do you think your quest will ever be over?
Sora I don't know... But I think, as long as the Keyblade stays with me... I'll have to keep fighting.
Rafiki Ahh... The struggle never ends. That is the great Circle of Life.
Sora Never ever?
Rafiki The secret to victory...is a strong heart.

cutscene.desc: He points to the sky. They look up

xml.sp: Rafiki Go on, go on, go---go then!

cutscene.desc: He laughs

xml.sp: Rafiki Go on, get out! Yes, yes! It is time! Your fight continues...

cutscene.desc: He holds up his staff

xml.sp: Sora Till we meet again, Your Majesty.
Simba I hope that's soon.
Sora It will be! So long!

cutscene.desc: Timon and Pumbaa nod. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run down the side of Pride Rock. Beneath the lion painting in the Stone Hollow, now there is three more, a lion cub, a duck, and a dog. Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Gummi Ship. They fly to Disney Castle at the behest of Chip and Dale and meet them in the Hall of the Cornerstone

xml.sp: Chip Oh, Sora! You're here!
Dale Something bad has happened! They turn and see a large dark portal in the wall behind the Cornerstone of Light. The portal pulses with energy
Chip Look! The Cornerstone of Light! Before you know it, it'll be surrounded!
Dale I think it could lead somewhere, but...
Goofy Do ya think it's connected to that door to the past?
Donald It could be a trap made by Organization XIII.
Sora Either way, we should probably check it out.

cutscene.desc: They enter the portal and arrive on a barren world covered in pillars of stone. The dry ground cracks under their feet as they look around. Sand blows in the wind, revealing an armored figure kneeling on the ground. A Keyblade stands plunged into the ground before it, allowing the man to lean against it. The cape of the figure blows softly in the breeze and all is silent for several moments until the figure speaks
Sora, Donald, and Goofy ready their weapons as the figure remains unmoving

xml.sp: ????? A Keyblade? Who are you? I know you. We've met before, way back when. No, that wasn't you. You're not the one I chose. Where is he? Xe...ha...nort... Is that you? Xeha...nort... Xehanort!

cutscene.desc: The figure puts a foot forward and stands upright. He grabs the Keyblade's handle with his right arm and pulls it slowly from the dry soil. They engage in battle with the Lingering Sentiment until he stands facing them again

xml.sp: ????? That's it. Your power. That's what I felt within you.

cutscene.desc: Without another word, he plunges his Keyblade into the ground and kneels against it. Unable to retrieve any more answers from this place, Sora, Donald, and Goofy return to the Gummi Ship and fly to Hollow Bastion, where Heartless are running around

xml.sp: Sora Wait a sec...I thought everything was supposed to be under control here!

cutscene.desc: The town's defense system starts up

xml.sp: Donald Hey, look!
Sora Must be Organization XIII again. We better go see Leon.
Scrooge Bless me bagpipes! I did it! I recreated Sea-Salt Ice Cream!
Donald Mmm! Can we try some?
Scrooge Of course!

cutscene.desc: He hands an ice cream bar to Donald, who takes a lick

xml.sp: Donald Oh boy! This is good!

cutscene.desc: Goofy and Sora also have some

xml.sp: Sora So salty!
Goofy But sweet!
Scrooge Aye. It's unique! When I was a lad, all the kids were crazy for it.

cutscene.desc: They continue to the Borough. One of the security system devices speeds past Donald, almost hitting him. Several Strafer Heartless appear. After defeating them, the door to Merlin's House opens and Yuffie walks out

xml.sp: Yuffie Come on in!
Sora Wait just a second... What happened to this place?
Goofy Didn't that Heartless look like the ones from Tron's world?
Yuffie C'mon, just get inside!

cutscene.desc: They follow her into the house, where Cid is typing at the computer

xml.sp: Yuffie Hurry up, Cid!
Cid Give me a second!
Merlin Confound it! Hurry!
Cid Why, you...!
Sora What's going on?
Cid turning around Talk about yer good timin'!
Yuffie The MCP is wreaking havoc inside the computer.
Donald Not again!
Cid Accordin' to Leon, anyway... He went on over to Ansem's study to find out what all the ruckus was about.

cutscene.desc: Leon and Aerith walk into the Study. Leon enters the passageway to the computer room, and runs to the railing, looking down over the Heartless Manufactory. He runs into the computer room and types at the keyboard. The metal side door opens. Leon walks down into the Heartless Manufactory, where the machine's lasers are sending out Heartless

xml.sp: Cid Turns out the MCP is using the data in that computer to crank out Heartless.

cutscene.desc: The Heartless speed off and Leon swipes them with his Gunblade. He runs back into the computer room. More Heartless appear in the Borough

xml.sp: Cid The MCP's been messin' around with the town's control system, too.

cutscene.desc: An alarm sounds, as Aerith and Leon stand in the computer room. The computer screen reads: Ignorant users. Obey the MCP. Leon types on the keyboard, looking for a solution

xml.sp: Yuffie That MCP sure doesn't know when to quit, does it?
Cid That's a computer program for ya.
Sora How's Tron doing?
Yuffie We can't reach him. We figure he must have been forced onto the game grid.
Cid And it don't sound like a particularly fun game, either.
Donald Awww...
Sora We'll go check on Tron.
Cid Thanks, kid. We're puttin' together an MCP Eradication program. I got a hunch it's almost finished, too.
Merlin Well, I hope your hunch is right for once!

cutscene.desc: Cid gives Merlin a look

xml.sp: Yuffie Listen, we're gonna need Tron's help when that Eradicator's completed...
Sora Don't sweat it. We'll make sure to tell Tron!
Merlin Remember, boys---we're counting on you.
Sora Roger!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod. The three proceed to the Postern

xml.sp: Yuna Liars!
Sora Wha---?
Rikku Leon doesn't have any treasure!
Paine And we fought for you guys.
Goofy Donald...?
Donald Well, I had to tell them something!
Yuna I don't see how we're gonna work this out.
Sora So what should we do?

cutscene.desc: They turn around and talk amongst themselves. Sora, Donald, and Goofy wait. Eventually, they return

xml.sp: Yuna We're just going to take YOUR treasure.
Sora But we don't have anything!
Paine You sure?

cutscene.desc: Rikku floats over and inspects Sora

xml.sp: Rikku Hmm...let's take a look!

cutscene.desc: She searches Donald

xml.sp: Rikku Mm-hmm...

cutscene.desc: She looks over Goofy

xml.sp: Rikku Oooh!

cutscene.desc: She flies over to Yuna

xml.sp: Rikku Hey, Yunie. I took a look, and sure enough...

cutscene.desc: She whispers something in Yuna's ear

xml.sp: Yuna Okay, we've decided! The Gullwings are taking all your items!
Sora You gotta be kidding me!
Yuna Oh, foofie.
Rikku This stinks!
Paine So not cool...
Sora Look, sorry we tricked you, but...
Paine Forget about it. Leon told us the whole story. He said your journey's been pretty rough.
Yuna So it wouldn't really be right if we took your things.
Rikku We'll root for you. Here, this is from us.

cutscene.desc: She lifts her hand and a treasure chest appears

xml.sp: Yuna Bye! Good luck on your journey!

cutscene.desc: The three fairies pose together and disappear. Sora opens the treasure chest and finds the Gull Wing Keychain. They continue to Ansem's Study. Leon hears someone enter and whirls around with his Gunblade

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, it's only us!

cutscene.desc: He puts the blade down as they walk in further

xml.sp: Aerith You can't talk to Tron if this room gets taken over.
Leon Did you check in with Cid?
Sora Uh-huh.
Leon And the Eradicator?
Donald It's almost done.
Aerith Great! Say, Leon, why don't you go work with Cid? I have this place under control.
Leon Are you sure? All by yourself...?

cutscene.desc: Aerith gives him a miffed look

xml.sp: Leon ...Er, sorry. It's all yours.
Sora How's Tron?
Leon We still can't get in touch with him. Maybe you guys should give it a shot.
Sora No, we'll go talk to him in person.
Leon Then I have a favor to ask. When you find Tron, could you tell him to come to the I/O tower? That's where we'll upload the MCP Eradication program.
Goofy The I/O tower. Got it!
Leon Thanks. And watch your backs.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks up the computer, it's threat message still displayed on the screen

xml.sp: Sora We'll be there soon, Tron.

cutscene.desc: He accesses the computer and they are transported to the Pit Cell. All around Space Paranoids, Heartless are walking around

xml.sp: Goofy Gawrsh, I hope Tron's okay.
Sora Me, too. Let's head for the game grid.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over to the computer terminal

xml.sp: Sora Great! The terminal works!
Donald Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They access the game grid. Leon enters Merlin's House, where Cid is typing away

xml.sp: Leon Finished?
Cid Would be, if it weren't for the old loon's magic.
Merlin OLD loon you say!?
Cid I'm tryin' to work here!
Merlin pointing his wand at Cid Oh ho-ho-ho, I'll show you who's old!

cutscene.desc: Merlin creates a spell on his wand. Cid types in the last of the program code and the disk pops out

xml.sp: Cid catching the disk Done!

cutscene.desc: Merlin's spell hits the keyboard and knocks Cid to the floor. Cid holds up the disk, while on the floor

xml.sp: Cid There you go, Leon.

cutscene.desc: He stands up

xml.sp: Cid One homemade program. A loony wizard special.

cutscene.desc: He gives the disk to Leon

xml.sp: Merlin tapping his wand on his hand This had better work.
Leon I'm off.
Merlin Be on your guard!

cutscene.desc: He looks at Cid, who back away slowly with his hands in sight. Leon nods and walks out when Cid's keyboard bursts into flames. Sora, Donald, and Goofy arrive at the game grid. Sora sees Tron amongst Heartless running everywhere

xml.sp: Sora Tron!

cutscene.desc: Tron throws his Identity Disk at one of them

xml.sp: Tron Careful...! Watch out!

cutscene.desc: A Devastator Heartless shoots a ball of energy at Tron. Tron catches his Identity Disk, and the ball knocks Tron to the ground

xml.sp: Sora Hold on!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Heartless and return to the Pit Cell

xml.sp: Tron You really saved me.
Sora Don't mention it!
Donald What's going on here?
Tron The MCP is ready to wage all-out war against the Users. What's been happening on the outside?

Sora Well, there's this machine for making Heartless---it's gone totally berserk... The town's control system is having problems, too. But Cid's putting together a program that can de-rezz the MCP. Once we pick it up at the I/O tower, he thinks we can use it to stop the MCP for good.
Tron Let's try it!
Sora Great!
Tron So who's this Cid?
Sora He's a friend of ours. Leon, Merlin, Aerith, Yuffie... They're all on the outside worrying about you, Tron.
Tron I must have a lot of User friends.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Goofy That program oughta be done by now, don'tcha think?
Donald To the tower!
