Tron Let's go!

cutscene.desc: They run through the Canyon and take a transport to the I/O Tower. Leon runs through the Restoration Site cleaving through Heartless to get the disk to the Postern. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Tron run through the Hallway of the I/O Tower

xml.sp: Tron Almost there!

cutscene.desc: Heartless appear

xml.sp: Sora Outta the way!

cutscene.desc: They defeat the Heartless and head for the Communications Room. Leon hurries into the computer room and types on the keyboard

xml.sp: MCP Warning. User control is terminated indefinitely.

cutscene.desc: Leon struggles with the computer. He pounds his fists on the keyboard

xml.sp: Leon No good!
Aerith Leon, let me try.

cutscene.desc: He hands her the disk. She nods

xml.sp: MCP This is your final warning. Stop at once.

cutscene.desc: Aerith walks to the drive and inserts the disk

xml.sp: Aerith Bon appetit! Don't talk with your mouth full.
MCP What...what are you loading?

cutscene.desc: Aerith celebrates and Leon crosses his arms. In the Communications Room, they stand around the center system

xml.sp: Tron Nothing's come in yet.
Sora Leon! Come onnn!

cutscene.desc: The system lights up and Tron smiles

xml.sp: Tron There!
Sora All right!

cutscene.desc: Tron jumps up onto the system and takes off his Identity Disk from his back. He holds it and it glows. It floats upwards into the glowing system, then returns to Tron with the program inside. Tron looks at the disk

xml.sp: Goofy What's it like?
Tron This is very strange...
Donald That's Merlin's magic!
Tron Huh? There's a power booster for me! And flight routines for the solar sailer!
Sora Meaning...we're set?

cutscene.desc: Tron jumps off the system

xml.sp: Tron Well, like you Users say... we won't know till we give it a try!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Tron We'll need a sailer to reach the MCP, so let's get to the simulation hangar!

cutscene.desc: They run to the Simulation Hanger, just outside the Hallway, and board a solar sailer simulation. Tron accesses the device and it's wings appear. The sailer leaves the hangar across the data stream

xml.sp: Tron You've got to keep a lookout. The MCP isn't going to just let us waltz in.

cutscene.desc: A Heartless floats up behind Sora and lands on the bridge of the sailer. The sailer tries to maintain flight as the weight of the Heartless that appear threaten to make it fall. Luckily, they defeat the Heartless before that could happen. The solar sailer stops at the Central Computer Mesa

xml.sp: Tron The MCP is straight ahead.
Sora Time to settle things for good.

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy nod and look to the Central Computer Core. They run into the Core and look up to the red spinning CPU. Commander Sark is standing, waiting for them

xml.sp: Sora Who was that?
Tron Sark. The MCP's number two.
Sark Tenacious little bugs! You're time is up. Prepare for de-resolution!

cutscene.desc: They defeat Sark's Heartless, then take on Sark himself. The Commander tries to stand, but weakly

xml.sp: Sark You're very persistent, Tron.
Tron I'm also better than you.
Sark We...would have made a great team...

cutscene.desc: Tron sends his Identity Disk whirling at Sark. It strikes his helmet and he lands on the floor, data pulses dying off. Tron looks to the large spinning column

xml.sp: Tron Now for the MCP!
Sora This thing is the MCP?
Tron That's it. Ugly, isn't it?
MCP Tron... Don't you understand? We don't need Users. We've advanced---they're superfluous. Be a part of me, and together the world will be ours to control!
Tron shaking his head MCP. You still don't get it, do you?

cutscene.desc: The MCP stops spinning

xml.sp: MCP Sark...

cutscene.desc: The Commander's body is still lying there

xml.sp: MCP Sark! all my functions are now yours!

cutscene.desc: A wave of data shines down onto Sark's neck. His body courses with energy. The Commander stands up, higher than ever, as he's grown several feet high. He stomps over to them. The MCP forms a data barrier around himself

xml.sp: MCP Eliminate all threats!

cutscene.desc: They manage to defeat Sark, and fire a beam from Tron's Identity Disk at the heart of the MCP. The MCP turns blue and vanishes. The data streams in Sark become corrupt and he disappears. Tron jumps for joy

xml.sp: Tron We did it!
Sora I see Tron has a silly side, too.
Tron I learned it from you. Of course, I do have my silly limits.
Sora Okay, then I'll tweak your program when I get back to the User world.
Tron You? Maybe we better not try that.
Sora Aww...How 'bout it, guys? Singin' Tron? Dancin' Tron!

cutscene.desc: Sora spins around

xml.sp: Sora Sound good?
Donald Yeah!

Tron giggling Okay, okay, fine. But before I crash---Sora, Donald, Goofy...and all the Users out there... Thank you... You really helped me. You made me so much stronger. You taught me what friendship is truly all about. And, I'll never forget it. As soon as I met you, I knew we were going to defeat the MCP and free the system.

cutscene.desc: He holds out a hand to Sora. He takes it, and Tron pulls him into a hug

xml.sp: Sora Uhh...
Tron Isn't this what Users do when they're sorry to say goodbye?
Sora Uhhh...it's a first for me.
Goofy Gawrsh, Tron, it's like a promise that we'll see each other again real soon.
Tron Okay. Well, then...

cutscene.desc: Tron gives Goofy and Donald a hug

xml.sp: Tron I promise.

cutscene.desc: He starts to back away slowly

xml.sp: Sora Where are you going?

cutscene.desc: He waves, and then jumps into the core, where the MCP was deleted. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run to the edge and watch him fall

xml.sp: Sora Tron...

cutscene.desc: There is a large rumbling and several systems come back online. Yuffie runs into the computer room

xml.sp: Yuffie Things are settling down in town! The only Heartless left anywhere are the local variety. And it looks like there are fewer than before.
Aerith Now if we can just get those three back in one piece...

cutscene.desc: The transfer system starts up and Sora, Donald, and Goofy appear in the room

xml.sp: Aerith You're here!
Yuffie Welcome back!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods sadly

xml.sp: Sora How's the town?
Yuffie A-okay!
Aerith Not a single trace of the MCP, either. Everything's back to normal. We made it.
Yuffie Hey, why the long face? What happened?

cutscene.desc: She wags a finger in his face

xml.sp: Donald Tron just disappeared.
Sora And he promised we'd see him again...

cutscene.desc: An alarm sounds

xml.sp: Aerith What's happening!?

cutscene.desc: The alarm stops

xml.sp: Tron Greetings, friends. System is up, and ready for User input.
Sora, Donald, & Goofy Tron!
Tron Stay in touch.
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: Donald runs to the keyboard

xml.sp: Donald Oh boy, oh boy!

cutscene.desc: He starts typing

xml.sp: Tron Hey, stop that! It tickles!
Goofy Tron is ticklish?

cutscene.desc: Sora grins, and starts to walk to the computer. Goofy laughs

xml.sp: Sora How 'bout this!

cutscene.desc: He starts typing

xml.sp: Tron giggling Please stop that!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Donald laugh. Sora types some more

xml.sp: Yuffie I think Tron's been hanging around those guys too much.
Tron amidst giggling W-wait, wait just a moment. I want to show you something I dug up from the system archives.

cutscene.desc: Sora stops typing

xml.sp: Tron You can see the town back when it was first built.

cutscene.desc: Outside in the Restoration Site, Cloud looks up at the sky and sees beams of light shooting upward

xml.sp: Leon That's right... I remember now.

cutscene.desc: Magical shards of light fall down around the city

xml.sp: Cid Just like the old days...
Merlin Hmm... I'd be fascinated to ascertain as to when the town got such a dreadful name as Hollow Bastion!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Aerith, Yuffie, Donald, and Goofy walk outside to the Postern

xml.sp: Aerith You know, this town had another name once.
Sora Hm? Aerith Radiant Garden.

cutscene.desc: Having found all the Torn Pages, Sora decides to check in on Pooh in the 100 Acre Wood. He enters Piglet's House, where the leaves are falling from the trees. Pooh is there with Gopher

xml.sp: Gopher to Pooh Say, what's wrong, sonny?
Pooh Oh, I was just thinking...and---and wondering.
Gopher You should be skedaddlin' outta here.
Pooh Why?
Gopher Why? Because it's Windsday, of course!

cutscene.desc: Gopher returns to his hole in the ground

xml.sp: Pooh Windsday? Oh! Well then, happy Windsday! Now, I think I shall wish everyone a happy Windsday! Oh, bother. Let's see now. Who is Everyone?

cutscene.desc: He sits down and pokes his head. Sora enters and a strong breeze picks up. So strong, that a hunny pot flies into his head

xml.sp: Sora Ouch!

cutscene.desc: He rubs his head

xml.sp: Sora Wonder if Pooh's here...

cutscene.desc: The breeze blows through again and Piglet comes flying through the air, past Sora

xml.sp: Piglet Oh, help, help! Somebody save me!
Sora Piglet!

cutscene.desc: Piglet flies onto a tree branch and holds on

xml.sp: Piglet Sora! Help! Please!
Sora Hold on, little guy!

cutscene.desc: Sora runs to the tree and rescues Piglet

xml.sp: Sora There you go!
Piglet Whew! Thank you, Sora. Oh, here comes Pooh Bear.

cutscene.desc: Pooh walks over to them

xml.sp: Sora Pooh! You're all right!
Pooh Why, hello. It's nice to meet you. Happy Windsday.
Piglet Nice to m-meet you? But, Pooh. It's me, Piglet. Don't you remember me?
Sora And me, too? We're friends!
Pooh We are? Hmm... It seems I can't remember.
Piglet Oh, Pooh... That's v-v-very sad!

cutscene.desc: Piglet walks off crying, then is picked up by the breeze again

xml.sp: Piglet Goodbye, Sora! Goodbye, Pooh!
Sora Piglet...

cutscene.desc: Owl arrives

xml.sp: Pooh Oh my. That does look rather fun, doesn't it?
Owl I say, it seems we have a rather serious predicament! Sora, would you mind going after poor Piglet?

cutscene.desc: Piglet ends up in an even higher tree

xml.sp: Sora Jump down, Piglet! I'll catch you!
Piglet looking down Oh, d-d-dear...
Sora You can do it, Piglet! You just have to be brave!
Piglet Sora... All right, Sora. I'll t-try...

cutscene.desc: He lets go of the branch, covers his eyes, and jumps. Sora misses Piglet and Pooh catches him, but falls over

xml.sp: Pooh Oh, that was rather frightening. I do hope you're all right, Piglet.
Piglet Oh, P-Pooh! You remembered my name? You really, truly remembered?
Pooh Of course, Piglet. But today I think I shall call you my friend Piglet who is very brave!
Piglet Me? Very brave? No... But it's easy to be brave when I have a wonderful friend like you, Pooh Bear!

cutscene.desc: Pooh stands up

xml.sp: Sora I'm happy for you guys.
Pooh Oh, and thank you for rescuing my friend Piglet...Somebody-I-Don't-Know.
Sora Oh... Uh, sure. Don't mention it.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks to Rabbit's House and sees Pooh flying in with a blue balloon, heading straight for Eeyore's house of sticks

xml.sp: Piglet Oh d-d-d-dear!
Sora C'mon!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Piglet run across the bridge. Pooh crashes and lets go of the balloon

xml.sp: Sora Eeyore, Pooh. Are you okay? Gosh, that's too bad, Eeyore. After all that work...
Eeyore No matter. Most likely would have fallen down anyway.
Piglet Well, I'll help you fix your house, Eeyore.
Eeyore Oh, hello there, Piglet. Thanks for offerin'. Wouldn't want to spoil your fun day, though.

cutscene.desc: Pooh stands up

xml.sp: Pooh Well, hello, Piglet. And hello, Somebody-I-Don't-Know.
Sora Pooh, this is Eeyore. You know Eeyore, don't you?
Pooh Um, I do?
Sora to Piglet What could've happened to him?

cutscene.desc: Pooh's stomach rumbles

xml.sp: Piglet Oh, I have an idea! Maybe Pooh's tummy is so rumbly that it's making him forget. If we bring him some honey, he's sure to remember!
Sora Well...um...I guess it's worth a try.
Eeyore Might work. But prob'ly not.
Sora First we gotta find some honey.
Eeyore If honey's what you're looking for, I know just the place. Follow me.

cutscene.desc: He walks around to the other side of Rabbit's House. Rabbit is carefully stacking hunny pots

xml.sp: Rabbit Splendid, just splendid.
Eeyore This is the place I told you about.

cutscene.desc: They see the pot stack

xml.sp: Sora Wow! Look at that.
Pooh heading straight for it How yummy for my tummy!

cutscene.desc: He sits down and starts eating

xml.sp: Piglet But doesn't that honey belong to someone?

cutscene.desc: When Rabbit returns carrying another pot, Pooh has already eaten up all the honey

xml.sp: Rabbit Oh, no! My honey! Pooh, did you eat ALL my honey!?
Pooh Oh, hello. It's nice to meet you.
Rabbit What did you say?
Pooh eyeing the pot Is that for me, too?

cutscene.desc: Rabbit reluctantly gives him the pot. Pooh sits down and starts eating

xml.sp: Rabbit Oh, I was sure I'd found a safe place for it, too...
Sora Sorry. It's our fault. We brought Pooh here.
Rabbit Oh, hello, Sora... It's good to see you again.
Sora Same here... We really are sorry.
Rabbit It's quite all right. I know Pooh can't be stopped when he gets this hungry.

cutscene.desc: Pooh has finished the honey and stands up

xml.sp: Pooh Pardon me, Somebody-I-Don't-Know. Is there any more?
Rabbit Are you feeling all right, Pooh? Could you really have forgotten all about me? What on earth is going on?
Pooh Is there more honey? You see, my tummy's rumbly.
Rabbit That's it! He's so hungry, he can't remember a thing!
Piglet Oh! We thought that, too.
Rabbit Then let's stuff this bear full of honey!
Eeyore I wouldn't get my hopes up.
Sora But I thought Pooh ate all your honey, Rabbit?
Rabbit Oh, I've got more. Must have emergency rations. But I hid them a bit too well.

cutscene.desc: They eventually find the hidden honey

xml.sp: Rabbit There now, Pooh. Have just as much as you like.
Pooh Why, thank you.

cutscene.desc: Pooh eats all the honey

xml.sp: Pooh Pardon me, Kind Somebody, but do you know where I might find another smackeral or two of honey?

cutscene.desc: They all sigh. Pooh walks over to the entrance to Rabbit's House

xml.sp: Pooh My tummy seems to be telling me there's some honey right in there.

cutscene.desc: Pooh gets into the hole, but gets stuck, flailing his legs on the outside

xml.sp: Pooh Bother. I'm stuck.
Rabbit sighing He still doesn't remember. What in the world has gotten into Pooh Bear?
Sora Whatever it is, we'd better help him.
Piglet Oh, yes. And quickly, too!
Pooh Oh, stuff and fluff.

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs Pooh's legs, Rabbit grabs Sora, Eeyore grabs Rabbit, and Piglet grabs Eeyore's tail. They all heave and try to pull Pooh out

xml.sp: Sora One...Two...Three!

cutscene.desc: Pooh pops out of the hole, flies through the air, and lands on the ground

xml.sp: Sora You're okay now, Pooh.

Rabbit Well, I wouldn't be so sure of that if I were you. Why, just---just look at him! He doesn't even remember who I am. Perhaps it's all this blustery wind, or---Or maybe he actually needs more honey! Or he's---he's sleepwalking and---and dreaming!
Pooh Well, if I am dreaming---which I suppose I could be---I hope that I get to the part where you invite me to lunch again very soon, Rabbit.
Rabbit That's right, you're always stopping by for lunch! Wait! Pooh! You called me Rabbit!
Pooh Well, of course, Rabbit.
Piglet What about Eeyore? Do you remember Eeyore, too, Pooh?
Pooh Oh, hello there, Eeyore. It's ever so nice to see you today.
Eeyore Thanks for noticing me, Pooh Bear.

cutscene.desc: Sora bends down and points to himself, smiling

xml.sp: Pooh Yes, hello there, Somebody-I-Don't-Know!

cutscene.desc: Sora sighs

xml.sp: Sora Well, at least you remember Rabbit and Eeyore now.

cutscene.desc: Sora travels to Kanga's House. He sees Pooh and Piglet there

xml.sp: Sora Hi!
Piglet Well, hello, Sora!
Pooh Yes, hello there, Somebody-I-Don't-Know.

cutscene.desc: Kanga hops toward them, with Roo in her pouch. She is holding a bottle

xml.sp: Kanga Eeyore told me Pooh wasn't quite himself. I thought this might be just what the poor dear needed.
Roo Yeah, I hope it'll make Pooh better!

cutscene.desc: Tigger bounces in on his tail

xml.sp: Tigger to himself ...A Tigger's a wonderful thing! Their tops are made out of rubber! Their bottoms are made out of spriiing!

cutscene.desc: He spins around and poses with his arms in the air

xml.sp: Tigger A present! For me? Why, presents are what Tiggers like best! And it's not even my birthday!

cutscene.desc: He snatches the bottle and bounces away, singing to himself

xml.sp: Kanga But Tigger! That's not for you!
Roo Wait, Tigger!
Piglet Oh, dear!
Sora C'mon, let's go after him.

cutscene.desc: They catch up with Tigger and explain everything

xml.sp: Tigger You mean Pooh even forgot about ME!?
Piglet Yes, Tigger.
Sora That bottle you thought was a present was medicine to make Pooh better.
Tigger Aw, who needs medicine!? Why, some tiggerific bouncing will jog his memory for sure!

cutscene.desc: Tigger bounces around Sora

xml.sp: Tigger Well, Pooh?
Pooh That looks like fun, Somebody-I-Don't-Know.
Tigger Nothing, huh? Hmm... Of course! We all gotta bounce together! That'll do the trick!

cutscene.desc: They all have fun jumping

xml.sp: Tigger I bet you remember me now, don't you, buddy-bear!
Pooh Well, I remember that bouncing always makes me hungry.

cutscene.desc: Tigger gasps, then looks down

xml.sp: Tigger All that bouncin' and he still doesn't remember me? Well then, I guess bouncin's not the answer. It makes a Tigger almost never wanna bounce again...

cutscene.desc: Tigger tosses the medicine bottle behind him. It lands in front of Piglet

xml.sp: Piglet Oh, please be careful with that.
Tigger Aw, sorry little Piglet...but Pooh not rememberin' me has me confuzled. I don't even feel like bouncin'!
Pooh Oh, but Tigger. I always thought bouncing was what Tiggers did best.

cutscene.desc: Tigger turns around happily

xml.sp: Tigger gasping Pooh Boy! You remember me! You do remember your ol' buddy Tigger after all!

cutscene.desc: Tigger laughs and bounces around

xml.sp: Tigger That's great!

cutscene.desc: At home, Pooh sits on the floor and falls asleep. He drifts out of his body and into his memories. All his friends are gathered on the hill. A boy in shadow is about to leave

xml.sp: Pooh I wonder who that is. Oh, well. Perhaps...I'll remember tomorrow.

cutscene.desc: Sora enters the Spooky Cave and sees everyone gathered there

xml.sp: Sora Hey, everyone... Uh-oh... Where's Pooh?
Piglet He went in there.

cutscene.desc: They look deeper into the cave

xml.sp: Rabbit Do you think there might be a jagular hiding inside?
Owl Jagular...well, now. That reminds me of when dear cousin Alphonse---
Sora Say, why are you all sitting around here? If you're worried about that bear, let's go find him!
Tigger That's exactly what I was thinking!
Roo Yeah, let's go!
Rabbit But if there really is a jagular, we'd better think this through.
Owl It seems we've got a bit of time. Why don't I just resume where I left off? My cousin---that is, my father's younger sister's---
Kanga What do you think we should do, Sora?

cutscene.desc: They choose to go look for Pooh. They find him in a cave made of crystal

xml.sp: Sora Ooh! There you are! Hey...we looked everywhere for you.
Pooh I was looking for a very dear friend that I remember I made a very important promise to.
Sora So, did you find him?
Pooh No, I looked and looked. But he doesn't seem to be anywhere.

cutscene.desc: Tigger bounces Pooh

xml.sp: Tigger Oh, Pooh Boy! So there you are.
Pooh But, Tigger, did you have to bounce me so...bounce-ily?
Tigger Gosh, I thought a jagular had gotten ya!
Pooh Oh dear. I hadn't thought of that. I do hope a jagular hasn't gone and gobbled up my friend!
Kanga Now, try to remember, Pooh. Isn't Sora the one you're looking for?

cutscene.desc: Pooh's tummy rumbles

xml.sp: Pooh Oh! The jagular!
Sora No, it's just your tummy grumbling. You must be hungry. C'mon... Let's head home and see if we can find you some honey.
Pooh rubbing his belly I'd like that, Sora.
Sora Pooh! You---you finally remembered!
Pooh Remembered what, Sora?
Sora Pooh...
Pooh I like it ever so much when you're cheerful, Sora.
Sora Me too, Pooh.
Pooh Oh... There's a bit of a rumbly in my tumbly.
Sora All right. Then let's go home!

cutscene.desc: He offers a hand to Pooh, who takes it. Everyone leaves the cave together. Sora enters Starry Hill

xml.sp: Pooh Oh, bother!

cutscene.desc: Sora sees Pooh on the hill with a hunny pot over his head

xml.sp: Sora Are you all right?

cutscene.desc: Sora runs up the hill to Pooh

xml.sp: Pooh Sora? Is that you? Help!

cutscene.desc: Sora swings Pooh around by the hunny pot. The pot flies off and he catches Pooh. They both sit together on the log under the gigantic moon

xml.sp: Sora So, what were you doing here?
Pooh I was thinking Perhaps there's a way to make it so you won't go away.
Sora You mean a way to make me stay?
Pooh Yes. Would there be such a thing as a way to make it so you don't go away again?
Sora Pooh...

cutscene.desc: Sora looks up at the moon

xml.sp: Sora Don't worry. I promise I'll come back and visit you now and then.
Pooh Could you make it now and now instead? That seems a bit better to me. Sora, if I go looking for you, will I find you?
Sora I'll always be with you---right here.

cutscene.desc: He points to Pooh's heart

xml.sp: Sora You don't have to go anywhere. Just stay here, and you can see me anytime you want.
Pooh You mean I just have to stay right here?
Sora Yep, that's all.
Pooh Would you promise?
Sora Promise.
Piglet I promise too!

cutscene.desc: Rabbit, Tigger, Eeyore, Gopher, Kanga, Roo, and Owl join them

xml.sp: Kanga And so do Roo and I.
Roo We sure do!
Rabbit You're welcome to visit us anytime, Sora.
Sora Thanks.
Owl After all, I must tell you of my Uncle Albert's adventures at sea.
Eeyore Guess you'll be stayin' awhile.

cutscene.desc: Sora laughs

xml.sp: Gopher Goodbye, Sora.
Sora Thanks, Gopher.
Tigger If you ever get lonely, just start bouncin' and think of your pal Tigger!
Sora I will, Tigger!

cutscene.desc: Sora hops off the log

xml.sp: Pooh You're leaving?
Sora Yes. I really have to go.
Pooh Well, I won't be sad, because you'll always be right here forever and ever.

cutscene.desc: He touches his heart

xml.sp: Pooh Right, Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora looks around at everyone

xml.sp: Sora And all of you...are right here, too.

cutscene.desc: Pooh smiles

xml.sp: Sora See ya!

cutscene.desc: He hops off the hill and waves to them. They each wave back. The book closes and the cover is fixed, now showing Pooh and Sora beneath the stars. Sora, Donald, and Goofy proceed to the Dark Depths and find Sephiroth

xml.sp: Sephiroth What is Cloud doing?
Sora Beats me.
Sephiroth Hmph. By the way, you three...

cutscene.desc: He whips out his masamune

xml.sp: Sephiroth Who are you?

cutscene.desc: The sword almost touches Sora, but he jumps backwards and gets out the Keyblade

xml.sp: Goofy I'm not sure we should tell ya.
Sephiroth Well... That's an interesting sword you're carrying.
Donald It's the Keyblade!
Sephiroth I see... So that's a Keyblade. And I suppose you must be its chosen wielder.
Sora So what if I am?
Sephiroth I wonder if it won't change it's mind---once I defeat you. Show me your strength.

cutscene.desc: Sora fights a coarse battle with Sephiroth

xml.sp: Sephiroth What intriguing power...
Sora How'd you like that?
Sephiroth brushing his shoulder I admit you're very skilled... But apparently, Cloud is the only one who can eliminate me.

cutscene.desc: He turns around

xml.sp: Sephiroth Tell Cloud to come here. Tell him Sephiroth is looking to settle things.

cutscene.desc: They return to the Marketplace and find Cloud there. Sora explains everything

xml.sp: Sora He's in the Dark Depths.
Cloud I see... So I guess it's time we settled this.

cutscene.desc: Cloud walks past the group silently, his face expressionless

xml.sp: Sora Cloud...

cutscene.desc: Sora returns to the Dark Depths, where Sephiroth is waiting

xml.sp: Sephiroth Did you give him my message?
Sora Maybe.
Cloud Sorry to keep you, Sephiroth!

cutscene.desc: Sephiroth turns toward the entrance to the Dark Depths and sees Cloud walk in

xml.sp: Sephiroth Cloud... You'll never let go of the darkness...
Cloud readying his sword Shut up!

cutscene.desc: Sephiroth walks closer and holds up his masamune

xml.sp: Sephiroth You'll never let go of your past...
Cloud Shut up!

cutscene.desc: Cloud runs at Sephiroth, who jumps into the air. Cloud looks up and jumps at him. The two exchange blows with their swords in midair

xml.sp: Sora Cloud! Get him!

cutscene.desc: Sephiroth knocks Cloud back. He spins to the wall, and jumps higher in the air. Sephiroth charges after him. Cloud cleaves his sword downward and strikes the blocking sword of Sephiroth several times. Sephiroth retaliates and Cloud dodges backwards. Sephiroth goes in for three more strikes, which Cloud blocks, but is still pushed back. Sephiroth hits him upward, then down to the ground. Before he hits, Cloud spins to gain a footing. He dodges as Sephiroth shoots down at him with the masamune. Cloud lands on the rock wall and runs along it. He jumps and swings at Sephiroth. Their swords clash and they switch sides. Cloud catches himself as he falls. They both turn around and strike. Their swords are locked together, neither one backing down. They glare at each other

xml.sp: Sephiroth Absurd. Defeating me is meaningless. You know that more than anyone, Cloud. No matter how many times I fall, your darkness keeps calling me back!
Tifa Wrong!
Cloud Tifa! Stay back!
Tifa How can I? I wanna help you.

cutscene.desc: The swords part and Sephiroth cleaves down as Cloud dodges back. He readies his sword again

xml.sp: Sephiroth You can't. He'll never let go of the darkness.
Tifa He doesn't have to. He just needs someone to surround him with light.

cutscene.desc: Sephiroth moves his sword toward Tifa, who jumps back

xml.sp: Tifa The darkness will be there, Sephiroth---but in a place you can't reach.
Sephiroth Is that right? Let's see what this light of yours can do.

cutscene.desc: He brings his sword down, but she dodges and moves forward to punch him. She misses and catches her footing on his other side. A flash of light hinders Cloud

xml.sp: Cloud No!

cutscene.desc: Tifa delivers two punches and two kicks, but all are dodged by Sephiroth. He knocks her backwards. She slides along the rocky ground. He strikes at her with his masamune four times, but she dodges each one. Cloud sees another flash of light

xml.sp: Sora Look out!

cutscene.desc: Another flash. Sephiroth flies in toward Tifa, but Cloud jumps into the middle. He holds his sword out toward Sephiroth

xml.sp: Tifa Cloud, you can have my light.
Sephiroth The light doesn't suit you.
Cloud I just...don't know.

cutscene.desc: Cloud glows with a blue aura

xml.sp: Sephiroth Stop!

cutscene.desc: He launches himself towards Cloud, but stops as Cloud glows with yellow light. Cloud and Sephiroth soar into the air with a flash of light

xml.sp: Sora Huh?

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy see Tifa standing alone

xml.sp: Goofy Where'd they go? Do ya think they made it back to their own world?
Sora They went somewhere else... Cloud went to fight a great battle---to defeat the darkness inside him.

cutscene.desc: Tifa walks over to them

xml.sp: Tifa Gone again.
Sora What will you do now?

cutscene.desc: She thinks

xml.sp: Tifa Guess I'll keep looking.
Sora Got any leads?
Tifa Don't worry... Light is easy to find. I gotta go. Here. This is for helping me out.

cutscene.desc: She hands him the Fenrir keychain

xml.sp: Sora But wait---when did we help?

cutscene.desc: They think it over, but she's already started leaving. Sora, Donald, and Goofy board the Gummi Ship

xml.sp: Chip looking at the map What's that? That big...thing?
Dale Maybe that's the source of the weird reading we picked up before!
Chip And there's something funny about Twilight Town. I'm seeing two of 'em!
Dale Look! It's another huge energy reading! And it's coming from someplace near the town.
Chip I dunno what's going on, fellas, but it sure looks like there's some big trouble brewing around Twilight Town!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy travel through the Assault of the Dreadnought to get to Twilight Town

xml.sp: Goofy Hey! I think we're almost there!
Sora Huh?
Donald What?
Goofy Gawrsh, aren't we here because of the picture?

cutscene.desc: Goofy takes out the photograph

xml.sp: Goofy Look, I'll show ya!
Donald Yeah! Goofy's right!
Goofy C'mon, let's go find this mansion!
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: When they reach the Old Mansion, they see the gate open and Pence, Hayner, and Olette lying on the ground. Sora runs to Hayner

xml.sp: Sora Hey, are you all right?

cutscene.desc: Hayner starts to get up

xml.sp: Sora What happened?
Hayner We came here looking for Kairi. Then those white things attacked us...
Donald You gotta be careful!
Sora Yeah, you guys didn't have to go and do that.
Hayner Of course we did. Kairi's our friend, too, ya know.
Sora You're right... You know, I never thought of it like that before.
Hayner Word is, this mansion gets a lot of really strange visitors.
Olette We thought this place might be the gateway to some kind of alternate Twilight Town.
Sora What do you mean, alternate Twilight Town?
Pence Hey, Goofy, do you think we could see that crystal of yours?

cutscene.desc: Goofy nods and takes out the crystal and the munny pouch

xml.sp: Olette I made that pouch myself, and I still have it. So there shouldn't be two of them here.
Hayner holding up the Four Crystal Trophy And this is the trophy Seifer gave you. You left it behind, remember?
Pence It's the only one of its kind. Same for the crystals---red, blue, yellow, green---only one of each color. But you've got your own!
Hayner So...where'd you get it?

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks

xml.sp: Goofy The pouch is from the King. When he gave us munny for the train ride, he gave us the crystal too.
Pence But then...where did the KING get it?
Hayner See? There's gotta be another town out there like this one. That would explain how the King got that pouch and the crystal. Everything makes sense.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy look at each other

xml.sp: Sora It...does?
Pence That other town must be where whatever's missing from here went!
Olette Like Kairi.
Sora I get it!

cutscene.desc: A few Dusks appear. King Mickey swoops down and slices them

xml.sp: Mickey Watch out!

cutscene.desc: They fight alongside Mickey to defeat the Nobodies

xml.sp: Mickey I got somethin' to tell ya. I found out where Ansem is---Ansem the Wise! The real Ansem! He snuck into Organization XIII's stronghold.
Sora And we've figured out where Kairi is! I'm pretty sure we're right.
Mickey But why'd you all come here?
Sora Someone gave us a clue.
Mickey Who?
Goofy Well, Your Majesty, Sora thinks it might been Riku.
Sora It's just a feeling I had.
Mickey Well, if that's what ya think, then it's probably right.
Sora You mean Riku's okay!
Mickey If that's what ya think...
Sora crossing his arms I've waited long enough, Your Majesty! Tell me what you know!
Mickey It's not for me to say.
Sora But Your Majesty! Why?
Mickey I don't wanna break my promise.
Sora You made a promise to Riku!? So he's okay! I can see him again!

cutscene.desc: Mickey covers his mouth

xml.sp: Hayner Huh? Who's Riku?
Sora My best friend.
Pence That's IT!
Olette Your Majesty? You got the pouch with the crystal from Riku, didn't you? And you promised not to tell, right?
Mickey Gosh, guys...
Donald That's enough!
Sora Yeah. Let's go!

cutscene.desc: Sora turns to face the mansion

xml.sp: Sora Kairi! Riku! We're on our way!

cutscene.desc: They all enter the Mansion Foyer

xml.sp: Mickey There's gotta be a computer somewhere.
Pence A computer... Do you think it's connected to that other Twilight Town?
Mickey It might be. And there should be a way into the Realm of Darkness there.
Sora Riku told you that, didn't he!?
Mickey Please, Sora. I made a promise.
Sora Aha! I knew it!
Donald Hey! Stop pestering the King!
Sora Right. Sorry...

cutscene.desc: Through the Library, they walk into the Computer Room. They see a desk with several monitors

xml.sp: Mickey There!
Sora We found it!
Donald How does it work?
Pence I can handle it.

cutscene.desc: Pence sits down at the computer and starts pressing buttons

xml.sp: Pence Okay... Here we go... Ah!
Hayner What's wrong?
Pence I can't go any further without a password.
Mickey Do ya have any idea what the password might be?

cutscene.desc: Sora thinks

xml.sp: Goofy Well, we only got this photo...

cutscene.desc: Goofy takes out the photo

xml.sp: Donald And the salty-sweet ice cream bar!
Sora Yeah, the one Donald ate up.
Goofy It was in the box right next to the photo.
Mickey Hey, that's it! Ansem the Wise loved ice cream!
Pence Okay, what's the name of the flavor?
Sora The name of the ice cream was...Sea-salt ice cream.

cutscene.desc: Pence types it in

xml.sp: Pence It worked!

cutscene.desc: The odd machine near the wall buzzes to life

xml.sp: Sora Let's go!
Hayner We'll be here to hold down the fort.
Olette Say hi to Kairi!
Sora You bet!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, Goofy and Mickey enter the machine and are turned to data. They reemerge in the Computer Room

xml.sp: Sora Are we back in the same place?
Donald Look!

cutscene.desc: They see the computer is completely totaled

xml.sp: Sora This is the other Twilight Town. Roxas's Twilight Town.

cutscene.desc: He pictures Roxas smashing the computer to pieces

xml.sp: Mickey There's gotta be an entrance into the dark realm somewhere. Let's split up.

cutscene.desc: Mickey runs into the Basement Hall and they follow him. Inside, they see a black and green portal of light

xml.sp: Sora There...
Mickey This is it.

cutscene.desc: They enter the portal and find themselves in Betwixt and Between. Nobody symbols float everywhere in all directions

xml.sp: Sora What is this place?
Donald Well, which way should we go?
Sora Riku! Kairi!

cutscene.desc: They are surrounded by Nobodies. They try to fight, but they just keep coming

xml.sp: Sora It's no use!
Axel Don't stop moving, or the darkness will overtake you!

cutscene.desc: Axel jumps in and slices at a few Nobodies with his chakram

xml.sp: Axel Get goin'!
Sora Why?
Axel Don't ask. Just do it!

cutscene.desc: Two Nobodies pull Axel to the ground. Sora runs over and knocks the Nobodies away

xml.sp: Sora You okay?
Axel I kidnapped Kairi, but she got away from me. After that, Saïx caught her. He's a member of Organization XIII. Saïx. Got it memorized? Now go save her!

cutscene.desc: A Dusk appears, flying at Sora and Axel. Sora whirls around and knocks it out

xml.sp: Sora Leave us alone!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Axel fight the Nobodies, but the horde shows no signs of slowing down

xml.sp: Axel I think I liked it better when they were on my side.
Sora Feeling a little...regret?
Axel Nah...I can handle these punks. Watch this!

cutscene.desc: He jumps into the center and focuses his energy. His chakram spin around him spouting fire. He screams, creating a gigantic torrent of flames which obliterates the Nobody horde

xml.sp: Sora Whoa!

cutscene.desc: They see Axel lying on the floor. Sora rushes over to him

xml.sp: Sora You're...fading away...

Axel Well, that's what happens when you put your whole being into an attack. You know what I mean? Not that Nobodies actually HAVE beings...right? Anyway, I digress. Go, find Kairi. Oh, almost forgot... Sorry for what I did to her.
Sora When we find her, you can tell her that yourself.
Axel Think I'll pass. My heart just wouldn't be in it, you know? Haven't got one.

cutscene.desc: Axel laughs weakly

xml.sp: Sora Axel, what were you trying to do?
Axel I wanted to see Roxas. He...was the only one I liked... He made me feel...like I had a heart. It's kind of...funny... You make me feel...the same... Kairi's in the castle dungeon. Now go.

cutscene.desc: He holds up his hand and opens a portal

xml.sp: Sora Axel...

cutscene.desc: Axel fades completely away with the smallest flicker of flame. Sora, Donald, and Goofy stand before the portal

xml.sp: Sora This leads to...
Donald Aw, come on! Let's get going!

cutscene.desc: Sora walks through the portal. Meanwhile, Xemnas sits with Xigbar, Luxord, and Saïx in the white room

xml.sp: Xigbar The house is looking pretty empty, huh? I thought I'd get a little enjoyment watching Axel throw one last tantrum, but he went a lot quieter than I thought.
Luxord Perhaps he was ready for it. Perhaps he put his existence on the line and won what he'd been longing for.
Xigbar Wait a minute. How would that even be possible? We don't exist, remember? What you're saying goes against the laws of nature.
Luxord Then perhaps he bet his NON-existence. Either way, he came out a winner. Oh, Axel. A grifter to the end.

cutscene.desc: Saïx stares at the floor

xml.sp: Saïx That's absurd. He won nothing and is nothing. He couldn't stand the emptiness of being without a heart, and that led to his demise. He was foolish and weak.
Xemnas But...

cutscene.desc: Saïx looks up

xml.sp: Xemnas Weakness has the power to awaken that which is dormant. It is clear that through his actions, however foolish they may have been, Axel has touched Sora's heart. Perhaps HE will soon awaken.

cutscene.desc: He stares at Roxas's empty seat. Sora exits with Donald, Goofy, and Mickey in the alley of a dark city. Mickey walks back to the street and looks up at the sky. Sora, Donald, and Goofy run to see what he's looking at, a giant flying fortress almost covering a heart-shaped moon. It seems a haunting welcome to The World That Never Was

xml.sp: Sora Axel said Kairi's in the dungeon.

cutscene.desc: Thunder sounds from the sky and dark clouds swirl

xml.sp: Mickey Then we better find a way to get to that castle!

cutscene.desc: They leave the Alley to Between and travel through Fragment Crossing. They reach Memory's Skyscraper and it starts to rain. Sora looks up. Lightning flashes through the sky. They hear the sound of steel

xml.sp: Donald Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora turns around and sees Samurai Nobodies blocking Donald and Goofy

xml.sp: Sora Donald! Goofy!

cutscene.desc: Sora tries to run to them, but his vision gets hazy. He turns around and sees a figure in a black cloak appear. The Oblivion Keyblade appears in his hand

xml.sp: Sora A Keyblade?

cutscene.desc: He runs at Sora, who blocks with his Keyblade. There is a flash and they end up on the Station of Awakening. Roxas is now holding the Oblivion and the Oathkeeper. Sora fights Roxas. They run at each other and block attacks

xml.sp: Sora Wh-who are you?
????? Someone from the dark.

cutscene.desc: Sora knocks him back

xml.sp: Sora You can't be Riku?
????? Riku? ...I defeated a Riku once.
Sora You what!?
????? Tell me... Tell me why he picked you!

cutscene.desc: He runs at Sora, scraping the Keyblades on the ground with a screech, sending up sparks. He attacks Sora, but Sora dodges. Sora blocks the Oblivion with his Keyblade, and knocks it away. The Oathkeeper strikes upward, but is also parried. Downward again, more blocking from Sora. The figure jumps into the air, spins and lands on his feet. He jumps at Sora, who leaps to dodge. Sora is hit by the Oblivion and thrown up in the air. The cloaked man jumps up towards him. Sora flips upside down and blocks both Keyblades, then flies to his feet on the floor. The figure hover above and notices the tiles on the floor of Riku, Kairi, Donald, and Goofy

xml.sp: ????? I see. That's why.

cutscene.desc: He falls to the floor and tries to strike Sora with the Oblivion. Sora jumps away and continues to dodge his attacks. Sora deflects one strike, opening the way for the man to pound continuously on his blocking Keyblade. Sora falls on one knee and his Keyblade is knocked away from him. Sora runs to it, but the man stops him, slamming the Oathkeeper into the floor between Sora and his Keyblade. Sora slides to a stop. The man points at him with the Oblivion. Sora struggles against his anger. He holds his hand out toward the Keyblade, and it disappears from the Oathkeeper's hold

The Keyblade flashes into Sora's hands and he strikes the man down. The two Keyblades drop and vanish. The man begins to walk past Sora. His mind flashes back to previous events. In front of the Old Mansion in Twilight Town, Roxas stands upright. He faces downward and seems lifeless. A hooded figure appears and walks toward him

xml.sp: ?????? You seek answers.

cutscene.desc: Roxas nods, still facing the ground. The figure waves a hand in front of him. The name 'SORA' appears in sharp, smoky letters, floating in the air in front of his face. Roxas looks up at it, then back towards the ground

xml.sp: ?????? You feel nothing. Nothing is real. I can give you purpose.

cutscene.desc: Roxas nods again. The man waves his arm again and the letters swirl around Roxas, gaining momentum until they're barely visible as letters. The man slams his fist into them and four points of golden light shoot out, forcing Roxas to flinch. He opens his eyes and sees a new golden letter X hovering before him. The silver letters rejoin with the X in their center forming a new word, turning fully golden. Roxas looks up at them

xml.sp: Roxas Roxas.
Xemnas That is right--the new you.

cutscene.desc: The scene switches to the Twilight Town clock tower, where Roxas it sitting with his head in his lap. He looks up partly

xml.sp: ???? Look who's finally awake.

cutscene.desc: He gasps and turns to see Axel standing beside him

xml.sp: Roxas Axel.
Axel Or...maybe I have it wrong. Might be time to sleep. Soon we won't be able to talk like this anymore.

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks down

xml.sp: Roxas Does that mean it's time for me to go back to where I belong?

cutscene.desc: Axel sits down next to him. Roxas listens intently

xml.sp: Axel You know, I've been thinking about something Naminé said. Roxas... are you really sure that you don't have a heart? Is it possible that we all have one? You, me, her... Or is that just wishful thinking?
Roxas I don't know.

cutscene.desc: He looks down again

xml.sp: Roxas I can't...just look inside.
Axel Y-yeah, I guess not...
Roxas But I figure...if there is something in there--inside us--then we'd feel it, wouldn't we? And if so... No... Nevermind.
Axel C'mon. Don't leave me hangin'.
Roxas Sora will find the answer we're looking for. I know he will. Because, he's me.
Axel True enough.

cutscene.desc: Axel hands Roxas a sea-salt ice cream bar. He's a bit taken aback, but accepts it. Roxas stares a bit, while Axel nibbles on his

xml.sp: Axel Man, I miss the old times. Still got it memorized? The day we met, when you got your new name, you and I sat right here and watched the sunset.
Roxas Yeah. This place is home. Me... Hayner, Pence, Olette... We've shared a lot of adventures.
Axel You'll see them again. I know you will.

cutscene.desc: Roxas nods

xml.sp: Roxas Yeah, you're right. Well, I should go.

cutscene.desc: Axel looks sad

xml.sp: Roxas Sora's waiting for me.
Axel Yeah, I suppose he is.

cutscene.desc: Axel looks away and takes a bite out of his ice cream

xml.sp: Axel Man, this is some good ice cream, huh?

cutscene.desc: They sit in silence, gazing at the view for a few moments. They start to glow

xml.sp: Roxas Take care, okay?
Axel Right back at ya...buddy.

cutscene.desc: A single tear falls onto the tower roof. The scene flashes back to the Station of Awakening. The hooded man walks past Sora and stumbles, his hood flying off, revealing his golden hair. He stands up and turns to Sora

xml.sp: Roxas You make a good other.

cutscene.desc: The world fades to white and Sora is back in the city. It has stopped raining

xml.sp: Sora You make a good other.
Donald Are you okay?
Sora What...just happened?
Goofy Gawrsh, I dunno. You just disappeared. Then me and Donald had to fight some Nobodies.
Sora Oh. He said... he defeated Riku...
Donald Who said that?
Sora That guy. In the black coat.
Donald But nobody could defeat Riku.
Sora Y...Yeah, you're right.
Goofy A black coat means Organization XIII. He musta been tryin' to trick ya.
Donald Yeah, that must be why we didn't see him!
Sora Huh?
Donald You must be tired, Sora.
Goofy C'mon, let's just find a way to get into that castle!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy walk on ahead, as Sora stops and takes another look behind him. Sora, Donald, Goofy, and Mickey reach The Brink of Despair and see the enormous swirling fortress. The road ends there

xml.sp: Sora Dead end?
Mickey There's gotta be a path somewhere.

cutscene.desc: In her prison cell, Kairi is kept company by Pluto. She pets his head, and his ear perks up. She stands up and walks to the bars of the cell to see who's coming

xml.sp: Kairi What are you going to do with us?
Saïx You're the fire that feeds Sora's anger.

cutscene.desc: Saïx leaves

xml.sp: Kairi No... Sora's in danger because of me...

cutscene.desc: A black portal appears at the back of the cell. Pluto barks at it and Kairi turns around. Naminé is inside

xml.sp: Naminé This way!
Kairi Who---?
Naminé Believe in yourself. C'mon, hurry!

cutscene.desc: Kairi walks over and takes Naminé's hand, which then glows with light. A section of the flying castle shines brightly, causing Sora to block it with his hand. The Keyblade appears and Sora takes it. He points it to the center of the castle and a beam shoots out

xml.sp: Sora Kairi... We're almost there.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, Goofy, and the King walk up the ramp that appears and enter Nothing's Call

xml.sp: Sora Kairi! Where are you?
Mickey Shhhh! Remember where we are! This is their stronghold!

cutscene.desc: Mickey runs off

xml.sp: Donald Wait! Your Majesty!
Goofy Be careful! I think we got company!

cutscene.desc: Naminé and Kairi run down the steps at Twilight's View, Pluto following behind. Naminé's form shakes slightly. They stop running when they see Berserker Nobodies and Saïx appears

xml.sp: Saïx Naminé... There you are.
Kairi Naminé...?
Saïx Kairi. I'm afraid leaving is not an option.

cutscene.desc: He holds out his left hand

xml.sp: Saïx I'll take you to see Sora.

cutscene.desc: Kairi gets defensive. Saïx retreats his hand

xml.sp: Saïx You don't want that?
Kairi I do. More than anything. But not with you around.
Saïx If I had a heart, this would be where I die of laughter.

cutscene.desc: They hear the sound of a sword. Saïx turns around and the Berserker Nobodies fall to the ground and disappear. Behind them is another figure in a black cloak holding a wing-like Keyblade

xml.sp: Saïx You... Didn't Roxas take care of you?
Naminé You can take it from here, Riku.
Kairi Riku!?

cutscene.desc: The figure's Keyblade disappears, and he shoots a Dark Firaga at Saïx. Saïx blocks with his arms, then jumps backwards. The figure grabs him and slams him against the wall. Saïx puts a hand to the wall and creates a dark portal. He smiles as he escapes into it. The figure starts to enter

xml.sp: Kairi running up Wait!

cutscene.desc: Pluto runs up to him. The man backs away from the dog, but it stays with him. Kairi walks up

xml.sp: Kairi Riku...you're really here...

cutscene.desc: She takes off his hood and reveals the figure of Ansem, who looks away from her. Sora and company continue through Nothing's Call to Crooked Ascension. They enter Twilight's View and ready themselves for the Hall of Empty Melodies

xml.sp: Saïx Sora... You've done well.

cutscene.desc: They look and see Saïx on a very elaborate high ledge

xml.sp: Sora Where's Kairi?
Saïx Who knows? I expect she's catching up with her friend from the darkness.
Sora What do you mean!?
Saïx She doesn't need you anymore.
Sora I'm supposed to believe that?
Saïx Well, you don't have to... But you can believe this. Organization XIII has no further use for you... Just look there.

cutscene.desc: He points to the moon

xml.sp: Saïx Our Kingdom Hearts... Thanks to you, we've collected countless hearts... Can you hear their euphoria? Now, all they need is one more helping from the Keyblade bearer!

cutscene.desc: Saïx snaps his fingers and hundreds of Shadow Heartless emerge from the walls

xml.sp: Donald We gotta fight!
Sora But---Kingdom Hearts!
Kairi Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora looks up to see Kairi on another ledge

xml.sp: Kairi Sora! It's really you!
Sora Kairi!

cutscene.desc: Shadows cover Sora. Kairi gasps

xml.sp: Kairi You leave Sora alone!

cutscene.desc: Kairi takes a few steps back and leaps over the railing and off the ledge. She hits the ground running and the Shadows overtake her

xml.sp: Kairi Sora---!

cutscene.desc: There's a flash of light and the Heartless covering Kairi disappear, and she's taken by the arm of Ansem, who hands her a Keyblade

xml.sp: Ansem Take it.

cutscene.desc: Kairi takes the Keyblade in her hand

xml.sp: Kairi This time...I'LL fight. You know Sora's completely hopeless without us! C'mon, Riku!

cutscene.desc: He watches as she runs into the fight, bashing Heartless with the blade. He readies his Keyblade and rushes in. Saïx watches from above. Something catches his eye. Maleficent and Pete enter on the opposite ledge

xml.sp: Saïx Well, well. Will the intrusions never end?

cutscene.desc: He chuckles and vanishes

xml.sp: Maleficent Why, Pete...this castle is perfect. Perhaps we should...acquire it.
Pete Well, the setup is...kinda nice, I guess, but...what about all the Heartless? This in-between world---it's way too close to the darkness! They ain't gonna listen to us here!
Maleficent Once again, you underestimate me.

cutscene.desc: The moon shines brightly in the sky as King Mickey runs through the castle, knocking out Heartless and Nobodies. He finds DiZ on the floor, surrounded by Nobodies, and takes them out. Mickey helps DiZ to stand. There is an odd-looking device next to him. DiZ reaches to his face and a long red sash falls to the floor

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise It's been too long, my friend.
Mickey Ansem the Wise. Why didn't you come to me before things got so bad?
Ansem the Wise Xemnas, the Organization's Superior, is the Nobody of Xehanort, my foremost apprentice. The burden was mine to bear.
Mickey Is that all?

cutscene.desc: Ansem turns to look at the moon

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise I won't deny there was more. I was...obsessed with thoughts of revenge. My apprentices stole everything precious to me---my research, and my pride.
Mickey I can't help you with revenge.
Ansem the Wise I know. Riku's told me a thousand times.
Mickey Where is he?
Ansem the Wise He must be with his friends by now. Riku was a great help to me. I found him wandering the darkness, after you and he lost track of each other.

Mickey Gosh, we didn't lose each other exactly. Riku left...well, 'cause Xehanort's Heartless was still inside his heart, troubling him. And he sure must've been suffering. But what I don't understand is why he looks like that now, when he's still Riku at heart...

Ansem the Wise I am to blame. When I met Riku the first time he still had the appearance of a boy. Probably because he had such a strong heart. I asked him to find a young man named Roxas from Organization XIII, and bring him to me. When I told him it would help Sora awaken from his slumber, Riku left without a word. He fought Roxas. And I can only surmise Riku lost that fight. Riku must have realized then to fight in the realm of darkness, he would have to immerse himself in that same darkness. And when he did...you saw what became of him. When Riku brought Roxas back to me, he was introducing himself...as Ansem. If that was what it took to awaken his friend, he was ready to live in darkness. Riku was the victim of my revenge. ...Oh, how my heart ached. I could only laugh to hide my shame.

Mickey I guess it musta been after that when I saw Riku again. He said he wanted to help Sora...but he made me promise--- Promise that Sora wouldn't ever find out about what happened to him while he was out in the darkness.
Ansem the Wise My friend, the time has come. I must make amends to these young people.

cutscene.desc: He picks up the strange device, and he and Mickey walk inside

xml.sp: Sora pushing the Shadows off of him Get off!

cutscene.desc: He looks up at Kairi and Ansem fighting off the Heartless

xml.sp: Sora What's going on!?

cutscene.desc: Above, a katar takes aim and shoots. The shard lands on the battleground near Sora. He looks up and sees a myriad of projectiles, which obliterate the Heartless

xml.sp: Xigbar Have you been a good boy?
Sora Show yourself!

cutscene.desc: Xigbar appears on the elaborate ledge

xml.sp: Xigbar Oh, it sounds like you haven't. Sora! Roxas!
Sora Roxas? Hey, did he just call me Roxas?

cutscene.desc: Donald nods

xml.sp: Xigbar You've really put Organization XIII in a pickle. I guess that must be why the Keyblade chose you. But MAN, did it pick a dud this time. You don't look like you're half the hero the others were.
Sora Are you done rambling?
Xigbar Rambling? As if! All I'm trying to tell you, traitor, is that your time is up!

cutscene.desc: He throws each of his hands up and his shooing katars appear. He throws them to his sides and cocks them

xml.sp: Goofy Here he comes!

cutscene.desc: Xigbar jumps down to the floor where they stand and smirks

xml.sp: Xigbar You really shouldn't have betrayed us.

cutscene.desc: He spins his katars around and locks them together. He teleports up to the ledge

xml.sp: Xigbar Gotcha now!

cutscene.desc: He aims at Sora and fires. Sora warps to each of the projectiles he shoots and knocks them back

xml.sp: Xigbar Clever little sneak!

cutscene.desc: Xigbar teleports back down to the group. Sora fights him until he can no longer hold up his katar. It clatters to the floor

xml.sp: Xigbar I lost? Me?
Sora Why did you call me Roxas?

cutscene.desc: Xigbar looks up at him

xml.sp: Xigbar Wouldn't you like to know...

cutscene.desc: He begins to fade away

xml.sp: Sora Hey! Hold on!
Donald Sora! It's Kairi!

cutscene.desc: Mickey and Ansem the Wise arrive and look over the ledge at Kairi and Ansem fighting the Heartless

xml.sp: Mickey Uh-oh, they need our help.
Ansem the Wise Sora and Riku are together. We have no part to play here.
Mickey Gee, I wonder if Riku will ever change back...
Ansem the Wise Riku chose that form so he could use the power of darkness. It won't be easy.

cutscene.desc: The two kings leave the Hall of Empty Melodies

xml.sp: Sora Kairi, we're on our way!

cutscene.desc: They pass through Naught's Skyway and enter the upper tier of the Hall of Empty Melodies. Millions of hearts float and merge with the heart-shaped moon. Xemnas watches

xml.sp: Xemnas Yes...Kingdom Hearts... Rejoice, and feast on these hearts we offer! Shine your pale light on this empty realm... Share your power with all Nobodies!

cutscene.desc: He lifts his arms to the moon and Saïx appears

xml.sp: Saïx Xemnas. Is Kingdom Hearts ready?
Xemnas Very soon.
Saïx Then, I can end this charade?
Xemnas Indeed.
Saïx smiling How I've waited to hear that.

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy find Kairi and Ansem

xml.sp: Donald Kairi, you were great!
Kairi Oh?

cutscene.desc: She turns around and sees them, bashfully flipping her hair. Sora walks up to her

xml.sp: Sora You are different, Kairi, but I'm just glad you're here!
Kairi You and Riku never came home, so I came looking for you.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks away from her

xml.sp: Sora I'm sorry.

cutscene.desc: Kairi rushes up and hugs him, much to Sora's surprise

xml.sp: Kairi This is real...

cutscene.desc: He hugs her back. A portal appears behind Ansem, and he begins to walk into it

xml.sp: Sora Wait, Ansem! I mean, Xehanort's Heartless...

cutscene.desc: He stops and the portal vanishes

xml.sp: Sora I never thought for a second that I'd ever see YOU again. Just thinking about all the things you did makes me really mad. But... But you saved Kairi, right? I have to be grateful for that... Thanks.

cutscene.desc: Ansem starts to leave, but Kairi runs over and stops him

xml.sp: Kairi Riku, don't go!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Donald, and Goofy are surprised

xml.sp: Donald & Goofy Huh?
Sora Kairi, what did you just say?
Kairi Riku.
Ansem I'm no one---just a castaway from the darkness.
Kairi Sora, come here. Say something to him.

cutscene.desc: Sora walks over. Kairi takes his hand

xml.sp: Kairi Here. You'll understand.

cutscene.desc: She places his hands together with hers

xml.sp: Kairi Close your eyes.

cutscene.desc: Sora does so, as Ansem looks at him. Sora sees Riku in a black cloak. He is holding the hands of Sora and Kairi. Sora opens his eyes and realizes

xml.sp: Sora Riku... It's Riku. Riku's here...

cutscene.desc: Sora falls to his knees, holding Ansem's hand, tears rolling down his face

xml.sp: Sora I looked for you!
Riku C'mon, Sora. You've got to pull it together.
Sora I looked everywhere for you!
Riku I didn't want you to find me.
Goofy But it was him that was helpin' us, wasn't it?
Donald Huh?
Goofy Those clues we kept finding. That musta been Riku.
Riku I was starting to worry you guys weren't ever gonna catch on. Sora never did pick the brightest friends.
Donald What do you mean by that!?
Sora Why didn't you let me know you were okay?
Riku I told you. I didn't want to be found. Not like this...

cutscene.desc: He looks at himself

xml.sp: Riku I couldn't. I fought with Ansem. With...Xehanort's Heartless---when it invaded my heart, and I won. But to use the power of darkness, I had to become Ansem myself.
Kairi Does that mean...you can't change back?
Riku This battle isn't over. And until it is, I still need the power of darkness.
Sora Then...let's finish it. You're still Riku, no matter what!

cutscene.desc: Donald, Goofy, and Kairi nod

xml.sp: Sora to Donald & Goofy So how 'bout it Think we can handle one last rumble together? The King's waiting!
Donald Yeah! Let's get going!

cutscene.desc: Ansem the Wise and Mickey find the closest ledge to Kingdom Hearts

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise This spot should do.

cutscene.desc: Ansem sets the device down

xml.sp: Mickey What's this gadget for?
Ansem the Wise It's a device to reclaim Kingdom Hearts and encode it as data.
Mickey Not sure I get it.
Ansem the Wise I do not claim to know the outcome of this venture, either. After all...Hearts are unpredictable.

cutscene.desc: He starts up the device, which shoots a steady beam at the moon. Sora, Donald, Goofy, Kairi, and Riku enter the Proof of Existence. The room feels like a graveyard, and all but three of the gravestones are damaged. They enter one of them and end up in Havoc's Divide. They look up to Kingdom Hearts and see a beam connected to it

xml.sp: Sora What's that?
Riku It's the King and DiZ---I mean, Ansem the Wise. They must be higher up. We better hurry.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods. They start to leave, but Luxord appears, separating Sora from the rest of the group. He snaps his fingers and large cards rise and cover Donald, Goofy, Riku, and Kairi. The cards spin around them. Luxord snaps his fingers again, and the cards fly away, with Sora's friends missing

xml.sp: Sora You!
Luxord I'd rather we just skip the formalities. The first to run out of time is the loser.

cutscene.desc: Sora fights a time battle with Luxord

xml.sp: Luxord You play the game quite well.

cutscene.desc: Sora slashes his Keyblade and runs at Luxord for a final blow. Luxord surrounds himself with cards. Sora slashes right through the cards, slicing them in half, and striking Luxord

xml.sp: Luxord How could you...Roxas...
Sora That's SORA!

cutscene.desc: Luxord fades away. The cards fly back in and return his friends

xml.sp: Kairi You okay?
Sora Yeah! No worries. Let's keep moving.

cutscene.desc: They return to the Proof of Existence

xml.sp: Riku I can sense Saïx. He's using something to boost his power. If we can figure out his power source, we may be able to use it, too.

cutscene.desc: They enter Addled Impasse and find Saïx looking up through a large window at Kingdom Hearts. He smiles at them when they enter

xml.sp: Saïx Only you could have made it this far in one piece...Roxas.

cutscene.desc: There is a claymore in his hand

xml.sp: Sora That's getting really old!

cutscene.desc: Donald and Goofy stand in front of him

xml.sp: Donald Yeah! He's Sora!

cutscene.desc: Saïx's claymore becomes super-sharp

xml.sp: Saïx Different name, same fate.

cutscene.desc: He thrusts the claymore forward and a wave of vibration shoots forward toward them. Riku runs to cover Kairi, and it send them sliding forward. A barrier forms and they are blocked out. They can only watch at Sora, Donald, and Goofy fight Saïx

xml.sp: Saïx Do you feel it, the moon's power? Moon, shine down!

cutscene.desc: After an intense battle, Saïx falls

xml.sp: Saïx A heart... if I had a heart...

cutscene.desc: He drops his claymore, which crashes to the floor, and turns toward the window, looking up at the moon

xml.sp: Saïx Why... Kingdom Hearts... Where is my heart?

cutscene.desc: He reaches out to it as he fades away

xml.sp: Sora I don't get it. Why's everybody been calling me Roxas?
Riku Because, Sora. Roxas is your Nobody.
Sora My...Nobody? But that's crazy, I never turned into a Heart...... Oh, right.
Kairi It was when you came to rescue me, remember?

Riku Xemnas was the one who found Roxas. He could use the Keyblade because he was your Nobody. That's why Xemnas brought him into the Organization--- But Roxas betrayed them. After that I fought him because I thought it would help you wake up. I lost, but the next time we met I made sure I was the stronger one.

cutscene.desc: The scene flashes back to the fight. Riku, blindfolded, stands up and walks toward Roxas. He lifts the Oblivion Keyblade and strikes it into the ground next to Roxas. The scene is silent for a moment before Roxas starts to move, startling him. Roxas struggles, grabbing the Keyblade and pulling it out of the ground, slashing at Riku with lightning speed. He leaps away. Roxas gets up and runs toward him with the Keyblade. Riku sends a Dark Firaga spell at Roxas, who blasts through it and continues his attack. He dodges again

xml.sp: Roxas Why don't you quit?
Riku Come on, Sora. I thought you were stronger than that.

cutscene.desc: Roxas looks surprised

xml.sp: Roxas Huh? Get real! Look which one of us is winning.

cutscene.desc: He places a hand near his mouth with an incredulous look

xml.sp: Riku So it's true. You really are his Nobody. Guess DiZ was right after all. Roxas What are you talking about? I am me! Nobody else!

cutscene.desc: Roxas throws his hand up and the Oathkeeper flashes into it. He rushes Riku and jumps into the air. Riku dodges again. Roxas swings around and slashes the Keyblade across his arm. Riku flew from Roxas's blow as he slumps, kneeling, to the ground

xml.sp: Roxas How many times do I have to beat you?
Riku All right. You've left me with no other choice.
Roxas What?
Riku I have to release the power in my heart--

cutscene.desc: He stands up

xml.sp: Riku The dark power that I've been holding back.

cutscene.desc: He takes off his blindfold and lets it fall to the ground

xml.sp: Riku Even...if it changes me forever.

cutscene.desc: He braces himself and cries out, being lifted into the air. Wind flies around his face as dark energy envelopes him. Roxas readies his Keyblades again. The smoke dissipates, revealing Ansem and his Heartless Guardian suspended in midair. Ansem is garbed in the same black cloak. He vanishes suddenly, surprising Roxas. Ansem reappears just a foot away. The Guardian's large muscular arm reaches out and grabs him by the chest. Fear laces the boy's face and he struggles to free himself as the arm lifts him into the air. His legs hang aimlessly and his movement is futile. He drops his Keyblades and they disappear after clanging to the ground. Roxas stops moving

xml.sp: Ansem I have accepted it.

cutscene.desc: Later, Ansem stands over the motionless body of Roxas, staring at him. A dark portal appears and he quickly hoods himself as DiZ enters. DiZ looks down at Roxas

xml.sp: Ansem He could feel Sora.
DiZ Oh, he told you how he felt, did he? Ridiculous. A Nobody cannot feel anything.
Ansem If he had met Sora, things might have been different.

cutscene.desc: The flashback ends

xml.sp: Riku Maybe I didn't need to fight him after all. I think he left the Organization because...he really wanted to meet you.
Sora Roxas...I wish I could meet him, too.

cutscene.desc: Riku walks closer to Sora and points to his heart. Sora points also and looks at Riku, who nods

xml.sp: Riku All right. Let's go.

cutscene.desc: They follow him back to the Proof of Existence, and notice that the path ahead is open. They walk up the stairs to Naught's Approach. The beam from Ansem's device is starting to weaken, and it shakes in his hands

xml.sp: Mickey Ansem?

cutscene.desc: Ansem laughs

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise I'm a fool. I've spent years studying the workings of the heart. Yet it seems I still haven't learned a thing!
Mickey What d'ya mean?

Ansem the Wise The process of encoding hearts is incalculable. The inhabitants of my Twilight Town were data created from real hearts. I was convinced that they would think and behave the way I had envisioned---but I couldn't have been more wrong. A heart is so much more than any system. I saw it when Roxas and Kairi crossed paths. I knew. But I was too stubborn to accept it. It's always the same. I try to wrap my mind around things my heart already knows, only to fail. While I was trying to bring Sora back, I had so many plans in store. But once Sora was an acting force, they fell apart. All my research amounted to nothing, compared with that one boy's heart.

cutscene.desc: The device starts to short

xml.sp: Mickey Ansem! The machine!
Ansem the Wise All the more proof that hearts cannot be contained by data. Run, my friend! It's going to self-destruct, and anything could happen!
Mickey But...
Sora Your Majesty!

cutscene.desc: Sora's group runs to them

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise Sora, the rest is up to you... And Roxas--- I doubt you can hear me---but...I am sorry.
Mickey Ansem!
Ansem the Wise My heart is telling me what I must do. Please allow me to do what it says!
Mickey No!

cutscene.desc: Riku grabs the King's arm

xml.sp: Mickey Riku!
Riku His heart's decided. We can't change that.

cutscene.desc: Xemnas appears

xml.sp: Xemnas I was wondering who would dare interfere with my Kingdom Hearts. And look---here you all are. How convenient for me. Ansem the Wise... You look pathetic.
Ansem the Wise Have your laugh. I deserve as much for failing to see you for the fool you are.

Xemnas Students do take after their teachers. Only a fool would be your apprentice. After all, none of this would have happened without you. YOU are the source of all Heartless. It was your research that inspired me to go further than you ever dared.

Ansem the Wise I admit...my disregard brought chaos to more worlds than one. But what were YOU seeking? You erased me from the world, only to take my name and continue research better left forgotten... Is this the answer you've been looking for?

Xemnas All that and more. I'm carrying on what you yourself began, and I'm creating a brand new world, one heart at a time. I thought you'd praise me, but all you ever do is hold me back. I understand, though. Unlike me, you have a heart. And you're powerless to control it. Consumed, by the jealousy you feel toward the student who surpassed you.

Ansem the Wise Xehanort. Foolish apprentice of a foolish man. You have surpassed nothing---only proved how little we both know. We may profess to know the heart, but its essence is beyond our reach. We're both ignorant---as oblivious as when we began. I'm afraid that any world you try to create... Any world of yours...would be an empire of ignorance. That is why you and your creation are destined to fall!

cutscene.desc: Electricity surges through and around the device

xml.sp: Ansem the Wise We've said enough! Riku, you know what to do! King Mickey, my friend, forgive me! Farewell!

cutscene.desc: The machine sparks and explodes. Sora tries to run for Ansem, but is stopped by Riku. Kairi holds on to Mickey. Donald trips as he tries to run in front of Goofy. Light flashes and pushes them backwards in a giant swirling tunnel. Millions of hearts fall around the Castle That Never Was. Nobodies dance in the streets. The hearts disappear and Heartless arrive. A heart for every Heartless. A gigantic horde race up the ramp toward the castle. The group wakes up on the floor. Sora sees Riku and his flowing silver hair. He is blindfolded

xml.sp: Sora Riku?

cutscene.desc: Riku gets himself up

xml.sp: Sora Riku!
Donald & Goofy Wow!
Kairi Riku!
Mickey Ansem did say anything could happen...

cutscene.desc: Riku looks ahead

xml.sp: Sora Riku, you gonna take that off?
Riku Oh...

cutscene.desc: Riku grabs his blindfold and pulls it from his face. His eyes are finally opened

xml.sp: Sora What was that?
Mickey His eyes couldn't lie.
Sora Lie? And just who were you trying to fool? Huh? Huhhh?
Riku Myself.
Sora Riku... C'mon, man! Why did you try to do so much on your own?

cutscene.desc: Sora runs to Donald, Goofy, Mickey, and Kairi

xml.sp: Sora You got friends...like us!

cutscene.desc: Riku looks at each of them in turn

xml.sp: Riku Have you forgotten? I'll tell you why. 'Cause I'm not a total sap like you.

cutscene.desc: He smirks

xml.sp: Sora Say that again!

cutscene.desc: Tons of hearts are flying to Kingdom Hearts, which has taken on a darker look, as if infected. They look down below and see millions of Heartless storming the castle

xml.sp: Donald Uhhhh-oh!
Sora What should we do, Riku?
Riku We must defeat Xemnas. He's the Organization's last survivor.
Sora Right!

cutscene.desc: Riku whips off his cloak

xml.sp: Riku C'mon!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods and they continue. The cloak flies through the air. They enter Ruin and Creation's Passage and battle through the floating platforms. They start to run to the next area

xml.sp: Kairi Sora! Riku!

cutscene.desc: Kairi points up at the oddly shaped windows where Heartless are literally pouring inside. They crawl up the hexagonal pathways between the platforms

xml.sp: Riku There's gonna be no end to this.
Sora Together we can stop 'em!

cutscene.desc: Maleficent and Pete appear in front of them

xml.sp: Maleficent Be gone from here! Leave these creatures to us!
Pete But there's no way we can take 'em all!
Maleficent I will be sending them after Xemnas. Or, perhaps, you would rather fight them yourself?

cutscene.desc: Pete thinks about it

xml.sp: Pete Frankly my dear, I'd rather...RUN!
Maleficent Off with you then!

cutscene.desc: Pete backs away until he notices Mickey

xml.sp: Pete Well, if it ain't the boat-boy King.
Mickey Time to weigh anchor, Captain Pete!
Pete What, like abandon ship? I don't think so!
Maleficent Sora! Your Majesty! Do not forget---when I've destroyed them all, this castle shall be mine!
Pete Now lookie here. Opportunities like this don't come along every day, ya know.

cutscene.desc: Pete rejoins Maleficent

xml.sp: Pete Bring 'em on!

cutscene.desc: They rush into the brawl

xml.sp: Mickey We gotta hurry.
Sora But...
Mickey They're doing what their hearts command. We can't interfere.

cutscene.desc: The group continues into The Altar of Naught, and find Xemnas raising his arms to the moon

xml.sp: Xemnas Ohh...my Kingdom Hearts...ruined. Now I'll have to start all over again. Warriors of the Keyblade!

cutscene.desc: He turns around and faces them

xml.sp: Xemnas Go forth, and bring me more hearts!
Mickey, Sora, & Riku No!

cutscene.desc: They each point at him with their appearing Keyblades

xml.sp: Xemnas Denizens of light, answer this Why do you hate the darkness?

Mickey Aw, we don't hate it. It's just kinda...scary. But the world's made of light AND darkness. You can't have one without the other, 'cause darkness is half of everything. Sorta makes ya wonder why we are scared of the dark.
Riku It's because of who's lurking inside it.

Xemnas Then allow me another question. You accept darkness, yet choose to live in the light. So why is it that you loathe us who teeter on the edge of nothing? We who were turned away by both light and dark---never given a choice?
Riku That's simple. It's because you mess up our worlds.
Xemnas That may be... However, what other choice might we have had?
Sora Just give it a rest! You're Nobodies! You don't even exist! You're not sad about anything!
Xemnas chuckling Very good. You don't miss a thing. I cannot feel---sorrow... No matter what misery befalls the worlds. No matter what you think, what you feel, or how you exist.

cutscene.desc: He throws his arms up and energy surrounds them. It takes Sora to Memory's Skyscraper, but the landscape is completely warped and the environment is nonexistent, like a waving flag in the background

xml.sp: Sora Guys!

cutscene.desc: He looks around, but his friends are nowhere to be found. Xemnas stands before him. He vanishes and a barrier forms around Sora, sapping his energy. He runs to the skyscraper, where Xemnas is standing on top. Sora looks up, and the barrier disappears. Xemnas's hands coarse with blue lightning. Sora jumps to the top of the entrance and runs up the building. Xemnas jumps up, flips downward, and conjures two red beam swords. He flies down the tower and meets Sora on the giant video screen. Sora slams Xemnas into the building, stunning him and they both fall to the ground. At the end of the battle, it is still raining.

xml.sp: Xemnas So... it wasn't a fallacy...

cutscene.desc: Xemnas is laying on the ground away from Sora. Xemnas fades away

xml.sp: Kairi Sora! Where are you?
Riku Sora, answer me!

cutscene.desc: The area vanishes and Sora falls back at the Altar of Naught with a flash of light

xml.sp: Mickey You're okay!
Sora Where's Xemnas?

cutscene.desc: Donald looks around and sees Xemnas inside the moon

xml.sp: Donald What!?

Xemnas Hear me, Kingdom Hearts! It seems we must begin anew. Ah, but know this I will give to you as many hearts as it takes. Mark my words! You can no more be complete without me than I without you. Heed me, Kingdom Hearts! Lend me your power, so that we may be complete! The power to erase the fools that hinder us.
Mickey Xemnas! No!
Xemnas Hearts quivering with hatred...
Sora Xemnas! Don't!
Xemnas Hearts burning with rage...
Donald You'll never win!
Xemnas Hearts scarred by envy... That fool Ansem said the heart's true nature was beyond his understanding. But it's not beyond mine! Hearts are the source of all power!

cutscene.desc: The moon glows insanely bright and Xemnas disappears

xml.sp: Sora Xemnas! You can't hide from us!
Mickey We're not gonna let him get away now!
Kairi Look at that!

cutscene.desc: A door appears

xml.sp: Goofy What's goin' on?
Mickey Kingdom Hearts...
Riku Let's go. Xemnas must be inside.
Mickey The worlds gave us this doorway. They want us to be the guardians of their destiny!

cutscene.desc: Sora nods

xml.sp: Riku Once we go through, there's no turning back. It's victory...or oblivion. So, Sora...are you ready? Do you remember before? We stood facing each other on opposite sides of that door. Now we stand side-by-side. Let's go home together this time.
Voice Beyond this door is the beginning of the end of your journey. Are you prepared for what lies ahead?
Sora Let's end this!

cutscene.desc: Sora, Mickey, and Riku touch each other's Keyblades together and hold them up. Beams shoot from their blades and the door opens

xml.sp: Sora Get ready, Xemnas! It all ends here!

cutscene.desc: All six of them enter the door and see almost an entire world inside. Sora gasps as he sees Xemnas in the center of it all

xml.sp: Xemnas So...it seems your hearts have led you to obliteration. Perhaps it doesn't pay to be too loyal to one's heart. I will have to be sure and remember that.

cutscene.desc: He sends a building after them. They run back and the building collapses on the ground. The door starts to close with Mickey and Kairi on the other side

xml.sp: Riku reaching for them No!

cutscene.desc: He is too late and the door closes

xml.sp: Sora We can take him on our own!

cutscene.desc: Several windowed walls punch up from the floor blocking them from continuing. Sora slices through them with his Keyblade and they run further inside. Xemnas's gigantic mecha flies into the sky and slams back down onto the ground. The platform they're standing on rises up to the mecha's level. Several buildings fly through the air toward them. Sora jumps up and breaks some of them apart with the Keyblade. He runs across the top of them and slices through. The last one sends them into the cylinder of the flying mecha. Nobodies appear, which they send into the core of the cylinder. They jump onto the side pipes, dodging the large wave of energy which erupts from the cylinder. They jump to the other cylinder and slide across the grate. More enemies appear and are knocked into the other cylinder, which also erupts into a surge of energy. They dodge and reach the other cylinder in time. They dodge the explosion and the cylinder drops off the mecha. As the second cylinder is destroyed, the group jump up to the energy core and attack it, stopping it. They come face to face with Xemnas, sitting like a king, armored on his throne. He has many weapons in his arsenal

xml.sp: Xemnas Cursed fools!

cutscene.desc: At the end of the battle, combined of katars, naginata, and magical cards, Xemnas screams in agony. They all appear back at the Altar of Naught. Xemnas falls to his knees, clutching his chest

xml.sp: Xemnas I need...more rage.. I need more...hearts...
Sora Xemnas. There's more to a heart than just anger or hate. It's full of all kinds of feelings. Don't you remember?
Xemnas Unfortunately...I don't.

cutscene.desc: Xemnas fades away. They celebrate at his defeat

xml.sp: Mickey Gosh, you all did great!
Sora to Riku You're coming back with us, right?
Riku I had given in to the darkness.
Sora Riku!
Riku How'm I gonna face everyone?
Sora Like this!

cutscene.desc: Sora squishes his face in and makes Riku laugh. The building shakes

xml.sp: Mickey Hurry!
Riku I'll open a path!

cutscene.desc: He holds out a hand and nothing happens

xml.sp: Mickey You don't belong in the dark realm anymore, Riku.
Donald How do we get out of here, Your Majesty?

cutscene.desc: They turn around and see an image of Naminé. She opens a portal. Mickey and Donald run right through her to the portal

xml.sp: Donald Who did this?
Mickey Well, I'm not sure. But we'd better hurry and get through.

cutscene.desc: Pluto barks in, runs around Mickey and Donald, and into the portal

xml.sp: Goofy Wait for me!

cutscene.desc: Goofy runs into the portal followed by Mickey

xml.sp: Donald C'mon!

cutscene.desc: Donald enters and Naminé appears

xml.sp: Kairi Thank you, Naminé.
Naminé Sure. See? We meet again, like we promised.
Sora Huh?
Roxas You said we'd meet again, but when we did, we might not recognize each other.

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks out of Sora

xml.sp: Naminé I did, didn't I?
Roxas But I knew you.
Naminé Mmm...it's strange.
Roxas I think I understand. I see myself the way you remember me. And you see yourself the way I remember you.
Naminé I always though Nobodies were doomed to fade back into darkness...
Roxas Yeah, but you and I didn't. We got to meet our original selves.
Naminé So, we can be together again!

cutscene.desc: Roxas walks to the side of her

xml.sp: Roxas Right. Anytime Sora and Kairi are together.
Kairi We'll be together every day. Right, Sora?
Sora Uh...yeah!

cutscene.desc: Kairi takes Naminé's hand, and they both glow. Naminé is transferred into Kairi

xml.sp: Roxas to Sora Look sharp!
