cutscene.desc: Roxas closes his eyes, and fades away. Sora glows, having taken Roxas back into himself

xml.sp: Sora checking himself Huh?
Riku Don't worry. You're all still you.
Kairi standing next to the portal Hey, let's go home!
Sora Riku... C'mon.
Riku Yeah.

cutscene.desc: Kairi walks inside the portal and it starts to close. Sora and Riku run to it, as Kairi turns back

xml.sp: Kairi Sora! Riku!

cutscene.desc: She reaches for them but the portal closes and dissipates

xml.sp: Sora What?

cutscene.desc: There's a flash of light and the two see a nesting core. The giant flying mecha bursts out of the core and flies toward them. It knocks into the castle tower and roars. The tower breaks and starts to collapse. Sora and Riku slide toward the ground. Riku sees a hovercraft and runs toward it

xml.sp: Sora Riku!

cutscene.desc: Riku jumps off the falling tower and onto the hovercraft. He flies it up to the tower

xml.sp: Riku Sora!

cutscene.desc: Sora jumps on and the mecha flies up alongside them. They attack several parts of the mecha with lasers from the hovercraft. They watch as it crashes to the ground. Energy swirls around it and the area is filled with smoke. The smoke clears to show a larger mecha equipped with even more guns. Xemnas, in his kingly armor sits at the head. Sora and Riku fly to the head of the mecha and jump off. The hovercraft is lost in the huge swirling abyss. They ready their Keyblades

xml.sp: Sora Hey, Riku?
Riku Yeah?
Sora I wanted to thank Naminé, but I couldn't bring myself to say it. Not until everything was back to the way it was before.
Riku Don't worry. We'll make that happen. Once this is over, you can thank her all you want.
Sora Yeah!

cutscene.desc: The armored Xemnas lifts his head. They start to fight him, when he shoots them into the abyss

xml.sp: Xemnas Nothingness is eternal! Riku...are you sure you're not jealous of Sora?

cutscene.desc: Sora glides to a discarded building and smashes it with his Keyblade. Riku rides the building as it crashes into the mecha. He slams his Keyblade into it and splits the building in half, breaking the mecha's shield. Xemnas shouts

xml.sp: Xemnas Embrace nothing! Hearts are power!

cutscene.desc: Sora and Riku glide back to the head of the mecha and start beating up Xemnas again. At the final strike, there is a flash of light and Sora and Riku appear in a gray area. Xemnas stands before him in a black and white outfit

xml.sp: Xemnas Heroes from the realm of light... I will not allow it to end this way---not yet. If light and darkness are eternal, then surely we nothings must be the same... Eternal!
Riku You're right, light and darkness are eternal. Nothing probably goes on forever, too. But guess what, Xemnas?
Sora That doesn't mean YOU'RE eternal!
Xemnas chuckling No more eternal than that radiance of yours...

cutscene.desc: Xemnas's hands spark with blue energy

xml.sp: Xemnas Anger and hate are supreme.

cutscene.desc: They attack Xemnas, dodging his thorned vines and red lasers. Xemnas blocks Sora in a sphere of blue energy.

xml.sp: Xemnas Can you spare...a heart?

cutscene.desc: (Riku jumps up to stop it, but is hit by the energy and knocked away

xml.sp: Riku Sora!

cutscene.desc: Xemnas sends out an image of himself against Riku, while he continues to hold Sora

xml.sp: Xemnas Guard!

cutscene.desc: Riku blasts through the clone and keeps running. When he reaches Sora and Xemnas, he punches in and grabs Xemnas's hand. The barrier blocking Sora vanishes and he falls to the ground. Riku takes the hilt of his blade and smacks Xemnas in the face. He grabs Xemnas horizontally and spins him around, throwing him

xml.sp: Riku Is that all you got?
Xemnas There is no such thing as light!

cutscene.desc: Xemnas forms two spheres of energy in each hand and melds them together. He lifts them over his head and black thorns pierce outwards. Everything around them turns black

xml.sp: Riku Sora!

cutscene.desc: In the darkness, a thousand points of light appear. Xemnas laughs as he sends each of those thousand lasers directly at Sora and Riku. They deflect them with spinning Keyblades. There's a flash of light and Sora and Riku are staring down Xemnas. Xemnas knocks Riku back

xml.sp: Sora Riku!

cutscene.desc: Xemnas holds a beam sword to Sora's head. Riku looks up. Xemnas swings his arms back to hit Sora, but Riku gets up in a flash and blocks with his Keyblade. Xemnas swings around. Riku pushes Sora out of the way and gets a strong hit with the beam sword in his left side. Riku falls. Sora catches himself and leaps forward. He grabs Riku's Keyblade and slams it into Xemnas's chest. Sora smashes Xemnas with his and Riku's blades, spinning him back. Sora crosses the Keyblades and knocks Xemnas high into the air. They both spin around and Sora lands next to Riku

xml.sp: Sora Riku!

cutscene.desc: Riku nods and takes Sora's Keyblade and hand. They both send a beam through Xemnas

xml.sp: Xemnas Cursed...Keyblade...

cutscene.desc: Xemnas angrily reaches out to them as he fades away in wisps and smoke.

xml.sp: Sora We did it!
Riku as Nobodies appear I wouldn't be too sure of that.

cutscene.desc: (They ready themselves for the battle. The hundreds of Nobodies are eventually defeated. Riku falls to his knees

xml.sp: Riku Sora... I can't...
Sora Don't say another word! It's not over. It's just not.

cutscene.desc: Sora puts Riku's arm over his shoulder and helps him up

xml.sp: Riku How can you say that? Even if we could go on...look where we are.
Sora Aw, c'mon, Riku. You've been hanging out in darkness too long. You gotta try and think positive!
Riku Sora?
Sora Hm?
Riku You lead.
Sora Got it.

cutscene.desc: They start walking, anywhere, just walking

xml.sp: Riku You know... I always figured I was better at stuff than you.
Sora Really?
Riku Are you mad?
Sora No. I kinda always thought you were better at everything, too.

cutscene.desc: Sora looks ahead

xml.sp: Sora Riku---look. What's that light?

cutscene.desc: They walk into the light and end up on a dark beach

xml.sp: Riku End of the road?
Sora Yep.
Riku Put me down. I can walk.

cutscene.desc: Sora helps him stand and walks to the water

xml.sp: Sora You know...maybe the darkness has gotten to me, too.

cutscene.desc: He turns around and sees Riku lying on the ground

xml.sp: Sora running back Riku!
Riku kneeling This world is perfect for me. If this is what the world really is...just this, then maybe I should fade back into darkness.
Sora Riku...
Riku If the world is made of light and darkness... We'll be the darkness.
Sora Yeah. The other side...the realm of light is safe now. Kairi, the King, and the others are there.
Riku That's what I mean. Hey, Sora... Could you help me? I want to get down to the water.

cutscene.desc: Sora nods and helps Riku up

xml.sp: Riku as they walk to the water At least the waves sound the same.

cutscene.desc: They sit on the waterside for a time

xml.sp: Riku What I said back there...about thinking I was better at stuff than you... To tell you the truth, Sora... I was jealous of you.
Sora What for?
Riku I wished I could live life the way you do. Just following my heart.
Sora Yeah, well, I've got my share of problems, too.
Riku Like what?
Sora Like...wanting to be like you.
Riku Well, there is one advantage to being me... Something you could never imitate.
Sora Really? What's that?
Riku Having you for a friend.
Sora Then I guess...I'm okay the way I am. I've got something you could never imitate too.

cutscene.desc: They look up at the starless sky and close their eyes, feeling the breeze on their skin and hearing the sound of the waves. A bottle washes up between Riku's legs and he picks it up and opens it. There is a note inside. He reads the letter

xml.sp: Riku Sora? I think it's for you.

cutscene.desc: He hands it to Sora, who reads it

xml.sp: Sora Thinking of you, wherever you are.
Sora & Kairi We pray for our sorrows to end, and hope that our hearts will blend. Now I will step forward to realize this wish.
Kairi And who knows Starting a new journey may not be so hard or maybe it has already begun. There are many worlds, but they share the same sky---one sky, one destiny.

cutscene.desc: A light appears over the water before Sora and Riku

xml.sp: Riku Light.
Sora The door to light...

cutscene.desc: He stands up and offers his hand to Riku

xml.sp: Sora We'll go together.
Riku Yeah.

cutscene.desc: They stands up and enter the light. The waves at the Destiny Islands are relatively calm as two falling stars grace the sky. Sora and Riku land in the water, and surface

xml.sp: Kairi Sora! Riku!

cutscene.desc: They look and see Kairi waving to them on the shore. Sora and Riku swim to shore. Mickey, Donald, and Goofy run past Kairi to the water, much to Sora's surprise. Goofy and Donald jump on Sora and knock him back into the water. Sora sits up as Goofy hugs him and Donald wipes his eye. Mickey runs to Riku, who picks him up and spins him around. Donald and Goofy hug Sora and look at Mickey and Riku. Kairi giggles, smiling. Sora takes out the Oathkeeper keychain. He looks up and takes the form of Roxas. Naminé smiles back at him

xml.sp: Sora W-We're back.
Kairi holding out her hand You're home.

cutscene.desc: Sora grabs her hand with his, both cupping the lucky charm. In the Disney Castle Throne Room, Daisy, Chip, Dale, and Minnie are greeted by Goofy, Pluto, Donald, Huey, Dewey, Louie, and Uncle Scrooge. Daisy runs to Donald and hugs him. Mickey and Minnie rub noses together. Hayner and Seifer face off in a new Struggle Tournament in the Sandlot in Twilight Town. Pooh and his friends march through Rabbit's garden in the Hundred Acre Wood. At night, they sit and watch the moon from Starry Hill. Ling, Yao, and Chien-Po peek out from the bushes to watch Mulan and Shang. As the two move in for the kiss, they fall out from behind the bushes. Mulan giggles and Mushu pops onto her shoulder. Belle walks into the ballroom for a dance with...the Prince. They swirl around the dance floor. Hercules, Meg, Phil, and Pegasus admire the newly restored Coliseum. Auron returns to the Farplane, scattering pyreflies. Hercules and Meg watch as the pyreflies dance around the Coliseum Gates. Will, Jack Sparrow, and Elizabeth are sailing on the Black Pearl. The moon comes out and Jack checks himself. He's still human. He kisses the treasure piece in his hand and turns the helm. The ship sails on. The Mayor and Jack Skellington are arranging a special Halloween in Dr. Finkelstein's lab in Halloween Town. In Space Paranoids, Tron receives a program on his Identity Disk and places it on his back. He checks to see if he feels any different and shrugs. He walks of out the Communications Room, feeling an urge to dance. Captain Pete fixes his hat on the bow of the steamboat. Mickey runs into the wharf and hurries onto the boat as it chugs down Timeless River. He waves as it leaves. Aladdin and Jasmine go for a magic carpet ride over Agrabah. Genie flies next to them. They fly off into the sky. Prince Eric and Ariel have a lovely wedding on a cruise ship. They wave to Ariel's friends and share a kiss. In the Pride Lands, Nala and Simba nuzzle each other until Rafiki walks through with a baby girl. He holds it up on the edge of Pride Rock to the ray of sunlight beaming down from the clouds. The Pride Lands are now lush and green. In the Radiant Garden, Cid is typing at his computer until Yuffie brings him a Sea-Salt Ice Cream bar. Yuna, Rikku, and Paine fly in and Rikku steals Yuffie's ice cream bar. She chases after the three fairies. Leon receives a letter and a magical image of a butterfly floats out. At the cliffs, Aerith looks to the sky. Sora walks into the Secret Place. The light shines down through the holes in the ceiling. He looks around at the cave drawings until coming to his old one of him giving a paopu fruit to Kairi. The picture is changed. Kairi has given one to him as well. Later, Sora meets Riku at the paopu tree overlooking the water

xml.sp: Riku Nothing's changed, huh?
Sora Nope. Nothing will.
Riku What a small world.
Sora But part of one that's much bigger.
Riku Yeah.
Sora Hey Riku...what do you it was---the door to the light?

cutscene.desc: Riku points to his heart

xml.sp: Riku This.
Sora This?
Riku Yeah. It's always closer than you think.

cutscene.desc: Sora smiles

xml.sp: Kairi Sora! Riku!

cutscene.desc: Kairi runs to them with a message in a bottle

xml.sp: Sora Hey, what's up?
Kairi Look.

cutscene.desc: She shows it to him, and they see King Mickey's seal on the letter

xml.sp: Sora From the King?

cutscene.desc: Sora takes it from her, dumps the message out, and they read it

In a dusty barren landscape, save a few plants, the Ansem Reports fly overhead. Words appear on the screen
The Keyblade is said to hold phenomenal power.
One legend says its wielder saved the world, while another says that he wrought chaos and ruin upon it.
I must know what this Keyblade is.
A key opens doors. -(Ansem Report 8

There seems to be destruction everywhere. An armored figure with a cape stands amidst the devastation. He holds a Keyblade over his shoulder. Two more people in armor approach. They walk to a middleground where Sora, Mickey, and Riku's Keyblades are stuck in the ground. The destruction behind them melts away like sand. The three each take a Keyblade. Surrounding them on all sides, creating a four-way path, is an uncountable number of Keyblades. Through the dust, they see another figure walking toward them. Words appear on the screen

Master of keyblade
The lost two
Memory of Xehanort
Chasers
Keyblade War
It all began with...
birth by sleep.)

An elderly man walks toward three armored figures standing at a crossroads between fields of fallen Keyblades. The wind blows through their capes as they stand, their Keyblades at the ready. The old man stares at them through piercing orange eyes as his form shimmers. A blurred copy of him phases out from his body, flashing into the form of a young man with a black helmet wearing a sinewy skintight suit. The youngest armored wielder moves to start running, but the older man holds him back and runs ahead. The old man and his enigmatic companion stop, and he raises his arm just as the young man leaps toward him. A pillar of earth slams upward into him, toppling him to the ground. He looks up as a taller pillar shoots up in front of him, carrying the old man and his companion. The younger one with the helmet leaps off the pillar, casting an electrical spell down to the armored man. Bolts of lightning strike the ground around him, creating cracks in the armor, as another pillar of earth arises behind him and the young man lands before him. The armored woman rushes ahead of him and he glances up at the old man for a moment, before running forward. The old man cackles, motioning with his hand and the clouds grow dimmer above him. A huge whirlwind erupts from the ground, sending Keyblades spiraling into the air. The armored boy fights the young man in the helmet, their Keyblades clashing against one another. The boy swipes downward, but the other dodges back, summoning an ice spell, which is countered by a second ice spell aimed at him. The armored woman looks up, seeing the whirlwind of Keyblades, which dips toward her. The helmeted one runs alongside it and leaps aboard, sending more ice spells toward the armored woman and armored boy. The dark helmet leaps off as the Keyblades knock the boy over, and he continues releasing ice spells. The boy attacks the helmeted one, who knocks him back as the woman summons a lightning spell. The dark helmet leaps off the ground as the lightning courses over the earth and lands back on the swirling mass of Keyblades, riding it up into the air, slamming the armored man over. The woman watches as the man tumbles over the cliff, righting himself before thrusting his Keyblade into the side to slow his descent. The Keyblades continue to destroy the landscape, knocking the cliff- side over, causing the man to dangle. The earth buckles under the woman as the Keyblades shoot out of the ground, sending her flying and dropping her Keyblade. The swirling mass of blades continues forward, striking the man and forcing him through the rock. As the woman hits the ground, the boy rushes over to her, her helmet knocked off, revealing her blue hair. She grabs her Keyblade and aims it upward, sending a spell towards the man. It reaches him, sparking a blue hexagonal barrier around him, sending the Keyblades scattering. Another torrent of blades slams into the barrier, sending it skyward near the old man, before it freezes in place, ripples coursing through it. The barrier explodes, but the old man stares unblinking. The woman catches her breath as the Keyblade mass topples, sending the man to the ground. He stands haphazardly, making his way toward the old man, who whirls around and blocks his attack with his own Keyblade. He sends an ice spell toward the man, which knocks him back and crawls up his arm. The boy strikes from behind, but the old man teleports, grabbing the boy from behind. The old man smirks as the boy struggles, helplessly flailing his arms as the old man starts to crush his helmet in front of the armored man. The man attempts to move forward, but is flung back by another torrent of Keyblades as the helmeted one rejoins the old man. The woman looks up, seeing the boy, as his helmet is torn off. He gazes back at her as his body is riddled with dark flames before being frozen in ice. The old man casually tosses the boy over the cliff, breaking his Keyblade as he tumbles down, his helmet finally cracking apart. The woman leaps under and catches him as he hits the ground. She gazes down at the frozen youth's blue eyes and blond hair. The old man's Keyblade becomes a blue and pink orb. He smiles and lifts it skyward, sending it into the clouds. The gray clouds begin parting as a blue light spills out of them. The woman watches from below as a large blue heart-shaped moon appears in the sky
Destiny is never left to chance

The armored man rips off his helmet, revealing his brown pointed hair and furious scowl. In the blink of an eye, his blue eyes turn yellow
KINGDOM HEARTS
Destiny is inevitable
From a far away cliff, Mickey Mouse stares at the scene before him
At long last destinies gather
